text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: Icantiri Petero : - - Te nonquemempiji , poametenaro oca pishiacantiri .

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: Icantiri : - - 多 Tequerampa ontime piotantari ?

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: 多 Tempa piote paitarica ayeari ojataque asheitoqui , impoiji ashitajero ? Tecatsi oncantero ashire .

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: Iro cantaincha pineanatantaro paitarica piquenqueshiretiri : terica oncameetsateji , eiro picameetsashiretitsi .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Tempa piojeitiro piquenqueshiretiro caari cameetsatatsi , poanti , paimentaro pijina , pantiro caari pai , picoshiti , pitseeya , picantimatiri pishaninca .

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: Irootaque caari picameetsajeitanta . Iro cantaincha terica pinquivacoteaji , tecatsi oncantero pishire .

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Irosati ijatantanacari Jesoshi Tiroqui aisati Shiroqui . Itentajeitanaquena maaroni iroamerepee .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Ojatashitaqueri cananasato , caari oni jorio . Ocantiri : - - Novincatsarite , tempa aviro ishanincani pincatsari Iravirini . Nocoaque pincavintsayena , aisati noshinto . Yataanaquero iroori camaari , catsiqueti yoanaquero .

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: Iro cantaincha imajeretanaque , te iranqueroji . Nocantajeivetari narori : - - Pincantajero ojatajeta , oshequi ashereajeitaquee .

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Icantiro : - - Itiancaquena Apa noncavintsayeri joriopee .

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Iro cantaincha opocashitiri , otiyeroashitacari , aiquero ocantatiiri : - - Novincatsarite , pincavintsayena .

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Icantiro : - - Te oncameetsateji aapitsateri atomi yoari ampanteariri otsiti . Te aviro jorio , 多 paita noncavintsaantempiri ?

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: Acanaqueri : - - Queario , novincatsarite , oca picantiri . Iro cantaincha , tempa yoaro otsiti iroaritsopequi yora ashitariri .

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Yacanaquero : - - Tsinane , cameetsa pishiretaquena . Aitaque nomataquempiro oca picoacotaquenarica . Irosati avisacotantanaja oshinto .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: Ari yovaanaja aisati Jesoshi , iquenanaque otsapijaqui incajare anta Carireaqui . Impoiji itoncaanaque toncaariqui , isavicapaaque . Noijajeitanaqueri narori , aisati iriori maaroni iroamerepee .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: Ijatashijeitaqueri oshequi atiripee , yaajeitanaqueneri oshequi mantsiayetatsiri : choritatsiri , caari shevatacha , caari amenatsi , caari neanatatsi , maaroni . Ari yoavisacojeitiri .

text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Ari yoajeitanaqueri cavaco maaroni neajeitaqueriri . Ineajeitajiri ineanataji caari neanaveitachani , ishevajeitanaja caari shevaveitachani , yaniiyetanaji caari aniiveitachani , yamenanaji caari amenaveitachani . Icantajeiti : - - Tempa icameetsataque Tasorentsi , yora pincatsariventajeitiriri maaroni joriopee .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
text2: Impoiji icajemajeitaquena Jesoshi , aisati iriori maaroni iroamerepee . Icantajeitaquena : - - Oshequi nocavintsaajeitaqueri maaroni yora apatotimentajeitanari . Ocarataque meeca mava quitaiteri icarajeitaquee : tecatsi meeca iroajeiteari . Oshequi aajeitaqueri itashe meeca . Ariorica nontiancavetajeari meeca , aitaque ajaajeitanaqueri itashe , eiro yaaveajatsi irareejeitajea ivancoqui .

text: And his disciples say unto him , Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness , as to fill so great a multitude ?
text2: Nocantajeitaqueri : - - Pamene , caaraiteitaque aca . 多 Jaoca ayerori tanta avacaajeiteariri ? Oshequi icarajeiti catsini .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven , and a few little fishes .
text2: Isampitaquena : - - 多 Jaoca ocaratiri tanta timatsiri ? Nacanaqueri : - - Ocarataque 7 , aisati timatsi shivajaniqui aparopee .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground .
text2: Ari icantajeitiri apatojeitainchari : - - Pisavicajeite quipatsiqui .

text: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes , and gave thanks , and brake them , and gave to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Irosati yaantacaro tanta aisati shivajaniqui . Icantiri iriri : - - Ariove apa , pipaquena noyeari . Impoiji icarajaquero , ipajeitaquenaro . Naajeitavaquero , impoiji novaajeitaqueneri iriori apatojeitainchari .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full .
text2: Yoajeitanaca , iquemajeitanaca . Impoiji napatojeitajiro timaarantapaajantsiri , nojaajiro cantiriqui ocarataji 7 .

text: And they that did eat were four thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Icarajeiti oajeitainchari 4 , 000 shirampari . Aisati oajeitainchari oshequi tsinane aisati jananequipee .

text: And he sent away the multitude , and took ship , and came into the coasts of Magdala ,
text2: Impoiji itiancajeitajiri Jesoshi : - - Meeca pijajeitanaje pivancopeequi . Irosati notejeitantanaja pitotsiqui , nomonteanaja anta Macataraqui .

text: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came , and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven .
text2: Impoiji ipocashitaqueri variseopee aisati saroseopee : icoajeivetaca irantacayerime Jesoshi caari cameetsatatsi ontimanteameri inquisantearimeri . Icantavetapaacari : - - Jentsite , namenempi pintasoncante , niotanteari piponeacarica inquitequi .

text: He answered and said unto them , When it is evening , ye say , It will be fair weather : for the sky is red .
text2: Yacanaqueri Jesoshi : - - Pamene , ariorica ishaavijiiteanaji , pineaquerorica opotsonaiteanaji , tempa picantajeiti : " Eiro oparii incani " .

text: And in the morning , It will be foul weather to day : for the sky is red and lowring . O ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky ; but can ye not discern the signs of the times ?
text2: Iro cantaincha , oquitaitetamani , pineamaneririca iquiteriteamaniro catsirincaiteri , aisati otsiteniiteamani , ari picantajeiti : " Ompariye meeca incani " . Piojeitaque jaoca ocanta inquite , pioti ompariaquerica incani . Iro cantaincha te piojeiteroji maaroni pineaqueri meeca quipatsiqui .

text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given unto it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas . And he left them , and departed .
text2: Te pincameetsajeiteji , oshequi pitseencajeitaqueri Tasorentsi : picoajeiveta pineena nontasoncante , iro cantaincha eiro nonijaimpirotsi . Apatiro pineaquero coajicani oca ishiacantiri Jonashi . Irootaque icantaqueriri Jesoshi , irosati ijatantanaja .

text: And when his disciples were come to the other side , they had forgotten to take bread .
text2: Ari nareejeitanaca intatiquero , nocarajeitiri itsipapee iroamere . Impoiji noquenqueshirejeitaquero tanta : tecatsi namaque .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Icantajeitaquena Jesoshi : - - Paamayearoyea tapiacaarori itantane variseopee aisati saroseopee .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have taken no bread .
text2: Ari nosampitavacaaca : - - 多 Paita icantanteeri : " Paamayearoyea tapiacaarori itantane " ? Te ameji tanta , iroitatsi icantantaqueeri .

text: Which when Jesus perceived , he said unto them , O ye of little faith , why reason ye among yourselves , because ye have brought no bread ?
text2: Iotashitaca Jesoshi nocantajeitaqueri , icantajeitana : - - Te pishiretasanojeitenaji . 多 Paita picantantari : " Te ameji atantane " ? 多 Paita piquenqueshiretantacari ?

text: Do ye not yet understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: 多 Tequerampa piojeiteji ? Chapinqui otimaveta tanta apapacoroni , iro cantaincha noacaajeitacari 5 , 000 shirampari . Paajeitajiro timaarantapaajantsiri : 多 jaoca ocaratiri cantiriqui pijaajiri timaarantapaajantsiri ? Nocantiri : - - Ocarati 12 .

text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Aisati impoiji ocarati tanta 7 , noacaajeitacari 4 , 000 shirampari . 多 Jaoca ocaratiri cantiriqui pijaajiri timaarantapaajantsiri ? Nocantiri : - - Ocarati 7 .

text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread , that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees ?
text2: Icantana : - - 多 Paita caari piojeitanta meeca ? Te nonquenqueshireteroji tanta pipeacotanacari . Queariompia , paamayearoyea tapiacaarori itantane variseopee aisati saroseopee .

text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Impoiji niojeitanaque te inquenqueshireteroji tapiacaasanotarori tanta , irointi ishiacaventiro maaroni yoametantayetiri variseopee aisati saroseopee . Te irininteji Jesoshi iramatavijeitee yora variseo aisati saroseo .

text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , saying , Whom do men say that I the Son of man am ?
text2: Impoiji nojajeitanaque anta Sesareaqui : ora nampitsi yovetsicacantaqueri Jiripo . Ari icantaquena Jesoshi : - - Noponeanaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque , iro cantaincha 多 paita yaamaajeitaquenari atiri , janicana ?

text: And they said , Some say that thou art John the Baptist : some , Elias ; and others , Jeremias , or one of the prophets .
text2: Nacanaqueri : - - Icanti aparopee : " Irioyeata Jesoshi Joani , yora vaotisatantaveitachaniri , itinaanaja " . Icanti itsipapee : " Irioyeata Iriashini , yonijantaja " . Icanti itsipapee : " Irioyeata Jerimiashini , yonijantaja " . Irio itsipa ijijeitimpi aviro quenquetsatacantatsiniri , pitinaanaja .

text: He saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ?
text2: Ari isampitana : - - Avirojei , 多 paita picantajeitiri avirori ?

text: And Simon Peter answered and said , Thou art the Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Yacanaqueri Shimo Petero : - - Avirotaque Quirishito naamaajeitari . Aviro Itomi Tasorentsi , yora Aneasanotatsiri .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Blessed art thou , Simon Barjona : for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee , but my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Icantiri : - - Queario picantaque , Shimo itomi Jonashi . Te irio oamejeitempirone atiri , irinti Apa jenoquiniri oametimpirori .

text: And I say also unto thee , That thou art Peter , and upon this rock I will build my church ; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it .
text2: Nopajitimpi Petero : ocanti pivajiro " Mapi " . Nocoacaaquempi poamejeiteri atiri noamejeitaquempiri avirori . Eiro imatiritsi camaari iroashinoncaajeiteri quemisantajeiteroneri pincamanteriri .

text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Noametempi paitarica irantajeiteri atiri irineanteariri Tasorentsi anta ipincatsaritinta . Eirorica piquemisantacairi atiri aca quipatsiqui , eiro ijatitsi inquitequi ; irinti maaroni pinquemisantacaajeiteri irisavicajeite anta inquitequi .

text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ .
text2: Impoiji aisati icantajeitana : - - Eiroyea picamantiritsi atiri : " Iriotaque Jesoshi Quirishito " .

text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples , how that he must go unto Jerusalem , and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and be raised again the third day .
text2: Impoiji icamantaquena Jesoshi : - - Irotaintsi nojate Jerosarequi . Anta oshequi iroashinoncaajeitena yora savicacantatsiri , yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , yora oametantirori Sanquenarentsi , maaroni . Aitaque oncanteari iroyeetena , iro cantaincha oncarate mava quitaiteri , ari nontinaanaje aisati .

text: Then Peter took him , and began to rebuke him , saying , Be it far from thee , Lord : this shall not be unto thee .
text2: Iro cantaincha ipiatsatacari Petero : - - Novincatsarite , te oncameetsateji oca picantaqueri . Eiro pashinoncaatsi , eiro picamitsi .

text: But he turned , and said unto Peter , Get thee behind me , Satan : thou art an offence unto me : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but those that be of men .
text2: Ari ipitsocashitanacari Jesoshi , icantiri : - - Pijate , piquempetacari Satanashi . 多 Paita pitseencantaquenari ? Te pioteroji icoacaaquenari Tasorentsi , irointi piotaque icoacaaquenari atiri .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Impoiji icantajeitana : - - Picoasanotirica pinquemisantasanotena , eiro pantanontatsi avisati , irointi pimpomerentsiventenaro paitarica noncoacaaquempiri narori . Ariorica iroashinoncaimenteetempiro , iro cantaincha pinquemisantasanotanaquena .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Yora coavetachari incavintsayea irisati irashinoncayea ; irintiquea yora caari cavintsaachane irisati irineeri Tasorentsi irinti .

text: For what is a man profited , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Ariorica intime ashiyetarori maaroni timayetatsiri quipatsiqui , iro cantaincha eirorica ijati inquitequi , tempa yatsipetashitacaro maaroni . Pineaquero , tecatsi pincantea pimpinateri Tasorentsi irisavicacantempiri anta inampiqui .

text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels ; and then he shall reward every man according to his works .
text2: Noponeaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Coajica nompiaje aisati aca , nontsipatapaaqueari nonampirepee , nompincatsaritapaaque , nonquempeteari Apa . Nompinajeiteri maaroni quearioventanarori nocoacairiri . Irinti maaroni caari quemisantana , noashinoncaajeiteri .

text: Verily I say unto you , There be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom .
text2: Queario oca noncamantempiri : eirotsitarica picamajeititsi avirori , pineajeitavajena nompocaje , nompincatsaritasanotapaaje .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter , James , and John his brother , and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart ,
text2: Ari 6 nomaajeiti , impoiji yora Jesoshi yaajeitanaqueri Petero , Santiaco , jeri Joa , yora irirenti Santiaco . Yaajeitanaqueri anta antearoqui toncaari .

text: And was transfigured before them : and his face did shine as the sun , and his raiment was white as the light .
text2: Ineajeitavaqueri ipashinitimojeitanacari . Ishipaquireavorotanaque , iquempetanacari catsirincaiteri ; aisati iitsaare , oquitamarotasanotanaque catsini .

text: And , behold , there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him .
text2: Imapocaqueri Moishishini , jeri Iriashini : iquenquetsatacaapaaqueri Jesoshi .

text: Then answered Peter , and said unto Jesus , Lord , it is good for us to be here : if thou wilt , let us make here three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Yora Petero , icantiri Jesoshi : - - Novincatsarite , aitanaquempaquea nopocajeitaque naroripee aca , noneajeitaquempi nainti . Pincoaquerica , novetsiquempiro mava pancotsijaniqui : aparoni pashi , aparoni irashi Moishishi , iro otsipa irashi Iriashi .

text: While he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud , which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ; hear ye him .
text2: Irosati omapocantapaacari omaaroncapaaca mencori , oshipaquireapaaque iroori . Isavicaque Tasorentsi mencoriqui , icanti : - - Iriotaque yoca notomi nonintasanotiri , oshequi noveshireimentasanotacari . Pinquemisantajeiteri .

text: And when the disciples heard it , they fell on their face , and were sore afraid .
text2: Iquemajeitantacarori iroamerepee oca , itarecajeitanaca , oshequi yoajeitanaqueri cavaco .

text: And Jesus came and touched them , and said , Arise , and be not afraid .
text2: Iro cantaincha ipocashitaqueri Jesoshi , ipamijeitaqueri . Icantiri : - - Pincatiajeitanaje , eiro pitsaroajeititsi .

text: And when they had lifted up their eyes , they saw no man , save Jesus only .
text2: Ari yamenajeitanaji : tecatsi irineaje , apaniro inaji Jesoshi .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , Jesus charged them , saying , Tell the vision to no man , until the Son of man be risen again from the dead .
text2: Impoiji yoirincajeitanaja , icantajeitiri : - - Eirota picamantitatsi oca pineaqueri . Arioricaquea noncamaque aisati nontinaanaje , irosatiquea pincamantantayetaqueari itsipapee atiri . Tempa noponeaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Ari nocantajeitaqueri : - - Yora oametantirori Sanquenarentsi icantajeiti : " Irotaintsirica impoque Quirishito , irijivatapaaque ironijantapaajea Iriashini " . 多 Paita icantajeitantarori oca ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Elias truly shall first come , and restore all things .
text2: Yacanaquena : - - Queario icantaqueri : " Ironijantapaajea Iriashini , irovetsicajeitaqueri maaroni " .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is come already , and they knew him not , but have done unto him whatsoever they listed . Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them .
text2: Noncamantempi : nijantaja inaji Iriashini , iro cantaincha te iriojeitavaqueriji atiripee , oshequi yoashinoncaajeitaqueri . Aisati narori , oshequi iroashinoncaajeitena .

text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist .
text2: Impoiji niojeitanaque iquenquetsatacotaqueri Joa , yora vaotisatantatsiri .

text: And when they were come to the multitude , there came to him a certain man , kneeling down to him , and saying ,
text2: Ari nareejeitapaaca anta itiminta oshequi atiri yapatojeitaca . Irosati ipocashitantacari Jesoshi shirampari . Itiyeroashitapaacari , icantapaaqueri :

text: Lord , have mercy on my son : for he is lunatick , and sore vexed : for ofttimes he falleth into the fire , and oft into the water .
text2: - - Novincatsarite , pincavintsayeri notomi : oshequi icamanatapiniti , oshequi yashinoncaapinitaca . Ipariapiniti paamariqui , itaapinita , pomein : aisati ipiincapiniti ojaqui , pocn , pocn .

text: And I brought him to thy disciples , and they could not cure him .
text2: Naavetanacanari poamere , nocantavetari : " Poavisacotajenari " , iro cantaincha te irimateriji .

text: Then Jesus answered and said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him hither to me .
text2: Ari icantajeitana Jesoshi : - - Te pinquemisantajeiteji , te pincameetsajeiteji . 多 Jaoca oncarate nontsipajeitempi piotanteari ? Oshequi pitseencajeitaquena . Impoiji icantiri ashitariri itomi : - - Jentsite , pamaquenari pitomi .

text: And Jesus rebuked the devil ; and he departed out of him : and the child was cured from that very hour .
text2: Ari iquisatsataqueri camaari , irosati ijatantanaja . Irosati yavisacotantaja yora evancari .

text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart , and said , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Impoiji nomanacaacari nosampijeitiri : - - 多 Paitaquea caari nomatantaro noavisacojeiteri narori ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Because of your unbelief : for verily I say unto you , If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye shall say unto this mountain , Remove hence to yonder place ; and it shall remove ; and nothing shall be impossible unto you .
text2: Icantajeitaquena : - - Iro caari pimatantaro te pinquemisantimateji capichaji . Queario oca noncamantempiri : pinquemisanterica capichaji ari pincantero oca toncaari : " Povaanajea anta " , ari ovaanajea . Pinquemisantasanoterica , tecatsi pomerentsitimotempine .

text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Iro cantaincha pincoaquerica pojoqueri camaari quempetariri yoca , ocameetsati pinquenquetsatacaasanoteri Tasorentsi aisati pintitea .

text: And while they abode in Galilee , Jesus said unto them , The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men :
text2: Ari notsipajeitacari Jesoshi anta Carireaqui : narori aisati maaroni itsipapee iroamere . Icantajeitana : - - Noponeaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Irotaintsi irayeetena ,

text: And they shall kill him , and the third day he shall be raised again . And they were exceeding sorry .
text2: iroyeetena . Oncarate mava quitaiteri nontinaanaje aisati . Noquemajeitantacariri , oshequi noashirejeitanaca .

text: And when they were come to Capernaum , they that received tribute money came to Peter , and said , Doth not your master pay tribute ?
text2: Impoiji nojajeitanaque Caperenaoqui . Ainiro anta itimi yora quempoyeiriri quirequi yoameetsatantayetarori ivanco Tasorentsi . Ari ijatashitiri Petero , isampitiri : - - 多 Ipashitapinitarimpa oametimpiri iirequite , yoameetsatantayetarori ivanco Tasorentsi ?

text: He saith , Yes . And when he was come into the house , Jesus prevented him , saying , What thinkest thou , Simon ? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute ? of their own children , or of strangers ?
text2: Yacashitanacari : - - Je , ipiri . Impoiji ipianaja Petero pancotsiqui . Isampitavaqueri Jesoshi : - - Shimo , 多 paita piquenqueshiretiri ? Yora pincatsaripee , 多 janica icoacotapinitiri iirequite ? 多 Icoacotirimpa ishanincasanori ? Terica , 多 irintimpa icoacotiri itsipapee atiri ?

text: Peter saith unto him , Of strangers . Jesus saith unto him , Then are the children free .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Tempa icoacotiri itsipapee atiri . Ari icantiri : - - Queario , tecatsi incoacoteri ishanincasanori . Aisati oquempetaca narori , tecatsi incoacotena Apa : tempa noshanincatacari .

text: Notwithstanding , lest we should offend them , go thou to the sea , and cast an hook , and take up the fish that first cometh up ; and when thou hast opened his mouth , thou shalt find a piece of money : that take , and give unto them for me and thee .
text2: Iro cantaincha te noninteji ontime inquishimentenari yora quempoyeiriri quirequi . Meeca pijate incajarequi , pimpitasate . Ariorica paaque shaori , pinquirancaqueri , pineaqueri ivantequi quirequi . Paavaqueri , impoiji paanajeneri yora quempoyeiriri quirequi , pimpapaaqueri . Iriotaque avinarojei , avirori aisati narori .

text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus , saying , Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ?
text2: Impoiji , nocarajeitaqueri itsipapee iroamere , nojatashijeitaqueri Jesoshi , nosampijeitiri : - - Anta ipincatsaritinta Tasorentsi , 多 janica intsipateari impincatsaritasanote ?

text: And Jesus called a little child unto him , and set him in the midst of them ,
text2: Ari icajemaqueri jananequi , isatecaqueri nianqui ,

text: And said , Verily I say unto you , Except ye be converted , and become as little children , ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: icantajeitana : - - Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri : pinquenqueshirejeitea , paventajeiteari Tasorentsi ; nocoaque pinquempejeiteari yoca jananequi , pishiretasanotena . Eirorica pishiretasanotanatsi , eiro pineirotsi ipincatsaritinta Tasorentsi .

text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child , the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Te irishemeteji yoca : maaroni quempetearine impincatsaritasanotanaque anta inquitequi .

text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me .
text2: Ariorica paacameetsateri quempetariri yoca jananequi , paacameetsajeitena narori .

text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me , it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea .
text2: Iro cantaincha ariorica pantacayeri caari cameetsatatsi , noasanquetasanotempi . Oncameetsateme pijivateme pincameme eiro pantacantarime caari cameetsatatsi . Tecatsi noasanquetimentempimeri .

text: Woe unto the world because of offences ! for it must needs be that offences come ; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh !
text2: Queario intime antayeterone caari cameetsatatsi , iro cantaincha oshequi irashinoncaajeitanaquea yora antacairiri .

text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee , cut them off , and cast them from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed , rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire .
text2: Aisati icanti Jesoshi : - - Meeca noshiacantempiro . Ariorica antacayempi paco caari cameetsatatsi , pimpesajero , pojocajero ; aisati pinquempetero piiti antacayempirica caari cameetsatatsi . Ocameetsaveta pinqueapontsoquitapaaje anta inquitequi , te oncameetsateji ontime apite paco , irootaque pijatanteari Sharincaveniqui , aisati te oncameetsateji ontime apite piiti , irootaque pijatanteari Sharincaveniqui . Ainiro anta paamari caari tsivacanetatsi : quearioya piquemaatsicatarocari .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire .
text2: Aisati ariorica antacayempiro poqui caari cameetsatatsi , pinquitsoreero , pojoquero . Ocameetsati pinqueanaraquitaje inquitequi ; te oncameetsateji ontime apite poqui , irootaque pijatanteari Sharincaveniqui pinquematsicatantearori paamari . Pineaquero , te oncameetsateji catsini pantero caari cameetsatatsi .

text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones ; for I say unto you , That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Aisati icanti Jesoshi : - - Aisati eiro catsini pitseenquiritsi jananequipee . Ainiro inampirepee Apa quempoyeaventajeitaqueriri jananequipee , camantacoventapinitiriri .

text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost .
text2: Noponeaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Nopocashitaqueri jatatsinemeri Sharincaveniqui , noavisacotantajeariri .

text: How think ye ? if a man have an hundred sheep , and one of them be gone astray , doth he not leave the ninety and nine , and goeth into the mountains , and seeketh that which is gone astray ?
text2: Aisati icantajeitana Jesoshi : - - Noshiacantempiro aisati . Ariorica intime ashitariri 100 irovishate . Impeaquearica aparoni , tempa irashitacotanaqueri yora 99 irovishate iramenantajeariri yora peainchari . 多 Paita piquenqueshirejeitiri avirori ?

text: And if so be that he find it , verily I say unto you , he rejoiceth more of that sheep , than of the ninety and nine which went not astray .
text2: Irineajeririca aisati , 多 iriompa iriveshireimentea yora apatojeitainchari caari peacha ? Te , irintiquea iriveshireimentea yora peavetainchari . Tempa queario .

text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven , that one of these little ones should perish .
text2: Aisati iquempeta yora Apa jenoquiniri : te incoyeji irijate Sharincaveniqui aparoni jananequi .

text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee , go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone : if he shall hear thee , thou hast gained thy brother .
text2: Aisati icantaquena Jesoshi : - - Ariorica irantero pishaninca caari cameetsatatsi , irootaque poashiretacotanteariri , ocameetsati pijatashiteri , pincanteri . Apaniro pijatashiteri , eiro picamantiritsi itsipapee . Ariorica inquemisantempi cameetsa irisavicantajeari , ari pinquempetacantajeri pirenti , paacameetsatavacaajea aisati .

text: But if he will not hear thee , then take with thee one or two more , that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established .
text2: Iro cantaincha eirorica iquemisantimpitsi , pijatashitajeri aisati , paanaqueri itsipa piyemisantaririnte : ariorica aparo , ariorica apite . Intsipajeitempi iriotanteari paitarica pincanteriri , aisati intsarojeitapeeri iriori .

text: And if he shall neglect to hear them , tell it unto the church : but if he neglect to hear the church , let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican .
text2: Eirorica iquemisantajeitimpi , ari pincamantajeiteri maaroni piyemisantaririnte , intsarojeiterita iriori . Eirorica iquemisantajeitiri , ari pinquempetacaajeari tseencantatsiri , antirori caari cameetsatatsi ; eiro picantajiritsi quemisantatsiri .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Paitarica pincantajeiteriri incanteri aisati iriori Tasorentsi . Pincantajeiteririca ainiro irantane , aisati incanteri iriori Tasorentsi . Pincantajeiteririca te aneroji irantane , aisati inquempetea iriori Tasorentsi .

text: Again I say unto you , That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask , it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Nampiitajempiro : irosatirica pincantajeiteriri avirori Apa jenoquiniri ; ariorica pincarajeite apite , ari inquemisantasanojeitempi .

text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name , there am I in the midst of them .
text2: Jaocarica irampatotimentenari apite quemisantanari , ariorica mava , aisati narori noncarajeitaqueri .

text: Then came Peter to him , and said , Lord , how oft shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? till seven times ?
text2: Impoiji yora Petero isampitiri Jesoshi : - - Novincatsarite , inquishenarica noshaninca , tempa ocameetsati noncavintsayeri , eiro nopiataritsi . Iro cantaincha irampiitapinitenarica inquisaquena , 多 jaoca oncarate noncavintsaapiniteri ? 多 Ariompa oncarate 7 ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , I say not unto thee , Until seven times : but , Until seventy times seven .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Irosati pincanteani pincavintsayeri : eiro pipiataritsi catsini .

text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king , which would take account of his servants .
text2: Noshiacantempiro jaoca icanta Tasorentsi ipincatsariventanti . Itimi pincatsari coatsiri impinatajeri iratiritepee .

text: And when he had begun to reckon , one was brought unto him , which owed him ten thousand talents .
text2: Icajemaqueri aparoni , irevitiriri oshequi quirequi catsini . Icantavetari : " Pimpinatajena " .

text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay , his lord commanded him to be sold , and his wife , and children , and all that he had , and payment to be made .
text2: Yacanaqueri : " Tecatsi noncantea nompinatajempi " . Ari icantiri pincatsari itsipapee : " Payeri yoca . Pimpimanteri , pimpimantero ijina , itomipee , irovaararo , maaroni , naantajeari quirequi irevitanari " .

text: The servant therefore fell down , and worshipped him , saying , Lord , have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Iro cantaincha itiyeroanaca quipatsiqui yora irevitiriri , icantiri : " Eirotsita pipimantanatsi . Coajica nompinatajempiro , maaroni " .

text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion , and loosed him , and forgave him the debt .
text2: Ari oshequi icavintsairi ivatorote , icantiri : " Aitanaji , moncarataca , eiro nocoacotajimpitsi " .

text: But the same servant went out , and found one of his fellowservants , which owed him an hundred pence : and he laid hands on him , and took him by the throat , saying , Pay me that thou owest .
text2: Ari ijatanaque yora irevitantavetachari . Iquenanaque avotsiqui , itonquiotavacari irevitiriri iriori capichaji . Icaticavaqueri itsanoqui , icantiri : " Pishintsite pimpinatajena ora pirevitanari " .

text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet , and besought him , saying , Have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Ari itiyeroavetanaca iriori , icantavetari : " Eirotsita picoacotanatsi , coajica nompinatajempi maaroni " .

text: And he would not : but went and cast him into prison , till he should pay the debt .
text2: Iro cantaincha te incavintsayeriji irinti . Yoiminqueacantaqueri , icantiri : " Ariorica pimpinatajena maaroni , noncanteri iroimisoquijajempi " .

text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done , they were very sorry , and came and told unto their lord all that was done .
text2: Ari ineantacariri itsipapee , yoashirejeitanaca . Ijatashitaqueri ivatorote , icamantaqueri : " Noneaqueri yoranqui picavintsairi , te incavintsanteji irinti . Yoiminqueacantaqueri irevivetariri irinti capichaji " .

text: Then his lord , after that he had called him , said unto him , O thou wicked servant , I forgave thee all that debt , because thou desiredst me :
text2: Ari icajemacantaqueri ivatorote , icantiri : " Picantaquena : ' Eirota pipimantanatsi ' , irootaque nocavintsaasanotantaquempiri , nocantimpi : ' Aitanaji , eiro pipinatajanatsi ' . Iro cantaincha te pincameetsateji avinti .

text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant , even as I had pity on thee ?
text2: Tempa oncameetsateme pincavintsayerime avirori yora irevivetimpiri capichaji , pinquempetename narori nocavintsaaquempi " .

text: And his lord was wroth , and delivered him to the tormentors , till he should pay all that was due unto him .
text2: Ari iquisaqueri , yoiminqueacantaqueri , icantiri : " Meecaquea aviroriniro , ariorica pimpinatasanotajena maaroni , ari noimisoquijajempi " .

text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you , if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses .
text2: Ari piojeitaquero oca noshiacantimpiri . Eirorica picavintsanti , iroasanquetasanotempi Apa jenoquiniri , pinquempeteari yora noquenquetsatacotiri .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these sayings , he departed from Galilee , and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan ;
text2: Ari iquenquetsatacaana Jesoshi chapinqui anta Carireaqui . Impoiji yovaanaja Joreaqui , anta Joriraniqui intatiquero . Noijatanaqueri narori , aisati itsipapee iroamere .

text: And great multitudes followed him ; and he healed them there .
text2: Aisati yoijajeitaqueri oshequi itsipapee atiri . Aisati oshequi yoavisacojeitaqueri mantsiayetatsiri .

text: The Pharisees also came unto him , tempting him , and saying unto him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause ?
text2: Aisati ijatashitaqueri Jesoshi variseopee . Icoavetaca incomitacayearime , irootaque isampitantavetariri : - - 多 Ocameetsatimpa irojocajero shirampari ijina ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , Have ye not read , that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female ,
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Tempa pineanatapinivetaro Sanquenarentsi . Peerani yovetsicaqueri Tasorentsi shirampari aisati tsinane ,

text: And said , For this cause shall a man leave father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife : and they twain shall be one flesh ?
text2: aisati icanti : " Ariorica irayero shirampari ijina , inteentareanaqueri iriri aisati iriniro , iro cantaincha te noncoacayeriji irojocajero ijina . Nocoaque quiso iroanaquero . Peerani inashiveitani shirampari aisati ijinatsori , iro cantaincha ariorica iraaquero , onquempetaquea apaniro irinaque , eiro yojocavacaajatsi " . Tempa aitaque itsipatacaacari Tasorentsi , te oncameetsateji irojocacaajeri atiri .

text: They say unto him , Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement , and to put her away ?
text2: Ari isampitiri aisati : - - 多 Arimpa ? 多 Paita icantantariri Moishishi peerani : " Pisanquenatenero pijina paperi pojocantearori , impoiji ocameetsati pojocajero " ?

text: He saith unto them , Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives : but from the beginning it was not so .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Te pincameetsashireteji , irootaque icantantimpiri Moishishi ocameetsati pojocajero pijina . Iro cantaincha te incoacayempiji Tasorentsi pojocajero . Icoacaaquempi eiro pojocajirotsi catsini .

text: And I say unto you , Whosoever shall put away his wife , except it be for fornication , and shall marry another , committeth adultery : and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery .
text2: Nocantimpi narori , ariorica pojocajero pijina impoiji paaje pashini , aitaque paimentaquearo pijinasanori . Apatiroti ariorica ojivate aimentempi , ocameetsaveta pojocajero .

text: His disciples say unto him , If the case of the man be so with his wife , it is not good to marry .
text2: Impoiji , nocarataqueri pashini iroamere , nocantaqueri Jesoshi : - - Ariompa , jaata eirota naitame nojina narori .

text: But he said unto them , All men cannot receive this saying , save they to whom it is given .
text2: Icantaquena : - - Eiro pimajeitirotsi pinquemajeitero oca nocantaquempiri . Apaniro inquemero yora yoametasanotiri Tasorentsi .

text: For there are some eunuchs , which were so born from their mother ' s womb : and there are some eunuchs , which were made eunuchs of men : and there be eunuchs , which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven ' s sake . He that is able to receive it , let him receive it .
text2: Timatsi caari matiro iraye ijina : irosati itimapaaque . Timatsi itsipa yaitsoquiyeetiri , caari yaanta ijina . Timatsi pashini caari coatsi iraye . Icoaque intimashitea inquearioventeneri Tasorentsi paitapeerica iranteneriri . Pimaterorica pinquemero oca , ari pinquenqueshiretero .

text: Then were there brought unto him little children , that he should put his hands on them , and pray : and the disciples rebuked them .
text2: Impoiji yamaqueneri Jesoshi jananequipee , icantajeitiri : - - Pimpamiteri notomipee , pincanteri Tasorentsi incavintsaajeitenari . Nocantajeivetari : - - Eiro pashereiritsi Avincatsarite .

text: But Jesus said , Suffer little children , and forbid them not , to come unto me : for of such is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Iro cantaincha icantana : - - Eiro picantiritsi : nocoaque iramajeitenarita jananequipee . Iojeiti iriori ipincatsajeitaquena . Maaroni quempetariri yoca irisavicajeite anta ipincatsaritinta Tasorentsi .

text: And he laid his hands on them , and departed thence .
text2: Irosati ipamijeitantavacari , icantiri Tasorentsi : - - Apa , nocoaque pincavintsaajeiteri yoca jananequipeeca . Impoiji ijatanaji .

text: And , behold , one came and said unto him , Good Master , what good thing shall I do , that I may have eternal life ?
text2: Impoiji ijatashitaqueri Jesoshi aparoni evancari , isampitapaaqueri : - - Oametantatsiri , picameetsataque . 多 Paita cameetsatatsiri nanteri narori nosavicanteari anta inquitequi , noncantaitatiyempani ?

text: And he said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God : but if thou wilt enter into life , keep the commandments .
text2: Ari icantiri : - - 多 Paita picantantanari : " Picameetsataque " ? Itimi aparo cameetsatatsiri : yora Tasorentsi . Iro cantaincha pincoaquerica pijate inquitequi , pantajeitero maaroni icantiniri Moishishini .

text: He saith unto him , Which ? Jesus said , Thou shalt do no murder , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness ,
text2: Icantiri : - - Otimi oshequi icantayetiniri : 多 paita picoaqueri nanteri ? Yacanaqueri : - - Eiro poantitsi , eiro pantirotsi caari pai , eiro picoshititsi , eiro pitseeyacotaritsi pishaninca ,

text: Honour thy father and thy mother : and , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: pimpincatsateri piri aisati piniro ; oquempetaca pininta avisati , aisati pinintajeiteri itsipapee iriori .

text: The young man saith unto him , All these things have I kept from my youth up : what lack I yet ?
text2: Icantaqueri : - - Aitaque nomatitacaro nojananequitapaini , irosati meeca . 多 Paita pashini nanteri ?

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou wilt be perfect , go and sell that thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come and follow me .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Picoaquerica pintsoteaquero maaroni , pijate pimpimantero maaroni timimojeitimpiri , pimperi ashinoncachari maaroni ovinaro ; impoiji impinatempi Tasorentsi , ontime pivaararo inquitequi . Ariorica pimpimantero maaroni , tsame poijatanaquena narori .

text: But when the young man heard that saying , he went away sorrowful : for he had great possessions .
text2: Iquemavaitiiro oca , ijatanaque , yoashiretanaca . Otimi oshequi irovaararo , te incoyeji impimantero .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , Verily I say unto you , That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Impoiji icantajeitana Jesoshi : - - Queario oca noncamantempiri : opomerentsitimotari ashitaarantachari irijate anta inquitequi .

text: And again I say unto you , It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Nampiitajempiro : tempa opomerentsitaca inqueero cameyo omorojaniqui quitsapi . Iro cantaincha opomerentsitasanotaca catsini irijate ashitaarantachari anta ipincatsaritinta Tasorentsi .

text: When his disciples heard it , they were exceedingly amazed , saying , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Noquemajeitantarori oca noajeitanaqueri cavaco . Nosampitiri : - - 多 Ariompa ? 多 Janica meeca materone iravisacotaje ?

text: But Jesus beheld them , and said unto them , With men this is impossible ; but with God all things are possible .
text2: Yamenaquena , icantaquena : - - Eiro imatirotsi atiri , iro cantaincha irinti Tasorentsi irimataquero maaroni . Tecatsi ompomerentsitimoteari irinti .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Behold , we have forsaken all , and followed thee ; what shall we have therefore ?
text2: Icantaqueri Petero : - - Pamene , nocoasanojeitaque noijatanaquempi , irootaque nojocajeitantacarori maaroni timimojeivetanari . 多 Paita naayetajeri coajicani aisati ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That ye which have followed me , in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory , ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Icantajeitana Jesoshi : - - Queario oca noncamantajeitempiri , tempa noponeaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque : coajica ontime quipatsi iroaquerari . Narori , nosavique anta novincatsarimentoqui , nompincatsatasanotaque . Aisati avirorijei , pincarajeitena pimpincatsarijeitanaque , ontime 12 pivincatsarimentopee pisavicajeitanteari aviroripee . Pimpincatsariventajeiteri maaroni joriopee .

text: And every one that hath forsaken houses , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my name ' s sake , shall receive an hundredfold , and shall inherit everlasting life .
text2: Ariorica poijajeitanaquena , tecatsi pantsipejeitea . Ariorica pojocanaquero pivancopee , pirentipee , pitsiropee , piripee , piniropee , pitomipee , piipatsite , paitapeerica . Iro cantaincha ariorica poijatasanotanaquena , te pantsipetashijeitearoji . Ariorica pojocanaquero aparo , impajempi Tasorentsi 100 . Aisati iraajeitanaquempi inampiqui pisaviquimojeitanteariri iriori , pincantaitatiyempani .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last shall be first .
text2: Itimajeiti meeca oshequi pincatsarijeitatsiri aca quipatsiqui , iro cantaincha eiro ipincatsarijeitajitsi inquitequi : ariorica aparopee pincatsaritanajantsine . Aisati itimajeiti meeca oshequi ashinoncaajeitachari , iro cantaincha coajica anta inquitequi impincatsaritaarantapaaje .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard .
text2: Pashini aisati icanti Jesoshi : - - Noshiacantempiro aisati jaoca icanta Tasorentsi ipincatsariventanti . Itimi ashitarori irovamashite . Tsiteniquera ijatamani nampitsiqui irameneri tsameetenerine .

text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day , he sent them into his vineyard .
text2: Ineapaaqueri coatsiri intsameeteneri , icantiri : " Ariorica pintsameetena meeca , irosati ishaaviniji , nompinajeitempi aparoni quirequi : yora pajitachari tenario " . Icantajeiti : " Ari cameetsa " . Ari icantiri : " Meeca pijajeite , pintsameejeite " . Ijajeitanaque , itsameejeiti .

text: And he went out about the third hour , and saw others standing idle in the marketplace ,
text2: Impoiji ijenoquitapaaque catsirincaiteri , ijatanaji aisati nampitsiqui yora ashitarori irovamashite . Ineapaaqueri itsipapee shirampari , icatiashijeitaca anta , tecatsi irantajeite .

text: And said unto them ; Go ye also into the vineyard , and whatsoever is right I will give you . And they went their way .
text2: Icantiri : " Ariorica pintsameejeite anta novamashitequi , cameetsa nompinajeitaquempi " . Icantajeitiri : " Ari " . Irosati ijajeitantanaca , itsameejeiti .

text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour , and did likewise .
text2: Aisati tampatica ijati nampitsiqui , itsameetacaajeitiri itsipapee . Aisati ishaavijini itsameetacaajeitiri itsipapee aisati .

text: And about the eleventh hour he went out , and found others standing idle , and saith unto them , Why stand ye here all the day idle ?
text2: Impoiji aisati antoo ishaavijiteanaji , ijatanaji nampitsiqui . Ineapaaqueri caari tsameejeitatsi . Icantajeitiri : " 多 Paita patsipetashijeitantari picatiashijeitaca ? Te pintsameejeiteji " .

text: They say unto him , Because no man hath hired us . He saith unto them , Go ye also into the vineyard ; and whatsoever is right , that shall ye receive .
text2: Yacajeitanaqueri : " Tecatsi tsameetacaajeitenane " . Icantiri : " Pintsameejeite novamashitequi , pincarajeiteri yora jivajeitanaintsiri incaranqui " .

text: So when even was come , the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward , Call the labourers , and give them their hire , beginning from the last unto the first .
text2: Ari otsimancaiteanaji , yora ashitarori icantiri quempoyeiniriri iirequite : " Pincajemajeiteri maaroni tsameetacotanarori novamashite , pimpinajeiteri . Pijivateri pimpinajeiteri yora impoitatsiri itsameejeiti . Impoiji pimpinajeiteri jivajeitatsiri itsameejeiti oquitaitetamani " .

text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour , they received every man a penny .
text2: Ari ipocajeiti yora impoitatsiri itsameejeiti : capichaji itsameejeiti iriori , iro cantaincha ipinajeitaqueri aparoni tenario . Aisati imoncaratavacaajeitaca ipinajeitaqueri maaroni .

text: But when the first came , they supposed that they should have received more ; and they likewise received every man a penny .
text2: Impoijiniquea ipocajeiti iriori yora intamanarori itsameejeitamani . Ijitashijeivetaca iranaacojeiteri impinajeiteri . Iro cantaincha ipinajeitaqueri aisati aparoni tenario .

text: And when they had received it , they murmured against the goodman of the house ,
text2: Ineatiiri iirequite , iquisatsataqueri yora tsameetacairiri ,

text: Saying , These last have wrought but one hour , and thou hast made them equal unto us , which have borne the burden and heat of the day .
text2: icantiri : " Yora impoitatsiri itsameejeiti capichaji , iro cantaincha imoncarataquena pipinataquena . Nainti nojatitamanaca oquitaitamani notsameeti , opomerentsivetaca , oshequi nomasavitaque . Oncameetsateme nanaacoterime nayeri quirequi " .

text: But he answered one of them , and said , Friend , I do thee no wrong : didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
text2: Ari icantiri : " Noshaninca , te namatavijeitempiji . Tempa nocantimpi oquitaitetamani : ' Nompinatempi aparoni tenario ' ; picantajeivetana : ' Ari , cameetsa ' .

text: Take that thine is , and go thy way : I will give unto this last , even as unto thee .
text2: Paanajeri meeca piirequite , pijajeitaje pivancoqui . Nopinatashitacari yora impoitatsiri itsameeti aparo tenario imoncaratantaquempiri .

text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own ? Is thine eye evil , because I am good ?
text2: Tempa ocameetsati nopashitacari noirequite . 多 Paita caari picoanta noncavintsayeri ? "

text: So the last shall be first , and the first last : for many be called , but few chosen .
text2: Aisati noncamantempi : anta inquitequi impincatsarijeitanaque yora caari pincatsarijeitatsi aca quipatsiqui . Yorari irinti pincatsarijeivetachari aca , eiro ipincatsarijeitajitsi anta inquitequi . Aisati icantajeivetari Tasorentsi oshequi atiri : " Pinquemisantena " , iro cantaincha te inquemisantajeiteji , irootaque caari irijajeitantea iriori inquitequi .

text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way , and said unto them ,
text2: Ari impoiji ijatanaque Jesoshi Jerosarequi , itentajeitanaquena narori , aisati itsipapee iroamere . Apaniro icantajeitaquena :

text: Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes , and they shall condemn him to death ,
text2: - - Meeca ajajeite Jerosarequi . Ari noponeanaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Irotaintsi irayena jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee aisati yora oametantirori Sanquenarentsi , incantena : " Te pincameetsateji " .

text: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock , and to scourge , and to crucify him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Incanteri oromasati : " Payeri Jesoshi , poyeri " . Irishirontimentajeitena iriori , impasanajeitena , impajacojeitena coroshiqui , noncame . Oncarataque mava quitaiteri irointinaajena aisati Apa .

text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee ' s children with her sons , worshipping him , and desiring a certain thing of him .
text2: Impoiji ojatashitiri Jesoshi ijina Severeo , otsipatari otomipee : yora Santiaco aisati Joa . Otiyeroashitapaacari , ocantapaaqueri : - - Nocoaque pincavintsayena .

text: And he said unto her , What wilt thou ? She saith unto him , Grant that these my two sons may sit , the one on thy right hand , and the other on the left , in thy kingdom .
text2: Isampitiro : - - 多 Paita picoiri ? Ocantiri : - - Coajica , ariorica pimpincatsaritasanotanaque , nocoaque irisaviquimotempi notomipee : aparo irisavique pacosanoriqui , irio itsipa irisavique pampatequi . Pincanteri incarajeitempi impincatsarijeitanaque .

text: But Jesus answered and said , Ye know not what ye ask . Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of , and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ? They say unto him , We are able .
text2: Icantiro , aisati icantiri otomipee : - - Te pioteji paitarica picoacotanari . Oshequi nonquematsicayetearo paitapeerica . 多 Tempa pintsaroacayearo pinquematsicatearo avirori ? Yacanaqueri : - - Te nontsaroacayearoji , ari nomataquero narori .

text: And he saith unto them , Ye shall drink indeed of my cup , and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with : but to sit on my right hand , and on my left , is not mine to give , but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father .
text2: Ari icantiri : - - Queario pinquematsicajeitearo . Iro cantaincha te naro cantatsine janicarica saviquimotenaneri coajica : irio cantatsine Apa , irinti .

text: And when the ten heard it , they were moved with indignation against the two brethren .
text2: Noquemajeitantarori oca icantajeitiriri , noquisajeitaqueri yora Santiaco aisati Joa ; iro noquisantacariri , icoaveta impincatsariteme .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them , and they that are great exercise authority upon them .
text2: Iro cantaincha icajemajeitaquena Jesoshi , icantajeitaquena : - - Piojeitaque yora ivincatsaritepee itsipapee atiri yamejeitaca iperanajeitacari ishanincapee .

text: But it shall not be so among you : but whosoever will be great among you , let him be your minister ;
text2: Iro cantaincha eiro piquempejeitaritsi . Eiro picoajeititsi avirori pimperanajeiteari pishanincapee . Pincoaquerica pimpincatsariventante pintacojeiteari pishaninca , eiroquea piperanayetaritsi . Pantajeiteneri pishaninca paitarica incoacaajeitempiri .

text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Noponeaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque , iro cantaincha te iro nompocantea nomperanajeitempi , irointi nopocanta nintacojeitempi aisati noncamimentajeitempi , maaroni .

text: And as they departed from Jericho , a great multitude followed him .
text2: Ari noponeajeitanaca Jericoqui , noquenajeitanaque avotsiqui . Yoijajeitanaquena oshequi atiri .

text: And , behold , two blind men sitting by the way side , when they heard that Jesus passed by , cried out , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Ari isaviqui otsapiqui avotsi apite caari amenatsi . Icamanteetiri : - - Coraque Jesoshi . Ari icajemajeitanaque : - - Pincavintsaajeitapeena : tempa aviro ishanincani Iravirini .

text: And the multitude rebuked them , because they should hold their peace : but they cried the more , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Ari iquisatsataqueri yora apatojeitainchari , icantajeitiri : - - Pimajerete . Aiquero icajemajeitanaque : - - Novincatsarite , pincavintsayena : tempa aviro naamaajeitacari , aviro ishanincani Iravirini .

text: And Jesus stood still , and called them , and said , What will ye that I shall do unto you ?
text2: Icatiapaaca Jesoshi , icantiri : - - 多 Paita picoiri nantempiri ?

text: They say unto him , Lord , that our eyes may be opened .
text2: Icantiri : - - Novincatsarite , nocoaque namenaje .

text: So Jesus had compassion on them , and touched their eyes : and immediately their eyes received sight , and they followed him .
text2: Ari icavintsairi , ipamititaqueri iroqui . Irosati yamenantanaja , aisati yoijajeitanaqueri .

text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem , and were come to Bethphage , unto the mount of Olives , then sent Jesus two disciples ,
text2: Ari nareejeitapaaca Vetejajequi , oquempejitaro toncaari ipajiyeetiro Orivomashi . Irotapaajantsi Jerosare . Itianquiri Jesoshi apite iroamere ,

text: Saying unto them , Go into the village over against you , and straightway ye shall find an ass tied , and a colt with her : loose them , and bring them unto me .
text2: icantiri : - - Pijivatanaque anta nampitsiquinta . Pineapaaquero voro , otsatacotaca ; otsipatacari orijani . Pintsatacoreapeero , pamaquenaro .

text: And if any man say ought unto you , ye shall say , The Lord hath need of them ; and straightway he will send them .
text2: Irisampitempirica ashaninca : " 多 Paita pitsatacoreantarori ? " Ari pincanteri : " Irio coirori Avincatsarite " . Ari incantempi : " Paanaqueneri " .

text: All this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Iro yantantarori oca , imoncaratiro isanquenatacotaqueriniri peerani yora camantantatsiniri pajitachari Sacariashi :

text: Tell ye the daughter of Sion , Behold , thy King cometh unto thee , meek , and sitting upon an ass , and a colt the foal of an ass .
text2: " Pincamantajeiteri jerosaresati : ' Coraquetaqueni pivincatsarite . Icameetsataque , te irishemeteji . Inquijacotapeempari vorojaniqui ' " .

text: And the disciples went , and did as Jesus commanded them ,
text2: Ari ijatanaque apite , ineapairo voro , yamaqueneri .

text: And brought the ass , and the colt , and put on them their clothes , and they set him thereon .
text2: Apite yamaque : tsinane , aisati orijani . Yoanquetaqueneri imititsaqui quitsaarentsi , impoiji iquijacotacari Jesoshi .

text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way ; others cut down branches from the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Ari itimi oshequi atiri anta avotsiqui , yoayetaqueneri iroicoropee anta avotsiqui iraaticantanaquearori voro . Aisati yoayetaqueneri ojempequijaniqui inchatoshi avotsiqui , iraaticantanaquearori . Aitaque yametaro yoayetiniri pincatsaripee iroicoropee aisati ojempequijaniqui inchatoshi .

text: And the multitudes that went before , and that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna to the Son of David : Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord ; Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Ari ijivajeitanaqueri oshequi atiri anta avotsiqui , aisati impoijeitanaqueri oshequi pashini . Icajemajeitanaque : - - Jeriqueti ishanincani Iravirini , tsame ampincatsajeitavaqueri . Itiancaqueri Avincatsarite , tsame aneacameetsajeiteri . Tempa ineacameetsatiri iriori Tasorentsi .

text: And when he was come into Jerusalem , all the city was moved , saying , Who is this ?
text2: Ari yareetapaaca Jerosarequi . Isampitavacaajeitaca maaroni jerosaresati : - - 多 Janicampa yoca ?

text: And the multitude said , This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee .
text2: Yacajeitaqueri itsipapee : - - Iriotaque Jesoshi , poneachari Nasaretequi , ora timatsiri Carireaqui . Oshequi iquenquetsatacotiri Tasorentsi .

text: And Jesus went into the temple of God , and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ,
text2: Ari ijataque Jesoshi ivancoqui Tasorentsi , iquisajeitapaaqueri maaroni amanantatsiri aisati pimantatsiri , yojocajeitapaaqueri . Aisati iquempejeitaqueri yora pinaavacaariri iirequite , aisati yora pimantiriri paroma : itatsinquitapaaqueri imesatepee aisati isavicamentopee .

text: And said unto them , It is written , My house shall be called the house of prayer ; but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Icantajeitaqueri : - - Ocanti Sanquenarentsi : " Icanti Tasorentsi : ' Ocameetsati pinquenquetsatacaapinijeitena aca novancoqui ' " . Iro cantaincha avirojei te pinquenquetsatacaajeiteriji , irointi picoshitapinijeitiri pocajeitatsiri .

text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
text2: Impoiji ijatashitaqueri oshequi caari amenatsi aisati choriyetatsiri . Yoavisacojeitaqueri .

text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did , and the children crying in the temple , and saying , Hosanna to the Son of David ; they were sore displeased ,
text2: Ari ineajeitaqueri yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee aisati yora oametantirori Sanquenarentsi , iquisajeitanaca . Ocameetsati yantayetiri , aisati icantajeiti atiripee : - - Tsame ampincatsajeiteri ishanincani Iravirini . Irootaque iquisajeitantacariri yoranqui ,

text: And said unto him , Hearest thou what these say ? And Jesus saith unto them , Yea ; have ye never read , Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise ?
text2: aisati icantajeitaqueri Jesoshi : - - 多 Piquemaquerompa oca icantajeitiri atiripee ? Te oncameetsateji impincatsajeitempi . Yacanaqueri : - - Je , noquemaqueri . Tempa pineanatiro Sanquenarentsi cantatsiri : " Impincatsajeiteri Quirishito yora jananequipee " .

text: And he left them , and went out of the city into Bethany ; and he lodged there .
text2: Ari ijatanaji Jesoshi , quiso noanajiri narori , aisati itsipapee iroamere . Nojajeitanaque Vetaniaqui , aitaque nomaajeitapairi .

text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city , he hungered .
text2: Ari oquitaitetamanaji nopiajeitanaja Jerosarequi . Nianqui itasheanaque Jesoshi .

text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way , he came to it , and found nothing thereon , but leaves only , and said unto it , Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever . And presently the fig tree withered away .
text2: Ineapaaquero avotsinampiqui iyera . Icoavetapaacaro oitsoqui , te ontimeji ; irointi iotaca oshi . Icanti : - - Meeca eiro otimajitsi aisati oitsoqui iroajeitantajearori atiri . Irosati oshimpeshitantanaca , ocamaque iyera .

text: And when the disciples saw it , they marvelled , saying , How soon is the fig tree withered away !
text2: Noneantacarori , nosampitiri : - - 多 Jaoca ocantanacari oshintsitantanacari oshimpeshitanaque ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Verily I say unto you , If ye have faith , and doubt not , ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree , but also if ye shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; it shall be done .
text2: Yacanaquena : - - Queario oca noncamantempiri : ariorica pishiretasanoteari Tasorentsi , pimatero avirori quempetarori pineaqueri meeca . Aisati pincanteririca Apa : " Povaajero oca toncaari , pojoquero anta incajarequi " , aitaque irimatacaaquempiro . Iro cantaincha , eiro pitseenquiritsi .

text: And all things , whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer , believing , ye shall receive .
text2: Ariorica pishiretasanoteari , irimatacaaquempiro paitapeerica pincoacoteriri .

text: And when he was come into the temple , the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching , and said , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority ?
text2: Ari nareejeitapaaja ivancoqui Tasorentsi , yoametantapaaji Jesoshi . Irosati ijatashitantapaacari yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee aisati yora jivatacantantatsiri , isampijeitiri : - - 多 Janicampa tianquimpiri pantayetantarori ocapee ? 多 Janica nintacaimpiri pipincatsaritantacari ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I also will ask you one thing , which if ye tell me , I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Aisati narori , aparo nosampitempi : ariorica pancaquena , noncamantempi janica tiancaquenari .

text: The baptism of John , whence was it ? from heaven , or of men ? And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say unto us , Why did ye not then believe him ?
text2: 多 Janicampa tianquiriri Joa ivaotisatantayetariri ashanincapee ? 多 Irimpa tianquiriri Tasorentsi ? 多 Irimpa tianquiriri atiri ? Ari icantavacaajeitanaca : - - Ancanteririca : " Irio Tasorentsi tianquiriri " , icanteecari : " 多 Paita caari piquemisantantari ? "

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; we fear the people ; for all hold John as a prophet .
text2: Iro cantaincha ariorica ancanteri : " Irio tianquiriri atiri " , iquisajeiteecari atiripee . Tempa ijitashijeitari irio Tasorentsi tianquiriri Joa iquenquetsati .

text: And they answered Jesus , and said , We cannot tell . And he said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Ari icantajeitiri : - - Te nioteji janicarica tianquiriri . Icantiri : - - Aisati narori , eiro nocamantimpitsi janicarica tiancaquenari nantantarori ocapee .

text: But what think ye ? A certain man had two sons ; and he came to the first , and said , Son , go work to day in my vineyard .
text2: Aisati icantajeitiri Jesoshi : - - Meeca noshiacantempiri ashitachari itomi apite : 多 paita piquenqueshiretacotiriri ? Icantiri intarori itimi : " Notiomi , pijate meeca pintsameete anta ovamashiqui " .

text: He answered and said , I will not : but afterward he repented , and went .
text2: Yacanaqueri : " Eiro notsameetitsi " , iro cantaincha impoiji ijati itsameeti .

text: And he came to the second , and said likewise . And he answered and said , I go , sir : and went not .
text2: Aisati icantiri itsipa itomi : " Notiomi , pijate meeca pintsameete anta ovamashiqui " . Ari icantiri : " Ari , apa , nojataque " . Iro cantaincha te irijateji .

text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father ? They say unto him , The first . Jesus saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you .
text2: Meeca nosampitempi : 多 janica antasanotiniriri iriri icoacairiri ? Yacanaqueri : - - Yora jivatatsiri itimi , jatatsiri itsameeti . Icantiri aisati : - - Queario oca noncamantempiri : irijivajeitempi irijajeitanaque inquitequi yora coshitantatsiri aisati ora antapiniyetiriri shirampari caari ai .

text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness , and ye believed him not : but the publicans and the harlots believed him : and ye , when ye had seen it , repented not afterward , that ye might believe him .
text2: Ipocapaaque Joa icamantavetimpi jaoca pincantajeameri pincameetsatantajeameri , iro cantaincha te pinquemisantavaqueriji . Irinti iquemisantajeitaqueri yora apatotiniriri oromasati iirequite , aisati oquemisantaqueri antapiniyetiriri shirampari caari ai . Pineajeivetacari iquemisantajeiti icameetsatantajari , iro cantaincha te pinquenqueshirejeiteaji avirorijei ; te pinquemisantavaqueriji Joa . Irijajeite irinti inquitequi : aviroriquea avinti , eiro pijajeititsi .

text: Hear another parable : There was a certain householder , which planted a vineyard , and hedged it round about , and digged a winepress in it , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country :
text2: Jero oca pashini icantiriri Jesoshi : - - Pashini aisati noshiacantempiro : pinquemajeitavaquero . Itimi shirampari panquitirori ovamashi . Itantacotiro otsapiqui . Aisati yovetsiquiro intsinacaitantearori oitsoqui , aisati onanteari oja . Yovetsiquiro pancotsi jenoquitatsiri yamenacotantarori savicatsiri ora panquirentsi . Impoiji icantiri pashini ishaninca : " Meeca nocoi pamenenaro novamashite , aisati pintsameetacotenaro " . Icantiri : " Ari " . Impoiji ijatanaque yora ashitarori ovamashi pashiniqui quipatsi .

text: And when the time of the fruit drew near , he sent his servants to the husbandmen , that they might receive the fruits of it .
text2: Peeranitanaque omoncarataca otimanaque oitsoqui . Itiancavetacari iratiritepee : " Pijajeite pincanteri yora amenirori novamashite impacantena nashitari narori " . Ari ijajeivetanaca .

text: And the husbandmen took his servants , and beat one , and killed another , and stoned another .
text2: Ineajeitavaqueri yora amenirori ovamashi : ipasatavaqueri aparo , tac , tac ; pashini yoavaqueri , shemi ; irio itsipa ipichavaqueri , pitse , pitse .

text: Again , he sent other servants more than the first : and they did unto them likewise .
text2: Ari yora ashitarori , ari itiancavetaca pashini iratiritepee , icarajeiveta oshequi . Iro cantaincha yoashinoncaajeitavaqueri yora amenirori ovamashi .

text: But last of all he sent unto them his son , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Impoiji iquenqueshiretaque yora ashitarori : " Meeca nontianqueri notomi . Iriitatsi impincatsatavaque irinti " . Ari itiancavetacari iriori .

text: But when the husbandmen saw the son , they said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and let us seize on his inheritance .
text2: Iro cantaincha ineajeitantavacariri , icantanirotavacaaca : " Coraquetaqueni yora itomi ashitarori iroamashite . Ariorica incame iriri , iriotaque ashitajearoneri ovamashi . Tsame avavaqueri , impoiji ashijeitajearo arori ovamashi " .

text: And they caught him , and cast him out of the vineyard , and slew him .
text2: Ari yaajeitavaqueri , shepi ; yaanaqueri anta otsapiqui , yoaqueri , shemi .

text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh , what will he do unto those husbandmen ?
text2: Ariorica impocaque yora ashitarori iroamashite , aamaaca , 多 jaoca incantapeeriri yora amenavetanariri iroamashite ?

text: They say unto him , He will miserably destroy those wicked men , and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen , which shall render him the fruits in their seasons .
text2: Icantajeitiri : - - Tempa iraanirojeiteri , iroashinoncaajeiteri , iroajeiteri . Impoiji iramenaje pashinipee cameetsatatsiri , amenajenerine iroamashite , yora paaranterineri irinti oitsoqui irovate .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Did ye never read in the scriptures , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner : this is the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Ari icantiri Jesoshi : - - Tempa pineanatiro ocantiri Sanquenarentsi : " Itseencaquero mapi yora vetsiquirori pancotsi , iro cantaincha ipeaquero Tasorentsi otincamiaro pancotsi . Tempa icameetsataque Avincatsarite , tempa avajeitanaquero cavaco maaroni yantajeitiri " .

text: Therefore say I unto you , The kingdom of God shall be taken from you , and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof .
text2: Irootaque nocantajeitantimpiri : eiro pineajeitiritsi Tasorentsi impincatsariventajeitempi . Irintiquea irinti impincatsariventajeiteri pashinipee : yora pincatsatasanojeiterineri , quemisantasanojeiterineri .

text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken : but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Naro shiacantachari mapi nocantaquempiri : terica piotavaquena , pashinoncayea ; terica pinquemisantena , pijate Sharincaveniqui .

text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables , they perceived that he spake of them .
text2: Ari iquemajeitavaqueri yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee aisati yora variseopee . Iojeitaque irio iquenquetsatacotaqueri Jesoshi .

text: But when they sought to lay hands on him , they feared the multitude , because they took him for a prophet .
text2: Icoajeivetaca iraacanterime Jesoshi , iro cantaincha itsaroacaajeitacari atiripee . Iotaqueri atiripee queario iquenquetsatacotaqueri Jesoshi Tasorentsi .

text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables , and said ,
text2: Pashini aisati ishiacantiniri Jesoshi , icantajeitiri :

text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king , which made a marriage for his son ,
text2: - - Noshiacantempiro jaoca icanta Tasorentsi ipincatsariventanti . Itimi pincatsari itomi aatsineri ijina . Impoiji icoaque pincatsari iriveshireimentajeiteari ishanincapee itomi . Icajemacantajeivetacari iroacaajeitearime .

text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding : and they would not come .
text2: Itiancavetacari inampirepee , icajemacantajeivetacari ishaninca , iro cantaincha , te impocajeiteji .

text: Again , he sent forth other servants , saying , Tell them which are bidden , Behold , I have prepared my dinner : my oxen and my fatlings are killed , and all things are ready : come unto the marriage .
text2: Itiancavetaja aisati , icantiri : " Pincamanteri yora nocajemacantaqueri : ' Vetsicayetaca maaroni . Yoayetaqueri vaca aisati vacajaniqui . Caate piveshireimenteari itomi aatsineri ijina ' " .

text: But they made light of it , and went their ways , one to his farm , another to his merchandise :
text2: Iro cantaincha te inquemisantavaqueriji , irointi ijajeitanaque jaocarica . Ijati aparo iroanequi , irio pashini ijati iomparita .

text: And the remnant took his servants , and entreated them spitefully , and slew them .
text2: Irio pashinipee yaajeitavaqueri itiancane , shepi ; yoashinoncaavaqueri , impoiji yoajeitavaqueri , shemi .

text: But when the king heard thereof , he was wroth : and he sent forth his armies , and destroyed those murderers , and burned up their city .
text2: Ari iquisanaca yora pincatsari . Itiancaqueri soraro , yoapaaqueri yora oaqueriri itiancane aisati itaitaqueri ivancopee .

text: Then saith he to his servants , The wedding is ready , but they which were bidden were not worthy .
text2: Impoiji icantiri itsipapee inampirepee : " Vetsicayetaca maaroni , iro cantaincha te incameetsateji yora nocajemacantajeivetacari " .

text: Go ye therefore into the highways , and as many as ye shall find , bid to the marriage .
text2: Pijajeite meeca anta nampitsiqui , pincantajeiteri maaroni pineajeitaqueri : " Caate avinti avincatsaritequi , piveshireimenteari itomi aatsineri ijina " .

text: So those servants went out into the highways , and gathered together all as many as they found , both bad and good : and the wedding was furnished with guests .
text2: Ari ijajeitanaque , yapatojeitaqueri maaroni ineajeitaqueri : cameetsayetatsiri , caari cameetsayetatsi , maaroni . Ijaajeitapaacaro pancotsi .

text: And when the king came in to see the guests , he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment :
text2: Ari ijataque yora pincatsari ivetsajeitavacari pocajeitaintsiri . Ineaqueri aparoni shirampari caari quitsaatacha cameetsa .

text: And he saith unto him , Friend , how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment ? And he was speechless .
text2: Icantiri : " Noshaninca , nopajeivetaquempi quitsaarentsi cameetsari pinquitsaatimentearimeri notomi . 多 Paita caari piquitsaatantaro ? " Te iranqueji .

text: Then said the king to the servants , Bind him hand and foot , and take him away , and cast him into outer darkness ; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ari icantiri inampire : " Poisoteri iracoqui aisati iitiqui . Pojoqueri anta otsitenitaquenta , anta itiminta iraajeitachari aisati cavintsaajeitachari " .

text: For many are called , but few are chosen .
text2: Pineaquero : icajemacantavetacari oshequi , iro cantaincha te irishequiteji yora icoyeasanotaqueri .

text: Then went the Pharisees , and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk .
text2: Impoiji ijajeitanaque variseopee , yoametavacaajeitaca : - - 多 Jaoca ancanteriri Jesoshi ancomitacanteariri ? Ariorica incomitaquea , irosati anquisacantanteariri .

text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians , saying , Master , we know that thou art true , and teachest the way of God in truth , neither carest thou for any man : for thou regardest not the person of men .
text2: Impoiji itiancajeitaqueri iroamerepee , itsipajeitacari oijatiriri Eroreshi . Isampijeitapaaqueri Jesoshi : - - Oametanari , niojeiti queario poametantaque . Cameetsa poametantiro irineane Tasorentsi , te pintsaroacayeariji itsipapee atiri , aisati te pimpincatsateriji .

text: Tell us therefore , What thinkest thou ? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar , or not ?
text2: Meeca pincamantena paitarica piquenqueshiretiri : 多 ocameetsatimpa amperi Sesari airequite ? 多 Tericampa oncameetsateji ?

text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness , and said , Why tempt ye me , ye hypocrites ?
text2: Iro cantaincha iotaque Jesoshi icoajeivetaca iramatavijeiterime . Isampitiri : - - 多 Paita picoantacari pamatavitena ? Te pincameetsateji .

text: Shew me the tribute money . And they brought unto him a penny .
text2: Pinijayenari quirequi pipapinitiriri oromasati . Ari yamaqueneri apamentaquiro , ipajiyeetiri tenario .

text: And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ?
text2: Ari isampitiri : - - 多 Janicampa ashitarori ishiacantaro oca ? 多 Jaoca opajitari ivajiro oca sanquenataincharica ?

text: They say unto him , Caesar ' s . Then saith he unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar ' s ; and unto God the things that are God ' s .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Tempa Sesari . Ari icantiri : - - Panteneri Sesari icoacaimpiri , aisati panteneri Tasorentsi icoacaimpiri iriori .

text: When they had heard these words , they marvelled , and left him , and went their way .
text2: Iquemajeitavaqueri , irosati yoajeitantanacari cavaco . Ari ijajeitanaji .

text: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection , and asked him ,
text2: Impoiji yora saroseopee ipocashitaqueri Jesoshi , ijitashijeitaca iriori eiro atinaajeitajatsi , eiro ajajeititsi inquitequi . Ari isampitapaaqueri :

text: Saying , Master , Moses said , If a man die , having no children , his brother shall marry his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: - - Oametanari , icantini peerani Moishishi : " Ontimerica shirampari ijina , iro cantaincha te intimacayeroji itomipee . Impoiji incamaquerica , ocameetsati iraajero irirentini ijinani , intimacayero otomi , iro cantaincha irishiacanteri itomini irirentini " .

text: Now there were with us seven brethren : and the first , when he had married a wife , deceased , and , having no issue , left his wife unto his brother :
text2: Ari itimi shirampari aisati irirenti , icarajeiti 6 . Yaavetajaro ijina , iro cantaincha te intimacayeroji itomi . Impoiji icamaque iriori , torein . Yaavetajaro aisati irirentini , te intimacayeroji aisati , impoiji icamaque .

text: Likewise the second also , and the third , unto the seventh .
text2: Aisati iquempejeitaca irirentipee , maaroni aajeivetajarori : te intimacayeroji itomipee .

text: And last of all the woman died also .
text2: Impoiji ocamaque iroori tsinane , torein .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven ? for they all had her .
text2: Ariorica intinaajeitanaje , 多 janicampa aajeroneri ? Pamene , ijinantajeiveitaroni maaroni .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Ye do err , not knowing the scriptures , nor the power of God .
text2: Ari yacanaqueri : - - Oshequi picomijeitacaro . Te piojeiteroji Sanquenarentsi , aisati te pioteji itasorentsitasanoti Tasorentsi .

text: For in the resurrection they neither marry , nor are given in marriage , but are as the angels of God in heaven .
text2: Ariorica antinaajeitanaje , tecatsi aajantsineri . Maaroni tinaajantsineri inquempejeitajeari inampirepee Tasorentsi : eiro yaajeitapaajitsi ijina .

text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead , have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God , saying ,
text2: Intinaajeitanaje maaroni camajeitatsiri , tempa pineanatiro icantimpiri Tasorentsi :

text: I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? God is not the God of the dead , but of the living .
text2: " Narotaque Tasorentsi : ipincatsataquena Avarama , ipincatsataquena Isaca , ipincatsataquena Jacovo " . Te incanteji : " Ipincatsaveitanani " , pineaquero , aneatsi meeca inajeiti : irootaque ipincatsajeitantacariri . Aisati , aneatsi inajeiti , irootaque ipincatsariventantariri iriori Tasorentsi .

text: And when the multitude heard this , they were astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Noquemajeitantacarori oca , noajeitanaqueri cavaco , nocantajeiti : - - Tempa cameetsa yoametanti Jesoshi .
