text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence , they were gathered together .
text2: Iquemajeitaque variseopee cameetsa yacanaqueri Jesoshi saroseopee , irootaque itsaroacantajeitanacariri iriori irineanatajeri aisati . Ari ipocashitaqueri iriori variseopee Jesoshi .

text: Then one of them , which was a lawyer , asked him a question , tempting him , and saying ,
text2: Icoajeivetaca incomitacayearime . Icarajeitiri aparoni oametantirori Sanquenarentsi , isampitiri :

text: Master , which is the great commandment in the law ?
text2: - - Oametanari , ainiro oshequi oamejeitaquee Sanquenarentsi : 多 paita cameetsatasanotatsiri anquemisantajeiteri ?

text: Jesus said unto him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Iro cameetsatasanotatsiri oca : " Pinintasanoteri catsini Tasorentsi , yora Avincatsarite : pinquearioventero pinintasanoteri , pincantaitatiyempani " .

text: This is the first and great commandment .
text2: Irootaque anaacotantatsiri isanquenajeitiri .

text: And the second is like unto it , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Otimi otsipa , quempetarori : " Oquempeta picavintsaaja avisati , pincavintsaajeiteri pishanincapee " .

text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets .
text2: Ariorica pimajeitaquero oca , ari pimoncarajeitaquero maaroni isanquenatiniri Moishishi , aisati maaroni isanquenatiniri yora quenquetsatacantatsiniri .

text: While the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus asked them ,
text2: Ari Jesoshi isampijeitiri yora variseopee apatotimentajeitariri : - - 多 Paita piquenqueshiretacotiriri Quirishito ? 多 Janica irishanincateari ?

text: Saying , What think ye of Christ ? whose son is he ? They say unto him , The Son of David .
text2: Yacajeitanaqueri : - - Irishanincateari Iravirini .

text: He saith unto them , How then doth David in spirit call him Lord , saying ,
text2: Icantiri : - - Peerani osanquenatacaaqueri Ishire Tasorentsi Iravirini , icantantariri Quirishito : " Novincatsarite " . Tempa piotiro isanquenare : " Yora Tasorentsi icantiri Novincatsarite : ' Pisavique , notiomi , nacosanoriqui , pincaratena ampincatsariventante . Aitaque pisavique irosati nontsoncajeitanteariri maaroni quisajeitaquempiri ' " . 多 Paita icantantariri Iravirini : " Novincatsarite " ?

text: If David then call him Lord , how is he his son ?
text2: Iriorica Quirishito ivincatsarite Iravirini , 多 paita picantantariri irio ishanincani ? Tempa amejeita apincatsajeitiri jivajeiteeri itimi .

text: And no man was able to answer him a word , neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions .
text2: Tecatsi incantajeitea irancanaqueri . Aisati itsaroacaajeitacari itsipapee irisampiterime iriori .

text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude , and to his disciples ,
text2: Impoiji icantajeitaqueri Jesoshi apatotimentajeitariri , aisati icantaquena narori , aisati icantajeitaqueri iriori itsipapee iroamere :

text: Saying , The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses ' seat :
text2: - - Yora oametantirori Sanquenarentsi aisati yora variseopee ijitashijeivetaca iquempetacari Moishishi : oshequi iperanatashijeitaquempi .

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: Ocameetsaveta pantayetero paitapeerica icantayetimpiri , iro cantaincha eiro pantirotsi yantashiyetari iriori . Icantajeivetimpi : " Cameetsa pintime " , iro cantaincha te intimeji iriori cameetsa . Te irimateroji iriori icantajeivetimpiri .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Oshequi opomerentsitimojeitaquempi pantajeitaquero icantajeitaquempiri , iro cantaincha te impomerentsiventearoji iriori .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: Yantashiyetaro paitapeerica pineanteariri , pineacameetsatanteariri . Imavacotacaro irineane Tasorentsi iracoqui aisati yamatseetacotacaro ivancainaqui ; antearo oni , pincantajeitanteariri : " Pineaqueri , quemisantincari ini " . Aisati oshequi yoanencashitacaro iitsaare ocaratapai .

text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Ariorica yoajeita , icoasanotaque intsipatapiniteari pincatsatatsiri . Aisati anta yapatojeitanta icoasanotaque savicamentotsi cameetsari .

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: Icoaque cameetsa pivetsajeiteari anta nampitsiqui , icoaque pincantajeiteri : " Oametanari " .

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: Iro cantaincha avinti , eiro piquempetaritsi : eiro picoitsi incanteetempi : " Oametanari " . Iriotaque Tasorentsi oamejeitimpiri ; avirojei , pimoncaratavacaajeitaca .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Aca quipatsiqui eiro picantashitaritsi itsipapee : " Apa " . Itimi Piri apaniro anta inquitequi .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: Aisati eiro pishinetiritsi incanteetempi : " Novincatsarite " . Itimi pivincatsarite apaniro , yora Quirishito .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: Pincoaquerica pimpincatsaritanaque , pijivate pintacojeiteari itsipapee .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Ariorica pincantajeiteri : " Nompincatsariventempi " , ari pishemetaque catsini , iro cantaincha iroashinoncayempi Tasorentsi . Impeajeri pincatsaritajantsine maaroni caari shemejeitatsi .

text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: Icantiri Jesoshi yora oametantirori Sanquenarentsi aisati variseopee : - - Oshequi pamatavitantajeiti , coajica irootaque oshequi pashinoncaajeitanteari . Eiro pijatitsi anta ipincatsaritinta Tasorentsi , aisati te pincoacayeriji itsipapee irijate iriori .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: Oshequi pamatavitantajeiti , coajica irootaque oshequi pashinoncaajeitanteari . Picoshitaquero camajimentaaro ovanco ; pishiacantavetaca piquenquetsatacairi Tasorentsi , pisamaninirotashitacaro , vero , vero , vero . Aitaque iroasanquetasanojeitempi Tasorentsi .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: Oshequi pamatavitantajeiti , coajica irootaque oshequi pashinoncaajeitanteari . Oshequi pipomerentsiventacaacari itsipa atiri pipeantacariri jorio . Impoiji poametiri yamatavitanti , inquempetantempiri irijatanteari Sharincaveniqui .

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: Oshequi pamatavitanti : piquempetacari caari amenatsi yora acatsatiriri iyamarajaquiririnte . Pashinoncaajeitanaquea . Picantashinirota : " Ariorica ancante : ' Tempa otimi ivanco Tasorentsi , piotanteari eiro namatavitimpitsi ' , ari ocameetsati amatavitante . Iro cantaincha ariorica ancante : ' Tempa otimi oro anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi , piotanteari eiro namatavitimpitsi ' , ari eiro amatavitanti " .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: 多 Paitasa picantantari ? Te pionirojeiteji catsini . Oshequi pineaveetashita . 多 Paita cameetsatasanotatsiri ? 多 Irompa oro cameetsatasanotatsiri ? 多 Irompa ivanco Tasorentsi cameetsatasanotatsiri ? Tempa irootaque ocameetsatantari oro otimi ivancoqui Tasorentsi .

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Aisati picantashinirojeita : " Ariorica ancante : ' Tempa otimi atantanariri Tasorentsi avira , piotanteari eiro namatavitimpitsi ' , ari ocameetsati amatavitante . Iro cantaincha ariorica ancante : ' Tempa itimi avira avaqueneri Tasorentsi , antaaqueneri , piotanteari eiro namatavitimpitsi ' , ari eiro amatavitantitsi catsini " .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: 多 Paitasa picantantari ? Te pionirojeiteji catsini . 多 Paita cameetsatasanotatsiri ? 多 Iriompa pivira ? 多 Irompa pitaantanariri Tasorentsi pivira ? Tempa irootaque icameetsatantari pivira pitaaqueneri Tasorentsi .

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Pamene , oshequi picanti : " Tempa otimi ataantanariri Tasorentsi " , " Tempa otimi ivanco Tasorentsi " , " Tempa otimi inquite " , paitapeerica . Picantashinirotaro , impoiji pijitashiniroveta ocameetsati pamatavitanti . 多 Pijitimpa te intimeji Tasorentsi ? Noncamantempi : itsoteaquero itasorenca maaroni . Iojeitiro pantajeitiri , iroasanquetimentempiro maaroni pamatavitanti .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: Oshequi pamatavitantajeiti , coajica irootaque oshequi pashinoncaajeitanteari . Pamene , timatsi pimayevetacari . Ariorica paaque piirequite 10 , pipaqueri Tasorentsi aparoni ; ariorica paaque 10 oshi pipanquitiri , jero pipavetacari aparoni oshi . Iro cantaincha te pinquenqueshireteroji icoacaasanovetaquempiri Tasorentsi : icoaveta pintimeme cameetsa , icoaveta pincavintsayerime pishaninca , icoaveta pinquemisanterime . Oncameetsateme pimajeiterome maaroni ocapee , impoiji ariorica paaque paitapeerica oncarate 10 , aparoni pimpaqueri Tasorentsi . Yovaajiniri , icantajiri aisati :

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: - - Te pioteji catsini , iro cantaincha picoajeiveta poamejeiterime itsipapee . Oshequi piquearioventavetacaro pipomerentsiventasanovetacaro caari icoacaasanotimpi Tasorentsi ; iro cantaincha te pinquenqueshiretimateroji capichaji oca icoacaasanovetimpiri .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: Oshequi pamatavitantajeiti , coajica irootaque oshequi pashinoncaajeitanteari . Piquivasanovetaro piramento otapiiqui , iro cantaincha te pinquiveroji osantequi : oshequi oshititaque . Aisati piquempejeita avirori , poameetsantashita ineacameetsajeitantimpiri ashanincapee , iro cantaincha pishirequi te pincameetsateji catsini : oshequi picoshitapiniti aisati oshequi pinevetaro vaararontsi .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: Te piojeiteji catsini . Pijivate pinquivasanotero osantequi , impoiji eiro oquipatsitajitsi aisati otapiiqui . Arioricame pincameetsashiretaqueme , irineacameetsajeitempime ashanincapee .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: Oshequi pamatavitantajeiti , coajica irootaque oshequi pashinoncaajeitanteari . Piquempejeitacaro yoanteetariri camatsiri , ipotsotiro quitamarori . Ocameetsavetaca saiteriquica , iro cantaincha tsompoina oshititaque , ojaacaro itonqui camatsiri .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Ineacameetsajeivetaro ashanincapee pantayetiri , iro cantaincha te pincameetsashireteji : oshequi pamatavitanti aisati oshequi pantapinitiro caari cameetsatatsi .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: Oshequi pamatavitantajeiti , coajica irootaque oshequi pashinoncaajeitanteari . Peerani yora pishanincapeeni yoajeitaqueri quenquetsajeitironiri irineane Tasorentsi , yora cameetsatatsiniri . Meeca povetsicajeitiro pancotsipee pinquenqueshirejeitanteariri yora quenquetsatacantatsiniri . Poanencayetaquero cameetsa . Picantanirojeiti : " Nontimitaqueame nainti peerani , eiro noajeitirime , eiro noquempetarime nainti noshanincani oajeitaqueriniri " .

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: Picanti avirori : " Noshanincajeitacari yora peeraniniri " . Queario oca picantanirojeitiri .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: Aisati piquempejeitacari , avirojeitaque oayeri . Tempa iriojeitaque intacaroniri , meeca aviro vaajeitajirori poantaji .

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: Piquempejeitacari maranque , te pincameetsajeiteji catsini . 多 Pijijeitimpa eiro pijajeititsi Sharincaveniqui ?

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: Aisati icantajeitaqueri Jesoshi : - - Nontianquempiri coajica itsipapee quenquetsatacoterineri Tasorentsi , iotasanotiriri , oametanteroneri irineane . Niotaque povaaranteri , pashinipee pimpajacotaaranteri , itsipapee pimpasanataaranteri anta papatojeitanta , itsipapee aisati pinquisaaranteri jaocarica irijayetanaqueri .

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Ainiro pantanejei avirori , picoacaajeitaqueri incamajeitaque maaroni cameetsatatsiri : yora Averini , maaroni . Aisati yora Sacariashi , yora itomini Verequiashini : iquemisantacaavetacari ashanincani anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi , iro cantaincha yoajeitaqueri . Pintimitaqueame avirori , pamijeitaquerime poajeitaquerime avirori . Pashi poajeitiro poantajeiti .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: Aitaque iroasanquetimentajeitaquempiri Tasorentsi maaroni picoacaajeitaqueri incame .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: Jo , aviro jerosaresati . Oshequi poapinitiri quenquetsatacotiriri Tasorentsi , pipichaavaqueri maaroni itiancayevetimpiri . Oquempeta teapa osaramonquitari orijanipee , ocavintsairi , nocoaveta nonquempetearome narori , noncavintsaajeitempime . Iro cantaincha te pincoajeiteji .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Jero ivanco Tasorentsi pineacameetsajeitaqueri : eiro nopiashitajarotsi aisati . Aisati Apa , eiro ipocashitajirotsi iriori .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Eiro pineapinijeitajanatsi aisati . Apanivani pineajeitavajena aisati , pincantajeite : " Icameetsataque Jesoshi , iriotaque Avincatsarite tianquiriri " .

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: Ari iponeaca Jesoshi ivancoqui Tasorentsi , irotajantsi irijataje . Ari nojatashitaqueri , nocarajeitaqueri itsipapee iroamere , namenacaajeitaqueri ivanco Tasorentsi aisati otsipapee pancotsi .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Ari icantaquena : - - Ari pineamempeajeivetacaro meeca oca pancotsipeeca . Queario oca noncamantempiri : coajica intireetajero maaroni , irovarayeetajero maaroni mapipee .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Ari nojajeitanaque toncaariqui ipajiyeetiro Orivomashi . Isavicapaaque Jesoshi , ari nojatashitaqueri , nosampijeitaqueri : - - Pincamantajeitena : 多 jaoca oncarate intireetantajearori pancotsipee ? 多 Paita iotacayenane jaoca oncarate pimpocantajeari ? 多 Jaoca oncarate omoncaratantajeari maaroni picantaquenari ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: Yacanaquena : - - Queariompiya , yamataviyeetimpicari .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Intime oshequi pocatsine , cantapaatsine : " Narotaque nainti Quirishito " . Iramataviyetapeeri oshequi atiri .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Pinquemapiniteri incante : " Imanatavacaajeita atiripee anta " . Incante itsipa : " Coajica irimanatavacaajeitea anta " . Iro cantaincha eiro piquenqueshirejeitatsi . Aitaque oncanteari irimanatavacaajeitea , iro cantaincha tequeratsita omoncarateaji maaroni nocantaquempiri .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Aitaque oncanteari yora atiri inquisajeitanaqueri itsipapee atiri ; intime pashinipee quemajeiterone itashe , iro cantaincha eiro otimanajitsi iroanajeari ; aisati onicapinitea quipatsi ;

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: iro cantaincha eirotsita iquematsicaatasanotarotsi .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: Pashini aisati icantaquena : - - Ariorica iriojeitanaque atiri piquemisantajeitaquena , iroashinoncaapinijeitempi , iroaarantempi , inquisajeitempi maaroni atiri .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Intime oshequi jocayeteroneri iquemisanti , impoiji inquisaqueri quemisantasanotaintsiri , iraacantayeteri , paitapeerica .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Intime amatavitantatsineri , incantavetea : " Nonquemisantacayempi " , iro cantaincha iramatavijeiteri maaroni quemisantavetavaquearine .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Oshequi irantajeitero atiri caari cameetsatatsi , oshequi catsini , impoiji irijocajeitajero inintavacaajeitani .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Iro cantaincha noavisacojeiteri maaroni quearioventanarori nocantaqueriri .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Pijajeitanaque maaroni quipatsiqui , pincamantajeiteri maaroni atiri nocoaque nompincatsariventajeiteri ; impoijiquea omoncaratea maaroni nocantaquempiri .

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: Aisati icamantajeitana Jesoshi : - - Peerani isanquenatini yora Iranieri , yora camantantatsiniri , icantini : " Intime coajica anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi caari cameetsatatsine , iramparajeitero maaroni " . Tempa piotiro oca noquenquetsatacotiri . Ariorica pineaqueri yoca nocamantacotiri ,

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: aisati pintimerica Joreaqui , pishiajeitanaque toncaariqui .

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Ariorica pisavique saiteriqui , eiro pijatapanajantitsi pivancoqui paantapanajantearori pivaararo , irointi pishiasanotanaque .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Aisati pintimerica oantsiqui , eiro pipiashitapaintarotsi otsipa piitsaare .

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Oshequi ashinoncaajeitanaquea tsinane tsomontetatsineri aisati antsotayerine ojananequite : eiro omatirotsi oshiasanotanaque .

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Aitaque coajica pishiajeitanaque , iro cantaincha pincanteri Tasorentsi eiro pishiantatsi incaniniqui aisati quitaiteriqui pimaoreajeitantari .

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: Aisati icanti : - - Aitaque oshequi iroashinoncaajeitempi . Pashinoncaasanojeitanaquea , panaacojeiteri maaroni peeraniniri aisati maaroni timajantsineri coajica .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Arioricame osamanitanaqueme iroashinoncaajeitempime , pintsoncajeiteame maaroni ; iro cantaincha incavintsaajeiteri Tasorentsi maaroni quemisanterineri incoyeajeiteri , irootaque eiro osamanitanta iroashinoncayeetempi .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: Ariorica incanteetempi : " Pamene , jeri yoca Quirishito " , eiro pishiretavacarotsi incantempiri . Aisati , incanteetempirica : " Nijaantapaaja anta Quirishito " , eiro pishiretavacarotsi .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Intime oshequi amatavitantatsineri , incante : " Naro Quirishito " , irio itsipa : " Naro quenquetsatacotiriri Tasorentsi " . Oshequi intasoncantayete , iramatavijeiteri oshequi savicajeitatsineri , iro cantaincha eiro imatiritsi yora quemisantasanotatsineri .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: Piquemaquena nocamantitaquempiro jaoca oncanteari coajicani .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: Incantempirica : " Timatsi Quirishito anta caaraiteriqui " , eiro patsipetashitatsi pijatashitena . Ariorica incantempi : " Ainiro Quirishito anta pancotsiqui tsompoina " , eiro pishiretarotsi .

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Ari noponeaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Tempa imapocapinitimpi iporequi , porec , impoiji otsoteapaintiro inquitequi : aisati nonquempetapaajea narori , ariorica nompocaje . Nomapocajeitapaajempi , iro cantaincha pineajeitavajena , maaroni .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Jaocarica icamapinitiri camatsiri , aitaque ipocashitapinitiri tisoni . Aisati oquempetaca , oshequi itseencanti joriopee , irootaque impocashitanteariri oshequi amatavijeiterineri .

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: Aisati icanti Jesoshi : - - Ari oshequi ompomerentsitimojeiteri atiri , maaroni : irashinoncaajeitanaquea . Impoiji intsipaite intsivacanaque catsirincaiteri , aisati yora cashiri ; impariajeitanaque impoquiropee , irishevajeitanaquea maaroni inquitesati .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: Impoiji nonconijatapaaje anta inquitequi , irosati iroashirejeitantanaqueari maaroni tseencajeitanari . Irineajeitavaquena maaroni atiri nonquenapaaje mencoriqui : nompincatsaritasanotapaaque , noshipaquireasanotapaaque .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: Nontiotapaaque iriojeitanteari maaroni nonampire impocajeitantapeempari iramajeitantapeempariri maaroni quemisantajeitanari , maaroni nocoyeajeitaqueri . Intsoncajeitanaqueri savicajeitatsiri pashinipeequi quipatsi , maaroni .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: Pashini icantajeitaquena Jesoshi : - - Meeca noshiacantempiro iyera : pinquenqueshiretasanotero . Ariorica oshiocajempequitanaje , aisati oshitanaje , ari piojeitanaque irotimatajantsi onquimojantsitaje .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Aisati oquempetaca : ariorica pineajeitavaquero oca nocantaquempiri , piojeitanaque irotajantsi nompocaje .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Eirotsitarica picamajeiti , ario pineajeitavaquero maaroni oca nocamantaquempiri .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Ompeanaquea inquite aisati quipatsi , iro cantaincha eiro opeatsi irointi noneane . Omoncaratajea maaroni nocantaquempiri .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: Pashini aisati icantajeitaquena Jesoshi : - - Iro cantaincha tecatsi iotatsine jaocarica oncarate : te irioteji inampirepee Apa , aisati te nioteji narori . Irinti Apa apaniro ioti .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Peerani itimaveitani Noeni , yoapinijeita ishaninca , ishinquitapinijeita , yaapinijeitiro ijina , maaroni . Te inquenqueshirejeiteroji icamantavetariri : " Coraquetaque oonquea " . Impoiji itetacaro pitotsi , yashitacotanaca , tarocn . Impoiji aisati omapocajeitaqueri atiri incani , ooncanaca , itsoncajeitanaca , itsitiajeitanaque . Aisati inquempejeitaquea maaroni atiri , ariorica omoncaratapaaquea nompocantajeari narori : eiro iquenqueshirejeitatsi , nomapocajeitapaajeri . Impoiji irashinoncaajeitanaquea maaroni tseencajeitatsiri .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Intimerica apite tsameetatsineri anta oantsiqui : naanajeri aparoni nontsipatanaqueari , irio itsipa eiro naanajiritsi .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Ontime apite tsinane tononqueroneri tirico : naanajero aparoni nontsipatanaquearo , iro otsipa eiro naanajirotsi .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: Aisati icantana : - - Paamaajeitena , pinquenqueshiretapinijeitena : te piojeiteji jaoca oncarate nompocantajeari . Nomapocapaimpicari .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: Oquempetaca yora ashitarori ivanco icoshiyeetiri : irioteme irotaintsi impoque coshiterineri , irisaaquiteme , eiro ishinetirime incoshiteri , irointi iroimpiavajerime .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Aisati narori , paamaajeitena : nomapoquimpicari .

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: Pinquempejeiteari nampirentsi cameetsari , yora iotasanotatsiri . Icantiri nampitariri : " Aviro vetsicapiniteroneri iroajeiteari notomi , pimpapiniteri cameetsa " .

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Ariorica irineaqueri cameetsa yovetsicapinitiro yoari , ari incanteri : " Cameetsa pantayetaquero nocoacayetaquempiri . Meeca aviro quempoyeajenarone maaroni timimojeitanari . Cameetsa nompinatempi , nioti eiro pamatavitanatsi " . Tempa ari inquimoshiretanaque inampire .

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: Iro cantaincha intimerica itsipa inampire , caari quemisanterine yora nampitariri . Incante irinti : " Meeca jataque ini nampitanari , eirotsita ipiajatsi " .

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: Iquisaqueri itsipa nampirentsi , icapojapiniyetiri , ishinquitapinitaca .

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: Impoiji imapocapaajiri yora nampitariri : te iraamaajeariji .

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ari yoasanquetapaaqueri , itiancaqueri arejiqui itsipajeitantapeempariri yora amatavitantatsiri . Ari anta yoashiretasanotanaca aisati oshequi icavintsaanaca . Eiro piquempejeitaritsi avinti , irintiquea pinquempejeitea quemisantasanotiriri nampitariri .

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: Pashini aisati icamantaquena Jesoshi : - - Meeca noshiacantempiro aisati jaoca icanta Tasorentsi ipincatsariventanti . Otimi 10 evancaro , coatsiri amenavaqueri ojimetsori impoque . Otsitenitanaque , irosati aantayetacaro otsioro .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: Ari ocarataque evancaro iotasanotaintsiri apapacoroni , aisati ocarataque caari iotatsi iroori apapacoroni .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Aavetacaro iroori otsioro , iro cantaincha te ayeji oja orivo .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: Irointi ora iotatsiri , aacotanaquero oja , ontsiotantearori .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Ari osamanitanaque , tequera impoque . Impoiji aajeitaquero ovochoquine , omaajeitanaque .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: Ari nianquiite oquematii icanteetaquero : " Coraquetapaaque pijimetsori , pijate pamenajeitavaqueri " .

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: Ari otinaajeitanaca , ovetsicajeivetaro otsioro .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Ocantavetaro caari iotatsi : " Pimpena narori oja , irotaintsi ontsivaque notsioro " .

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: Iro cantaincha acanaquero ora quenqueshiretainchari : " Eiro nopimpirotsi , eiro onarotsi oja . Nompempirica , tecatsi nontsiotanaqueari narori . Pijajeite pamanantanontapaintea avirori " .

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: Ari ojatanaque amanantavetapainta . Jentsipaite yareetapaaca ojimetsori , iqueanaque anta yoajeitanta , icarajeitaquero ora vetsicajeitainchari , yashitacojeitanaca .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: Impoiji opiavetaja caari quenqueshireacha , ocantavetapaacari : " Pashitareajenaro narori , noneapaajempi " .

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: Iro cantaincha yacanaquero : " Te niotempiji , janicampirica . Te noncoyeji pimpocashitena aca " .

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: Pinquenqueshiretero oca noshiacantimpiri : paamayena , te piojeiteji jaocarica oncarate nompocantajeari .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: Icantaquena aisati : - - Pashini noshiacantempiro jaoca icanta Tasorentsi ipincatsariti . Oquempetaca ijatanaque ashitaarantachari pashiniqui nampitsi . Ijivataque icajemajeitaqueri maaroni inampirepee , icantaqueri : " Nocoaque pinquempoyeajeitenari noirequite " .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: Icantiri aparo : " Jeri S . 200 , 000 , pinquempoyeajenari " . Irio icantiri itsipa : " Jeri S . 80 , 000 , pinquempoyeajenari " . Irio itsipa aisati ipaqueri S . 40 , 000 inquempoyeanteariri . Irio anaacotantaintsiri ioti yora ipasanotaqueri oshequi . Yora caari ipasanoti , irio caari iotasanotatsi . Ari ipajeitaqueri , impoiji ijatanaque pashiniqui nampitsi .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Yora aasanotiriri quirequi oshequi ijatanaque iomparita . Yoshequiasanotaqueneri iirequite ivatorote , icaratiri S . 200 , 000 aisati .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Aisati iomparita yora airiri S . 80 , 000 . Yoshequiaqueri aisati , yaantacari aisati itsipa S . 80 , 000 .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: Iro cantaincha irinti aavetariri S . 40 , 000 , yaanajiri quirequi , itijiri omoroqui quipatsi .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: Impoiji ipiaja yora ivatorote , icantapairi : " Pimpajeitena meeca noirequite " .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: Ari ipocaque yora aaqueriri S . 200 , 000 , yamaqueri aisati itsipapee S . 200 , 000 . Icantiri : " Jeri quirequi pipaquenari . Oshequi niomparitaca , noshequiasanotaqueri . Jeri itsipa quirequi , icarati aisati S . 200 , 000 " .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Ari icantiri ivatorote : " Cameetsataque , pimatasanotaquero nocoacaaquempiri . Chapinqui piquempoyeajanari capichaji , nocoaque meeca pinquempoyeajenari oshequi aisati . Nocoaque oshequi noveshireacayempi " .

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: Impoiji ipocapaaque yora airiri S . 80 , 000 . Icantiri ivatorote : " Jerica quirequi pipaquenari . Oshequi niomparitaca , noshequiasanotaqueri . Jeri itsipa quirequi , icarati aisati S . 80 , 000 " .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Icantiri ivatorote : " Cameetsataque , pimataquenaro nocoacaaquempiri . Chapinqui piquempoyeajanari capichaji , nocoaque meeca pinquempoyeajenari aisati oshequi . Oshequi noveshireacayempi " .

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: Impoitapaaque yora aavetariri S . 40 , 000 , icantapaaqueri : " Niotaquempi avirori , te pincavintsante , oshequi notsaroacaimpi . Nojiti ariorica noshequiaquerime piirequite , ari paapitsatenarime maaroni , irootaque caari niomparitanta . Notijaqueri piirequite , maaroni . Jerica , noipiajimpiri " .

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: Yacanaqueri : " Te pincameetsateji , oshequi piperataca . Piovetaca nocoavetaca narori irishequianaqueme noirequite .

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: 多 Paita caari pipantari yora itsipa quempoyeapinitiriri quirequi ? Pimpajerime iriori , impinataquename , naantajeameri aisati . Aisati iroimpiajenarime maaroni nashisanori " .

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Ari icantiri itsipa inampire : " Paapitsatajeri noirequite , pimpajeri yora ashitasanotariri meeca S . 400 , 000 .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: Nompasanoteri yora ashitaarantachari . Irintiquea yora caari ashitaarantacha , naapitsatajeri ora capichaji timimovetariri .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Meeca paanajeri yoca anta otsiteniitetinta : te incameetsateji . Nocoaque incarajeiteri maaroni yora oashirejeitachari aisati ashinoncaajeitachari " .

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: Impoiji icantajeitana Jesoshi : - - Noponeaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Coajica nojatanaje , impoiji nompiaje aisati ; oshequi nompincatsaritapaaque , noncarajeitapaaqueri oshequi nonampirepee . Nompincatsaritasanotapaaque , impincatsatasanojeitavaquena maaroni savicajeitatsiri .

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Nampatojeiteri maaroni atiri , jaocarica isavicajeitiri . Nonquempeteari yora ashitariri ivira inashitacaari : irovishate aisati yora iyavarate ; aisati narori nonashitacayeari quemisantajeitanari aisati tseencajeitanari .

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Noncantajeiteri maaroni quemisantajeitanari : " Pimpocajeite aca nacosanoriquica " . Irinti tseencajeitanari noncantajeiteri : " Pimpocajeite avirori aca nampatequica " .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: Impoiji noncamantajeiteri savicajeitatsiri nacosanoriqui : " Caatanaque , maaroni , oshequi iriveshireacaajeitempi Apa maaroni . Peerani , catsini yovetsicajeitaquempiro pisavicajeitanteari anta inampiqui . Meeca pijajeite pincarajeiteri . Cameetsa impincatsariventajeitempi .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: Aavetaquenani notashe , pipajeitaquenaro noari . Aavetaquenani nomire , pipajeitaquenaro niraqueri . Te piojeivetenaji , iro cantaincha pineshinoncajeitaquena anta pivancopeequi .

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: Te ontimaveiteani noitsaare , ari pipajeitaquenaro . Nojoquiiveitani , ari pijatashijeitana pineajeitana . Yoiminqueetaquenani caravosoqui , ari pijatashijeitana , picavintsaajeitaquena " .

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: Impoiji incantajeitena yora cameetsajeitatsiri : " 多 Arimpa novincatsarite ? 多 Jaocampa ocaratiri aantavetaquempiri pitashe nopantaquempiri poari ? Te nonquenqueshiretajeroji . 多 Jaocampa ocaratiri aantavetaquempiri pimire nopantaquempiri piraqueri ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: 多 Jaocampa ocaratiri noneshinoncatantaquempiri novancoqui ? 多 Jaocampa ocaratiri nopantaquempirori piitsaare ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: 多 Jaocampa ocaratiri nojatashitantimpiri noquivantantimpiri ? "

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: Ari nancanaqueri : " Queario oca noncamantempiri : ariorica picavintsaaqueri aparoni quemisantanari picavintsaaquena narori " .

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: Impoiji noncanteri yora catiajeitainchari nampatequi : " Tsamempi pijajeitanaque anta Sharincaveniqui , pinquematsicajeitearo anta paamariqui yovetsicaqueri Tasorentsi peerani . Yovetsiquiniri camaari aisati maaroni oijajeitiriri . Meeca pincarajeiteri anta , oshequi pashinoncayea .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Peerani aaquena notashe , iro cantaincha te pimpenaji noyeari . Aaquena nomire , iro cantaincha te pimpenaji nireri .

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: Nojatashivetimpi noneempime , iro cantaincha te pineshinoncatavaquenaji , te poisavicavaquenaji pivancoqui . Te nonquitsaaveiteani , iro cantaincha te pimpenaji noitsaare . Nojoquiitacani aisati yoiminqueetaquena caravosoqui , iro cantaincha te pijatashitenaji pineena " .

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: Impoiji irancajeitena : " Novincatsarite , 多 jaocampa ocaratiri noneantavetaquempiri pashinoncaaca , iro cantaincha te noncavintsayempiji ? "

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: Ari noncanteri : " Queario oca noncamantempiri : te pincavintsaajeiteriji yora quemisantajeitanari , irootaque caari picavintsantana narori " .

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: Ari iroashinoncaajeiteri Tasorentsi anta Sharincaveniqui , incantaitatiyempani . Irinti cameetsajeitatsiri irisavicajeitaje inquitequi , incantaitatiyempani .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Impoiji icamantajeitaquena Jesoshi , narori aisati itsipapee iroamere :

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: - - Piojeiti ocarati apitenivani quitaiteri omoncaratantajeari quitaiteri apajitiri Yavisantaniri . Noponeaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque , iro cantaincha coajica impajacotacanteetaquena .

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Ari yapatojeitaca yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee aisati yora savicacaajeitantatsiri . Yapatojeitaca anta ivancoqui yora ivincatsarite saserotepee . Ipajita iriori Caijashi .

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: Yoametavacaajeitaca , icanti : - - 多 Jaoca ancanteriri Jesoshi aanteariri aisati avacantanteariri ? Iro cantaincha te ancoyeji iriojeitanaque atiripee : iquisacoventaricari .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: Ari icanti itsipapee : - - Irotaintsi quitaiteri Yavisantaniri : inquimoshirejeitanaque atiripee . Eiro amatiritsi ayeri meeca Jesoshi , iquisacoventajeitaricari .

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
text2: Impoiji yovaanaja Jesoshi Vetaniaqui , noijajeitanaqueri . Nojajeitanaque maaroni , irosati ivancoqui Shimo , yora patsaaveitachaniri peerani .

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: Noajeitapaaca , irosati opocantacari tsinane amacotaquero casancajari . Oshequi ovinaro casancajari . Ari osaitapaaqueri iitoqui .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Noneajeitantarori oca , noquisajeitanaquero , nocantajeiti : - - 多 Paitaquea aparajatantarori ?

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Ompimanterome casancajari , ayeme oshequi quirequi , impoiji oncavintsayerime oshequi ashinoncaajeitachari .

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Yacanaquena Jesoshi : - - 多 Paita picantimentantarori oca tsinaneca ? Ocameetsataque oca antaqueri .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Incantaitatiyempani incarajeitempi ashinoncaajeitachari , pincantaitatiyempani pincavintsaapinijeiteri irinti . Irompa nainti , eiro nocantani nosavique aca .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Iotaque noncame , irootaque osaitantanari .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: Queario oca noncamantempiri : coajica pinquenquetsatacaajeiteri maaroni savicajeitatsiri quipatsiqui , pintsoteaquero maaroni nampitsi , aisati pincarajeiteri oshequi itsipapee . Jaocarica pijajeiteri pincamantajeiteri atiripee antaquerica oca tsinane , iriojeitanteari ocavintsaquena .

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: Impoiji ijatanaque itsipa iroamere , yora pajitachari Jorashi Ishicariote . Ijatashijeitaqueri yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee ,

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: icantapaaqueri : - - Ariorica noncamantajeitempi jaoca pincanteriri Jesoshi paanteariri , 多 paita pimpinajeitenari ? Yacanaqueri : - - Nompinatempi quirequi . Ari ipajeitaqueri imentaqui quirequi , icarati 30 . Iro yovetsiqueetiri imentaqui perata .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: Irosati ipiantaja Jorashi , yamenasanotiri Jesoshi iriotanteari jaoca iraacanteriri .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: Ari moncarataca noajeitantarori tanta caari tapiacha . Nojatashijeitaqueri Jesoshi , nosampijeitiri : - - 多 Jaoca picoaqueri nojajeiteri novetsicantempirori poyeari pinquenqueshiretantearori Yavisantaniri ?

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Icantaquena : - - Pijajeite Jerosarequinta , pincantapaaqueri yora pineapaaqueri : " Icanti oamejeiteeri : ' Irotaintsi nomoncaratero . Nocoaque noyea anta pivancoqui , noncarajeiteri noamerepee ' " .

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Ari nojajeitanaque , nocantapaaqueri . Yonijaquenaro ivanco , irosati novetsicantacaro noajeiteari .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Ari tsitenijencaiteanaque ipocapaaque Jesoshi , isaviquimojeitapaaquena ,

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: noajeitanaca . Impoiji icantajeitaquena : - - Queario oca noncamantajeitempiri : meeca , aca picarajeitica , timatsi aacantenaneri .

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Ari noashirejeitanaca , irosati nosampijeitantariri : - - 多 Narompa , novincatsarite , aacantempineri ? Irio itsipapee aisati icantiri : - - 多 Narompa , novincatsarite , aacantempineri ?

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Yacajeitaquena : - - Iriotaque yoca quitacotaquenarica meeca nomatitatequi .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Noponeaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Oquenquetsatacotanani Sanquenarentsi peerani , aitaque nomoncaratero maaroni oquequetsatacotanari . Iro cantaincha oshequi irashinoncaasanotanaquea yora aacantenaneri . Oncameetsateme eiro itimime iriori , impoiji eiro yashinoncaame .

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: Impoiji isampitiri Jorashi : - - 多 Narompa , oametanari , aacantempineri ? Yacanaqueri : - - Je , avirotaque .

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: Ari tequera nontsoncajeitero noyea , ari yaaquero Jesoshi tanta , yajiricaquero , ipasonquitiri Tasorentsi . Impoiji icarajaquero , ipajeitaquena , icantajeitaquena : - - Paajeitavaquero , poajeitearo . Tempa narotaque camimentajeitempineri .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Impoiji yaaquero aisati nirajeitantari , ipasonquitajiri Tasorentsi . Ipacojeitaquenaro , icantajeitaquena : - - Pirajeitero , maaroni .

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: Tempa irootaque niraja amparajatimentajeitempineri , incavintsaajeitantempiri Tasorentsi . Ariorica paventajeitena , eiro iquenqueshiretajirotsi Tasorentsi caari cameetsatatsi pantajeitiri . Iroaquera oca nocantajeitaquempiri piojeitanteari jaoca pincantajeari pavisacojeitantajeari : avirorijei , aisati maaroni timajeitatsiri .

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Eiro meeca nirajirotsi aisati ovaja . Ariorica nirajero aisati , noncarajeitempi irajeitero anta ipincatsaritinta Tasorentsi .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Ari nopampoyeaventajeitiri Tasorentsi , impoiji nojajeitanaque anta toncaariqui pajitachari Orivomashi .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Nareejeitantacari , icamantajeitana Jesoshi : - - Meeca tsiteniri pojocajeitanaquena . Tempa oquenquetsatacojeitimpini Sanquenarentsi : " Incamaquerica shentajeitiriri irovishate , irishiajeitanaque irovishate , irovaraajeitanaquea " .

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Iro cantaincha ariorica nontinaanaje aisati , nojivajeitanajempi Carireaqui .

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: Ari icantiri Petero : - - Arioricampa irojocajeitanaquempi irinti yocapee , iro cantaincha nainti , eiro nojoquimpitsi .

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Queario oca noncamantempiri : meeca tsiteniri , tequerarica irineaje teapa , ari oncarataque mava pincante : " Te nioteriji Jesoshi " .

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: Icantiri : - - Ariorica nontsipatempi ancamajeite , iro cantaincha eiro nocantitsi : " Te nioteriji Jesoshi " . Aisati nocantajeivetacari narorijei , maaroni .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Impoiji ijatanaque Jesoshi Jetsemaniqui , noijajeitanaqueri : narori , aisati maaroni itsipapee iroamere . Icantaquena : - - Pisavicajeitavaquetsita aca : nojate anta nonquenquetsatacaavaquerita Apa .

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Ari yaanaqueri Petero , jeri itomipee Severeo apite . Oshequi yoashiretanaca , iquenqueshiretanaca .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Impoiji icantiri : - - Oshequi catsini noashiretanaca . Pisavicajeitavaqueta aca , pisaaquiteyea .

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Ari yavisaque capichaji , impoiji itarecapaacaro quipatsi , iquenquetsatacaaqueri Iriri : - - Apa , te noncoaveteaji nonquemaatsicatearome , iro cantaincha eiro nantirotsi nocoavetari narori , irointi nantempiro picoacaaquenari avinti .

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Impoiji ipiashitacari iroamere , ineajeitapaaqueri imaajeitaque . Icantiri Petero : - - Tempa pamavetimatero pivochoquine , te pimateroji pisaaquitimate capichaji .

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Pisaaquite , pincanteri Tasorentsi iramitacotantempiri eiro pantantarotsi caari cameetsatatsi . Picoavetaca pimatasanoterome maaroni nocoacaaquempiri , iro cantaincha te pimateroji .

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Ari ipianaja , icantajiri aisati : - - Apa , picoacaasanotaquenarorica nonquemaatsicatearo , aitaque cameetsa : nomoncaratero maaroni picoacaaquenari .

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Ipianaja aisati , ineajeitaqueri iroamerepee , imaajeitaque : oshequi aajeitaqueri ivochoquine .

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: Ari ipianaja aisati , iquenquetsatacaajiri . Irosati yapiitaque icantaqueriri incaranqui .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Ipiashitajari aisati iroamere , icantiri : - - 多 Maajimpimpa aisati ? Meeca moncarataca . Noponeaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque ; meeca icantacoventaquena , meeca irayena caari cameetsajeitatsi .

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: Pintinaajeitanaje , tsame ajataje . Jeri , yocatapaaque aacantenaneri .

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: Irosati ipocashitantapaacari Jorashi , yora yoamevetari Jesoshi : ijivajeitapaaqueri oshequi atiri . Yamayetaque ivesamentopee , ivasamentopee , maaroni . Ipocajeitapaaque aisati yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee aisati itsipapee savicacantajeitatsiri .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Icamantanirotitacari Jorashi incaranqui : - - Nonintavorotapaaqueri Jesoshi , piojeitanteariri . Impoijiquea pajiricapeeri avirori .

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Irosati ijatashitantacari , icantapaaqueri : - - 多 Ainirompi , oametanari ? Inintavoronirotapaaqueri .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Icantavaqueri Jesoshi : - - Noshaninca , 多 paita pipocashitiri aca ? Irosati ipocashijeitantapaacariri maaroni , yaajeitapaaqueri , tapi .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Irosati yaantacaro itsipa iroamere ivesamento iriori , ipesavetacari inampire ivincatsarite saserote . Ipeshitaqueri iyempita .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: Icantiri Jesoshi : - - Poajero pivesamento , ipiatimpicari . Tempa impesheetajeri iriori pesantapinitatsiri .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: Tempa piote noncoaquericame , noncanterime Apa , impoiji intianquenarime oshequi catsini inampire inquisacoventename .

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: Iro cantaincha inquisacoventenaricame , iroavisacotenaricame , eiro nomoncaratirome ocamantacotitananiri Sanquenarentsi .

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Impoiji icantajeitiri yora pocashijeitaqueriri : - - 多 Paita pamashitantanari pivesamento aisati pivasamento ? 多 Narompa coshinti piquisantanari ? Pineapinitana maaroni quitaiteriqui anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi , noametanti ; ja , payenaniqueti .

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: Iro cantaincha irootaque paajeitantaquenari omoncaratantajeari oquenquetsatacotitananiri Sanquenarentsi . Irosati narori notsaroantanaca , noshianaca . Aisati iquempejeitaca maaroni iroamerepee .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: Ari yayeetanaqueri Jesoshi anta ivancoqui Caijashi : yora ivincatsarite saserotepee . Yapatojeitanta yora oametantirori Sanquenarentsi aisati yora savicacantajeitatsiri .

text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: Ari impoitanaji Petero anta otsapiqui iipatsite saserote . Iqueapaaquero otantacota quipatsi , isaviquimotapaaqueri yora soraropee . Yamenapaaque iriotanteari jaocarica incanteeteriri Jesoshi .

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Ari yora oametavacaajeitainchari icoayetanaque tseeyacotearineri Jesoshi , ontimanteari iroacantanteariri .

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: Ari itimi oshequi tseeyacovetacariri , iro cantaincha tecatsi incanteri iroacanteri . Impoiji ipoqui apite pashini tseeyacotapaariri ,

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: icantapaaque iriori : - - Icanti yoca : " Nontireajero ivanco Tasorentsi : oncarate mava quitaiteri novetsicajero aisati " .

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Ari icatianaca ivincatsarite saserote , icantiri Jesoshi : - - 多 Tecatsimpa pincanteri avirori ? 多 Paita ojita oca icantacojeitaquempiri ?

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: Imajeretaque Jesoshi , te iranqueriji . Yapiitajiri aisati : - - Tempa ineaquempi Tasorentsi , yora aneasanotatsiri . Pincamantasanotena : 多 avirompa Quirishito , Itomi Tasorentsi ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Narotaque . Noponeaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Coajica pineajena nosavique iracosanoriqui Tasorentsisanori , aisati pineavajena nonquenapaaje mencoriqui , nompiaje aca quipatsiqui .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Irosati iquisantanacari saserote , irosati itsereantanacaro iitsaare . Icanti : - - Pinquemaniroteriqueti : ijitasorentsitacateemi . 多 Paitampa acoantacari intime pashini camantacoterineri ?

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: 多 Paita piquenqueshirejeitiri avirorijei ? 多 Jaoca ancanteriri ? Yacajeitanaqueri : - - Cameetsa incame .

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Impoiji iquitiojavorojeitaqueri ivoroqui . Impoiji icapojanajeitaqueri , aisati ipasanajeitaqueri , tac , tac , tac ;

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: icantaqueri : - - Quirishito , pincamantena : 多 janica capojanataquempiri ?

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: Ainiroquera isaviqui Petero anta saiteriqui . Oneaqueri nampirentsi , ocantiri : - - Aviro oijatiriri Jesoshi , yora carireasati .

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: Icanti Petero : - - Te nioteji paitarica picantaquenari .

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Ari ijavetanaca anta iqueavetapaaca , otimi pashini nampirentsi , oneavaqueri iroori , ocanti : - - Jeri yoca oijatiriri Jesoshi , yora nasaretesati .

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: Icantanaquero : - - Te nioteriji yoca picantaquenari . Terica ontampaticate oca nocantaquempiri , nocoaque iroasanquetenata Tasorentsi .

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Impoiji capichaji , jeri pashini cantapairiri : - - Queario , avirotaque oijatiriri : noquemaquero pineanataque , avirotaque carireasati .

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Teve , te nioteriji yora shirampari picantaqueri . Ioti Tasorentsi queario nocantaquempiri . Terica ontampaticate nocantaquempiri , nocoaque iroasanquetenata Tasorentsi . Irosati ineantanaca teapa .

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Ari iquenqueshiretanaquero icantaqueriri Jesoshi : " Eirotsitarica ineaji teapa , oncarate mava pincante : ' Te nioteriji Jesoshi ' " . Ari isoquijanaji , iraapaaca jii , jii .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: Ari iroaquera oquitaitetamani , yoametavacaajeitaca yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee aisati savicacaajeitantatsiri : - - 多 Jaoca ancanteriri meeca Jesoshi avacantanteariri ?

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: Ari yoisoyeetaqueri , yayeetanaqueri anta itiminta pincatsari , yora pajitachari Pirato .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: Yora Jorashi , yora aacantiriri Jesoshi , iotaque yoacantashitacari Jesoshi . Oshequi iquenqueshiretanaca , irosati yoipiantajantanari yora 30 imentaqui : yora peratatatsiri . Icantapaaqueri yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserote aisati yora savicacaajeitantatsiri :

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: - - Jeriniro piirequite . Te oncameetsateji oca nantaqueri . Tecatsi irante Jesoshi , naacantashitacari . Yacajeitanaqueri : - - Jm , aviroyea .

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: Ari ipishoncanajiniri quirequi anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi , iquenaitaji , ipianaja . Impoiji ijatanaque , ishiticaja irisati .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserote yaajeitajiri quirequi , icantajeiti : - - Te oncameetsateji aca anquempoyeajeri yoca quirequica . Tempa iriotaque apinataqueriri iroacantanteariri .

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Ari yoametavacaajeitaca : - - 多 Jaoca ancantajeriri quirequica ? Icanti : - - Tsame amanantero quipatsi antijanteariri camatsiri caari aneapinijeiti . Iro yamanantaqueri quipatsi ora yaapiniyeetiri quipatsi yovetsiqueetiri coviti .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Meeca ipajiyeetaquero oca quipatsi : " Ivinaro Jesoshi yoacantantacariri " .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Imoncarataquero isanquenatitacaniri Jeremiashi : " Irayeri 30 imentaqui quirequi , yovetsicanteetariri perata . Iriotaque ivinaro iraacantanteariri Quirishito . Eiro ishequititsi quirequi impinatantaveteariri .

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: Iriotaque iramanantantearori quipatsi anta yaapiniyeetiri quipatsi yovetsiqueetiri coviti . Iriotaque Avincatsarite canterineri iramanantero quipatsi " . Irootaque isanquenataqueniri Jeremiashini .

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Ari icatiimotacari Jesoshi yora pincatsari pajitachari Pirato . Isampitiri iriori : - - 多 Avirompa ivincatsarite joriopee ? Yacanaqueri : - - Je , narotaque .

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Impoiji iquishimanataqueri yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee aisati yora savicacantantatsiri , iro cantaincha tecatsi incante iriori , imajeretashitaca .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Isampitiri Pirato : - - 多 Tempa pinquemeri icantacotaquempiri ? 多 Paita caari pineanatanta avirori ?

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Tecatsi incante , te impiateariji . Ari yoanaqueri cavaco pincatsari , oshequi iquenqueshireanaca .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Ari maaroni osarintsi , ariorica omoncarataca Yavisantaniri , yora Pirato isampitapinijeitaqueri savicajeitatsiri : " Timatsi oshequi pishaninca anta caravosoqui . 多 Picoaquempa noisoquijajempiri aparoni ? " Aitaque icantapinita maaroni quitaiteri Yavisantaniri , yoimisoquijapinitiri aparoni , janicarica icoiri joriopee .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Itimi caravosoqui meeca shirampari iquemacojeitaqueri joriopee , ipajita Varavashi : oshequi yoanti irinti .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Ari meeca yapatojeitaca oshequi atiri , irootaque icantajeitantacariri : - - Piojeiti nametaca noimisoquijimpiri aparoni timatsiri caravosoqui . 多 Janicampa picoajeitiri noimisoquijajeitempiri meeca ? 多 Iriompa Varavashi ? Terica pincoyeriji Varavashi , 多 irioricampa picoajeitaque noimpacajempiri Jesoshica , yoca picantiri Quirishito ?

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Iotaque Pirato oshequi iquisashitacari Jesoshi yora jivatacantantatsiri , te incoacaajeiteriji ashanincapee inquemisantajeiteri . Ijivetaca Pirato incantajeiterime ashaninca : " Nocoaque poimpacajenari Jesoshi " .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: Aisati incaranqui otianquiniri ijina camantiriri : " Ocanti pijina : ' Eiro poacantiritsi Jesoshi , icameetsatasanotaque . Nomishitacari incaranqui , oshequi noquenqueshiretacotaqueri ' " . Irootaque caari icoantaveta iroacanterime .

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Iro cantaincha yora jivatacaajeitiriri ashanincapee icantajeitiri : - - Pincantajeiteri : " Poimisoquijajeri Varavashi , irinti Jesoshi , pimpajacotacanteri " . Icantajeitaqueri : - - Aviroyeampa , paitarica picoaqueri avirori .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Ari yapiitajiri Pirato , isampijeitiri : - - Jeri icarataque apite : 多 janicampa picoaqueri noimpacajempiri ? Icantajeitaqueri : - - Varavashi .

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: Isampijeitiri : - - 多 Jaoca noncanteriri Jesoshica : yoca ipajiyeetiri Quirishito ? Yacajeitanaqueri : - - Pimpajacotacanteri .

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Isampijeivetari : - - 多 Paitampa yantaqueri nompajacotacantanteariri ? Aiquero icajemajeitanaitiiri : - - Pimpajacotacanteri . Pimpajacotacanteri .

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Ari iotanaque yatsipetashitaca isampinajeivetacari , aisati oshequi iquisajeitanaca atiripee . Icantiri inampire : - - Pamacotenarota nija . Yamacotaqueneri , impoiji iquivacotaca , iriotanteari atiri te incoaveteaji iroacanteri Jesoshi . Ineajeitaqueri atiripee , aisati icantajeitiri : - - Te naro coatsine noacanteri . Picoajeitaquerica avinti , aviroyeampa .

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Yacajeitanaqueri : - - Nocoasanojeitaque , tempa narojeitaque cantaquempiri . Inquishenata nainti Tasorentsi , aisati ocameetsati inquisheri notomipee narori .

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Ari yoisoquijajiri Pirato Varavashi . Icantiri soraro : - - Paanajeri Jesoshica , pimpasateri , impoiji pimpajacoteri .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Ari yaanaqueri soraro Jesoshi anta ivancoqui pincatsari , icajemajeitaqueri itsipapee soraro .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Ari isapocaqueri Jesoshi iitsaare , impoiji iquitsaatiri otsipa quitsaarentsi , quiraanirori .

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Yovetsicaqueneri iramatseere totsequi , yamatseetaqueri . Aisati ipaqueri chacopi , icantiri : - - Pajiriquero opirico chacopi . Yora pincatsari peerani iquitsaatapinitaro quiraanirori , yamatseetaro iramatseere pinatasanotachari , aisati yajiricapinitiro iotiquiro cameetsari . Ari itiyeroashinirojeitacari soraropee Jesoshi , ipincatsatamempeacari , ishirontimentajeitari , icantajeitiri : - - Aviro , novincatsarite . 多 Pipincatsariventajeitirimpa maaroni joriopee ? Iji , iji , iji , iji .

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: Iquitiojajeitaqueri , impoiji yaapitsatajiri chacopi , ipasatantajari iitoqui .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Oshequi yapiinataqueri ishirontimentanatacari , iji , iji , iji . Impoiji isapocajiri quitioncanirori , iquitsaatajiri aisati iitsaaresanori . Yaajeitanaqueri impajacoteri .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Ari yaajeitanaqueri Jesoshi impajacotanteariri . Anta avotsiqui itonquiotavacari shirenesati , ipajita Shimo . Iperanatavacari soraro : - - Jero oca coroshica , paanaqueneri yoca . Ari yaanaqueneri .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Yareejeitapaaca Coricotaqui . Iro apajitiro aneanequi : iitontsini .

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: Ari ipeevetacari Jesoshi ovaja , oconoajata quepishijatatsiri . Ineantavetavacaro , te incoyeji irirero .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Ari ipajacojeitaqueri soraropee coroshiqui , impoiji ineatsajeitaca iriojeitanteari janica aajeroneri iitsaare .

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: Impoiji isavicajeitaque , yamenajeitaqueri .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Isanquenajeitaquero paperiqui : " Jerica Jesoshi . Iriotaque ivincatsarite joriopee " . Impoiji ipajacotaquero coroshiqui , ivatitotacaro Jesoshi .

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Impoiji aisati ipajacojeitaqueri apite coshinti : aparo yoatiacotaqueri iracosanoriqui Jesoshi , irio pashini yoatiacotaqueri irampatequi .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Ari ainiro avisayetatsiri avotsiqui , ishirontimentajeitacari Jesoshi . Itecainajeitaca ,

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: ishirontajeitaca , iji , iji , iji . Icantajeitiri : - - Pintireerome ivanco Tasorentsi , aisati oncarate mava quitaiteri povetsicajerome aisati . Jentsite , poavisacotajea avisati . Avirorica itomi Tasorentsi , jentsite paniireashitajea .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Aisati iquempejeitaca yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , yora oametantirori Sanquenarentsi , jeri yora savicacantatsiri : ishirontimentajeitacari . Icantajeiti :

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: - - Ijitashiniroveitani yoavisacojeitirini ashanincapee , iro cantaincha meeca te irimatajeaji iriori iroavisacotajea irisati . Jentsite , amenavaqueritsita : iriorica avincatsarite , iraniireapaaje . Ariorica iraniireapaaje , ari ampincatsatanaqueri arori . Iji , iji , iji .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Ari ipincatsarivetari Tasorentsi iriori : ariorica iroavisacoteri irinti . Aamayea ari incoaque iroavisacoteri itomi , tempa icanti meeca yoca : " Narotaque Itomi Tasorentsi " . Iji , iji , iji .

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Aisati iquempejeitaca yora coshitantatsiri ipajacoyeetaqueri : ishirontajeitaca iriori .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: Ari icarataque catsirincaiteri tampatica , omapocanaca otsiteniiteanaque , otsimoirotanaque : irosati ishaaviniji .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Ari ishaaviniji antearojenca icanti Jesoshi : - - Eri , Eri , arama savacatani . Iro acantiri aneanequi : " Apa Tasorentsi , 多 paita pojocantanari ? "

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Iquemantacariri yora savicajeitaintsiri , icanti : - - Pinquemerite , icajemaqueri Iriashi .

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Ari ishianaca aparoni , yovincaquero pijoncashincanari ovajaqui quepishijari . Isataaquero inchaquiiqui , ijicotacovetacanari Jesoshi , irantsimicantearorime ,

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: iro cantaincha icantiri itsipapee : - - Eiro pantiritsi : tsame amenavaquerita , impocashiteririca Iriashi iroavisacoteri . Iji , iji , iji .

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Ari icajemanaji aisati Jesoshi , impoiji icamanaque , torein .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Icamantacari Jesoshi , otsereanaque oticaashiro ivanco Tasorentsi : intanaca jenoqui otsereanaque , tsererere , irosati ishaaviji . Aisati onicanaca quipatsi , nica , nica , nica ; ocotareanaque antearo mapipee .

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: Yashitareacotanaca tijaari , itinaajeitanaja oshequi quemisantatsiri , tinare .

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: Impoiji , itinaantajari Jesoshi , ijajeitanaque yora itsipapee tinaajeitajanchari Jerosarequi . Ineajeitaqueri oshequi atiri .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Ari yora capitano aisati yora soraropee ineajeitaquero onicanaca quipatsi , aisati ineajeitaqueri yora tinaajeitajanchari , ineaquero otsiteniitanaque , maaroni . Impoiji yoajeitanaque cavaco , aisati icantajeiti : - - Queariotaque : iriotaque Itomi Tasorentsi .

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
