text2: Otimi anta nijanteaji oshequi tsinanepee , amenajeitaqueri Jesoshi . Iroojeitaque oijaveitariniri , oponeajeitaca Carireaqui . Quiso oapinitirini , opapinitirini yoari .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: Ocarajeitaquero Maria maquitarasato ; jero otsipa Maria : ora iriniro Santiaco aisati Jose ; jero aisati iriniro itsipa Santiaco aisati Joa . Ari oneajeitaqueri Jesoshi , icamanaque .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Ari ishavijiiteanaque . Itimi aparoni iroamereni Jesoshi , ipajita Jose . Iponeaca iriori Arimateaqui ; ashitaarantincari ini .

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: Ijatashitaqueri Pirato , icantapaaqueri : - - Camaque Jesoshi . Nocoaque pishinetenari naanajeri noiminquiajeri omoroqui : onta yovetsiqueetiniriri camatsiri . Ari icantiri iriori soraro : - - Pishineteri yoca iraanajeri .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
text2: Ari ijataque , yaanaqueri , yampinaicacotaqueri tocoyaqui caari pitsitatsi .

text: And laid it in his own new tomb , which he had hewn out in the rock : and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre , and departed .
text2: Impoiji yoaqueri omoroqui mapi iroaquera imoqueetiro . Itivironquiro antearo mapi omoroqui , yashitacotantacariri . Impoiji ijatanaji Jose .

text: And there was Mary Magdalene , and the other Mary , sitting over against the sepulchre .
text2: Ainiro osavicaque anta Maria maquitarasato aisati otsipa Maria . Oneacotaqueri yoiminqueaqueri .

text: Now the next day , that followed the day of the preparation , the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate ,
text2: Iro quitaiteri ipajacotantariri Jesoshi opajita Yavisantaniri . Oquitaitetamanaque ijatashijeitaqueri Pirato yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserote aisati yora variseopee .

text: Saying , Sir , we remember that that deceiver said , while he was yet alive , After three days I will rise again .
text2: Icantajeitapaaqueri : - - Novincatsarite , noquemajeitaqueri icantaqueri chapinqui yora amatavitantatsiri : " Noncamaque , impoiji oncarataque quitaiteri mava , ari nontinaanaje " .

text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day , lest his disciples come by night , and steal him away , and say unto the people , He is risen from the dead : so the last error shall be worse than the first .
text2: Nocoaque pintianque soraro meeca irishentasanotero omoro anta yoiminqueaquerinta . Iramenasanotero irosati omoncaratanteari mava quitaiteri . Ijatashitiricari iroamereni , yaanajiricari . Impoiji icantajeitiricari ashanincapee : " Tinaanaja inaji Jesoshi " . Peerani oshequi yamatavitantini iriori , iro cantaincha ariorica iraanajeri , yamatavitasanojeitiricari iroamereni ashanincapee , icanticari : " Tinaanaja inaji Jesoshi " .

text: Pilate said unto them , Ye have a watch : go your way , make it as sure as ye can .
text2: Icantiri Pirato : - - Jeri yoca soraropee , pijajeite pamenasanojeitero .

text: So they went , and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone , and setting a watch .
text2: Irosati ijajeitantanaca , yashitacotasanotaqueri , impoiji ishentajeitiro soraro .

text: In the end of the sabbath , as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week , came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre .
text2: Ari avisanaque quitaiteri imaoreajeitantari , meeca otomincotapaaque . Tsiteniquera ojatamanaque Maria maquitarasato , aisati otsipataro omariaroronte . Ojataque amenamanajero omoro yoyeetaquerinta Jesoshini .

text: And , behold , there was a great earthquake : for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven , and came and rolled back the stone from the door , and sat upon it .
text2: Omapocanaca antearo onicanaca quipatsi aisati . Jeri aisati itimi inampire Avincatsarite : iponeanaca inquitequi , ipocaque itivironcapaaquero mapi , irootaque isavicantapaacari .

text: His countenance was like lightning , and his raiment white as snow :
text2: Oshequi ishipaquireapaaque , iquempetacaro iporequi . Oquitamarotasanotaque iitsaare , oquempetacaro sharaca .

text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake , and became as dead men .
text2: Oshequi catsini itsaroacaajeitavacari soraropee , te irimatajeaji irishevatajea : iquempevetanaca incamaquerica .

text: And the angel answered and said unto the women , Fear not ye : for I know that ye seek Jesus , which was crucified .
text2: Ari icantiro tsinane : - - Eiro pitsaroitsi avinti . Niotaque irio pipocashiveta Jesoshi .

text: He is not here : for he is risen , as he said . Come , see the place where the Lord lay .
text2: Te aneajeriji meeca , tinaanaja ini . Tempa icamantitaquempini . Caatanaque , pamenero aca yoyeevetacarica .

text: And go quickly , and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead ; and , behold , he goeth before you into Galilee ; there shall ye see him : lo , I have told you .
text2: Impoiji pishintsitanaje pijatanaje pincamantajeitapeeri iroamere : " Tinaanaja Avincatsarite , irijivajeitanaquempi Carireaqui . Aitaque pineajeitapaajeriri anta " . Irootaque nocamantaquempiri .

text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy ; and did run to bring his disciples word .
text2: Ari oasanotanaque cavaco , aisati oshequi oquimoshiretanaque . Ojatanaque , oshiashitanacari iroamere , oncamanteri .

text: And as they went to tell his disciples , behold , Jesus met them , saying , All hail . And they came and held him by the feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Nianqui imapocaquero Jesoshi , ivetsatacaro . Ojatashitaqueri , otiyeroashitacari , ajiricapairi iitiqui . Oshequi opincatsatapaacari .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Be not afraid : go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee , and there shall they see me .
text2: Impoiji icantaquero : - - Eiro pitsaroitsi . Pijajeite meeca pincamantajeiteri noamereni irijajeiteta anta Carireaqui . Aitaque irineajeitapaajenari anta .

text: Now when they were going , behold , some of the watch came into the city , and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done .
text2: Ari ojatashitaqueri iroamereni tsinane . Irinti yora soraro shentavetarori omoro ijataarantaji nampitsiqui , icamantajeitapairi yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee .

text: And when they were assembled with the elders , and had taken counsel , they gave large money unto the soldiers ,
text2: Yapatojeitiri iriori yora savicacantantatsiri . Yoametavacaajeitaca : - - 多 Jaoca ancanterori meeca amanacotanteariri ? Ari icajemajeitaqueri soraro , icantajeitaqueri : - - Jeri yoca quirequica , nocoi nompinatempi .

text: Saying , Say ye , His disciples came by night , and stole him away while we slept .
text2: Pincantashijeiteari atiripee : " Nomaajeitaque nianquiiteni . Ipocaque iroamereni Jesoshi , yaanajiri " .

text: And if this come to the governor ' s ears , we will persuade him , and secure you .
text2: Ariorica inquemacovetaquempi yora pincatsari , pincantaque : " Nomaaque " , noncamanteri narori : " Eiro piquishiritsi soraropee . Te irimayeji . Narotaque cantaqueriri : ' Pintseeya ' " .

text: So they took the money , and did as they were taught : and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day .
text2: Ari yaajeitaqueri quirequi , icamantajeitaqueri atiri : " Nomaajeitaque , impoiji yaajeitajiri iroamereni Jesoshi " . Ainirotatsi meeca icantajeiti joriopee meeca .

text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee , into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them .
text2: Ari nojatanaque Carireaqui , notsipajeitacari itsipapee iroamere . Aparoni peaincha , yora Jorashi . Nojajeitanaque toncaariqui icantaquenari chapinqui Jesoshi .

text: And when they saw him , they worshipped him : but some doubted .
text2: Noneajeitapaajiri , nopincatsajeitapaajiri . Iro cantaincha aparopee tseencavetapaincha .

text: And Jesus came and spake unto them , saying , All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth .
text2: Ari ipocashijeitana Jesoshi , icantaquena : - - Icantitaquenani Apa peerani : " Pimpincatsaritasanote meeca aca inquitequi aisati pimpincatsariventasanojeiteri maaroni quipatsisati " .

text: Go ye therefore , and teach all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Irootaque nocantantimpiri : pijajeite maaroni nampitsipeequi , pinquemisantacaajeiteri maaroni atiripee , pintsoteaqueri maaroni . Ariorica inquemisantajeitaque , pivaotisajeiteri : irootaque icoacaaqueriri Apa , aisati nocoacaajeitaqueriri narori , aisati ocoacaajeitaqueriri Ishire Tasorentsi .

text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you : and , lo , I am with you alway , even unto the end of the world . Amen .
text2: Pincamantajeiteri atiri irimajeitero maaroni nocamantaquempiri . Quiso noajeitanaquempi , noncanteani , irosati nompocantajeari nompincatsaritantapaajeari . Ari ocarati . Narotaque sanquenatirori :

text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God ;
text2: Meeca noncamantempiro cameetsatatsiri . Noncamantempi yoavisacotanti Jesoquirishito . Tempa iriotaque itomi Tasorentsi .

text: As it is written in the prophets , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Peerani isanquenatini camantantatsiniri pajiveitachaniri Isayashi . Jero oca isanquenatiniri : " Icantiri Tasorentsi itomi : ' Pinquemena , notiomi . Nontianqueri quenquetsatacotempineri , irijivatanaquempi . Incantajeiteri atiri : Paamaajeiteari Quirishito , pincameetsashirejeitanaque .

text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Inquenquetsatacaajeiteri ishaninca caaraiteriqui . Incantajeiteri : Pincameetsashirejeitanaque oncanteata ariorica impoque Avincatsarite , irineacameetsajeitantapeempiri ' " .

text: John did baptize in the wilderness , and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins .
text2: Ari moncaratapaaca icantiniri peerani Isayashini . Yareetapaaca caaraiteriqui Joa , yora vaotisatantatsiri . Icantajeitaqueri ishaninca : - - Pinquenqueshireempa , eiro piquempetajatsi peerani . Ariorica pojocasanojeitajero pantajeiveitaniri , ari novaotisajeitaquempi , impoiji iriojeitanaque atiri icavintsaajeitaquempi Tasorentsi , eiro iquenqueshireacotajimpirotsi pantaveitaniri .

text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea , and they of Jerusalem , and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Ari ijatashijeitaqueri maaroni joreasati , aisati maaroni jerosaresati , icamantajeitapairi : - - Ainiro nantayetiri caari cameetsatatsi . Nocoaque navisacotaje . Ari ivaotisajeitavaqueri Joa Joriraniqui .

text: And John was clothed with camel ' s hair , and with a girdle of a skin about his loins ; and he did eat locusts and wild honey ;
text2: Irio iquitsaatari tijachari iviti cameyo . Ishiticatsaquitari meshinantsitsa . Yoapinitari quentori aisati ija pitsi .

text: And preached , saying , There cometh one mightier than I after me , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose .
text2: Ari icamantapinitiri ishaninca : - - Coraque impoitapeenaneri , yanaacotaquena , ipincatsaritasanoti irinti . Nopincatsatasanotaqueri catsini , narori notseencaja narosati .

text: I indeed have baptized you with water : but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Novaotisajeitaquempi nijaqui , iro cantaincha intianquempiro irinti Ishire , ontsipajeitantempiri .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee , and was baptized of John in Jordan .
text2: Ari pashini quitaiteri yareetapaaca Jesoshi . Iponeaca Nasaretequi , timatsiri Carireaqui . Ivaotisatavaqueri Joa Joriraniqui ,

text: And straightway coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens opened , and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him :
text2: impoiji yaatanaji . Yamenanaque jenoqui , irosati ineantavacaro Ishire Tasorentsi . Omapocapaaca aniireashitapaaqueri , oshiaqueri sampaquiti .

text: And there came a voice from heaven , saying , Thou art my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Iquematiiri Tasorentsi icantiri : - - Avirotaque notomi nonintasanotiri . Oshequi noquimoshireventasanotaquempi .

text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness .
text2: Impoiji aanaqueri Ishire Tasorentsi caaraiteriqui .

text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days , tempted of Satan ; and was with the wild beasts ; and the angels ministered unto him .
text2: Itimaiti anta ocarataque 40 quitaiteri . Yora Satanashi ineantavetacari , irantacayerime caari cameetsatatsi . Aisati tecatsi ishaninca intsipateari , irinti timatsi covencayetatsiri , iro cantaincha intacojeitacari inampirepee Tasorentsi .

text: Now after that John was put in prison , Jesus came into Galilee , preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God ,
text2: Ari pashini quitaiteri yashitacoyeetaqueri Joa caravosoqui . Impoiji ijatanaji Jesoshi Carireaqui . Icamantajeitaqueri ishaninca jaoca icanta Tasorentsi yoavisacotanti .

text: And saying , The time is fulfilled , and the kingdom of God is at hand : repent ye , and believe the gospel .
text2: Icantajeitaqueri : - - Irotaintsi impincatsariventajeitajee Tasorentsi . Pinquenqueshireempa , eiro piquempetajatsi peerani : te pincameetsaveiteani . Pinquemisantajeite pavisacotantajeari .

text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Ari pashini quitaiteri ishiteatanacaro Jesoshi incajare timatsiri Carireaqui . Ineapaaqueri Shimo , aisati irirenti , Antirishi . Iquitsati incajarequi : aitaque icantapinita , iquitsatapinitiri shima .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Come ye after me , and I will make you to become fishers of men .
text2: Icantapaaqueri Jesoshi : - - Poijatanaquena , nocoaque pinquemisantacaapiniteri atiri .

text: And straightway they forsook their nets , and followed him .
text2: Irosati yojocantanacaro iitsarite , yoijatanaqueri .

text: And when he had gone a little further thence , he saw James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , who also were in the ship mending their nets .
text2: Capichaji yovaavetanaca aisati , ineapaaqueri Santiaco , Joa , apite : iriotaque itomipee Severeo . Isavicajeiti ivitoqui , ishiticayetiro iitsarite .

text: And straightway he called them : and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants , and went after him .
text2: Icajemapaaqueri , yoijajeitanaqueri . Yojocanaqueri iriri , isavicaque irinti pitotsiqui , icarajeitaqueri amitacojeitiriri .

text: And they went into Capernaum ; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue , and taught .
text2: Impoiji yareetapaaja Jesoshi Caperenaoqui , icarajeitiri iroamerepee . Irootaque saavaro , imaoreajeitantari , iqueajeitapaaque pancotsiqui yapatojeitantari . Yoametantapaaque .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for he taught them as one that had authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Yora atiripee , yoajeitanaque cavaco , icantajeiti : - - Pineaqueri , cameetsa yoametantasanotaque , iotasanoti irinti . Te inquempeteariji yora oametapinijeiveteerori sanquenarentsi : te iriotasanoteji irinti .

text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit ; and he cried out ,
text2: Aisati itimi anta pancotsiqui aparoni shirampari neiriri camaari .

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of God .
text2: Icajemacotavaqueri Jesoshi , icantavaqueri : - - Niotaquempi : aviro nasaretesati , aisati aviro itomi cameetsari Tasorentsi . 多 Paita pipocashitantanari ? 多 Arimpa pintsoncajeitapaaquena ?

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him .
text2: Icantiri Jesoshi camaari : - - Pimajereiteteve . Pinijantareanajeri noshaninca .

text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him , and cried with a loud voice , he came out of him .
text2: Ari yampitsiitacaanacari ashaninca , antearojenca icajemanaque , irosati inijantareantanajari camaari .

text: And they were all amazed , insomuch that they questioned among themselves , saying , What thing is this ? what new doctrine is this ? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits , and they do obey him .
text2: Aisati yoajeitanaque cavaco ishaninca , maaroni . isampitavacaanaca : - - 多 Pineaquerompa imataqueri ? Iroaquera aquemaquero oca yoametaqueeri . Aisati imataqueri camaari , itiancaqueri : itsaroacaitacariteemi .

text: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee .
text2: Irosati iquenquetsatacotantajeitacari maaroni carireasati .

text: And forthwith , when they were come out of the synagogue , they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew , with James and John .
text2: Ari iponeajeitajari pancotsiqui yapatojeitantari , ijajeitanaque ivancoqui Shimo , jeri Antirishi . Yoijajeitanaqueri Santiaco aisati Joa .

text: But Simon ' s wife ' s mother lay sick of a fever , and anon they tell him of her .
text2: Icamantiri Jesoshi : - - Ojoquiitaca irairo Shimo , aaquero catsiirentsi . Jero onta nariainchari .

text: And he came and took her by the hand , and lifted her up ; and immediately the fever left her , and she ministered unto them .
text2: Ari ijatashitanaquero , yacatsavacotapaaquero , yoisavicapaajiro . Irosati opeantanaja ovatsiire , irosati opajeitantacari iroyeari .

text: And at even , when the sun did set , they brought unto him all that were diseased , and them that were possessed with devils .
text2: Iqueanaji catsirincaiteri , irotanaintsi ontsitenijencaiteanaje , yamayetaqueneri Jesoshi maaroni mantsiayetatsiri , aisati maaroni yatajeaoncayetiri camaari .

text: And all the city was gathered together at the door .
text2: Maaroni nampitsiquiniri yapatojeitapaaca omoroqui pancotsi .

text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases , and cast out many devils ; and suffered not the devils to speak , because they knew him .
text2: Isavicajeitapaaque maaroni mantsiayetatsiri , onashiyetaca imantsiarepee . Yoavisacojeitajiri . Aisati icantaqueri camaari : - - Pinijantareajeitanajeri yora patajeaonquiri , aisati pimajerejeite . Yora camaari , iojeitaqueri Tasorentsi ini Jesoshi , irootaque caari icoanta Jesoshi incamanteri atiri .

text: And in the morning , rising up a great while before day , he went out , and departed into a solitary place , and there prayed .
text2: Oquitaitetanaque , tsiteniquera itinaamanaja Jesoshi . Ijatamanaque anta tecatsi timatsine , iquenquetsatacairi iriri .

text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him .
text2: Icoacoayetajiri Shimo aisati itsipajeitari .

text: And when they had found him , they said unto him , All men seek for thee .
text2: Ineantapaajariri , icantapaaqueri : - - Icoacoajeitaquempi maaroni ashaninca .

text: And he said unto them , Let us go into the next towns , that I may preach there also : for therefore came I forth .
text2: Ari icantavaqueri iriori : - - Ari inajini . Tsame avaanajea otsipapeequi nampitsi . Aitaque anta nonquenquetsatacaajeiteri itsipapee atiri , irootaque nopocantacari quipatsiquica .

text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee , and cast out devils .
text2: Iquenaquenayetanaque , itsoteajeitaquero nampitsipee anta Carireaqui . Iquenquetsatacaapinitaqueri ishaninca anta yapatotapinijeitanta , yoavisacojeitaqueri maaroni neiriri camaari .

text: And there came a leper to him , beseeching him , and kneeling down to him , and saying unto him , If thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Pashini quitaiteri ijatashitaqueri patsaatsiri , icantapaaqueri : - - Tempa aviro pincatsari , pincavintsayena . Ainiro pitasorenca : pinintirica poavisacotajena , ari pimataquero .

text: And Jesus , moved with compassion , put forth his hand , and touched him , and saith unto him , I will ; be thou clean .
text2: Oshequi icavintsaasanotavaqueri . Ari yacotashitavaqueri , ipamitavaqueri . Icantavaqueri : - - Je , noninti : aitaque pavisacotaje .

text: And as soon as he had spoken , immediately the leprosy departed from him , and he was cleansed .
text2: Irosati opeantanaja ivatsaaro , yavisacotanaji .

text: And he straitly charged him , and forthwith sent him away ;
text2: Itiancajiri , icantasanotiri :

text: And saith unto him , See thou say nothing to any man : but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: - - Noncantempi : eiro picamantayetiritsi itsipapee , irinti pijatashiteri saserote . Pinijaapaajeri pavisacotaji . Pimoncaratero icantiniri Moishishini : poyeneri Tasorentsi pivira iriotanteari pishaninca pavisacotaji .

text: But he went out , and began to publish it much , and to blaze abroad the matter , insomuch that Jesus could no more openly enter into the city , but was without in desert places : and they came to him from every quarter .
text2: Ari ijatanaque , iro cantaincha icamantacoyetaquero , yovaraaquero . Iotacojeitaqueri Jesoshi , irootaque caari ijatanta nampitsiqui . Itimaiti anta ocaraiteti . Ijatashijeitaqueri atiri poneayetachari otsipapeequi nampitsi .

text: And again he entered into Capernaum , after some days ; and it was noised that he was in the house .
text2: Pashini quitaiteri ipianaja Jesoshi Caperenaoqui . Iquemacojeitajiri areetaja ivancoqui .

text: And straightway many were gathered together , insomuch that there was no room to receive them , no , not so much as about the door : and he preached the word unto them .
text2: Yapatojeitaca oshequi atiri , ijaapaaca pancotsiqui . Tecatsi inquenapee pashini inquempejitantapeemparori omoro . Iquenquetsatacaajeitaqueri Jesoshi .

text: And they come unto him , bringing one sick of the palsy , which was borne of four .
text2: Ari icompitacotapaaqueri choritatsiri . Icarati amiriri itsipasati .

text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press , they uncovered the roof where he was : and when they had broken it up , they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay .
text2: Tecatsi inquempejitantapeempariri Jesoshi , yojocaajeitavaqueri atiripee . Ari yataitacaanaqueri otataroqui pancotsi . Itatareapaaquero , itampaticataquero inaquenta Jesoshi . Imataquero omoro , ari yoaniitacotaqueri inareantariqui .

text: When Jesus saw their faith , he said unto the sick of the palsy , Son , thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Iotavaqueri Jesoshi ishirejeitacari , irootaque icantantacariri : - - Noshaninca , ainiro pantayetiri , iro cantaincha eiro noasanquetimentimpirotsi , aitaque noavisacotajempi .

text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there , and reasoning in their hearts ,
text2: Ainiro anta isavicaiti oametantirori sanquenarentsi .

text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies ? who can forgive sins but God only ?
text2: Icantashiretaque iriori : - - 多 Paita icantashinirotantarori oca ? Ijitasorentsinirotacateemi . 多 Jaoca incanteriri iroavisacotanteariri ? Tempa apaniro yoavisacotanti irinti Tasorentsi .

text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves , he said unto them , Why reason ye these things in your hearts ?
text2: Ioshiretashitaca Jesoshi icantashiretaqueri , icantiri : - - 多 Paita picantashiretantari ?

text: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: 多 Paita pomerentsitasanotachari ? 多 Pomerentsinimpa nocantiriri yoca choritatsiri : " Eiro noasanquetimpitsi , irointi noavisacotajempi " ? Te ompomerentsiveteaji : eiro piojeititsi nomaterorica . Irointi pomerentsivetacha noncanteri yoca : " Pincatianaje , paajero pinariantavetari , paniitanaje " . Tempa onconijatasanotanaque nomaterorica .

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( he saith to the sick of the palsy , )
text2: Aca quipatsiquica nocavintsaajeitiri caari cameetsatatsi , aisati noavisacojeitaqueri . Nocoaque piojeite ainiro notasorenca noavisacotanteariri . Ari icantaqueri choritatsiri :

text: I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy bed , and go thy way into thine house .
text2: - - Nocantimpi , pincatianaje , paanajero pinariantaniri , pijataje pivancoqui .

text: And immediately he arose , took up the bed , and went forth before them all ; insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .
text2: Irosati icatiantanaja , yaanajiro inariantaniri , isoquijanaji . Ineajeitavajiri ishaninca , yoajeitanaque cavaco . Icantajeitanaque : - - Tempa icameetsatasanoti Tasorentsi , te aneapiniteroji peerani quempetarori oca .

text: And he went forth again by the sea side ; and all the multitude resorted unto him , and he taught them .
text2: Ipianaja Jesoshi aisati otsapijaqui incajare . Yapatotashijeitapaajari aisati atiri , yoametavajiri .

text: And as he passed by , he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the receipt of custom , and said unto him , Follow me . And he arose and followed him .
text2: Impoiji yovaanaja aisati . Ineapaaqueri Irevi , yora itomi Arijeo , isavicaiti pancotsiqui yapatotapinitiri quirequi : yapatotapinijeitiniri oromasati . Icantapaaqueri : - - Tsame , poijatanaquena . - - Ja , tsamequeti . Ari icatianaca , yoijatanaqueri .

text: And it came to pass , that , as Jesus sat at meat in his house , many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples : for there were many , and they followed him .
text2: Ari ijajeitanaque ivancoqui Irevi . Yoacaajeitapaacari oshequi oijajeitiriri Jesoshi , iroamere , apatotapinitiriri quirequi , maaroni . Jeri aisati yoacaacari caari cameetsayetatsi . Yareejeitapaaca oametantirori sanquenarentsi , variseo ini . Ineacotapaaqueri Jesoshi yoimojeitacari caari cameetsayetatsi . Isampitapaaqueri iroamere : - - 多 Paita itsipajeitantariri yocapee , yoajeita ? Te incameetsajeiteji .

text: When Jesus heard it , he saith unto them , They that are whole have no need of the physician , but they that are sick : I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Ari iquemavaqueri iriori Jesoshi , icantiri : - - Yora caari mantsiatatsine te incoyeji aavinterineri , irintiquea mantsiatatsiri . Te iro nompocantea noncajemeri cameetsatatsiri , irintiquea caari cameetsatatsi .

text: And the disciples of John and of the Pharisees used to fast : and they come and say unto him , Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Ari itijeita iroamerepee Joa aisati iroamerepee variseo . Yora atiri ipocashitiri Jesoshi , icantapaaqueri : - - Jeri meeca itijeita iroamerepee Joa , aisati iquempejeita iroamerepee variseo . 多 Paita caari ititanta poamerepee avirori ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ? as long as they have the bridegroom with them , they cannot fast .
text2: Ari icantavaqueri Jesoshi : - - Oquempetaca ariorica iraye shirampari ijina , incajemajeiteri ishaninca inquimoshireventajeiteri . Ariorica irareejeitapeempa , 多 arimpa intijeitapeempa iriori ? Eiro . Tempa iriveshireimentapeempari . Pineaquero , meeca nocarajeitiri noamerepee : 多 paita nontitacanteariri ?

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Aisati , ariorica irojocajeitanajeri ishaninca aatsiri ijina , impoijiniquea intijeitanaquea . Aisati coajica , nojocanajeririca noamerepee , iroashiretacojeitanaquena , irosati intijeitantanaquea .

text: No man also seweth a piece of new cloth on an old garment : else the new piece that filled it up taketh away from the old , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Tempa ajacapinitiro quitsaarentsitsara , irootaque oshiricamaotantari . Impoiji , te oncameetsateji impataqueetero nianqui iroaquerari : tequera oshiricamaoteji irointi . Impataqueeterome , impoiji ariorica inquiveetajerome aisati , oshiricamaotanaqueme iroori iroaquerari , antsiviacaaquerome maatsarantsi . Impoiji ontsereacaaquero iroaquerari .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles : else the new wine doth burst the bottles , and the wine is spilled , and the bottles will be marred : but new wine must be put into new bottles .
text2: Ariorica ampeantantajearime pearentsi iroaquerajari peesatitatsiri imeshina , tempa ari intapianaqueame , intoncanaqueme . Aitaque intsereanaqueme , aisati amparajatanaqueame iroaquerajari , chararara . Tempa apeantantapinitaro iroaquerajari imeshinaqui iroaquerari . Pineaquero : iroaquerari oca noamejeitimpiri , te oncameetsateji onconoyearo ora yoametapinijeitimpiniri intaroniri .

text: And it came to pass , that he went through the corn fields on the sabbath day ; and his disciples began , as they went , to pluck the ears of corn .
text2: Ari pashini saavaro iquenanaque Jesoshi panquirentsiqui , itsipajeitari iroamerepee . Ari nianqui yaviitapairo iroamere oitsoqui tirico , itaquireiro otaqui , yoajeitaro oitsoqui .

text: And the Pharisees said unto him , Behold , why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful ?
text2: Ari icantiri variseo : - - Paitateemi yaviitantarori oitsoqui , itaquireitantacaro quitaiteri amaoreantari . Te oncameetsateji . 多 Paita yantantarori ?

text: And he said unto them , Have ye never read what David did , when he had need , and was an hungred , he , and they that were with him ?
text2: Ari yacanaqueri Jesoshi : - - 多 Tempa pinquenqueshireeroji sanquenarentsi quenquetsatacotiriri peerani Iravirini ? Te ontimeji iroyeari , aaqueri itashe , aisati itsipajeitari .

text: How he went into the house of God in the days of Abiathar the high priest , and did eat the shewbread , which is not lawful to eat but for the priests , and gave also to them which were with him ?
text2: Ainiro onaveitani tanta yovetsiqueetiniriri Tasorentsi : te irishineyeeteriji iroajeitearo atiri , apaniro yoaro saserote , irinti . Iro cantaincha aavetacari itashe Iravirini . Ijatashitiri Aviatara , yora ivincatsarite saserote , icantiri : " Notasheajeitaque . Tecatsi noajeiteari " . Ari ipavaqueri tanta : " Jero oca , poyea " . Ari yoacaro , aisati yoacaajeitacari itsipajeitari . Caari inajeiti saserote , iro cantaincha te irininteji Tasorentsi iroashinoncaajeiteri .

text: And he said unto them , The sabbath was made for man , and not man for the sabbath :
text2: Pamene , yovetsiquiniri Tasorentsi atiri quitaiteri imaoreajeitantari . Te iro irovetsicanteanari atiri irineapincatsatearo quitaiteri .

text: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Narotaque cantacaantaquerori quitaiteri amaoreantajeitari : tempa noponeaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque .

text: And he entered again into the synagogue ; and there was a man there which had a withered hand .
text2: Yora Jesoshi ijatanaji aisati pancotsiqui yapatojeitantari . Aitaque isaviquiri shirampari quisoporoquitatsiri iracoqui .

text: And they watched him , whether he would heal him on the sabbath day ; that they might accuse him .
text2: Yamenashijeitavaqueri atiri , sorerere : icoaque iriote ariorica iroavisacotajeri saavaroqui . Icoajeitaque incantajeite : " Te oncameetsateji oca yantiri Jesoshi " .

text: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand , Stand forth .
text2: Yora Jesoshi icantiri quisoporoquitatsiri : - - Pincatiaje , caate aca nianqui .

text: And he saith unto them , Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days , or to do evil ? to save life , or to kill ? But they held their peace .
text2: Impoiji isampijeitaqueri maaroni amenajeitaintsiri : - - 多 Cameetsampa aneshinoncateri atiri quitaiteri amaoreajeitantari ? 多 Ariompa avashinoncayeri ? 多 Ocameetsatimpa avavisacoteri ? Tericampa , 多 picoaquempa ayeri ? Iro cantaincha imajerenirojeitanaque .

text: And when he had looked round about on them with anger , being grieved for the hardness of their hearts , he saith unto the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it out : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Iquisanaca Jesoshi , yamenajeitaqueri , aisati iquenqueshireanaca . Iro iquenqueshireantanacari te incavintsaantajeiteji atiri . Icantiri shirampari : - - Pancotaje . Ari yacotanaji , irosati yavisacotantanaja .

text: And the Pharisees went forth , and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Isoquijajeitanaque variseopee , ijatashijeitanaqueri ishaninca Eroreshi . Yoametavacaajeitaca : - - 多 Jaocasa ancanteriri Jesoshi , avanteariri ?

text: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea : and a great multitude from Galilee followed him , and from Judaea ,
text2: Yora Jesoshi aisati iroamerepee ijajeitanaji incajarequi , yoijajeitanaqueri oshequi carireasati , aisati joreasati ,

text: And from Jerusalem , and from Idumaea , and from beyond Jordan ; and they about Tyre and Sidon , a great multitude , when they had heard what great things he did , came unto him .
text2: jerosaresati , iromeasati , intatiquerosati Jorirani , maaroni savicajeitatsiri Tiroqui , Shiroqui , maaroni . Iquemacojeitaqueri itasoncanti , irootaque ijatashijeitantacariri oshequi atiri .

text: And he spake to his disciples , that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude , lest they should throng him .
text2: Icantiri iroamere : - - Pamaquenarota pitotsi , nontetearo : ishenacajeitapaanacari ashanincapee .

text: For he had healed many ; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him , as many as had plagues .
text2: Ari iquenquetsatacaajeitaqueri , impoiji yaniireapaaji aisati quipatsiqui . Oshequi yoavisacojeitavaqueri . Yora mantsiayetatsiri iteencareayetaqueri ishanincapee , impamitantapeempariri Jesoshi .

text: And unclean spirits , when they saw him , fell down before him , and cried , saying , Thou art the Son of God .
text2: Yora atiri yatajeaonquiri camaari ipincatsajeitaqueri . Antearojenca ineanatacaaqueri icantajeitaqueri : - - Jesoshi , avirotaque itomi Tasorentsi .

text: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known .
text2: Icantasanotiri Jesoshi : - - 多 Paita picantantanari ? Pimajerete , eiro picamantacotanatsi .

text: And he goeth up into a mountain , and calleth unto him whom he would : and they came unto him .
text2: Ari impoiji itoncaanaque toncaariqui . Icajemaqueri yora icoyeaqueri , ari ijatashijeitaqueri .

text: And he ordained twelve , that they should be with him , and that he might send them forth to preach ,
text2: Icoyeasanotaqueri 12 shirampari , intsipatasanojeitanteariri . Impoiji intiancajeiteri inquenquetsatacaajeiteri ishaninca irineane Tasorentsi .

text: And to have power to heal sicknesses , and to cast out devils :
text2: Aisati imatacaaqueri itasoncantajeitaque irojocanteariri camaari .

text: And Simon he surnamed Peter ;
text2: Ari icoyeaqueri iroamere 12 . Icoyeaqueri Shimo , ipajitajiri aisati Petero .

text: And James the son of Zebedee , and John the brother of James ; and he surnamed them Boanerges , which is , The sons of thunder :
text2: Aisati icoyeaqueri Santiaco itomi Severeo . Icoyeaqueri Joa irirenti Santiaco : ipajiyeetajiri aisati Voaneriji , acantiro aneanequi " Shintsiri " .

text: And Andrew , and Philip , and Bartholomew , and Matthew , and Thomas , and James the son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus , and Simon the Canaanite ,
text2: Aisati icoyeaqueri Antirishi , Jeripi , Varitorome , Mateo , Tomashi , Santiaco itomi Arijeo , Tareo , Shimo . Iriotaque Shimo shintsiyetirori paitaricapee .

text: And Judas Iscariot , which also betrayed him : and they went into an house .
text2: Aisati icoyeaqueri Jorashi Ishicariote : iriotaque aacanterineri coajica Jesoshi .

text: And the multitude cometh together again , so that they could not so much as eat bread .
text2: Impoiji ipianaja Jesoshi pancotsinentsiqui . Yapatojeitajiri aisati oshequi atiri . Tecatsi incantea iroyea .

text: And when his friends heard of it , they went out to lay hold on him : for they said , He is beside himself .
text2: Iquemacotaqueri Jesoshi ishanincasanori , ijatashivetajari iraanajerime ivancosanoriqui . Icantavacaanaca : - - Te irineacoteaji Jesoshi , tsame aanajeri .

text: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said , He hath Beelzebub , and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils .
text2: Ario ipocashitiri aisati jerosaresati , oametantirori sanquenarentsi . Icantacotashitapaacari : - - Iriotaque Satanashi atajeaonquiriri Jesoshi . Tempa Satanashi iriotaque ivincatsarite camaari : iriotaque amitacotiriri itianquiri iamaaririnte , irootaque imatantacariri .

text: And he called them unto him , and said unto them in parables , How can Satan cast out Satan ?
text2: Icajemavaqueri Jesoshi , icantavaqueri : - - 多 Queariompa yatajeaoncaquena camaari ? Pamene : 多 jaoca incanteari Satanashi irojocajea irisati ?

text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself , that kingdom cannot stand .
text2: Oquempetaca ariorica inquisavacaajeitea savicatsiri nampitsiqui , irojocavacaajeitea , 多 arimpa irisavicajeitanaje cameetsa ?

text: And if a house be divided against itself , that house cannot stand .
text2: Aisati oquempetaca ariorica inquisavacaajeitea savicatsiri pancotsiqui , 多 arimpa inquisoavacaajeitajea ?

text: And if Satan rise up against himself , and be divided , he cannot stand , but hath an end .
text2: Aisati iquempetaca , ariorica Satanashi inquisherime iamaaririnte , irojocavacayeame , eirome itimime : aitaque impoyereavacayeame .

text: No man can enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he will first bind the strong man ; and then he will spoil his house .
text2: Aisati iquempeta iriori coshitantatsiri : itsaroacaari shintsitatsiri inqueavancoteri incoshitanteariri irovaararo . Ariorica impocashiteri , irijivatapeeri iraapeeri , iroisotapeeri shintsitatsiri , impoijiquea incoshiteri paitaricapee yoayetiri ivancoqui .

text: Verily I say unto you , All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men , and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme :
text2: Queariotaque oca noncamantasanotempiri : icavintsaajeitajiri Tasorentsi maaroni antirori caari cameetsatatsi . Aisati , ariorica incantimajeiveteari , incavintsaajeiteri aisati .

text: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness , but is in danger of eternal damnation :
text2: Iro cantaincha , eiro icavintsaajeitiritsi irinti cantimatirori Ishire : incantaitatiyempani intime iriori Sharincaveniqui . Eiro catsini yavisacotajitsi .

text: Because they said , He hath an unclean spirit .
text2: Irootaque icantaqueriri Jesoshi . Pineaquero , icantashinirojeivetaca incaranqui : " Irio camaari amitacotiriri Jesoshi " . Tempa irootaque Ishire Tasorentsi amitacotiriri , caari ini camaari .

text: There came then his brethren and his mother , and , standing without , sent unto him , calling him .
text2: Ari isaviqui Jesoshi pancotsiqui , isaviquimojeitapaaqueri areejeitapaariri . Impoiji areetapaaca iriniro , otsipajeitapaari irirentipee . Ocatiapaaca saiteriqui , ocantiri oneapaaqueri : - - Pincantenari notomi . Ari iqueashitanaqueri , icantapaaqueri : - - Areetapaaca piniro , pirentipee , aisati pitsiropee . Osavicapaaque saiteriqui , ocoapaaquempi .

text: And he answered them , saying , Who is my mother , or my brethren ?
text2: Ari yacavaqueri : - - 多 Jaoca ocantari inatatsiri ? 多 Jaoca icantari iyetatsiri ?

text: And he looked round about on them which sat about him , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Irosati ijicotantanacari saviquimojeitaqueriri . Icantanaque : - - Jeroca inatatsiri . Jerica iyetatsiri .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of God , the same is my brother , and my sister , and mother .
text2: Janicarica antapinitirori icoacairiri Tasorentsi : iriojeitaque iyetatsiri , tsiotatsiri , inatatsiri . Noshanincajeitacari maaroni quemisantajeitanari .

text: And he began again to teach by the sea side : and there was gathered unto him a great multitude , so that he entered into a ship , and sat in the sea ; and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land .
text2: Yoametantaji aisati Jesoshi anta otsapijaqui incajare . Yapatotimentapaajari oshequi atiri catsini . Irosati itetantaca pitotsiqui , itiancaquero nianquija capichaji , isavicaque . Icatiashijeitapaacari otsapijaqui maaroni ashaninca .

text: And he taught them many things by parables , and said unto them in his doctrine ,
text2: Yoameyetaqueri paitaricapee , aisati ishiacaaventiniri , icantiri :

text: Hearken ; Behold , there went out a sower to sow :
text2: - - Meeca noncamantempi . Ijataque panquiveetatsiri yojocaitiro oitsoqui tirico .

text: And it came to pass , as he sowed , some fell by the way side , and the fowls of the air came and devoured it up .
text2: Yojocaitiro , opariaarantapaaque avotsiqui . Ipocapaaque contsaro , yoapaacaro , itsonquitapaaqueri .

text: And some fell on stony ground , where it had not much earth ; and immediately it sprang up , because it had no depth of earth :
text2: Pashini pariapaintsi oitsoqui mapiqui . Te ontimasanoteji oshequi quipatsi , jentsipaite oshiocavetanaca .

text: But when the sun was up , it was scorched ; and because it had no root , it withered away .
text2: Ari ijenoquitapaaque catsirincaiteri , irosati oshimpeshitantanaca . Te omparitsatasanoteji , irootaque ocamantanacari .

text: And some fell among thorns , and the thorns grew up , and choked it , and it yielded no fruit .
text2: Opariapaaque pashini oitsoqui quitotseequimashiqui , oquimotanaque quitotseequi . Irootaque ajaanaquerori , caari oitsoquitanta panquirentsi .

text: And other fell on good ground , and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased ; and brought forth , some thirty , and some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Pashini pariapaintsi quipatsiqui cameetsari . Oquimotanaque , otimayetanaque oitsoqui . Aparo oitsoquitanaintsi ocarati oitsoqui 30 . Pashini otimanaque aisati oitsoqui ocarati 60 . Iro otsipa ocarati oitsoqui 100 .

text: And he said unto them , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Piquemavaquerorica oca nocantaquempiri , piotavaquero , pinquenqueshiretavaquero .

text: And when he was alone , they that were about him with the twelve asked of him the parable .
text2: Impoiji ijajeitanaji atiripee , itimanaji apaniro Jesoshi , itsipajeitari aparopee oijatiriri , aisati iroamere caratatsiri 12 . Isampijeitiri : - - 多 Jaoca ocantari oca pishiacaaventiniriri ?

text: And he said unto them , Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God : but unto them that are without , all these things are done in parables :
text2: Icantanaqueri : - - Meeca noncamantempiro caari piojeitini : aitaque piojeitero jaoca icantari Tasorentsi ipincatsariventanti . Irompa irinti yontapee , eiro nocamantasanotiritsi , irointi noshiacantiniri oncanteata

text: That seeing they may see , and not perceive ; and hearing they may hear , and not understand ; lest at any time they should be converted , and their sins should be forgiven them .
text2: iramenavetea , iro cantaincha eiro ineasanotitsi , inquemavetea , iro cantaincha eiro iotasanotitsi . Eiro iquenqueshireatsi , eiro icavintsaajiritsi Tasorentsi .

text: And he said unto them , Know ye not this parable ? and how then will ye know all parables ?
text2: Aisati icantaqueri : - - 多 Tempa pinquemavaquero oca noshiacantimpiri ? Ariorica noshiacantempiro aisati , 多 jaoca pincanteari piotantearori ?

text: The sower soweth the word .
text2: Yora jocaiyetirori oitsoqui ishiaqueri ovaayetirori irineane Tasorentsi .

text: And these are they by the way side , where the word is sown ; but when they have heard , Satan cometh immediately , and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts .
text2: Aparopee jocaiyetapaincha avotsiqui oshiaqueri quemisantavetavacarori irineane Tasorentsi , iro cantaincha yora Satanashi yojocapitsatajiri iquenqueshireantavetacari : te inquemisantanajeji .

text: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground ; who , when they have heard the word , immediately receive it with gladness ;
text2: Aisati oca jocaitapainchari mapiqui , oshiaqueri quemavetavacarori irineane Tasorentsi . Intsipaite iquimoshireventavetavacaro .

text: And have no root in themselves , and so endure but for a time : afterward , when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word ' s sake , immediately they are offended .
text2: Ishiaquero panquirentsi caari timatsine ovaritsa . Intsipaite ocamaque . Iquemisantavetaca , irootaque yoashinoncanteetacariri , aisati iquisanentanteetacariri . Intsipaite yojocanajiro iquemisantaveta .

text: And these are they which are sown among thorns ; such as hear the word ,
text2: Oca jocaitainchari quitotseequimashiqui oshiacaaventiri quemavetavacarori irineane Tasorentsi .

text: And the cares of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , and the lusts of other things entering in , choke the word , and it becometh unfruitful .
text2: Iro cantaincha iquenqueshiretapinitiro timayetatsiri aca quipatsiqui , iquimoshireventajeitiro yashiyetari . Aiquero icoanaitii irashijeitearo paitaricapee , irootaque yojocantajarori iquemisantavetari . Ishiaquero caari timatsi oitsoqui .

text: And these are they which are sown on good ground ; such as hear the word , and receive it , and bring forth fruit , some thirtyfold , some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Iroquea oca irointi jocaitapainchari quipatsiqui cameetsari , oshiacaaventiri quemasanotavaquerori irineane Tasorentsi . Aitaque ishiretasanotacaro , iriotaque shiacaaventainchari panquirentsipee timanaintsiri oitsoqui . Aparo oitsoquitanaintsi ocarati oitsoqui 30 . Pashini otimanaque aisati oitsoqui ocarati 60 . Iro otsipa ocarati oitsoqui 100 . Oca oitsoqui oshiaquero amajeitaqueneriri Tasorentsi , aparo iranaacotaqueri itsipapee .

text: And he said unto them , Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel , or under a bed ? and not to be set on a candlestick ?
text2: Aisati icantaqueri : - - Ancoaquerica antsiotea , 多 arimpa avajero tsiomentotsi covitiqui tsompoina ? 多 Arimpa amanaquero tsiomentotsi ? Tempa acoiro antsiojeitearo maaroni amenajeitanteari .

text: For there is nothing hid , which shall not be manifested ; neither was any thing kept secret , but that it should come abroad .
text2: Coajica onconijatanaque maaroni amanavetari , iriojeitanaquero maaroni antajeitaqueri .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Otimirica piquemantari , pinquemavaquero oca nocamantaquempiri .

text: And he said unto them , Take heed what ye hear : with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you : and unto you that hear shall more be given .
text2: Pashini icantaqueri aisati : - - Pinquenqueshiretero oca piquemaqueri . Ariorica capichaji pinquemisantavaquero nocamantimpiri , ari capichaji piotavaquero . Ariorica pinquemisantasanotavaquero , ari oshequi piotavaquero , noametasanotaquempiro catsini .

text: For he that hath , to him shall be given : and he that hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he hath .
text2: Yora iotavaquerori noametaqueriri , aiquero noametasanoteri catsini . Yora caari iotavaquero nocamantavetacariri , eiro iotitsi catsini .

text: And he said , So is the kingdom of God , as if a man should cast seed into the ground ;
text2: Aisati icanti : - - Tempa ipincatsariventajeitaquee Tasorentsi . Ishiaqueri shirampari jatatsiri ipanquitiro oitsoqui quipatsiqui .

text: And should sleep , and rise night and day , and the seed should spring and grow up , he knoweth not how .
text2: Imaapiniti tsiteniriqui , isaaquitapiniti quitaiteriqui . Ocontetsoaquitanaque ivanquire , oquimotanaque . Te iriotacoteroji jaoca ocantanacari oshiocantacari .

text: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself ; first the blade , then the ear , after that the full corn in the ear .
text2: Oshiocaque quipatsiqui : ojivati otsoaqui , impoiji ominca , impoiji opa , impoiji antaiquitanaque oitsoqui .

text: But when the fruit is brought forth , immediately he putteth in the sickle , because the harvest is come .
text2: Ariorica osampaquitanaque oitsoqui , intotacoyeetero , tempa omoncaratapaaca iraantearori .

text: And he said , Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God ? or with what comparison shall we compare it ?
text2: Aisati icanti Jesoshi : - - 多 Jaoca noncantempirori noshiacaaventempiro jaoca icanta Tasorentsi ipincatsariventanti ? 多 Jaoca ancanterori anquenquetsatacotantearori ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which , when it is sown in the earth , is less than all the seeds that be in the earth :
text2: Oshiaquero oitsoqui moshitasa . Irointi oitsoqui , te onquempetearoji pashinipee oitsoquiyetatsiri : quiripequiitaque oni catsini . Ariorica ampanquitero ,

text: But when it is sown , it groweth up , and becometh greater than all herbs , and shooteth out great branches ; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it .
text2: oshiocanaque . Onquimotanaque , anayetanaquero otsipapee panquirentsiyetatsiri . Antearoyetanaque ojempequipee , aitaque iramampeapinitearo vanquiyetachari .

text: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them , as they were able to hear it .
text2: Aitaque icantapinita Jesoshi , ishiacaaventapinitiniri atiri iroametanteariri irineane Tasorentsi . Ariorica capichaji iquemaquero , ari capichaji yoametaqueri : oshequirica iquemavaquero , ari oshequi yoametaqueri .

text: But without a parable spake he not unto them : and when they were alone , he expounded all things to his disciples .
text2: Iotaca ishiacaaventapinitiniriri . Irintiquea iroamere , itsoteajeitaqueneri yoametasanojeitiri .

text: And the same day , when the even was come , he saith unto them , Let us pass over unto the other side .
text2: Iqueanaji catsirincaiteri . Icantajiri iroamere : - - Tsame amonteanaje intatiquero .

text: And when they had sent away the multitude , they took him even as he was in the ship . And there were also with him other little ships .
text2: Itiancanajiri apatotimentajeitariri : - - Tsamajempi pijajeitanaje pivancopeequi . Irosati inaque iriori pitotsiqui , isavicaque . Itejeitanaja iroamere , yoimonteajiri . Aisati imonteacotanaja yora apatotimentariri otsipapee pitotsi .

text: And there arose a great storm of wind , and the waves beat into the ship , so that it was now full .
text2: Omapocavaqueri nianquija antearo tampea catsini . Ora omotoncane otejatapaacaro pitotsi , irovetaincha ojaayeame .

text: And he was in the hinder part of the ship , asleep on a pillow : and they awake him , and say unto him , Master , carest thou not that we perish ?
text2: Imaaque Jesoshi anta opataquiqui , itiinataca . Yoisaaquireaqueri iroamere , icantaqueri : - - Oametanari , 多 paita caari pinquenqueshireanta ? Irotanaintsi ampiincajeite .

text: And he arose , and rebuked the wind , and said unto the sea , Peace , be still . And the wind ceased , and there was a great calm .
text2: Itinaanaja , icajemacotaquero tampea , aisati icantiro incajare : - - Pimajerete , pimajerejate . Opeanaja tampea . Omajerejatasanotanaji incajare .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye so fearful ? how is it that ye have no faith ?
text2: Icantiri : - - 多 Paita pitsaroantari ? 多 Paita caari pishirejeitantari Tasorentsi ?

text: And they feared exceedingly , and said one to another , What manner of man is this , that even the wind and the sea obey him ?
text2: Oshequi catsini itsaroasanojeitanaque . Icantavacaanaca : - - 多 Janicampa yoca , oquemisantantacariri tampea ? Aisati incajare , oquemisantaqueri .

text: And they came over unto the other side of the sea , into the country of the Gadarenes .
text2: Yareejeitanaca intatiquero , yamatsecapaaque quipatsiqui : irootaque iipatsite jerasesati . Intsipaite itonquiotavacari neiriri camaari , iponeanaja anta tijaarimashiqui ,

text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs ; and no man could bind him , no , not with chains :
text2: aitaque isaviquiri . Tecatsi aaveerineri iroimajerenteri .

text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains , and the chains had been plucked asunder by him , and the fetters broken in pieces : neither could any man tame him .
text2: Yoisotapiniyeevetari iracoqui carenatsa , aisati iitiqui , iro cantaincha ipesayetaquero , peti , peti . Tecatsi anacoterine ishintsiti .

text: And always , night and day , he was in the mountains , and in the tombs , crying , and cutting himself with stones .
text2: Icantatiani : tsiteniriqui , quitaiteriqui , iquenayeti tijaariqui aisati toncaariqui . Icajemayeti , itoyetaro mapi .

text: But when he saw Jesus afar off , he ran and worshipped him ,
text2: Yoca shirampari ineitavacari arejiquinta Jesoshi , ishiashitanacari , itiyeroashitapaacari .

text: And cried with a loud voice , and said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of the most high God ? I adjure thee by God , that thou torment me not .
text2: Icantavaqueri Jesoshi camaari : - - Pinijantareanajeri yoca shirampari . Antearojenca icajemacotapaaqueri : - - 多 Paita pashereantanari ? Aviro Jesoshi , itomi Tasorentsi inquitequiniri , tempa ineajeitaquee . Nocantasanotimpi catsini , eiro poashinoncaanatsi .

text: And he asked him , What is thy name ? And he answered , saying , My name is Legion : for we are many .
text2: Ari isampitiri Jesoshi : - - 多 Jaoca pipajitari ? Yacanaqueri : - - Nopajita Oshequianti . Iro nopajitantari , oshiquianti noni catsini .

text: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country .
text2: Eiro pitiancanatsi pashiniqui nampitsi . Aitaque icantasanotapinivetacari catsini .

text: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding .
text2: Ari anta itimi oshequi chancho , yoajeita tioncaiquiji .

text: And all the devils besought him , saying , Send us into the swine , that we may enter into them .
text2: Yora Oshequianti icantiri : - - Ari pintianquenari anta chanchoqui , irineavaquena iriori , quiso noapaajeri .

text: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave . And the unclean spirits went out , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea , ( they were about two thousand ; ) and were choked in the sea .
text2: Ari ishinetaqueri ; inijantareanajiri camaari shirampari , yojocanajiri . Ineavaqueri irinti chancho . Icarajeiti chancho 2 , 000 . Ishiajeitanaca imperitaitequi , ipiincajeitanaque incajarequi , pocn , pocn , pocn ; itsitiajeitanaque , pomiririri .

text: And they that fed the swine fled , and told it in the city , and in the country . And they went out to see what it was that was done .
text2: Itsaroajeitanaque shentajeivetariri , ishiajeitanaca , icamantapairi savicajeitatsiri nampitsiqui , aisati oantsipeequi . Otsoteanaca neantsi . Ipocajeitanaque atiri irameneri jaocarica icantacari chancho .

text: And they come to Jesus , and see him that was possessed with the devil , and had the legion , sitting , and clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Ijatashijeitiri Jesoshi , ineajeitapairi yora neaveitariniri camaari . Isavicaji , iquitsaataja , timanaji iquenqueshiretantari . Ari ineajeitapaaqueri , itsaroacaajeitapaacari .

text: And they that saw it told them how it befell to him that was possessed with the devil , and also concerning the swine .
text2: Yora neasanotaqueriri incaranqui icamantajeitaqueri : - - Pineaqueri , yoavisacotajiri Jesoshi yora neaveitariniri camaari . Aisati yoviincacantaqueri chancho .

text: And they began to pray him to depart out of their coasts .
text2: Impoiji icantasanojeitiri : - - Pijataje , eiro pipocajitsi aisati nonampiqui .

text: And when he was come into the ship , he that had been possessed with the devil prayed him that he might be with him .
text2: Ari itetanaja Jesoshi pitotsiqui . Icantasanovetari yora yoavisacotiri : - - Nocoaque noijatanaquempi .

text: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not , but saith unto him , Go home to thy friends , and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee , and hath had compassion on thee .
text2: Iro cantaincha , icantiri Jesoshi : - - Eiro poijatanatsi , ainti pijataje pinampiqui , anta pishanincaqui . Pincamantapeeri : " Ineshinoncatajana novincatsarite " .

text: And he departed , and began to publish in Decapolis how great things Jesus had done for him : and all men did marvel .
text2: Ari ijatanaque neaveitariniri camaari Tecaporishiqui . Icamantajeitapairi maaroni atiri : - - Yoavisacotajana Jesoshi . Yoajeitavaqueri atiri cavaco .

text: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship unto the other side , much people gathered unto him : and he was nigh unto the sea .
text2: Ari imonteanaja Jesoshi intatiquero . Yapatojeitavacari oshequi atiri anta otsapijaqui .

text: And , behold , there cometh one of the rulers of the synagogue , Jairus by name ; and when he saw him , he fell at his feet ,
text2: Yareetapaaca shirampari pajitachari Jairo , yora jivatacaajeitiriri atiri anta pancotsiqui yapatotantari . Ineapaaqueri , itiyeroashitapaacari Jesoshi .

text: And besought him greatly , saying , My little daughter lieth at the point of death : I pray thee , come and lay thy hands on her , that she may be healed ; and she shall live .
text2: Icantasanotapaaqueri : - - Irotaintsi oncame noshinto . Pimpoque pimpamitapeero avisacotantajeari iroori , eiro ocamantatsi .

text: And Jesus went with him ; and much people followed him , and thronged him .
text2: Ari yoijatanaqueri , aisati yoijajeitanaqueri oshequi catsini apatotimentariri , yovetacajeitanaqueri .

text: And a certain woman , which had an issue of blood twelve years ,
text2: Ocarajeitaqueri tsinane irajashetatsiri . Ocaratacotaque osarintsite 12 irajashetantacari .

text: And had suffered many things of many physicians , and had spent all that she had , and was nothing bettered , but rather grew worse ,
text2: Oshequi yaavinteenayevetaro , aiquero yoatsiyeetaquerori . Atsipetashitacaro opinaventayevetacaro maaroni ashiyevetari . Te avisacotimateji , aiquero ojatatii irajatanaque catsini .

text: When she had heard of Jesus , came in the press behind , and touched his garment .
text2: Oquemaque icantacoyeetiriri Jesoshi : " Oshequi yoavisacotanti " . Osatecanacari oijajeitiriri , oquenapaaque itapiiqui . Oquenqueshiretanaca : - - Ariorica nantiteri iitsaare , aitaque navisacotanaje . Ari antitaqueri iitsaare , ocaratanaji irajaveitani .

text: And straightway the fountain of her blood was dried up ; and she felt in her body that she was healed of that plague .
text2: Oquemavaitia maaririri , avisacotanaji .

text: And Jesus , immediately knowing in himself that virtue had gone out of him , turned him about in the press , and said , Who touched my clothes ?
text2: Aisati iriori Jesoshi , iquemashitavaitiaro itasorenca . Ari ipitsocashitanacari oijajeitiriri , icantiri : - - 多 Janicampa antitaquenarori noitsaare ?

text: And his disciples said unto him , Thou seest the multitude thronging thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Yacanaqueri iroamere : - - Tempa pineeriji yoshequitaque oijajeitimpiri . Yovetacayetaquempi . Aiquero picanti : " 多 Janicampa antitaquenarori noitsaare ? "

text: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing .
text2: Yamenamenayetanaque irineero antitaqueriri iitsaare .

text: But the woman fearing and trembling , knowing what was done in her , came and fell down before him , and told him all the truth .
text2: Iroori tsinane , oshequi otsaroanaque , opioncanaque , pio , pio . Iotanaque avisacotaji . Otiyeroashitapaacari , opincatsataqueri . Otsoteaquero ocamantasanotaqueri maaroni .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace , and be whole of thy plague .
text2: Icantiro : - - Tsinane , pishiretaquena , irootaque pavisacotantajari . Meeca pijataje , pinquimoshiretanaje . Aitaquenea pavisacotajiri .

text: While he yet spake , there came from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house certain which said , Thy daughter is dead : why troublest thou the Master any further ?
text2: Tequerata intsonquerome ineanatiro , ipocajeitapaaque inampirepee Jairo . Icantapaaqueri : - - Camanaque pishinto . 多 Paita pantsipetacanteariri pashereaqueri yoca oametantatsiri ?

text: As soon as Jesus heard the word that was spoken , he saith unto the ruler of the synagogue , Be not afraid , only believe .
text2: Iquemavaquero Jesoshi oca icantapaaqueriri . Icantiri Jairo : - - Eiro picantashiretitsi , nainti pishiretea .

text: And he suffered no man to follow him , save Peter , and James , and John the brother of James .
text2: Tecatsi irishinete oijatanaquerine . Irinti ishinetaque yora Petero , Santiaco , Joa . Iriotaque Joa irirenti Santiaco .

text: And he cometh to the house of the ruler of the synagogue , and seeth the tumult , and them that wept and wailed greatly .
text2: Yareejeitapaaca ivancoqui Jairo . Ineapaaqueri atiripee : icajemajeitaque , iraashiretacojeitacaro , iraacojeitacaro .

text: And when he was come in , he saith unto them , Why make ye this ado , and weep ? the damsel is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Iqueapaaque , icantapaaqueri : - - 多 Paita picajemacojeitantarori ? 多 Paita piraacojeitantarori ? Te oncamasanoteji evancaro , irointi omai .

text: And they laughed him to scorn . But when he had put them all out , he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel , and them that were with him , and entereth in where the damsel was lying .
text2: Ishirontimentajeitavacari , iro cantaincha yoisoquijajeitapairi . Yaanaqueri irini , jero inironi , aisati iroamere , iqueanaque anta onaquenta evancaroni .

text: And he took the damsel by the hand , and said unto her , Talitha cumi ; which is , being interpreted , Damsel , I say unto thee , arise .
text2: Yajiricavacotapaaquero acoqui . Icantiro : - - Tarita comi . Acantiro aneanequi arori : " Evancaro , pintinaanaje " .

text: And straightway the damsel arose , and walked ; for she was of the age of twelve years . And they were astonished with a great astonishment .
text2: Otinaanaja evancaro , tancore , aniitanaji . Ocarataque osarintsite 12 , irootaque omatantajari aniiveetaji . Yoasanojeitanaque cavaco oshaninca .

text: And he charged them straitly that no man should know it ; and commanded that something should be given her to eat .
text2: Icantasanotiri : - - Eiroya picamantayetiritsi atiri . Meeca pimpero oyeari .

text: And he went out from thence , and came into his own country ; and his disciples follow him .
text2: Ari ijatanaji Jesoshi , yareetapaaja iipatsitequi iriori . Yoijajeitajiri iroamere .

text: And when the sabbath day was come , he began to teach in the synagogue : and many hearing him were astonished , saying , From whence hath this man these things ? and what wisdom is this which is given unto him , that even such mighty works are wrought by his hands ?
text2: Impoiji quitaiteri imaoreajeitantari , yoametantapaaji anta yapatotapinijeitacanta joriopee . Yoajeitavaqueri cavaco oshequi quemavaqueriri . Itseencajeitaqueri Jesoshi , icantajeiti : - - Tempa iriotaque ashanincasanori arori . 多 Jaoca oponeimotacariri oca yoametantiri ? 多 Jaoca icantacari itasoncantayetantacari ? 多 Caarimpa yoca vetsicapinitirori inchato ? Iriotaque otomi Maria , tempa iriotaque irirentipee Santiaco , Jose , Jorashi , aisati Shimo . Aisati iritsiropee , tempa osaviquimojeitaquee aca .

text: But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , but in his own country , and among his own kin , and in his own house .
text2: Icanti Jesoshi : - - Ari ineacameetsajeivetacari atiripee camantantatsiri . Iro cantaincha iriorica camantantatsiri ishanincasanori , ari intseenqueri .

text: And he could there do no mighty work , save that he laid his hands upon a few sick folk , and healed them .
text2: Ari itseencajeitaqueri , irootaque caari itasoncantapinitanta anta inampiqui . Aparopee ipamiyetiri mantsiayetatsiri , yoavisacoyetiri .

text: And he marvelled because of their unbelief . And he went round about the villages , teaching .
text2: Iro cantaincha te inquemisantajeiteriji ishaninca , irootaque yoantanacari cavaco : - - 多 Paita caari iquemisantajeitantana ? Iquenaquenayetanaque Jesoshi nampitsipeequi , yoametantayetanaque .

text: And he called unto him the twelve , and began to send them forth by two and two ; and gave them power over unclean spirits ;
text2: Aisati icoyeaqueri iroamere 12 . Imatacaaqueri iroavisacotanteariri neiriri camaari . Impoiji itiancajeitaqueri ; itsipatavacaayetanaca , apitepee ijayetanaque nampitsipeequi .

text: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey , save a staff only ; no scrip , no bread , no money in their purse :
text2: Icantasanotavaqueri : - - Ariorica pijatanaque , tecatsiyea paanaque . Eiro paanaquetsi poyeari , eiro paanaquerotsi pitsarate . Aisati eiro paanaqueritsi piirequite . Irointiquea paanaque piotiquiro .

text: But be shod with sandals ; and not put on two coats .
text2: Aisati pisapatotanaquea , iro cantaincha eiro piquitsaatarotsi poicoro .

text: And he said unto them , In what place soever ye enter into an house , there abide till ye depart from that place .
text2: Aisati icantavaqueri : - - Jaocarica pisavicapaaqueri , aitaque pintimaanitapaaqueri , irosati pijatantajeari pashiniqui nampitsi .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear you , when ye depart thence , shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them . Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Eirorica yaacameetsajeitavaquempi nampitsiquiniri , aisati eirorica iquemisantajeitavaquempi , ari povaanajea , iriotanteari pishemacari , eiro pipiashitaritsi aisati .

text: And they went out , and preached that men should repent .
text2: Ari ijajeitanaque iroamere . Icamantajeitiri atiripee : - - Pinquenqueshirejeitea , eiro pantapinitirotsi aisati caari cameetsatatsi .

text: And they cast out many devils , and anointed with oil many that were sick , and healed them .
text2: Yoavisacojeitiri oshequi yatajeaoncane camaari . Itiritantayetari quejitsi oshequi mantsiaripee , yoavisacoyetiri .

text: And king Herod heard of him ; ( for his name was spread abroad : ) and he said , That John the Baptist was risen from the dead , and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Oshequi quemacojeitiriri Jesoshi , irootaque iquemacotantacariri aisati pincatsari pajitachari Eroreshi . Icantayeti atiripee : - - Iriotaque Joa vaotisatantatsiri , camavetainchari : itinaanaja . Iro itinaantajari itasorentsiti .

text: Others said , That it is Elias . And others said , That it is a prophet , or as one of the prophets .
text2: Timatsi pashini cantayevetachari : - - Irioyeata Iriashini : itinaanaja . Pashini cantayetatsiri aisati : - - Iriotaque camantantatsiri . Ishiajiri camantantaveitachaniri .

text: But when Herod heard thereof , he said , It is John , whom I beheaded : he is risen from the dead .
text2: Ari iquemacotaqueri Eroreshi , icanti : - - Iriotaqueteemi Joa . Nopesacantavetacari itsanoqui iro cantaincha itinaanaja aisati .

text: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John , and bound him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife : for he had married her .
text2: Ari peerani Eroreshi yaapitsataqueri irirenti ijina . Ipajita irirenti Jeripi , iro ijinantaveitaniri , Eroriashi . Yora Joa icantapinivetacari Eroreshi : - - Te oncameetsateji paapitsateri pirenti ijina . Oquisanaqueri Eroriashi , ocoasanoveta oacanterime , iro cantaincha te irininteji yora ojimentajari . Oshequi ashereapinitaqueri , irootaque yaacantantacariri Joa , yoiminquiacantaqueri caravosoqui tsompoina .

text: For Herod feared John , knowing that he was a just man and an holy , and observed him ; and when he heard him , he did many things , and heard him gladly .
text2: Ipincatsavetacari iriori Joa , iotiri icameetsatasanoti , iquemisantasanotiri Tasorentsi . Te irishinevetearoji ijina oacanteri . Itsaroacaapinivetari Joa , iquenquetsatacaapinitiri . Ineacameetsatiro icantiriri Joa , iro cantaincha te irioteji jaoca incanteari .

text: And when a convenient day was come , that Herod on his birthday made a supper to his lords , high captains , and chief estates of Galilee ;
text2: Omoncarataja iitaiterite itimantacari peerani Eroreshi . Yoacaajeitari ivincatsaririnte , ivincatsarite soraro , aisati ivincatsarite carireasati . Irootaque quitaiteri oacantantacariri Eroriashi Joa .

text: And when the daughter of the said Herodias came in , and danced , and pleased Herod and them that sat with him , the king said unto the damsel , Ask of me whatsoever thou wilt , and I will give it thee .
text2: Oqueapaaque oshinto Eroriashi anta yoajeitanta omaninquetsaveetapaaque apaniro . Ineacameetsatavaquero Eroreshi aisati itsipajeitari . Icantiro evancaro : - - Pincoacotena paitarica picoaqueri . Aitaque nompaquempiro .

text: And he sware unto her , Whatsoever thou shalt ask of me , I will give it thee , unto the half of my kingdom .
text2: Ineaquena Tasorentsi , ioti eiro namatavitimpitsi . Paitaricapee pincoacotaquenari , aitaque nompaquempi . Picoaquerica nompaarantempi noipatsite , aitaque nompaquempi cashetani .

text: And she went forth , and said unto her mother , What shall I ask ? And she said , The head of John the Baptist .
text2: Osoquijanaji iroori , osampitapaaquero iniro : - - 多 Paita noncoacoteriri ? Acavaquero iroori : - - Iro pincoacoteriri iito Joa vaotisatantatsiri .

text: And she came in straightway with haste unto the king , and asked , saying , I will that thou give me by and by in a charger the head of John the Baptist .
text2: Intsipaite opianaja aisati , opiashitanajari pincatsari . Ocoacotapaaqueri , ocantiri : - - Nocoi meeca pimpacotenaro matitaqui iito Joa .

text: And the king was exceeding sorry ; yet for his oath ' s sake , and for their sakes which sat with him , he would not reject her .
text2: Oshequi yoashiretanaca . Tempa aitaque icantaquero incaranqui : " Eiro namatavitimpitsi " . Aisati iquemajeitavaqueri maaroni itsipajeitacari . Te meeca incoajeji iramatavitero .

text: And immediately the king sent an executioner , and commanded his head to be brought : and he went and beheaded him in the prison ,
text2: Ari itiancaqueri oantatsiri , icantavaqueri : - - Pamaquenaro iito Joa . Ari ijatanaque anta yoiminqueaquerinta , ipesapaaqueri itsanoqui .

text: And brought his head in a charger , and gave it to the damsel : and the damsel gave it to her mother .
text2: Yamacotaquero matitaqui iitoni , ipapaaquero evancaro . Iroori , ovaaquenero iniro .

text: And when his disciples heard of it , they came and took up his corpse , and laid it in a tomb .
text2: Iquemacotaqueri iroamereni Joani , ari ijatashijeitaqueri . Yaanajiri , itijajiri .

text: And the apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus , and told him all things , both what they had done , and what they had taught .
text2: Ipiajeitanaja itiancane Jesoshi . Icamantajeitapaajiri maaroni yantayetaqueri . Aisati icamantacoyetapairo maaroni yoametantayetaqueri .

text: And he said unto them , Come ye yourselves apart into a desert place , and rest a while : for there were many coming and going , and they had no leisure so much as to eat .
text2: Irosati icantani oshequi atiri ipocashitapinitiri Jesoshi , aisati ijajeitanaji . Te irinijantareeriji , tecatsi incantea iroyea . Icantajeitavaqueri itiancane : - - Tsame ajate ayojeitanaquea anta tecatsi timatsine . Amaoreajeitavaqueta capichaji .

text: And they departed into a desert place by ship privately .
text2: Ari ijajeitanaque , iquenanaque pitotsiqui .

text: And the people saw them departing , and many knew him , and ran afoot thither out of all cities , and outwent them , and came together unto him .
text2: Ari ineajeitavaqueri oshequi atiri , iojeitavaqueri . Iponeajeitanaca ivancopeequi , ishianaca , ishitejeitanaca . Ishianaca , yanaacojeitaqueri , yapatotimentajeitavacari .

text: And Jesus , when he came out , saw much people , and was moved with compassion toward them , because they were as sheep not having a shepherd : and he began to teach them many things .
text2: Imitajanaque Jesoshi , ineapaatiiri oshequi apatojeitainchari . Irosati ineshinoncajeitantapaacariri ishiacaantapaaqueri ovisha caari timatsine amenerineri . Oshequi yoamejeitapaaqueri paitapeerica .

text: And when the day was now far spent , his disciples came unto him , and said , This is a desert place , and now the time is far passed :
text2: Ari ishaavijitanaji catsirincaiteri . Ipocashitiri iroamere , icantiri : - - Meeca anajeitaque aca caaraiteriqui , tecatsi avajeiteari . Aisati ishaavijitaque catsirincaiteri .

text: Send them away , that they may go into the country round about , and into the villages , and buy themselves bread : for they have nothing to eat .
text2: Pintiancajeiteri atiri irijajeitajeta oantsiqui , nampitsiqui quempejiniri . Iramanantajeitapeeta iroyeari .

text: He answered and said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they say unto him , Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread , and give them to eat ?
text2: Yacanaqueri , icantiri : - - Pimperita avinti iroyeari . Icanti iroamere : - - 多 Picoavetampa nojate namanantaite tanta nompantajeiteariri ? Oshequi ompinatea noacantajeiteariri maaroni , eiro imoncaratarotsi airequite .

text: He saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? go and see . And when they knew , they say , Five , and two fishes .
text2: Yacanajiri : - - 多 Jaoca ocaratiri pitantane timatsiri ? Pijate , pamenaitero . Ari ineaitiro , icantaqueri : - - Apapacoroni ocarati tanta , aisati apite shima .

text: And he commanded them to make all sit down by companies upon the green grass .
text2: Icantiri : - - Poisaviqueri atiripee ara saveshishiqui . Pampatoyeteri , aisati pinashitacaayeteari .

text: And they sat down in ranks , by hundreds , and by fifties .
text2: Ari yapatojeitaqueri , isavicajeitanaque . Aparoni apatojeitainchari icarati 100 atiri . Itimi oshequi itsipapee apatojeitainchari aisati . Inashiyetaca pashinipee apatojeitainchari , icarayetaque 50 .

text: And when he had taken the five loaves and the two fishes , he looked up to heaven , and blessed , and brake the loaves , and gave them to his disciples to set before them ; and the two fishes divided he among them all .
text2: Ari yaaquero Jesoshi tanta aisati shima , yamenanaque jenoqui . Icantiri iriri : - - Ariove , Apa , aviro paquenarori oca noyearica . Icarajaquero tanta . Ipaqueri iroamere irovayeteneri apatojeitainchari . Aisati shima , yovayetaqueneri maaroni atiri ,

text: And they did all eat , and were filled .
text2: ari yoajeitanaca . Iquemajeitanaca , te intsonqueroji .

text: And they took up twelve baskets full of the fragments , and of the fishes .
text2: Yaayetajiro timaarantapaajantsiri , ijaayetajiro cantiriqui ocarati 12 .

text: And they that did eat of the loaves were about five thousand men .
text2: Icarajeiti oacarori 5 , 000 shirampari .

text: And straightway he constrained his disciples to get into the ship , and to go to the other side before unto Bethsaida , while he sent away the people .
text2: Impoiji itianquiri Jesoshi iroamere , icantiri : - - Pintetanajea pitotsiqui . Pijivajeitanaquena intatiqueronta , anta Vetsairaqui : nontiancajeitajerita ivancopeequi yoca apatojeitainchari .

text: And when he had sent them away , he departed into a mountain to pray .
text2: Impoiji ijatanaque Jesoshi toncaariqui , iquenquetsatacairi iriri .

text: And when even was come , the ship was in the midst of the sea , and he alone on the land .
text2: Otsitenijencaiteanaji , inianquijatacotanaque iroamere incajarequi . Itimaiti Jesoshi apaniro quipatsiqui .

text: And he saw them toiling in rowing ; for the wind was contrary unto them : and about the fourth watch of the night he cometh unto them , walking upon the sea , and would have passed by them .
text2: Ineaqueri iroamere , icomacomajeiveta , iotaqueri imaojempequitaque . Aiquero oipiacotajiriri tampea . Ari oquitaitetimataji ijatashitajiri iriori Jesoshi . Yaniijatanajiro incajare , te intsitiyeji . Iro iravisanaquerime ,

text: But when they saw him walking upon the sea , they supposed it had been a spirit , and cried out :
text2: iro cantaincha ineajeitavajiri , yaniijatapaajiro incajare . Ijijeivetavacari irio camaari . Ari icajemajeitanaque : - - Eeeee . Coraquenive camaari .

text: For they all saw him , and were troubled . And immediately he talked with them , and saith unto them , Be of good cheer : it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Ari ineajeitavaqueri maaroni . Itsaroajeitanaque . Ineanatapaajiri : - - Pinquimoshirejeitaje . Narotaque pocajantsiri . Eiro pitsaroashijeitatsi .

text: And he went up unto them into the ship ; and the wind ceased : and they were sore amazed in themselves beyond measure , and wondered .
text2: Itetapaaja pitotsiqui , itsipajeitapaajari , opeanaja tampea . Yoajeitanaque cavaco catsini .

text: For they considered not the miracle of the loaves : for their heart was hardened .
text2: Ineajeivetacari incaranqui itasonquiro tanta , iro cantaincha tequera inquenqueshireimateaji .

text: And when they had passed over , they came into the land of Gennesaret , and drew to the shore .
text2: Ari imonteanacaro , yareejeitapaaca Jenesaretequi . Yaatacojeitapaaque .

text: And when they were come out of the ship , straightway they knew him ,
text2: Imitajajeitapaaque , intsipaite iojeitavaqueri atiri .

text: And ran through that whole region round about , and began to carry about in beds those that were sick , where they heard he was .
text2: Ishiashijeitapaacari . Yamacojeitaqueri mantsiayetatsiri inareantariqui . Jaocarica itimapairi Jesoshi , aitaque anta yaacotanaqueneriri .

text: And whithersoever he entered , into villages , or cities , or country , they laid the sick in the streets , and besought him that they might touch if it were but the border of his garment : and as many as touched him were made whole .
text2: Iquenaquenayeti nampitsijaniquiqui , nampitsiqui antearo , aisati oantsiqui . Jaocarica iquenanaqueri Jesoshi yoayetaqueneri mantsiayetatsiri . Yoayetaqueneri nianqui nampitsiqui , icantajeitavaqueri : - - Pishinetenaro nompamititavaquempiro ocaratapai piitsaare . Ari yavisacojeitaji maaroni pamititajeitavaqueriri iitsaare .

text: Then came together unto him the Pharisees , and certain of the scribes , which came from Jerusalem .
text2: Ari ipocapaaque variseopee , aisati aparopee oametantirori sanquenarentsi , iponeaca Jerosarequi . Yapatotimentapaacari Jesoshi .

text: And when they saw some of his disciples eat bread with defiled , that is to say , with unwashen , hands , they found fault .
text2: Ineajeitapairi iroamere , yoajeita iriori : te inquivacoteaji . Icantajeiti intacaroniri : " Ariorica ayea , ajivate anquivacotea ancameetsashiretanteari " .

text: For the Pharisees , and all the Jews , except they wash their hands oft , eat not , holding the tradition of the elders .
text2: Yora variseo yamejeitaro tequeratarica iroyeata , iquivacotasanota . Tempa yamejeitaro maaroni joriopee . Irompa eirorica iquivacotita , eiro yoatsi . Aitaque imoncaratajiro yoametantapinitiniri intacaroniri .
