text: And when they come from the market , except they wash , they eat not . And many other things there be , which they have received to hold , as the washing of cups , and pots , brasen vessels , and of tables .
text2: Ariorica imponeajea anta nampitsiqui nianqui , eirorica iquivacotasanotapaajatsi , eiro yoapaajatsi . Aisati imoncaratashiyetaro oshequi paitarica yoameyetiriri ishanincani . Iquivajeitapinitiro pajo , onero , oya , maaroni .

text: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him , Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders , but eat bread with unwashen hands ?
text2: Ari isampijeitapaaqueri Jesoshi : - - 多 Paita caari imoncaratantaro poamere yoametantapinitiniri intacantaqueeniri ? Jeri yoca meeca oainchari , te inquivacoteaji : ainiro irantane .

text: He answered and said unto them , Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites , as it is written , This people honoureth me with their lips , but their heart is far from me .
text2: Icantavaqueri Jesoshi : - - Oshequi pamatavitantayeti . Aitaque icamantacotitaquempini peerani Isayashini . Isanquenatini : " Icantashivetana yoca atiri : ' Picameetsati ' , iro cantaincha te inquenqueshiretenaji .

text: Howbeit in vain do they worship me , teaching for doctines the commandments of men .
text2: Yatsipetashitaro itiyeroimentavetana ; ipincatsatashivetana . Pamatavitashiyetacari pishaninca : picantanirovetari oca poametantavetari irootaque irineane Tasorentsi " . Queario oca icantaqueniri Isayashi .

text: For laying aside the commandment of God , ye hold the tradition of men , as the washing of pots and cups : and many other such like things ye do .
text2: Aisati icantiri Jesoshi : - - Pojocashitacaro icantavetimpiri Tasorentsi , irointi piquemisantashitacaro yoametantapinitiri atiri .

text: And he said unto them , Full well ye reject the commandment of God , that ye may keep your own tradition .
text2: Aitaque pitseencaquero icantiri Tasorentsi , irointi picoaque pimoncaratajero yoametantapinitiri intacantaroniri .

text: For Moses said , Honour thy father and thy mother ; and , Whoso curseth father or mother , let him die the death :
text2: Icantini Moishishini : " Pimpincatsateri piri , aisati piniro " . Aisati icanti : " Aitaque iroasanqueteri Tasorentsi yora cantimatiriri iriri aisati iriniro " .

text: But ye say , If a man shall say to his father or mother , It is Corban , that is to say , a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ; he shall be free .
text2: Iro cantaincha picantashinirojeivetari ashaninca : " Ariorica pincashiacayeri Tasorentsi piirequite , ari pimpasanoteri . Irashinoncayearica piri , piniro , pincanteri : ' Eiro nomatirotsi noncavintsayempi : nocashiacaaqueri Tasorentsi noirequite nomperiri ' " .

text: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother ;
text2: Aitaque meeca te pishineteriji pishaninca irintacoteari iriri , iriniro .

text: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition , which ye have delivered : and many such like things do ye .
text2: Picoacaaqueri inquemisantero poametapinitiriri , aisati poametaqueri intseenquero icantiri Tasorentsi . Aitaque picantanirotapinitari : pojocacaayetiri ashaninca iquemisanti .

text: And when he had called all the people unto him , he said unto them , Hearken unto me every one of you , and understand :
text2: Ari icajemajiri aisati apatojeitainchari , icantajeitiri : - - Pinquemajeitavaquena maaroni . Piojeitavaquero oca .

text: There is nothing from without a man , that entering into him can defile him : but the things which come out of him , those are they that defile the man .
text2: Ocameetsati avajeitearo paitapeerica , eiro otimitsi antane : tecatsi oncantero avari ashire . Piquenqueshiretiro caari cameetsatatsi , irootaque pantapinitantarori .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Otimirica piyempita piquemantari , pinquemavaque .

text: And when he was entered into the house from the people , his disciples asked him concerning the parable .
text2: Ari ijajeitanaji apatotimentariri , iqueapaaji Jesoshi pancotsiqui . Isampitiri iroamere : - - 多 Jaoca ocantari pishiacaaventiniriri ?

text: And he saith unto them , Are ye so without understanding also ? Do ye not perceive , that whatsoever thing from without entereth into the man , it cannot defile him ;
text2: Icantiri : - - Aisatimpa avirori , 多 tempa pinquemavaquena ? Paitapeerica iroyeari ashaninca , ocameetsati , eiro otimitsi irantane . Tempa piotavaquero .

text: Because it entereth not into his heart , but into the belly , and goeth out into the draught , purging all meats ?
text2: Eiro omatirotsi ishire , ainti ojataque isheitoqui , impoiji ishitajiro . Irootaque yoamejeitiriri ocameetsataque paitarica yoyeeyetari .

text: And he said , That which cometh out of the man , that defileth the man .
text2: Aisati icantiri : - - Oca iquenqueshiretiri antacairiri ashaninca caari cameetsatatsi .

text: For from within , out of the heart of men , proceed evil thoughts , adulteries , fornications , murders ,
text2: Te iroyearoji caari cameetsatatsi , irointi iquenqueshiretiro . Irootaque yantajeitantarori maaroni : yantavintsatiro tsinane caari yai , antavintsatiri shirampari caari ai , icoshiti , yoanti .

text: Thefts , covetousness , wickedness , deceit , lasciviousness , an evil eye , blasphemy , pride , foolishness :
text2: Yaimentaro ijina , aimentari ojime . Inevetaro yashiyetari pashini atiri . Icamaaritanti , yamatavitanti , imayempitantapiniti , imashitsati , icantimatanti , ishemeti . Te ontimeji iojeitantari .

text: All these evil things come from within , and defile the man .
text2: Iquenqueshiretiro atiri caari cameetsatatsi , irootaque yantantarori : impoiji otimi irantanepee .

text: And from thence he arose , and went into the borders of Tyre and Sidon , and entered into an house , and would have no man know it : but he could not be hid .
text2: Impoiji ijatanaji Jesoshi Tiroqui . Isavicapaaque pancotsiqui , te incoaveteaji irioyeeterime . Iro cantaincha tecatsi incantea irimanea .

text: For a certain woman , whose young daughter had an unclean spirit , heard of him , and came and fell at his feet :
text2: Otimi anta tsinane , yatajeaonquiro oshinto camaari . Oquemacotavaqueri tsinane Jesoshi , ojatashitaqueri , otiyeroashitapaacari .

text: The woman was a Greek , a Syrophenician by nation ; and she besought him that he would cast forth the devil out of her daughter .
text2: Caari oni jorio , oponeaca Shirojenishiaqui . Ocantapaaqueri : - - Yatajeaoncaquero noshinto camaari , poavisacotajenaro .

text: But Jesus said unto her , Let the children first be filled : for it is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it unto the dogs .
text2: Icantavaquero : - - Nojivatavaquerita noshanincasanori nintacoteari . Te oncameetsateji aapitsatajeri yoari ajananequite , amperi otsiti iroyeari .

text: And she answered and said unto him , Yes , Lord : yet the dogs under the table eat of the children ' s crumbs .
text2: Iroori acanaqueri : - - Je , queario . Aitaque iniri otsiti nijanteaji . Yoatsopequititayetari atomi .

text: And he said unto her , For this saying go thy way ; the devil is gone out of thy daughter .
text2: Icantajiro : - - Je , cameetsa ; queario picantaqueri . Cameetsa pijataje meeca , avisacotanaji pishinto .

text: And when she was come to her house , she found the devil gone out , and her daughter laid upon the bed .
text2: Opianaja ovancoqui . Oneapaajiro oshinto , onariaca omaamentoqui , avisacotaji .

text: And again , departing from the coasts of Tyre and Sidon , he came unto the sea of Galilee , through the midst of the coasts of Decapolis .
text2: Impoiji yovaanaja aisati Jesoshi , iquenanaji Tiroqui , Shiroqui aisati Tecaporishiqui . Ari yareetapaaja incajarequi Carireaquiniri .

text: And they bring unto him one that was deaf , and had an impediment in his speech ; and they beseech him to put his hand upon him .
text2: Yameetapaaqueneri aparo shirampari imayempiti , aisati imasontiti . Icantapaaqueri : - - Pimpamitavaqueri , poavisacotajeri .

text: And he took him aside from the multitude , and put his fingers into his ears , and he spit , and touched his tongue ;
text2: Yora Jesoshi yojocanajiri apatotimentariri , apaniro itsipatanacari mayempiri . Yoiminquiaqueneri iracotsapaqui iyempitaqui . Iquitiojaquero iracotsapaqui , ipantaqueri inenequi .

text: And looking up to heaven , he sighed , and saith unto him , Ephphatha , that is , Be opened .
text2: Yamenanaque jenoqui , yaneencanaque , icantiri : - - Epeta . Acantiri arori aneanequi : " Ovitareanajea " .

text: And straightway his ears were opened , and the string of his tongue was loosed , and he spake plain .
text2: Ovitareanaja iquemantari . Opeanaja iniconeneveitani , cameetsajencatanaji ineaveetaji .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man : but the more he charged them , so much the more a great deal they published it ;
text2: Yapiitapinivetari : - - Eiroyea picamantacotanatsi . Iro cantaincha te inquemisanteriji , aiquero catsini icamantacotaqueriri .

text: And were beyond measure astonished , saying , He hath done all things well : he maketh both the deaf to hear , and the dumb to speak .
text2: Aiquero catsini yoajeitanaqueri cavaco Jesoshi . Icantajeitiri atiripee : - - Paitaquea , ocameetsatasanoti yantayetiri . Imatasanotaquero Jesoshi maaroni yantayetiri . Iquemacaayetajiri mayempiveitachaniri , aisati yora masontiveitachaniri , ineaveetacaayetajiri .

text: In those days the multitude being very great , and having nothing to eat , Jesus called his disciples unto him , and saith unto them ,
text2: Pashini quitaiteri yapatojeitaca aisati oshequi atiri , tecatsi iroajeiteari . Yora Jesoshi icajemiri iroamere , icantavaqueri :

text: I have compassion on the multitude , because they have now been with me three days , and have nothing to eat :
text2: - - Nocavintsaajeitaqueri yocapee . Iro nocavintsaajeitantacariri mavataque quitaiteri itsipajeitaquena , te iroajeiteaji meeca .

text: And if I send them away fasting to their own houses , they will faint by the way : for divers of them came from far .
text2: Aajeitaqueri itashe . Timatsi aparopee poneainchari paricoti : ariorica nontiancavetajeari meeca ivancoqui , ari irimaoshirejeitanaque nianqui avotsiqui , irimaotsajeitanaque .

text: And his disciples answered him , From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness ?
text2: Yacanaqueri iroamere : - - 多 Jaoca ancanteari anquemacaajeitanteariri tanta ? Aca caaraiteriqui .

text: And he asked them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven .
text2: Isampitiri : - - 多 Jaoca ocaratiri pitantane ? Icanti : - - Ocarati 7 .

text: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground : and he took the seven loaves , and gave thanks , and brake , and gave to his disciples to set before them ; and they did set them before the people .
text2: Icantajeitiri apatotimentajeitariri : - - Pisavicajeite quipatsiqui . Yaaquero tanta , ipasonquitiri iriri . Icarajaquero , ipajeitaqueri iroamere , yovaajeitaqueneri apatojeitainchari .

text: And they had a few small fishes : and he blessed , and commanded to set them also before them .
text2: Itimaque aisati shivajaniqui aparopee . Ipasonquitacotaqueri aisati . Impoiji icantiri iroamere : - - Pimpajeiteri aisati shivajaniqui .

text: So they did eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets .
text2: Ari yoajeitaca , iquemajeitanaca . Yaayetajiro timaarantapaintsiri , yoajiro cantiriqui . Ocarati jaajanchari 7 .

text: And they that had eaten were about four thousand : and he sent them away .
text2: Icarajeiti oainchari 4 , 000 . Impoiji itiancajeitajiri : - - Pijajeitaje pivancopeequi .

text: And straightway he entered into a ship with his disciples , and came into the parts of Dalmanutha .
text2: Itsipajeitanajari iroamere , itejeitanaja pitotsiqui . Ijajeitanaji anta Tarimanotaqui .

text: And the Pharisees came forth , and began to question with him , seeking of him a sign from heaven , tempting him .
text2: Ari ipocapaaque variseo . Iquisatsatiri , icantiri : - - Jentsite , pintasoncantayete niotantempiri avirotaque Tasorentsi , impoijiquea ariorica nonquemisantanirotempi .

text: And he sighed deeply in his spirit , and saith , Why doth this generation seek after a sign ? verily I say unto you , There shall no sign be given unto this generation .
text2: Oshequi catsini ocantimoneentacari Jesoshi . Icanti : - - 多 Paita icoajeitantari maaroni atiri nonijayeri nontasoncante ? Queariotaque oca noncamantasanotempiri , eiro ineanatsi nontasoncantayete .

text: And he left them , and entering into the ship again departed to the other side .
text2: Ari ijatanaji Jesoshi , itetanaja aisati pitotsiqui . Ijatanaji , imonteanaja intatiquero .

text: Now the disciples had forgotten to take bread , neither had they in the ship with them more than one loaf .
text2: Ipeacojeitanacaro iroamere iraanaquerome tanta pitotsiqui , aparo yaanaque .

text: And he charged them , saying , Take heed , beware of the leaven of the Pharisees , and of the leaven of Herod .
text2: Icanti Jesoshi : - - Paamaventearo tapiacaarori tanta , yashitari variseo , aisati yashitari Eroreshi .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have no bread .
text2: Ari icantavacaanaca , icantajeiti : - - Tecatsi atantane , irootaque icantantaqueeri : " Paamaventearo tapiacaarori tanta " .

text: And when Jesus knew it , he saith unto them , Why reason ye , because ye have no bread ? perceive ye not yet , neither understand ? have ye your heart yet hardened ?
text2: Iotacotaqueri Jesoshi , icantiri : - - 多 Paita picantavacaantari : " Tecatsi atantane " ? 多 Paita caari piquemanta ? 多 Paita caari piotanta ? 多 Paita caari piquenqueshiretanta ?

text: Having eyes , see ye not ? and having ears , hear ye not ? and do ye not remember ?
text2: Otimaveta poqui , 多 paita caari pineanta ? Otimaveta piquemantari , 多 paita caari piquemanta ? 多 Paita caari pinquenqueshiretantajaro

text: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? They say unto him , Twelve .
text2: noshequiantacarori tanta ? Ocaraveta apapacoroni tanta , icarati oacarori 5 , 000 shirampari . Ari paajiro timaarantapaajantsiri . 多 Jaocampa ocarati jaajanchari cantiriqui ? Yacajeitanajiri : - - Ari ocaratiri 12 .

text: And when the seven among four thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? And they said , Seven .
text2: Icanti Jesoshi : - - Aisati pashini , ocarati tanta 7 , icarati aisati oacarori 4 , 000 . Paajiro aisati timaarantapaajantsiri . 多 Jaoca ocaratiri cantiri pijaajiri ? Icantajeitiri : - - Ocarati 7 .

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye do not understand ?
text2: Icantiri : - - 多 Tequerampa meeca piotavaquero ? Te iro nonquenquetsatacote tanta incaranqui , irointi noquenquetsatacoti yoametantiri variseo aisati Eroreshi .

text: And he cometh to Bethsaida ; and they bring a blind man unto him , and besought him to touch him .
text2: Ari ijajeitanaji Vetsairaqui . Yameetapaaqueneri quitapoajaquiri . Icantapaaqueri : - - Pimpamitavaqueri iramenantajeari .

text: And he took the blind man by the hand , and led him out of the town ; and when he had spit on his eyes , and put his hands upon him , he asked him if he saw ought .
text2: Ari yacatsatanaqueri quitapoajaquiri , yaanaqueri otsapitapaaca nampitsi . Iquitiojaqueri iroquiqui , ipamijaquitaqueri . Isampitaqueri : - - 多 Amenavetajimpimpa ?

text: And he looked up , and said , I see men as trees , walking .
text2: Yamenanaji , icanti : - - Je , namenavetaja , noneavetajari shiramparinta , iro cantaincha te inconijatasanoteji , ishiavetacaro inchato , aniitaintsiri .

text: After that he put his hands again upon his eyes , and made him look up : and he was restored , and saw every man clearly .
text2: Yapiitajiri aisati , ipamijaquitajiri iroquiqui . Impoiji yamenasanotanaji , yavisacotasanotanaji . Yamenanaji , conijaitetasanotanaji maaroni .

text: And he sent him away to his house , saying , Neither go into the town , nor tell it to any in the town .
text2: Icantiri Jesoshi : - - Eiroyea piquenanajitsi nampitsiqui , apatiroyea povaanajero pivancoqui .

text: And Jesus went out , and his disciples , into the towns of Caesarea Philippi : and by the way he asked his disciples , saying unto them , Whom do men say that I am ?
text2: Ari yovaanaja Jesoshi , itsipatanajari iroamere . Ijajeitanaque nampitsipeequi anta Sesareajiripoqui . Inianquitanaque avotsiqui , isampijeitaqueri iroamere : - - 多 Paita yaamaajeitaquenari atiripee ?

text: And they answered , John the Baptist : but some say , Elias ; and others , One of the prophets .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Aparopee aamaayetaincha aviro Joani vaotisatantatsiniri . Irio itsipa yaamaaquempi aviro Iriashini . Itsipapee aisati icanti aviro camantantatsiniri , pitinaanaja .

text: And he saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? And Peter answereth and saith unto him , Thou art the Christ .
text2: Isampijeitaqueri : - - Avirojei , 多 paita piquenqueshirejeitiri ? Yacanaqueri Petero : - - Avirotaque naamaajeitacari peerani : aviro Quirishito .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man of him .
text2: Icantasanotiri : - - Eiroyea picamantacotanatsi .

text: And he began to teach them , that the Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders , and of the chief priests , and scribes , and be killed , and after three days rise again .
text2: Ari yoametajiri aisati : - - Noponeaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Coajica oshequi nonquemaatsicatimentajeitempi . Queario , intseencaquena pincatsaripee , aisati jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , aisati oametantirori sanquenarentsi : intseencajeitaquena , iroacantajeitaquena . Noncamaque , iro cantaincha oncarataque mava quitaiteri , irosati nontinaantanajeari .

text: And he spake that saying openly . And Peter took him , and began to rebuke him .
text2: Aitaque icantasanojeivetacari . Yora Petero yaanaqueri quempequetiji ara , icantaqueri : - - 多 Paita picantantarori oca ? Te oncameetsateji poamaimatea .

text: But when he had turned about and looked on his disciples , he rebuked Peter , saying , Get thee behind me , Satan : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but the things that be of men .
text2: Ari ipitsocashijeitacari Jesoshi iroamerepee , yamenajeitanaqueri . Irosati ishintsitsatantacariri Petero : - - Piquempetacari Satanashi . Pijate , te pincameetsateji . Piquempejeitacari atiri , te pinquenqueshireempa . Te pioteroji icoacaaquenari Tasorentsi .

text: And when he had called the people unto him with his disciples also , he said unto them , Whosoever will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Impoiji icajemiri Jesoshi apatojeitachari aisati iroamere . Icantiri : - - Ariorica picoaque poijajeitena , eiro pantirotsi caari cameetsatatsi picoashiyevetari avirori . Poijajeitanaquena , pinquearioventajeitenaro maaroni noncoacaaquempiri : piojeite ariorica pincamimentena .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it ; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel ' s , the same shall save it .
text2: Terica pincoyeji pincamimentena , patsipetashita pitimi , ainti pijate Sharincaveniqui . Iro cantaincha ariorica pincamimentena , aisati ariorica pinquemisantacayeteri atiri , eiro patsipetashitarotsi : pincantaitatiyempani panee anta inquitequi .

text: For what shall it profit a man , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ?
text2: Ariorica pashijeitearo maaroni timayetatsiri aca quipatsiqui , aintiquea pijate Sharincaveniqui , tempa pantsipetashitearo pashiyetearo .

text: Or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Ariorica pijate Sharincaveniqui , 多 jaoca pincanteari pijatanteari inquitequi ?

text: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation ; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels .
text2: Tseencantatsiri inajeiti maaroni timajeitatsiri , aisati yantapinijeitiro caari cameetsatatsi . Noponeaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Coajica nojataje inquitequi : meeca , ariorica pipashiventacaana , aisati ariorica pipashiventacaaro noneane , coajica nompiapaajerica , nompashiventacaapeempi avirori . Aisati ariorica nompiaje nompincatsaritasanotapaaque , nonquempetapaaqueari Apa , aisati nontsipajeitapaaqueari inampirepee .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That there be some of them that stand here , which shall not taste of death , till they have seen the kingdom of God come with power .
text2: Aisati icantajiri Jesoshi : - - Queariotaque oca noncamantasanotempiri . Pamene , acarajeitaque meeca aca . Eirotarica picamajeititsi , ari pineavaqueri Tasorentsi impoque , impincatsaritapaaque , intasorentsitapaaque .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh with him Peter , and James , and John , and leadeth them up into an high mountain apart by themselves : and he was transfigured before them .
text2: Avisanaque 6 quitaiteri . Yaanaqueri Jesoshi yora Petero , Santiaco , aisati Joa , ijivatanaqueri anta antearoqui toncaari . Ari itimajeitapaaque apaniro . Ipashinitanaca Jesoshi , ipashinitimotanaqueri oijajeitiriri .

text: And his raiment became shining , exceeding white as snow ; so as no fuller on earth can white them .
text2: Oshipaquireanaque iitsaare . Oquitamarotanaque catsini . Aca quipatsiqui te aneeroji catsini quempetearoneri .

text: And there appeared unto them Elias with Moses : and they were talking with Jesus .
text2: Imapocapaaca , iconijatimotapaaqueri Iriashini aisati Moishishini , iquenquetsatacaapaaqueri Jesoshi .

text: And Peter answered and said to Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Ineaveetashitanaca Petero : - - Oametanari , tempa ocameetsatasanoti pamaquena aca , noneantaquempiri . Meeca nocoaque novetsicajeitempi mava pancotsijaniqui : aparoni pashi , aparoni irashi Moishishi , iro otsipa irashi Iriashi iriori .

text: For he wist not what to say ; for they were sore afraid .
text2: Itsaroasanojeitanaque catsini , irootaque caari iotanta Petero paitarica incanterimeri .

text: And there was a cloud that overshadowed them : and a voice came out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Otsimancajeitapaaqueri mencori . Omapocanaca irineane Tasorentsi mencoriqui , icantajeitaqueri : - - Iriotaque notomi nonintasanotiri , pinquemisanteri .

text: And suddenly , when they had looked round about , they saw no man any more , save Jesus only with themselves .
text2: Intsipaite yamenayevetanaca iroamere , tecatsi irinee , irinti apaniro Jesoshi .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , he charged them that they should tell no man what things they had seen , till the Son of man were risen from the dead .
text2: Irosati ipiajeitantanaja , yoirincajeitanaja . Icantasanotiri Jesoshi : - - Eiroyea picamantacotirotsi oca pineaqueri . Coajica noncame . Ariorica nontinaanaje , irosati pincamantacotantenari oca pineaqueri meeca . Tempa noponeaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque .

text: And they kept that saying with themselves , questioning one with another what the rising from the dead should mean .
text2: Ari iquemajeivetavacari , irosati isampitavacantanaca paita ojitari oca icantiriri Jesoshi : " Coajica noncame . Nontinaanaje aisati " .

text: And they asked him , saying , Why say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Isampijeitaqueri : - - 多 Paita icantantari oametantirori sanquenarentsi : " Tequeratarica impoque Quirishito , irijivatapaaque Iriashini " ?

text: And he answered and told them , Elias verily cometh first , and restoreth all things ; and how it is written of the Son of man , that he must suffer many things , and be set at nought .
text2: Iriori Jesoshi yacanaqueri : - - Queario icanteetiri : " Irijivatapaaque Iriashini , iroameetsajeitapaaque maaroni " . Noponeaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque , tempa naro isanquenatacotiniri peerani : " Oshequi inquemaatsicatearo , aisati oshequi intseencajeitavaqueri " . 多 Paita icantantaroniri oca ?

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is indeed come , and they have done unto him whatsoever they listed , as it is written of him .
text2: Meeca noncamantempi : aitaque peerani ipocaji aisati Iriashini . Oshequi yantanayetaqueri , imoncarataquero isanquenatacotiteetacariniri .

text: And when he came to his disciples , he saw a great multitude about them , and the scribes questioning with them .
text2: Ari ipiajeitanaja anta isavicajeitaquenta iroamerepee pashini . Ineajeitapaaqueri itsipajeitapaacari oshequi apatotimentacariri . Itimi oametantirori sanquenarentsi , ineanajeitiri yora iroamerepee Jesoshi .

text: And straightway all the people , when they beheld him , were greatly amazed , and running to him saluted him .
text2: Ari ineajeitavaqueri Jesoshi , ipocaji , yoasanotavaqueri cavaco . Ishiashijeitanacari , ivetsajeitavacari .

text: And he asked the scribes , What question ye with them ?
text2: Isampitapaaqueri : - - 多 Paita pineanatacojeitiri ?

text: And one of the multitude answered and said , Master , I have brought unto thee my son , which hath a dumb spirit ;
text2: Yacanaqueri aparoni shirampari , icanti : - - Oametanari , namaquempiri notomi . Yatajeaoncapinitiri camaari . Imasontiaqueri notomi .

text: And wheresoever he taketh him , he teareth him : and he foameth , and gnasheth with his teeth , and pineth away : and I spake to thy disciples that they should cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Irajiricapaajeririca , ipishoncajiri quipatsiqui , ishimoretacaanacari , yatsicanajitacaanacari , iquisoporoquitacaanacari . Nocantavetari poamere : " Poavisacotajeri " . Teve , te irimateroji .

text: He answereth him , and saith , O faithless generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him unto me .
text2: Yacanaqueri Jesoshi : - - Te pinquemisantimajeiteji . 多 Jaoca oncarate piojeite ? Noametapinijeivetaquempi , iro cantaincha te pinquemisantajeitavaque . Jentsite , pamaquenarite pitomi .

text: And they brought him unto him : and when he saw him , straightway the spirit tare him ; and he fell on the ground , and wallowed foaming .
text2: Ari yamaqueneri . Yora camaari , ineapaaqueri Jesoshi . Yampitsitacaanacari jananequi , ipariacaanaqueri quipatsiqui , poron . Ipinaironcapinaironcatanaca , ishimoretanaque ivantequi .

text: And he asked his father , How long is it ago since this came unto him ? And he said , Of a child .
text2: Yora Jesoshi isampitaqueri iriri jananequi : - - 多 Jaoca ocaratiri intantanacari ? Yacanaqueri : - - Ainiroquerani ijananequitapaini .

text: And ofttimes it hath cast him into the fire , and into the waters , to destroy him : but if thou canst do any thing , have compassion on us , and help us .
text2: Oshequi yojocacaapinitari paamariqui , aisati nijaqui . Icoaveta iroamayerime . Pitasoncantirica , pineshinoncatajena , poavisacotajenari .

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou canst believe , all things are possible to him that believeth .
text2: Icanti Jesoshi : - - 多 Paita picantantanari : " Pitasoncantirica " ? Pinquemisanterica , aitaque irimataquempiro Tasorentsi paitapeerica .

text: And straightway the father of the child cried out , and said with tears , Lord , I believe ; help thou mine unbelief .
text2: Antearojenca icanti iriri jananequi : - - Noquemisantaveta . Tericampa nonquemisantasanote , pinquemisantacaasanotena avinti .

text: When Jesus saw that the people came running together , he rebuked the foul spirit , saying unto him , Thou dumb and deaf spirit , I charge thee , come out of him , and enter no more into him .
text2: Iriori Jesoshi ineavaqueri ishiashijeitapaacari oshequi atiri . Iquisatsataqueri camaari , icantiri : - - Avironirotaque camaari . Pimasontitacanti , pimayempitacanti . Meeca nocantasanotimpi , poimpacanajeriqueti , eiro patajeaoncajiritsi aisati .

text: And the spirit cried , and rent him sore , and came out of him : and he was as one dead ; insomuch that many said , He is dead .
text2: Icajemanaque camaari , yampitsitacaanacari jananequi , yojocanajiri . Yora jananequi iquempevetanacari camatsiri . Oshequi cantayetanaintsi : - - Camanaque inaque .

text: But Jesus took him by the hand , and lifted him up ; and he arose .
text2: Iro cantaincha yacatsavacotajiri Jesoshi , yoitinaajiri , icatianaja iriori .

text: And when he was come into the house , his disciples asked him privately , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Impoiji iqueajeitapaaji pancotsiqui . Iojeitaca iroamere , isampijeitiri : - - 多 Paitaquea caari nomatantaro narori noavisacoteri ?

text: And he said unto them , This kind can come forth by nothing , but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Oshequi ishintsiti yora camaari , irootaque caari pimatantari poavisacotajeri yora yatajeaonquiri . Aisati maaroni quempejeitariri , eiro pimajeitiritsi . Iro cantaincha , pincantasanoteririca Tasorentsi , ari iramitacotempi poavisacotajeri yatajeaoncane camaari .

text: And they departed thence , and passed through Galilee ; and he would not that any man should know it .
text2: Ari yovaanaja Jesoshi anta , iquenanaji Carireaqui . Ari icoaque iroameteri iroamerepee apaniro , irootaque imanantanajari ijajeitanaji . Icantanaqueri : - - Noponeaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque : coajica iraacaanteetena . Irayena atiri , iroyena . Ari noncamasanovetaquea , impoiji , omavatapaaque quitaiteri , ari nontinaanaje aisati .

text: But they understood not that saying , and were afraid to ask him .
text2: Iro cantaincha te iriojeitavaqueroji iriori oca icamantavetacariri . Itsaroajeitanaque irisampiterime .

text: And he came to Capernaum : and being in the house he asked them , What was it that ye disputed among yourselves by the way ?
text2: Ari yareejeitapaaca Caperenaoqui , isavicajeitapaaque pancotsiqui . Isampitiri Jesoshi iroamere : - - 多 Paita picantavacaanacari avotsiqui ?

text: But they held their peace : for by the way they had disputed among themselves , who should be the greatest .
text2: Imajerejeitanaque iriori , ipashiventajeitanaca . Icantavacaajeitanaca anta avotsiqui , icanti : - - Meeca acarajeitica , 多 janicampa anacotantatsineri impincatsarite ?

text: And he sat down , and called the twelve , and saith unto them , If any man desire to be first , the same shall be last of all , and servant of all .
text2: Ari isaviqui Jesoshi . Icajemiri iroamere , icantiri : - - Ariorica pincoye pimpincatsariventante , pintacojeiteari pishaninca maaroni , aisati pamitacojeiteri , pineshinoncajeiteri .

text: And he took a child , and set him in the midst of them : and when he had taken him in his arms , he said unto them ,
text2: Yamaqueneri aparoni jananequi . Isatecapaaqueneri nianqui , yavitsanotavaqueri . Icanti :

text: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name , receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me , receiveth not me , but him that sent me .
text2: - - Pishirejeitena narori , impoiji pincavintsayeri jananequi . Ariorica pincavintsayeri , aisati narori , pincavintsayena . Aisati oquempetaca , ariorica pincavintsayena , te naro pincavintsaasanote , irintiquea Apa tiancaquenari .

text: And John answered him , saying , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name , and he followeth not us : and we forbad him , because he followeth not us .
text2: Impoiji yora Joa icantanaqueri : - - Oametanari , noneajeitaqueri shirampari , icanti : " Noquemisantaqueri Jesoshi , irootaque nojocantacariri camaari " . Te meeca ancarajeiteriji iriori aca , irootaque notsaneacotantariri .

text: But Jesus said , Forbid him not : for there is no man which shall do a miracle in my name , that can lightly speak evil of me .
text2: Icanti Jesoshi : - - Eiro pitsaneacotaritsi . Tempa nomatacaaqueri itasoncanti , eiro meeca icantimatanatsi irinti .

text: For he that is not against us is on our part .
text2: Janicarica caari quisanenteene iriotaque acarajeitiri .

text: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name , because ye belong to Christ , verily I say unto you , he shall not lose his reward .
text2: Aisati icantiri Jesoshi : - - Ariorica iriotavaquempi atiri aviro quemisantanari , irootaque incavintsantavaquempiri , aitaque impinateri Apa . Queariotaque oca nocamantasanotimpiri .

text: And whosoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe in me , it is better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he were cast into the sea .
text2: Jeri yoca jananequi , quemisantanari : eiro catsini pantacairitsi caari cameetsatatsi . Pantacayeririca , iroasanquetayempi Tasorentsi , pashinoncaasanotanaquea . Oncameetsateme pincamiteame peerani , eiro pashinoncaitame .

text: And if thy hand offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter into life maimed , than having two hands to go into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Jero oca noshiacantempiri meeca piotanteari te oncameetsateji catsini pantero caari cameetsatatsi . Ariorica antacayempiro paco caari cameetsatatsi , pimpeshero . Aitaque ocameetsatiri pijapontsoquitanaje inquitequi , oncanteata anta paneantasanotapaajeari . Te oncameetsateji catsini ontime apite paco : eirorica pipeshirotsi , irootaque pijatanteari Sharincaveniqui . Aitaque anta otimiri paamari caari tsivacanetatsi , aisati iriori yora quenitsi caari caamanetatsi .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Eiro anta icamitsi quenitsi , aisati eiro otsivacanetitsi paamari iroori .

text: And if thy foot offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter halt into life , than having two feet to be cast into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Aisati ariorica antacayempiro piiti caari cameetsatatsi , pimpesajero . Aitaque ocameatsatiri pijapontsoquitanaje inquitequi , oncanteata anta paneantasanotantapaajeari . Te oncameetsateji ontime apite piiti : eirorica pipeshirotsi , irootaque pijatanteari Sharincaveniqui .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Eiro anta icamitsi quenitsi . Aisati eiro otsivacanetitsi paamari iroori .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out : it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye , than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire :
text2: Aisati ariorica antacayempi poqui caari cameetsatatsi , pinquitsoreero . Ari ocameetsatiri pijanaroquitanaje anta ipincatsaritinta Tasorentsi . Te oncameetsate ontime apite poqui : eirorica piquitsoreirotsi , irootaque irojocanteetempiri Sharincaveniqui .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Eiro anta icamitsi quenitsi . Aisati eiro otsivacanetitsi paamari iroori .

text: For every one shall be salted with fire , and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt .
text2: Avirojeitaque quemisantajeitanari , irootaque inquisajeitantempiri caari quemisantajeitatsi . Ariorica pinquemisantajeitena , ompomerentsitimotempi .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his saltness , wherewith will ye season it ? Have salt in yourselves , and have peace one with another .
text2: Ocameetsati tivi . Irompa ariorica ompeanaquea ovoteare , tecatsi oncantajea ompoteataje aisati . Aisati piquempetaca avirori : ariorica paacameetsatavacaajeitea , tempa ocameetsati : pincanteani paacameetsatavacaajeitea , maaroni .

text: And he arose from thence , and cometh into the coasts of Judaea by the farther side of Jordan : and the people resort unto him again ; and , as he was wont , he taught them again .
text2: Ari yovaanaja Jesoshi , iquenanaji Joreaqui . Aisati ijataji intatiquero Joriraniqui . Yapatotimentajari aisati oshequi atiri , yoamejeitapaajiri . Tempa aitaque yametaro yoametantapiniti .

text: And the Pharisees came to him , and asked him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife ? tempting him .
text2: Ipocashitapaaqueri variseo . Icoaveta incomitacayearime Jesoshi , irootaque isampijeitantapaacariri : - - 多 Oshinetantampa irojocajero shirampari ijina ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , What did Moses command you ?
text2: Yacavaqueri : - - 多 Paitampa icantimpiniri Moishishi ?

text: And they said , Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement , and to put her away .
text2: Yacajeitanaqueri iriori : - - Icantini Moishishi : " Pisanquenatajenero pijina , pincamantajero : ' Nojocajempi ' . Impoijiquea oshinetantajea irosati pojocantajearori " .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept .
text2: Icantanaqueri Jesoshi : - - Te incoaveteaji Tasorentsi pojocajero pijina , iro cantaincha te ontimeji piquenqueshireantari , irootaque isanquenatantimpironiri Moishishini oca .

text: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female .
text2: Peerani intantacarori yovetsicantaque Tasorentsi , yovetsicaqueri shirampari . Aisati iroori tsinane yovetsicaquero .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and cleave to his wife ;
text2: Irootaque yojocantariri shirampari iriri , aisati iriniro , irantearori ijina .

text: And they twain shall be one flesh : so then they are no more twain , but one flesh .
text2: Ari icarati shirampari , aisati tsinane : apite inavetaca . Iro cantaincha , ariorica irayero ijina , inquempetaquea apaniro irinaque : quiso iroavacaya .

text: What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Ari ineaqueri Tasorentsi apaniro inaque , meeca eiro pinijantareacaajiritsi .

text: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter .
text2: Ari itimapaaji anta pancotsiqui . Isampitajiri aisati iroamere : - - 多 Jaoca ocantari oca picantaqueriri ?

text: And he saith unto them , Whosoever shall put away his wife , and marry another , committeth adultery against her .
text2: Icantiri : - - Janicarica joquerone ijina , ariorica iraaje otsipa tsinane , tempa iraimentearo ijinasanori .

text: And if a woman shall put away her husband , and be married to another , she committeth adultery .
text2: Aisati oquempeta iroori tsinane , ariorica ojocajeri ojime , aajerica pashini shirampari , tempa aimenteari ojimesanori iroori .

text: And they brought young children to him , that he should touch them : and his disciples rebuked those that brought them .
text2: Ari yameetapaaqueneri jananequipee , icantapaaqueri Jesoshi : - - Pincanteri Tasorentsi cameetsa irisavicacaajeiteri yoca jananequipee . Iro cantaincha icantavaqueri iroamerepee : - - Eiro pamiritsi jananequipee , pashereiricari oametanari .

text: But when Jesus saw it , he was much displeased , and said unto them , Suffer the little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Te onimoteriji Jesoshi yantiri iroamere . Icantiri : - - Pishineteri impocashitenata jananequi . Eiro pitsaneanatsi . Pineaqueri yoca jananequi , ishirejeitaquena : ipincatsariventajeitiri Tasorentsi maaroni quempejeitariri iriori .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child , he shall not enter therein .
text2: Queariotaque oca nocamantasanotimpiri , irinti jananequi ipincatsatiri Tasorentsi . Irompa irinti yora caari shiiri jananequi , yora caari pincatsatiri Tasorentsi , eiro ijatitsi irinti anta ipincatsaritinta .

text: And he took them up in his arms , put his hands upon them , and blessed them .
text2: Yavitsanojeitavaqueri jananequi , ipamitaqueri iitoqui . Icantajeitiri : - - Cameetsa irineshinoncatempi Tasorentsi .

text: And when he was gone forth into the way , there came one running , and kneeled to him , and asked him , Good Master , what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life ?
text2: Ari ijataji Jesoshi , iquenanaji avotsiqui . Ishiapaaca aparoni shirampari , itiyeroashitapaacari . Icantiri : - - Oametantatsiri , cameetsari pini . 多 Paitampa nanteri naneantajeari , noncantaitatiyempani ?

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God .
text2: Icantiri : - - 多 Paita picantantanari : " Cameetsari pini " ? Tecatsi cameetsatatsine , irinti apaniro Tasorentsi icameetsati .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Defraud not , Honour thy father and mother .
text2: Piovintsataquero oca icantacantiniri Moishishini : " Eiro poantitsi . Eiro paimentarotsi pijina . Eiro paimentaritsi pijime . Eiro picoshititsi . Eiro pitseeyacotaritsi atiri . Eiro pamatavitantitsi paitanteariri yashiyetari pishaninca . Pimpincatsateri piri , aisati piniro " .

text: And he answered and said unto him , Master , all these have I observed from my youth .
text2: Icantanaqueri iriori : - - Pamene , ainironi nevancaritapaini , aitaque notsoteaquero maaroni ocapee , irosati meeca .

text: Then Jesus beholding him loved him , and said unto him , One thing thou lackest : go thy way , sell whatsoever thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , take up the cross , and follow me .
text2: Yora Jesoshi , yamenanaqueri , inintaqueri . Icantaqueri : - - Ainiro apanivani caari pimati . Pijate meeca pimpimantayetero maaroni pashiyetari . Pimpashijeiteari caari ashitaarantachane , pashini paapaaje pivaararo inquitequi . Impoiji , tsame , poijatanaquena .

text: And he was sad at that saying , and went away grieved : for he had great possessions .
text2: Iquemavaitiiri icantaqueriri , yoashiretanaca . Iro yoashiretantanacari oshequi timimotiriri irovaararo . Icantavorotanaca , ijatanaji .

text: And Jesus looked round about , and saith unto his disciples , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Ari ipitsocashitanacari Jesoshi iroamere , icantiri : - - Yora ashitaarantachari opomerentsitimotari irijate anta ipincatsaritinta Tasorentsi .

text: And the disciples were astonished at his words . But Jesus answereth again , and saith unto them , Children , how hard is it for them that trust in riches to enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Iquemavaitiiri iroamere , yoajeitanaque cavaco . Yapiitajiniri aisati Jesoshi , icantiri : - - Evancari , aitaque opomerentsitaca pijate anta ipincatsaritinta Tasorentsi .

text: It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Tempa opomerentsitaca inqueero cameyo omoroqui quitsapi . Iroquea irointi pomerentsitasanotachari irijate ashitaarantachari anta ipincatsaritinta Tasorentsi .

text: And they were astonished out of measure , saying among themselves , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Yoajeitanaqueri cavaco catsini iriori . Icantavacaanaca : - - 多 Janicampa meeca avisacotajantsine ? Opomerentsitasanotaca .

text: And Jesus looking upon them saith , With men it is impossible , but not with God : for with God all things are possible .
text2: Yamenanaqueri Jesoshi , icanti : - - Eiro imatashitarotsi atiri iroavisacotajea irisati , irintiquea Tasorentsi matacayerine iroavisacotajeri . Tecatsi pomerentsitimotearine irinti .

text: Then Peter began to say unto him , Lo , we have left all , and have followed thee .
text2: Impoiji Petero icantanaqueri iriori : - - Naroquea nainti , aitaque nojocayetaquero maaroni , paitarica nashijeiveitaniri , noijatanaquempi meeca avirori .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my sake , and the gospel ' s ,
text2: Icanti Jesoshi : - - Queariotaque oca noncantempiri . Ariorica pincoaque poijatanaquena , eiro patsipetashitarotsi pojocayetero pinampi , pirentipee , pitsiropee , piniro , piri , pijananequitepee , poanepee . Aisati ariorica pincoaque pinquemisantacayeri pishaninca , eiro patsipetashitarotsi .

text: But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time , houses , and brethren , and sisters , and mothers , and children , and lands , with persecutions ; and in the world to come eternal life .
text2: Queario , inquishimentempiro piquemisantaquena , ompomerentsivetea , iro cantaincha eiro patsipetashitarotsi . Ariorica pojocanaquero aparo , impajempi Tasorentsi 100 : pivancopee , pirentipee , pitsiropee , piniropee , pijananequitepee , poanepee , maaroni . Aitaque coajica ontimimojeitempi oshequi anta paneasanojeitapaajenta , pincantaitatiyempani .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last first .
text2: Ainiro pincatsarivetachari meeca , iro cantaincha coajica eiro ipincatsaritajitsi ; ainiro meeca yora caari pincatsariyetatsi , iro cantaincha coajica impincatsarite irinti .

text: And they were in the way going up to Jerusalem ; and Jesus went before them : and they were amazed ; and as they followed , they were afraid . And he took again the twelve , and began to tell them what things should happen unto him ,
text2: Ari iquenajeitanaque avotsiqui , irotaintsi irijajeite Jerosarequi , ijivatanaque Jesoshi . Yoajeitanaqueri cavaco oijajeitiriri , aisati itsaroajeitanaque . Ari yapatotiri aisati yora 12 iroamere , icantiri : - - Pinquemena . Tempa noponeaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Meeca ajate Jerosarequi . Coajica iraacanteetena anta , iraavaquena jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , aisati oametantirori sanquenarentsi , iroacantaquena . Iraacantajena aisati , iraantenari pashinisati atiri .

text: And they shall mock him , and shall scourge him , and shall spit upon him , and shall kill him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Irishirontimentajeitaquena , inquitiojena , impasanatena , iroyena . Omavatapaaque quitaiteri , irosati nontinaantanajeari .

text: And James and John , the sons of Zebedee , come unto him , saying , Master , we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire .
text2: Ipoqui quempeji Santiaco , jeri Joa , yora itomipee Severeo . Icantiri : - - Oametantatsiri . Nocoaque pishinetenaro paitarica noncoacotempiri .

text: And he said unto them , What would ye that I should do for you ?
text2: Icantavaqueri Jesoshi : - - 多 Paita picoiri noshinetempiri ?

text: They said unto him , Grant unto us that we may sit , one on thy right hand , and the other on thy left hand , in thy glory .
text2: Icantiri : - - Coajica pimpincatsaritasanote , pishinetena nosaviquimotempi pacosanoriqui . Irio iyeca irisaviquimotempi pampatequi , nonquempejeitempi avirori pipincatsariti .

text: But Jesus said unto them , Ye know not what ye ask : can ye drink of the cup that I drink of ? and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ?
text2: Icantiri Jesoshi : - - Te pioteji paitarica picantaquenari . Pamene , oshequi nonquematsicatearo narori , 多 arimpa pimatero oshequi pinquematsicatearo avirori ?

text: And they said unto him , We can . And Jesus said unto them , Ye shall indeed drink of the cup that I drink of ; and with the baptism that I am baptized withal shall ye be baptized :
text2: Icantanaque iroamere : - - Je , ario nomataquero . Icantiri : - - Je , aitaque ontime coajica pinquematsicateari .

text: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give ; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared .
text2: Iro cantaincha tecatsi noncantea noshinetempi pisavique nacosanoriqui , aisati nampatequi . Irintiquea cantatsineri Tasorentsi janicarica saviquimotenaneri : iotitacarini peerani yora saviquimotenaneri .

text: And when the ten heard it , they began to be much displeased with James and John .
text2: Iquemajeitantacariri yora itsipapee iroamere , iquisanentanaqueri Santiaco aisati Joa .

text: But Jesus called them to him , and saith unto them , Ye know that they which are accounted to rule over the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and their great ones exercise authority upon them .
text2: Icantajeitiri Jesoshi : - - Caate , pimpocajeite . Pioti itimi ivincatsaritepee pashinipee atiri . Iperanayetacari ishaninca iriori . Aisati yora savicacaajeitiriri iriori , iperanajeitacari ishaninca .

text: But so shall it not be among you : but whosoever will be great among you , shall be your minister :
text2: Eiro piquempejeitaritsi avirori . Aintiquea ariorica pincoaque pimpincatsariventajeiteri pishaninca , pintacojeiteari maaroni pitsipajeitari .

text: And whosoever of you will be the chiefest , shall be servant of all .
text2: Aisati ariorica pincoaque pisavicacante , ari pintacojeiteari maaroni pitsipajeitari .

text: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Noponeaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Te iro nompocantea nonampiteari atiri , irointiquea nopocanta nintacojeiteari itsipapee . Aisati noncamimenteri oshequi atiri , noavisacotanteariri .

text: And they came to Jericho : and as he went out of Jericho with his disciples and a great number of people , blind Bartimaeus , the son of Timaeus , sat by the highway side begging .
text2: Ari yareetaca Jesoshi anta nampitsiqui pajitachari Jerico . Yovaanaja aisati , itsipajeitanacari iroamerepee aisati oshequi apatojeitainchari . Ainiro isavicaiti avotsinampiqui shirampari pajitachari Timeojani , iriotaque itomi Timeo . Icamarajati Timeojani , icoacotapinitiri atiri impashiteari quirequi .

text: And when he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth , he began to cry out , and say , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Iquemacotavaqueri impoque Jesoshi , yora nasaretesati . Iroaquera iquemacotavaqueri , icajemavaqueri , icantiri : - - Jesoshi , tempa aviro ishanincani Iravirini , pineshinoncatapaajena narori .

text: And many charged him that he should hold his peace : but he cried the more a great deal , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Oshequi atiri ishintsitsajeitaqueri : - - Pimajerete . Iro cantaincha aiquero catsini icajemasanotanaji aisati : - - Aviro quempetajariri Iravirini . Pineshinoncatena narori .

text: And Jesus stood still , and commanded him to be called . And they call the blind man , saying unto him , Be of good comfort , rise ; he calleth thee .
text2: Icatiapaaca Jesoshi , icanti : - - Pincajemeri . Icajemeetiri camarajari , icanteetiri : - - Piveshireanaquea , pincatianaje . Icajemimpi yonta .

text: And he , casting away his garment , rose , and came to Jesus .
text2: Irosati yojocantanacaro yoicotari , icatianaca , cati . Ijatashitanaqueri Jesoshi .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , What wilt thou that I should do unto thee ? The blind man said unto him , Lord , that I might receive my sight .
text2: Icantavaqueri Jesoshi : - - 多 Paita picoacotanari ? 多 Jaoca noncantajempiri ? Yacanaqueri camarajari : - - Apa , nocoaque namenaje .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Go thy way ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And immediately he received his sight , and followed Jesus in the way .
text2: Icantiri Jesoshi : - - Meeca pijataje . Pishiretaquena , irootaque pavisacotantajeari . Irosati yamenantanaja , yoijatanajiri avotsiqui .

text: And when they came nigh to Jerusalem , unto Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount of Olives , he sendeth forth two of his disciples ,
text2: Iquempejijeitapaacaro Jerosarequi , Vetejajequi , aisati Vetaniaqui : onaquenta toncaari pajitachari Orivomashi . Yora Jesoshi itiancaqueri iroamere apite ,

text: And saith unto them , Go your way into the village over against you : and as soon as ye be entered into it , ye shall find a colt tied , whereon never man sat ; loose him , and bring him .
text2: icantavaqueri : - - Pijatapainte anta nampitsiqui onta amontetacari . Pareetapaaquearica , pineapaaqueri aparoni voro , tequera irantearitasanote , tequera inquijacoyeeteari . Ainiro itsatacota : pintsatacoreapeeri , pamaquenari .

text: And if any man say unto you , Why do ye this ? say ye that the Lord hath need of him ; and straightway he will send him hither .
text2: Ariorica incanteetavaquempi : " 多 Paitaquea pitsatacoreantariri voro ? " Ari pincantanaqueri : " Irio coiriri Avincatsarite . Coajica iroimpiajempiri aisati " . Ari irishinetempiri .

text: And they went their way , and found the colt tied by the door without in a place where two ways met ; and they loose him .
text2: Ari ijatanaque iroamere . Ineapaaqueri voro anta avotsiqui . Itsatacota ashitacoroqui pancotsi . Itsatacoreapaaqueri .

text: And certain of them that stood there said unto them , What do ye , loosing the colt ?
text2: Ainiro isaviqui atiri , isampitavaqueri : - - 多 Paita pantiri ? 多 Paita pitsatacoreantariri voro ?

text: And they said unto them even as Jesus had commanded : and they let them go .
text2: Yacanaqueri , icantiri oca icantavaqueriri Jesoshi . Ari ishinetavaqueri yaanaqueri voro .

text: And they brought the colt to Jesus , and cast their garments on him ; and he sat upon him .
text2: Ari yacatsatacotanaqueneri Jesoshi . Yoanquetaqueneri imititsaqui iitsaarepee , impoiji iquijacotacari .

text: And many spread their garments in the way : and others cut down branches off the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Ari yaniitacaanaqueri avotsiqui , ipincatsajeitavaqueri maaroni ishaninca , imaaroncajeitaqueneri quitsaarentsipee avotsiqui . Yora itsipapee ipesaqueneri inchatoshi , aisati yoaqueneri avotsiqui .

text: And they that went before , and they that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna ; Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord :
text2: Yora jivajeitaqueriri aisati impoijeitaqueriri , icajemajeitanaque : - - Jeritapaaque oavisacojeiteeneri , tsame aacameetsajeitavaqueri . Coraqueni , iriotaque itiancaqueeneri Avincatsarite .

text: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David , that cometh in the name of the Lord : Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Peerani Iravirini ipincatsariventirini ashanincani : meecaquea , impincatsariventaquee yoca aneavaquerica . Iriotaque ishanincani Iravirini . Tsame ampincatsajeiteri Tasorentsi inquitequiniri .

text: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem , and into the temple : and when he had looked round about upon all things , and now the eventide was come , he went out unto Bethany with the twelve .
text2: Ari yareejeitapaaca Jerosarequi , iqueapaaque ivancoqui Tasorentsi . Itsoteaquero yamenayetaquero , iro cantaincha ishaavijiiteanaque catsirincaiteri . Isoquijanaji , ijatanaji Vetaniaqui . Itsipajeitanajari iroamerepee .

text: And on the morrow , when they were come from Bethany , he was hungry :
text2: Ari oquitaitetamanaji aisati , yojocanajiro Vetania , irijate Jerosarequi . Nianqui aavetacari itashe .

text: And seeing a fig tree afar off having leaves , he came , if haply he might find any thing thereon : and when he came to it , he found nothing but leaves ; for the time of figs was not yet .
text2: Ineaquero paricoti inchato , pajitachari iyera . Otimaveta oshi . Ari ijatashitiro , icoavetapaacaro oitsoqui . Te aneeroji , irointi oshi . Tequeratsita omoncaratajea oitsoquitantajeari .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto it , No man eat fruit of thee hereafter for ever . And his disciples heard it .
text2: Icantanaqueri Jesoshi iroamere : - - Tecatsi iroajeitajeari atiri oitsoqui aisati .

text: And they come to Jerusalem : and Jesus went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ;
text2: Ari yareejeitaja aisati Jerosarequi . Iqueapaaji ivancoqui Tasorentsi . Yojocajeitapaaqueri maaroni pimantajeivetachari aisati maaroni amanantajeivetachari . Itatsinquitayetapaaqueri imesatepee yora pinavacaavetariri iirequite . Aisati itatsinquitayetapaaqueri isavicamentopee pimantajeivetariri sampaquiti .

text: And would not suffer that any man should carry any vessel through the temple .
text2: Itsaneapitsajeitacari irayetanaqueme vaararontsi anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi .

text: And he taught , saying unto them , Is it not written , My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer ? but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Ari yoametantaque , icantajeitiri : - - Peerani isanquenatironi irineane Tasorentsi , icantini : " Irootaque oca novanco . Aca inquenquetsatacaajeitantenari maaroni atiri " . Tempa piojeivetaro . Iro cantaincha avirojei pipeaquero ivanco coshinti .

text: And the scribes and chief priests heard it , and sought how they might destroy him : for they feared him , because all the people was astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Ari iquemajeitavaqueri maaroni yora apatotimentariri , irootaque yoajeitantanacariri cavaco . Aisati iquemacotaqueri jivatacaajeitiriri saserote , oametantirori sanquenarentsi , maaroni . Icantajeivetaca : - - 多 Jaoca ancantaniroteriri Jesoshi , avanteariri ? Iro cantaincha tecatsi incanteri , itsaroacaajeitacari . Tempa ipincatsajeitiri atiri Jesoshi .

text: And when even was come , he went out of the city .
text2: Iqueanaji catsirincaiteri , ari yojocanajiro Jesoshi nampitsi .

text: And in the morning , as they passed by , they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots .
text2: Oquitaitetamanaji aisati , ipianaja anta onaquenta iyera . Ineapaaquero , ocamanaque , irosati anta ovaritsaqui .

text: And Peter calling to remembrance saith unto him , Master , behold , the fig tree which thou cursedst is withered away .
text2: Iquenqueshiretaquero Petero icantanaqueri Jesoshi oshaiteji . Icantiri : - - Oametanari , pamenero iyeraca poamaimatanaqueri oshaiteji . Camanaque .

text: And Jesus answering saith unto them , Have faith in God .
text2: Yacanaqueri Jesoshi : - - Pishireteari Tasorentsi .

text: For verily I say unto you , That whosoever shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; and shall not doubt in his heart , but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass ; he shall have whatsoever he saith .
text2: Queariotaque oca noncamantajeitempiri . Ariorica pincanteri Tasorentsi : " Povaajero otishinta , poviincajero anta incajarequi " . Eirorica pitseencashiretitsi , aisati ariorica pioshiretasanotaque ovaanaquea , ari irimataquempiro .

text: Therefore I say unto you , What things soever ye desire , when ye pray , believe that ye receive them , and ye shall have them .
text2: Irootaque noncamantantempirori oca : ariorica pinquenquetsatacayeri Tasorentsi , paitarica pincanteriri , pinquenqueshirete : " Aitaque irimataquenaro nocantaqueriri " . Pishiretearirica , aitaque irimataquempiro .

text: And when ye stand praying , forgive , if ye have ought against any : that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses .
text2: Ariorica pinquenquetsatacayeri Tasorentsi , pijivate pincavintsayeri pishaninca : eiro piquishimentiritsi paitapeerica iranteri . Impoiji aisati avirori , eiro iquishimentimpirotsi Apa Tasorentsi pantayetiri avirori .

text: But if ye do not forgive , neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses .
text2: Eirorica picavintsairitsi pishaninca , eiro icavintsaimpitsi avirori Tasorentsi .

text: And they come again to Jerusalem : and as he was walking in the temple , there come to him the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders ,
text2: Ari yareejeitanaja aisati Jerosarequi , yaniitamanaji anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi . Yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , oametantirori sanquenarentsi , aisati savicacaantatsiri ipocashijeitaqueri .

text: And say unto him , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority to do these things ?
text2: Icantajeitapaaqueri : - - 多 Janica oametimpirori pipincatsaritantari pimayetantarori pantayetiri ? 多 Janicampa meeca peaquempiri pincatsari , pimayetantacarori pantayetiri ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I will also ask of you one question , and answer me , and I will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Icantavaqueri Jesoshi : - - Meeca aparo nosampijeitempi avirori . Ariorica pancaquena avirori , noncamantempiro .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ? answer me .
text2: Yora Joa ivaotisatantayeti . 多 Janicampa tianquiriri ivaotisatantayeti ? 多 Iriompa Tasorentsi tianquiriri ? Tericampa , 多 irintimpa atiri tianquiriri ? Panquenaqueti .

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then did ye not believe him ?
text2: Ari icantavacaanaca saserotepee : - - Ariorica ancanteri : " Iriotaque Tasorentsi tianquiriri " , icanteecari : " 多 Paita caari piquemisantantari Joa ? "

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; they feared the people : for all men counted John , that he was a prophet indeed .
text2: Aisati eiro acantiritsi : " Iriotaque atiri tianquiriri " . Iquisheecari . Pineaquero , yora saserote itsaroacaajeitacari atiripee ; maaroni atiri ineacameetsajeitaqueri Joa , icantajeiti : " Tempa irio Tasorentsi tianquiriri Joa icamantanti " .

text: And they answered and said unto Jesus , We cannot tell . And Jesus answering saith unto them , Neither do I tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Irootaque icantantariri saserotepee : - - Te nioteji janicarica tianquiriri . Icanti Jesoshi : - - Aisati narori , eiro nocantimpitsi janicarica tiancanari nopincatsaritantari nomatantarori oca .

text: And he began to speak unto them by parables . A certain man planted a vineyard , and set an hedge about it , and digged a place for the winefat , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country .
text2: Impoiji ishiacantiniri oca , icantiri : - - Ipanquitiro ovamashi shirampari . Itantotacotaquero otsapiqui , yovetsicashitaquero onanteari ovaja . Impoiji yovetsiquiro shitamencotsi anta jenoqui iramenacoventantearori maaroni . Impoiji aisati icantiri tsameetacantatsiri : " Pishentenaro maaroni : coajica nompinatempi cameetsa " . Impoiniji ijatanaque pashiniqui quipatsi .

text: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant , that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard .
text2: Osamanitapainti iraacanaque oitsoqui ova . Ari yora ashitarori itiancavetari inampire aparo , iraaranteme ova .

text: And they caught him , and beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Te impavaqueriji , irointi yaanirotavaqueri , tapi ; ipasatashitavacari , tac , tac . Yoipiavajiri , tecatsi iraanaque .

text: And again he sent unto them another servant ; and at him they cast stones , and wounded him in the head , and sent him away shamefully handled .
text2: Ari itiancavetaca aisati itsipa inampire . Iposainatavaqueri iitoqui , toc , toc , yoashinoncaavaqueri .

text: And again he sent another ; and him they killed , and many others ; beating some , and killing some .
text2: Itiancavetaca pashini aisati . Yoavaqueri , shemi . Aisati itiancavetacari oshequi itsipapee : aparopee ipasanatavaqueri , irio itsipapee yoavaqueri .

text: Having yet therefore one son , his wellbeloved , he sent him also last unto them , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Apanivaniquea itimanaque itomi iriori , inintasanotiri . Icantashiretanaque iriori : " Irioricampa irinti notomi irio impincatsatavaqueri " . Itiancavetacari iriori .

text: But those husbandmen said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and the inheritance shall be ours .
text2: Iro cantaincha icantavacaanaca tsameetacotirori : " Jeritapaaque itomi ashitarori , ariorica incamaque iriri , iriotaque yoca ashitasanotajearoneri . Tsame avavaqueri , impoijiquea ashijeitajearota ainti irovamashite " .

text: And they took him , and killed him , and cast him out of the vineyard .
text2: Ari yaavaqueri , yoanirotavaqueri , shemi . Yojocaqueri otsapitapaaca ovamashi .

text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do ? he will come and destroy the husbandmen , and will give the vineyard unto others .
text2: 多 Paita piquenqueshirejeitiri ? 多 Jaoca incanteriri ashitarori irovamashite ? Tempa impoque irinti , impoyereapaaqueri iratiritepee . Pashini iramenaje shentajenerine .

text: And have ye not read this scripture ; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner :
text2: Tempa pineanatiro sanquenarentsi . Ocanti : " Yora vetsiqueronemeri pancotsi itseencajiro mapi intincamitantearomeri ivanco , icanti : ' Te oncameetsateji ' .

text: This was the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Iro cantaincha Avincatsarite ipeajiro mapica otincami ivanco , ocameetsatasanoti . Tempa irootaque avantanacari cavaco " .

text: And they sought to lay hold on him , but feared the people : for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them : and they left him , and went their way .
text2: Iotacojeitavaquero icantaqueri Jesoshi , iriotaque ishiacaaventaqueri . Icoajeiveta iraajeitanaquerime , iro cantaincha itsaroacaajeitacari yora apatotimentajeitacariri . Ari yojocajeitanajiri , ijajeitanaji .

text: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians , to catch him in his words .
text2: Itianqueetiri variseopee aisati oijatiriri Eroreshi . Icoavetaca incomitacayearime irineane Jesoshi .

text: And when they were come , they say unto him , Master , we know that thou art true , and carest for no man : for thou regardest not the person of men , but teachest the way of God in truth : Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar , or not ?
text2: Yareetapaaca , icantapaaqueri : - - Oametantatsiri , niojeitaquempi avirotaque cameetsatatsiri . Te oncantimoneentanaquempiji paitarica icantayetiri atiri , te pintsaroacayeariji . Tampatica poametantiro icoacaajeiteeri Tasorentsi . 多 Ocameetsatimpa nomperi ivincatsarite oromasati quirequi ? 多 Tericampa oncameetsateji ? 多 Nomperimpa ? 多 Eirompa nopiritsi ?

text: Shall we give , or shall we not give ? But he , knowing their hypocrisy , said unto them , Why tempt ye me ? bring me a penny , that I may see it .
text2: Iotacotaqueri Jesoshi , iramataviterime yoca sampitaqueriri . Icantiri : - - 多 Paita picoantacari pincomitacayename ? Pamaquenari quirequi , ponijayenari .

text: And they brought it . And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ? And they said unto him , Caesar ' s .
text2: Ari aparo yamaqueneri . Isampijeitiri : - - 多 Janicampa shiacantachari ivoroqui ? 多 Janicampa ashitarori ivajiro ? Yacajeitanaqueri iriori , icantiri : - - Irio ashitaro Shisari , yora ivincatsarite oromasati .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar ' s , and to God the things that are God ' s . And they marvelled at him .
text2: Icantiri : - - Panteneri pincatsari icoacaimpiri , aisati panteneri Tasorentsi icoacaimpiri iriori . Yoajeitanaqueri cavaco yora sampijeitiriri .

text: Then come unto him the Sadducees , which say there is no resurrection ; and they asked him , saying ,
text2: Icantapiniti saroseo : " Eiro itinaajatsi camatsiri " . Ari ipocashitiri iriori Jesoshi , isampitapaaqueri :

text: Master , Moses wrote unto us , If a man ' s brother die , and leave his wife behind him , and leave no children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: - - Oametantatsiri , isanquenajeitanaroni peerani Moishishi , icantini : " Ariorica incame shirampari , irojocanaquero ijinani . Eirorica itimacaanaquerotsi itomi , cameetsa iraitajeri irirentini ijinani . Ariorica intimacayero itomitsori camaintsiri , irishiacantajeitajeri itomisanori iriori " .

text: Now there were seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and dying left no seed .
text2: Ari . Ainiro shirampari irirenti . Yaaveta ijina , impoiji icamaque , toren . Tequera intimacayeroji itomi .

text: And the second took her , and died , neither left he any seed : and the third likewise .
text2: Yaavetajaro irirentini apitetapaintsiri . Icamaque iriori , aisati te intimacayeroji itomi . Aisati iquempetaja iriori yora mavatapaintsiri .

text: And the seven had her , and left no seed : last of all the woman died also .
text2: Aisati iriori iquempejeitaca maaroni irirentini . Tecatsi intimacayero itomi . Impoiji ocamaque iroori tsinane , toren .

text: In the resurrection therefore , when they shall rise , whose wife shall she be of them ? for the seven had her to wife .
text2: Coajica ariorica intinaajeitanaje camajeitaintsiri , 多 janicampa aajeroneri ? Tempa aitaque ijinantajeiveitaroni maaroni .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Do ye not therefore err , because ye know not the scriptures , neither the power of God ?
text2: Icantiri Jesoshi : - - Te pioteroji sanquenarentsi , aisati te piotacoteriji Tasorentsi , tempa irootaque picomitantacarori oca .

text: For when they shall rise from the dead , they neither marry , nor are given in marriage ; but are as the angels which are in heaven .
text2: Icamajeitaque , toren . Coajica intinaajeitanaje aisati . Iro cantaincha eiro yaajitsi aisati ijina . Eiro itimajitsi aacaajerineri aisati . Aitaque irishiapaajeari inampire Tasorentsi savicatsiri jenoqui .

text: And as touching the dead , that they rise : have ye not read in the book of Moses , how in the bush God spake unto him , saying , I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ?
text2: Meeca noncamantempi : aitaque intinaajeitanaje camajeitatsiri . Tempa pineanataquero isanquenare Moishishi . Oquenquetsatacotiro quitotsequishi , otaavetaca iro cantaincha te ontsonqueaji . Anta iquemaquero peerani Moishishi icantiriri Tasorentsi : " Narotaque Tasorentsi , icantani ipincatsajeitaquena Avarama , Isaca , aisati Jacovo " .

text: He is not the God of the dead , but the God of the living : ye therefore do greatly err .
text2: Pineaquero , aneatsi ini iriorijei , irosati icantani iquemisantiri Tasorentsi . Te inquemisantajeji camaintsiri , irintiquea aneatsiri . Pineaquero , te ampoyereempaji . Oshequi picomitasanotaca avirori .

text: And one of the scribes came , and having heard them reasoning together , and perceiving that he had answered them well , asked him , Which is the first commandment of all ?
text2: Iquempejitapaaque aparoni oametantirori sanquenarentsi . Iquemapaaqueri icantavacaanaca . Iotacotapaaqueri Jesoshi , cameetsa yoametavaqueri saroseo . Ari isampitapaaqueri : - - 多 Paita icoacaasanoteeri Tasorentsi ?

text: And Jesus answered him , The first of all the commandments is , Hear , O Israel ; The Lord our God is one Lord :
text2: Yacanaqueri Jesoshi : - - Tempa isanquenataqueeroni Moishishi peerani icoacaasanoteeri Tasorentsi . Jero oca isanquenatiniri : " Noshaninca , pinquemisantajeitena . Yora Tasorentsi , iriotaque Avincatsarite , apaniro ipincatsariti irinti .

text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind , and with all thy strength : this is the first commandment .
text2: Oshequi catsini pinintasanoteri , pincanteani . Aisati pinquenqueshiretapiniteri " .

text: And the second is like , namely this , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself . There is none other commandment greater than these .
text2: Aisati isanquenatini : " Oquempetaca avisati nintajancha , aisati pinquempejeiteri maaroni picarajeitiri , pinintajeiteri " . Irootaque inintacaasanojeitaqueeri maaroni .

text: And the scribe said unto him , Well , Master , thou hast said the truth : for there is one God ; and there is none other but he :
text2: Icantanaqueri oametantirori sanquenarentsi : - - Je , aitaque . Queariotasanotaque oca picantaqueri . Apaniro ini Tasorentsi , tecatsi pashini .

text: And to love him with all the heart , and with all the understanding , and with all the soul , and with all the strength , and to love his neighbour as himself , is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices .
text2: Cameetsa oshequi catsini anintasanoteri , anquenqueshiretapiniteri . Aisati oquempeta arosati nintajancha , aisati anquempeteri maaroni acarajeitiri , anintajeiteri iriori . Irootaque icoacaasanotaqueeri Tasorentsi . Te iro incoasanote atayeneri poshiniri .

text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly , he said unto him , Thou art not far from the kingdom of God . And no man after that durst ask him any question .
text2: Iquemaqueri Jesoshi , cameetsa icantaqueri , icantiri : - - Irotaintsi pimpincatsateri Tasorentsi , impincatsariventantempiri iriori . Impoiji itsaroacaajeitacari atiripee irisampitajerime aisati .

text: And Jesus answered and said , while he taught in the temple , How say the scribes that Christ is the Son of David ?
text2: Yoametanti Jesoshi anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi : - - Icanti oametantirori sanquenarentsi : " Yora Quirishito , irishanincatasanotajeari Iravirini " . 多 Paita icantantarori ?

text: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost , The Lord said to my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: Tempa iro Ishire Tasorentsi sanquenatacairiniri Iravirini . Isanquenataqueroni oca : " Yora Tasorentsi icantiri novincatsarite : ' Pisavique aca nacosanoriqui , pincaratena ampincatsarijeite . Aitaque noasanquetaajeiteri maaroni quisajeivetaquempiri ' " .

text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord ; and whence is he then his son ? And the common people heard him gladly .
text2: Tempa iquenquetsatacotitarini Iravirini Quirishito , icantiri : " Novincatsarite " . 多 Jaoca incanteari Iravirini impincatsatajeri ishaninca impoitajantsiri itimi ? Ari iquemajeitavaqueri , iquimoshirejeitanaque oshequi apatotimentacariri .

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: Ari yoametantaji aisati , icanti : - - Paamayeariyea oametantirori sanquenarentsi . Icoashita iroaneencashitea , irishemetacayero iitsaare , inquenaquenatsantsatacaayetero . Icoaque irineacameetsatashiteari ishaninca anta nampitsiqui .

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: Aisati ariorica ijatapiniti anta pancotsiqui yapatojeitanta , icoyeapinitiro savicamentotsi cameetsatasanotatsiri . Aisati ariorica irampatojeitea ishaninca iroajeitearica , icoaque iriori irisatecapeempa nianqui incarajeitanteariri pincatsaripee .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Yaapitsanirotaquero maaroni timimovetarori camajimentaaro . Osamani ineanatashimempeavetacari Tasorentsi , vero , vero . Oshequi yamatavitantaveta , iro cantaincha coajicani iroasanquetasanotaqueri catsini Tasorentsi .

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: Ari isavicaque Jesoshi , imontetacaro yoapiniyetantariri quirequi . Yamenajeitaqueri oshequi pocajeitatsiri , itetapinitiri iirequite yoantaririqui . Ipoqui oshequi ashitaarantincari , itetapaaque oshequi catsini iirequite .

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: Opocapaaque iroori aparoni camajimentaaro ashinoncaincaro . Otetapaaque iroori apimentaquite quirequijaniqui , te impinaveteaji irinti .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
text2: Icajemiri iroamere , icantiri : - - Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri : capichaji otevetaca oca ashinoncaincaro , iro cantaincha ineacameetsatasanotaquero Tasorentsi . Tempa opaqueri maaroni timimovetacarori : tecatsi meeca amanantantajeari oyeari . Irintiquea yora ashitaarantincari , oshequi itejeivetaca , iro cantaincha te irineacameetsatasanoteriji Tasorentsi : tempa oshequitatsi iirequite iquempoyeanontari .

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Impoiji isoquijanaji Jesoshi . Icantiri aparoni iroamere : - - Oametanari . Pamenero mapica yovetsicantarori ivanco Tasorentsi : antearo oni , aisati ocameetsati pancotsi .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Icantiri Jesoshi : - - Pineaquero jaoca ocantari oca mapipanco . Antearo onaveta , iro cantaincha coajica intireetajero , ojocayetanaquea nijanteaji mapi . Ompoyereajea pancotsi .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Impoiji isavicanaque Jesoshi toncaariqui , opajita Orivomashi . Imontetapaaro ivanco Tasorentsi . Imananaca Petero , Santiaco , Joa , jeri aisati Antirishi : ijatashijeitaqueri Jesoshi .

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: Isampitapaaqueri : - - Pincamantajeitena . 多 Jaoca oncarate ontireantajeari ivanconta Tasorentsi ? Ariorica coajica omoncaratapeempa ontireanteari , 多 jaoca noncanteari niotantajeari ?

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Icantiri Jesoshi : - - Yamataviyeetimpicari .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Intime oshequi pocayetatsineri , cantatsineri : " Narotaque nainti Quirishito " . Iramatavitapeeri oshequi atiri .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: Ariorica pinquemacoteri imanatavacaaca atiri , aisati pinquemeri pashini cantatsine : " Irimanatavacaajeitea atiri " . Iro cantaincha eiro pitsaroanaquetsi . Aitaque oncanteari coajicani , irimanatavacaapinitea , iro cantaincha tequerata omoncarateaji nompincatsaritantapaajeari .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: Yora atiri inquisapinitanaqueri itsipapee . Oshequi irimanatavacaajeitea itsipasatipee atiri . Onicapiniyetanaquea quipatsi , aisati intasheapinijeitanaque atiripee . Aiquero ojatatiye , inquematsicajeitearo paitapeerica , irashinoncaasanojeitanaquea .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: Aisati icantaqueri Jesoshi : - - Paamaventea . Icantacoventimpicari , yaimpicari yora oametavacainchari . Ariorica pijate anta yapatojeitantari aitaque impasanayeetavaquempiri , tac , tac . Iraanaquempi anta itiminta savicacaantatsiri , aisati anta itiminta pincatsari . Ariorica irayempi , irosati pinquemisantacayeri , iravisacotantajeari .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Irijivajeite maaroni atiri inquemacojeitena noavisacotanti , impoiji nompocaje , nompincatsaritasanotapaaque .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ariorica irayeetanaquempi anta , ariorica incantacoventeetempi , eiro picantashiretitsi : " 多 Jaoca noncanteriri ? " Aitaque oametaquempi Ishire Tasorentsi paitarica pincanteriri . Irootaque neanatacaaquempine , eiro pineanatashitatsi avirori .
