text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: Coajica aparo shirampari iraacanteri irirenti , iroacantanteariri . Pashini iraacanteri itomi . Aisati pashini atiri inquisanaqueri ashitariri , iroacanteri .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Piquemisantaquena , irootaque inquisanteetempiri maaroni . Queario , ompomerentsitimojeitempi , iro cantaincha ariorica pincanteani pishiretasanotena , aitaque noavisacotajempi .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: Aisati icantiri Jesoshi : - - Ariorica pineanatero isanquenareni Iranirini , piotavaquero icantiniri : irashinoncaajeitanaquea atiri . Icanti intime ivancoqui Tasorentsi caari cameetsatatsine . Te oncameetsateji intime anta . Ariorica pintime Joreaqui , aisati pineeririca yoranqui , pishintsite pishiajeitanaque anta toncaariqui .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Ariorica pisavique pancotsiqui saiteriqui , eiro piqueapanajantitsi paantapanajantearori paitapeerica , irointi pishianaque .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Aisati pisaviquerica oantsiqui , eiro pipiapanajantatsi paantapanajantearori piitsaare .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Ariorica omoncaratapaaquea maaroni oca , joo , oshequi ashinoncayetanaquea tsomonteyetatsine , aisati ashinoncaaquea antsotayerine ojananequite : ompomerentsitimojeitearo oshianaque .

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Pincanteri Tasorentsi , oncanteata ariorica pishianaque , eirotarica oparii incani . Pishiasanojeitanaque , yaimpicari quisajeitempineri .

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: Jero aisati icantiri Jesoshi : - - Aitaque coajica irashinoncaasanojeitanaquea catsini oshequi atiri . Peerani te irineapiniveitearoni quempetearoneri oca , jeri yora maaroni intacaroniri , te irineeroni . Coajica aisati maaroni impoitajantsineri , eiro ineirotsi aisati quempetearoneri oca .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Irishintsite iroimajerentajeiteri Tasorentsi : eirorica , impoyereavacaajeiteame . Iro iroimajeretanteariri , incavintsaajeiteri quemisantajeiterineri , tempa irinintajeiteri iriori .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: Pamene , ariorica incamanteetempi : " Pineavaqueri : jerica Quirishito " , eiro piquemisantiritsi . Aisati ariorica incanteete : " Pineaqueri : jeri yonta " , eiro piquemisantiritsi catsini , itseeyani .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Impocapaaque amatavitantatsine , incantapaaque : " Narotaque nainti Quirishito , narotaque camantantatsiri " . Intasorentsimempeavetapaaquea , incoavetaquea pinquemisantavaqueri , irimayetempiro caari pineapiniti . Incoavetea iramataviterime quemisantajeitiriri Tasorentsi , iro cantaincha tecatsi incanteri .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: Paamaventea . Nojivatitaquempiro nocamantasanojeititaquempiro maaroni .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: Aisati icantiri : - - Ariorica irovecaraanaquero iquisavacaajeita , impoijiquea intsitenitanaque catsirincaiteri , eiro iquempetajatsi meeca . Aisati eiro iquitasantetanajitsi cashiri .

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Aisati impariaarantanaque impoquiropee , imponeaquea inquitequi , imporocayetanaque itsipapee .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: Noponeaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque : coajica irineajeitavajena atiri nonquenapaaje mencoriqui . Nontasorentsitasanotapaaque , nompincatsaritapaaque .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: Aisati nontiancajeiteri nonampirepee irampatojeiteri maaroni quemisantajeitanari . Imponeanaquea maaroni quipatsipeequi .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: Yovaajiniri aisati , icantiri : - - Jero oca piotantearori oshiacaaventiri iyera . Iroaquerarica oshiocajempequiyetaje , ariorica ontimanaje oshi , piotaque irotajantsi osarintsitapaaje .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Aisati , ariorica pineajeitavaquero maaroni oca nocamantayetaquempiri , piote quempejitapaajana , irotaintsi nompocashitajantempi .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Queariotaque oca nocamantimpiri . Tequeratsita pincamajeite avirori , omoncaratapaaquea maaroni oca nocamantimpiri .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Ompeajea inquite aisati quipatsi , irompa irointi noneane , eiro opeajatsi .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: Jeroca aisati icantiri : - - Jaocarica oncarate quitaiteri , jaocarica incarate catsirincaiteri , tecatsi iotatsine . Aisati te irioteji yora inampire Tasorentsi jenoquiniri . Pamene , narotaque itomi Tasorentsi , iro cantaincha te nioteji . Irintiquea iotatsi apaniro Apa .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: Paamaventea , aisati paamaajeitena . Te pioteji jaoca oncarate nompocantajeari .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Nonquempeteari shirampari , jatatsiri paricoti . Ariorica yojocanaquero ivanco , icantajeitanaqueri maaroni inampirepee paitarica irantajeiteneriri . Aisati iriori yora shentiniriri ivanco icantanaqueri iriori : " Paamaajenayea " .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: Irootaque nocantajeitantimpiri : paamaajeitajenayea avirori . Te pioteji jaoca oncarate nompocantajeari : ariorica inqueanaje catsirincaiteri , ariorica nianquiite tsiteniri , ariorica irineaje teapa , ariorica onquitamaroiteamanaje quitaiteri nompocaje .

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: Paamaventea , paamaasanojeitena . Ariorica nompocaje , nomapocapaimpicari . Noneapaimpicari , maatsimpi catsini .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Oca nocantimpiri , irootaque nocantajeitaqueriri maaroni atiri . Paamaventasanojeitea , paamaasanojeitena , maaroni .

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Ari apitenivani quitaiteri omoncaratajea quitaiteri yavisantaniri . Iro iquenqueshiretantarori quitaiteri peerani yavisantaniri inampire Tasorentsi , oajeitiriri itomipee ejipitosati . Quitaiteri yavisantaniri te iroapinitearoji tapiachari tanta , irointi caari tapiacha . Ari icoaque jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee aisati oametantirori sanquenarentsi jaoca incanteriri iramataviteri Jesoshi , iraanteariri . Aitaque icoaveta iroyerime Jesoshi .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Icanti : - - Eiro aantaritsi quitaiteri yavisantaniri : iquisacoventajeitaricari atiripee .

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Ari isavicaque Jesoshi Vetaniaqui , anta ivancoqui Shimo patsaaveitachaniri . Oshequi oajeitachari anta . Opocapaaque tsinane , amacotapaaquero casancajari . Iojataca oja nararo , oshequi ovinaro . Ocameetsatasanoti onantari , iro yovetsiqueetiri mapi pajitachari aravashitoro . Ocarajacotapaaqueneri , osaitantapaacari iitoqui .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: Itimanaque aparopee quisaneentajeitaquerori . Icantavacaanaca iriori : - - 多 Paitampa meeca aparajatantacarori oca casancajari ?

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: Arime ompimanterome , aantaquearome oshequi quirequi , impoijiquea ompayeterime ashinoncayetachari . Impoiji iquisatsajeivetacaro ,

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: iro cantaincha icantiri Jesoshi : - - Eiro piquishimentirotsi . 多 Paita pashereantarori ? Ocameetsatasanoti osaitaquena .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Aitaque incantaitatiyempani ashinoncaincari : pincanteani pincarajeiteri , aisati pineapiniteri . Ariorica pincoaque pintacoteari , aitaque pimataquero , pimpaqueri . Irompa nainti , eiro nocantaitatiani nontsipajeitempi aca .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: Te omayeteroji paitapeerica , irointi omataque osaitaquena . Tempa asaitapinitiri camatsiri , iro cantaincha te iriotacoteaji . Irointi oca tsinane ojivataquena osaitaquena , aneatsiquerana noni . Iotaquena noncamaque .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri : jaocarica incamantantajeitero atiri noneane , incamantacotero antaqueri oca tsinaneca , inquenqueshireajeitantearori .

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Ainiro iriori Jorashi Ishicariote icarajeitiri iroamere Jesoshi . Ijatanaque apaniro anta itiminta jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , incantacoventanteariri Jesoshi .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Iquemajeitavaqueri ora icantapaaqueriri , iquimoshirejeitanaque , icantiri : - - Cameetsataque : oshequi nompinajeitempi quirequi . Impoiji iquenqueshireti Jorashi : - - 多 Jaoca noncanteriri naacantanteariri ? 多 Jaoca oncarate ?

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Moncaratapaaca quitaiteri yoajeitantarori tanta , caari tapiacha . Aisati yoari ovishajaniqui : yametapinijeitaro yoajeitari quitaiteriqui iquenqueshiretapinitiro yavisantaniri oantatsiri peerani . Isampitiri Jesoshi iroamere : - - 多 Jaoca picoaqueri novetsicajeitero avajeiteari ?

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Ari itiancaque iroamere apite , icantiri : - - Pijate nampitsiquinta . Aitaque pintonquiotavaqueari aparoni shirampari , iraacote chomoqui nija . Poijatanaqueri iriori .

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Jaocarica anta inqueapaajeri , aitaque iniri ashitarori ivanco ; iriotaque pineanatapeeri . Pincantapaaqueri : " Icanti oametantatsiri : ' 多 Jaocame nosavicantapeempari , noacantapeempariri noamere ? ' "

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Irosati ironijantavaquempirori anta jenoqui oshitamencotanta : antearo oni . Timatsi ovetsicajeitaca maaroni avantayetearori : apanivaniji povetsicajeitapaaquero ayeari .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Ari ijatanaque iroamere nampitsiqui , ineapaaquero oca icantaqueriri , impoiji yovetsicapaaquero yoari .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Ari ishaavijiiteanaque catsirincaiteri . Yareetapaaca iriori Jesoshi , itsipajeitapaacari iroamerepee .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Isavicajeitapaaque , yoajeitapaaca , icantiri Jesoshi : - - Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri . Meeca acarajeitica , timatsi aacantenaneri , oacojeitaqueeri .

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Yoashirejeitanaca , icantiri aparo : - - 多 Narompa aacantempineri ? Aisati itsipa : - - 多 Narompa ? Aisati itsipapee isampijeitanaqueri .

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: Icanti Jesoshi : - - Tempa iriotaque aacantenaneri chaantacotaquenari meeca nomatitatequi .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Noponeaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Irotanaintsi noncame : aitaque ontsataaquea isanquenatacotitaquenari . Iro cantaincha irashinoncaitaquea yora aacantenaneri . Eirome itimime iriori , eirome yaacantaname , aisati iriori eirome iquematsicatarome , coajica .

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Ainiro yoajeitaca , yaaquero Jesoshi tanta . Ipasonquitiri iriri , icarajaquero , ipajeitaqueri iroamere . Icantiri : - - Paajeitero , tempa narotaque camimentajeitempineri .

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Impoiji yaaquero pajoqui aisati . Ipasonquitaqueri iriri , ipacojeitaqueri , irajeitavaquero .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Icantajeitaqueri : - - Irootaque niraja amparajatimenterineri oshequi atiri . Ariorica noncamimentempi , piojeitaquero queario icantaquempiri Tasorentsi , iroavisacojeitempi .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Queariotaque oca nocamantajeitimpiri . Eiro meeca napiitajirotsi aca quipatsiqui nirajero ovaja . Ariorica nosavicapaaje anta ipincatsaritinta Tasorentsi , ari nirapaajero pashinijari .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Ari ipampoyeaventajeitanaqueri Tasorentsi , impoiji ijajeitanaji anta toncaariqui , opajitanta Orivomashi .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Icantajeitaqueri Jesoshi : - - Coajica pojocajeitanaquena . Aitaque isanquenatacotiteetaquempini : " Noyeri yora shentiriri ovisha , impoiji inquenashiveetanaquea irovishate " .

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Iro cantaincha , coajica nontinaanaje , nojivajeitanaquempi anta Carireaqui .

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Icantiri Petero : - - Ariorica irojocajeitempi maaroni irinti yoca , irompa nainti , eiro nojoquimpitsi .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Icantiri : - - Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri : meeca tsiteniriqui , tequeratsitarica irampiitajerota irineaje teapa , oshequi pintsaroanaque . Oncarate mava pincante : " Te nioteriji Jesoshi " .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Iro cantaincha icantasanoti Petero : - - Eiro nojoquimpitsi . Ariorica ancarajeitavacayea ancamajeite , eiro nocantitsi : " Te nioteriji " . Aisati omoncarataca icantajeitaqueri maaroni itsipapee .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Ari yareejeitapaaca anta Jetsemaniqui . Icantajeitiri iroamere : - - Pisavicajeitavaqueta aca , nonquenquetsatacaavaquerita Apa .

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Irintiquea yaanaqueri Petero , Santiaco , jeri Joa . Iquenqueshireanaca , aisati yoashiretanaca .

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: Icantiri : - - Oshequi catsini noashiretasanotanaca . Pisavicavaqueta aca , pisaaquiteyea .

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Ari yovaanaca capichaji ara . Itiyeroanaca quipatsiqui , iquenquetsatacairi iriri . Icantiri : - - Apa , aviro avinti mayetirori maaroni , paitapeerica . Nocoavetaca poavisacotename oca nonquematsicateari , iro cantaincha eiro pantirotsi nocoavetari narori , pantenaro picoacaaquenari avinti .

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Impoiji ipianaja anta isavicaquenta iroamere . Ineapaatiiri , maajeitaque . Icantapaaqueri Petero : - - Shimo , 多 maaquempimpa ? Tempa pamavetimatero pisaaquitimate capichaji .

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Pisaaquite . Pincanteri Tasorentsi oncanteataquea ariorica incoaque camaari irantacayetempiro caari cameetsatatsi , eiroquea pantantarotsi . Queario picoasanovetaca pantenerime Tasorentsi icoacaaquempiri , iro cantaincha te pimateroji .

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Ipianaja aisati , iquenquetsatacaajiri aisati iriri . Irosati icantajiri icantaqueriri incaranqui .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Ipiapaaja aisati , ineajeitapaajiri , maajeitaji aisati . Oshequi catsini aajeitaqueri ivochoquine . Oshequi ipashiventajeitaca , te irioteji paitarica incanteriri .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Ari ipianaja aisati mavatapaintsiri . Impoiji icantapaaqueri : - - Meecaquea pimaajeite , pimaoreajeite . Noponeaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Moncaratapaaca , aitaque meeca icantacoventaquena : irayena meeca caari quemisantatsi .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: Meeca pintinaanaje , tsame ajataje . Ja , jeri yocatapaaque aacantenaneri .

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Irosatiquera ineaveeti Jesoshi , ipocapaaque yora Jorashi , iriotaque tsipaveitariniri yora iroamere Jesoshi . Itsipajeitapaacari meeca oshequi atiri . Yamajeitapaaque isaviritepee , aisati inchaquiipee . Iriojeitaque itiancane jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , jeri itiancane oametantirori sanquenarentsi , jeri savicacantatsiri .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Icantitajeitacari yora Jorashi : - - Meeca noncamantasanotempi piotantapeempariri Jesoshi : pineaquena nonintavorotapaaqueri , pajiricapeeri . Paanaqueriyea , pishentasanoteriyea .

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Ari ipocapaaque , iquempejitapaacari . Icantapaaqueri : - - Oametanari . Inintavoronirotapaaqueri .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: Yajiricajeitapaaqueri , tapi , yaajeitanaqueri .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Aparo iroamere yaaquero isavirite . Ipeshitaqueri iyempita inampire ivincatsarite saserote , peti .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Icantajeitavaqueri Jesoshi : - - 多 Narompa coshinti ? 多 Paita pamashitantanari pisaviritepee aisati inchaquiipee ? Paashitanaquena , eiro noshiapitsatimpitsi .

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Aitaque maaroni quitaiteri notsipajeivetaquempi anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi , noametantini . Ja , payenaniqueti . Meecaquea omoncarataca ocantiri sanquenarentsi .

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Iriori iroamere , yojocajeitanaqueri , ishiajeitanaca maaroni .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Aparoquea evancari oijavetanacariri Jesoshi . Te inquitsaatanaqueaji , irointi yampinaicanaca ivashicaro . Yajiriqueevetavacari ,

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: itsaneanaca iriori , yojocanaitiiro ivashicaro , ishiatsempequitanaca .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Impoiji yaajeitanaqueri Jesoshi ivincatsaritequi saserote . Yapatojeitimentapaacari maaroni jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , savicacaajeitantatsiri , aisati oametantirori sanquenarentsi .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: Iriori Petero yoijatacoventavetanacari Jesoshi , iro cantaincha nijanteaji , irosati yareetantapaaca anta ivancoqui saserote . Isaviquimotapaaqueri yora nampirentsipee , itatapaaquero paamari .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Ainiro aisati anta pancotsiqui ivincatsarite saserote aisati maaroni oametavacaajeitachari . Isampijeitiri atiri : - - 多 Pineacotaquerimpa yantiro Jesoshi caari cameetsatatsi noacantanteariri ? Iro cantaincha , tecatsi irineacoteri .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Ipocapaaque oshequi tseeyacotacariri , te omoncarateaji icantayetaqueri .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Aparopee catianaincha , itseeyacotashitacari , icanti :

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: - - Noquemajeitaqueri Jesoshi , icanti : " Coajica noshoveajero ivanco Tasorentsi , oca yovetsicane atiri . Ari oncarate mava quitaiteri novetsicajeneri nainti pashini ivanco , caari yovetsiqui iriori atiri " .

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Iro cantaincha te omocaratavacayeaji icantayevetacari .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Icatianaca nianqui yora ivincatsarite saserote . Isampitaqueri Jesoshi : - - 多 Paita caari paquimatanta ? 多 Paita ojita oca icantacoyetaquempiri yoca ?

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Iriori Jesoshi imajeretaque , te iranqueji . Yapiitaqueri yora ivincatsarite saserote : - - 多 Avirompa Quirishitotatsiri , itomi Tasorentsi noneacameetsajeitiri ?

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Narotaque . Aitaque noponeaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Coajica pineajena nosavique anta iracosanoriqui Apa , noncarateri nompincatsarijeite . Aisati pineavajena nonquenantapaajearo onta mencorinta , nompiaje aisati quipatsiqui .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Yora ivincatsarite saserote yaitanacaro iitsaare , itsereanaquero , tsererere ; iquisanaca . Icantanaque : - - 多 Paitampa meeca acoantari pashini camantacoterineri ?

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Piquemajeitavaqueri meeca : ijitasorentsinirotacateemi . 多 Paita picoajeitiri ? 多 Jaoca ancanteriri ? Icantajeitanaque : - - Ainiro irantane , cameetsa incame .

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Ainiro aparopee quitiojayetaqueriri . Impoiji ipashicavorotaqueri , aisati ipasanatiri . Icantiri : - - Pincamantenate janica pasavorotaquempiri . Aisati iriori nampirentsipee , ipasanajeitaqueri .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: Isaviqui iriori Petero anta pancotsiqui ishaaviji . Opocapaaque aparoni inampire saserote .

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Oneapaaqueri Petero , itaataque paamari . Amenashetapaaqueri , sorerere , ocantiri : - - Aviro tsipatariri yora Jesoshi nasaretesati .

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Itsaroanaque iriori , icantanaque : - - Jm , te nioteji paitarica picantiri . Te nonquemempiji aisati . Isoquijanaji saiteriqui , ijatanaque anta otsapiqui . Ineanaque teapa .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Oneajiri aisati nampirentsi . Ocantajeitiri yora ocarajeitaqueri : - - Iriotaque yoca tsipatariri Jesoshi .

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Aisati icantaji Petero . Ari osamanitapainti capichaji . Yapiitajiri yocapee , icantiri : - - Queariosanotaque . Aitaque pitsipatarini iriori , avirotaque carireasati .

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Icantasanotiri : - - Te nioteriji yora shirampari picantaqueri . Ioti Tasorentsi queario nocantaque : notseeyanirica , nocoaque iroasanquetayenata Tasorentsi .

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Yapiitajiro ineanaji teapa . Iquenqueshiretanajiro Petero icantaqueriri Jesoshi : " Tequeratarica irampiitanajerota irineaje teapa , oncarate mava pincante : ' Te noneeriji Jesoshi ' " . Ari yoashiretanaca Petero , irosati iraantanaca , jii , jii .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Ari oquitaitetamani , yapatojeitamanaja yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , savicacaantajeitatsiri , oametantirori sanquenarentsi , maaroni . Aisati yapatojeitaca maaroni pashini oametavacainchari . Icantavacaimentajeitacari Jesoshi . Ari yoisoyeetanaqueri Jesoshi , yaanaqueri anta , ipapaaqueri Pirato .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: Isampitavaqueri : - - 多 Avirompa ivincatsarite jorio ? Iriori Jesoshi yacanaqueri : - - Je , naro .

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Icantajeiti jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee : - - Oshequi yantaniroyetaqueri yoca , te incameetsateji .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: Yapiitajiri Pirato , isampitajiri : - - 多 Paitampa caari pacanta ? Piquemavaqueri oshequi icantacotashijeitaquempiri .

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Te iranqueji Jesoshi . Irosatiquea iriori Pirato yoantanacariri cavaco .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: Ari ainiro yametacari : maaroni osarintsi , ariorica omoncaratapaaja yavisantaniri , yoimisoquijapinitiri aparoni yoiminqueetiri . Yoimisoquijajiri janicarica icoajiri atiripee .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Ainiro meeca yashitacotaca anta atiripee coajeivetachari irojoquerime pincatsari : ipajita aparoni Varavashi . Iro irojocantearimeri pincatsari , yoantaque .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Ari ijatashijeitaqueri yora apatojeitainchari , icantajeitapaaqueri : - - Meecaquea nocoi pantajeitenaro oca pametari : poimisoquijajenari aparoni poiminquiri .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Yacavaqueri Pirato : - - 多 Iriompa picoaqueri noimisoquijajempiri yora pivincatsarite ?

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Iotaque Pirato oshequi ipincatsajeitiri atiri Jesoshi , irootaque iquisajeitantacariri saserotepee , yaacantantacariri .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Ari yora saserote iquenaquenayetanaque , icantajeitaqueri atiripee : - - Picantacoventiricari Jesoshi . Pincantajeiteri : " Irinti poimpacaajeri Varavashi " .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: Yapiitajiri aisati Pirato , icantiri : - - 多 Jaocampa meeca noncanteriri yoca pipincatsajeivetacari ?

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Icajemajeitanaji aisati : - - Pimpajacotacanteri coroshiqui .

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Isampitiri : - - 多 Paitampa yantaqueri nompajacotacantanteariri ? Aiquero yovaapinijeitanaquero icajemajeitanaque : - - Pimpajacotacanteri , pimpajacotacanteri .

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: Icoanaque Pirato inquimoshiretacaajeitajeri yora atiripee , irosati yoipacantajariri Varavashi . Ja irintini Jesoshi ipasanatacantaqueri , ari yaacantaqueri impajacotacantanteariri .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Iriori soraro yaanaqueri tsompoina ivancoqui Pirato . Ipajitironta pancotsi peretorio . Yora soraro icajemajeitaqueri maaroni itsipapee .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Itseencajeitanaqueri , ishirontimentajeitacari , icantiri : - - 多 Avirotaquempa ivincatsarite jorio ? Jentsite , narori , nompincatsajeitempi . Tsame pinquitsaatearo quitioncanirori , aisati pamatseetearo amatseerentsi pinquempetanteariri pincatsari , impoiji nompincatsajeitantempiri . Iji , iji , iji . Ari iquitsaataqueri , aisati yantaqueneri totseequi , yamatseetaqueri .

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Ipasanatiri iitoqui , iro ipasatantacariri savoroqui . Iquitiojaqueri . Itiyeroashinirotacari , ineapincatsatamempeacari .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Ari oshequi yantavintsanataqueri , impoiji isapocajiri iitsaare quitioncanirori , iquitsaatajiri iitsaaresanori iriori . Impoiji yaanaqueri anta impajacotanteariri .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Nianqui avotsi ineaqueri soraro shirampari pajitachari Shimo , iriotaque shirenesati . Irio iriri Arijantero , jeri Irojo . Iponeanaja Shimo oantsiqui , iro iravisanaqueme , iro cantaincha yaavaqueri soraro , iperanatavacari : - - Panatanaqueneri Jesoshi coroshi .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Ari yaajeitanaqueri Jesoshi anta opajitanta Coricota . Iro ipajitantarori otishi oshiaquero iitonaroqui atiri .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Ipavetari ovaja oconoajataca aavintarontsi pajitachari mira . Iro cantaincha te irireeroji .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Impoiji ipajacojeitaqueri , aisati ineantacaro mapijaniqui , iriojeitanteari janicarica aitajerineri iitsaareni . Ipavacaayetacaro .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Ari ijenoquitapaaque catsirincaiteri , irosati ipajacotantacariri .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Isanquenataquero sanquenarentsi , ocanti : " Iriotaque ivincatsarite jorio " . Ipatacaaquero coroshiqui jenioquiji .

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Ora pashini coroshi ipajacotaqueri apite coshinti . Aparo yoatiacotaqueri iracosanoriqui Jesoshi , irio itsipa yoatiacotaqueri irampatequi .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Irootaque omoncaratantajari sanquenarentsi cantatsiniri : " Irishiacanteri caari cameetsatatsine " .

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Ainiro anta avisayetatsiri icantimatanaqueri , aisati yavimacanaca , icantajeitiri : - - Joo , aviro shoveajeronemeri ivanco Tasorentsi . Oncarateme mava quitaiteri povetsicajerome aisati .

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: 多 Arimpa pitasoncantashiyeta ? Jentsite , pintasoncacoventajea avisati : poavisacotajea avisati , paniireanaje coroshiqui .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Irosati icantaqueriri iriori yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , aisati oametantirori sanquenarentsi . Ishirontimentajeitacari , icantavacaajeitanaca : - - Irintiquea itsipa yoavisacoti . Jaaquea iriori te iroavisacotajeaji .

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: Jeri Quirishitovetachari , pincatsariventerinemeri ijorioririnte . Jentsite , amenavaquerita ariorica iraniireanaje ara coroshiqui . Noneaqueririca , ari nonquemisantanaqueri . Aisati iriori tsipatacariri Jesoshi ipajacojeitaca , itseencaqueri .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Ari icaravetapaaca catsirincaiteri tampatica , otsitenitanaque maaroni quipatsiqui . Ari ishavijitanaji , iporeanaji aisati .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Irosati icajemantanaca antearojenca Jesoshi , icanti : - - Eroi , Eroi , irama savatani . Irootaque acantiri aneanequi : " Notasorentsite . Notasorentsite . 多 Paita pojocantaquenari ? "

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Iquemavetavacari aparopee shirampari , icanti : - - Pinquemeri , icajemiri Iriashi .

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Ari ishianaca aparo atiri , yoviincapaaqueneri quepishijariqui aajatirori . Yoisotacotaqueneri savoroquiiqui . Ipavetari irantsimicavaquerome . Icanti : - - Ari icantavacata : amenavaquerita ariorica impocashitapaaqueri Iriashi iroaniitapaajeri .

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Antearojenca icajemanaque Jesoshi , icamanaque , toren .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Ainiro anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi antearo tocoya , tontari , opaincaca omoroqui . Intanaca jenoqui otsereamaotanaque , tsererere , irosati ishaaviji . Apitemaotanaji .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Ainiro imontetacari iyapitanote soraro . Ineavaqueri jaoca icantanacari Jesoshi , icamantanacari . Irootaque icantantacari : - - Quearioteemi : iriotaque yoca shirampari itomi Tasorentsi .

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Otimaiti paricoti aparopee tsinane , amenajeitiri . Ocarajeitaiti Maria Maquitarasato , jero aisati pashini Maria , irootaque iriniro Santiaco , jeri aisati Jose . Yora Santiaco impoitatsiri itimi . Aisati ocarajeitiri Sarome .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Ainiro itimaveitani Jesoshi anta Carireaqui , oijajeitirini maaroni oca tsinanepee . Intacojeitarini aisati . Otimaque meeca aca oshequi otsipapee tsinane . Itoncaantanacari Jesoshi anta Jerosarequi , irootaque oijajeitiriniri .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Ishavijiiteanaji catsirincaiteri . Iro quitaiteri meeca yovetsicajeitiro iroajeiteari osaitequera , tempa osaitequera quitaiteri imaoreantajeitari .

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: Ainiro Jose , yora poneachari Arimateaqui . Aitaque icarajeitiri yora oametavacaajeitainchari . Ineacameetsajeitiri atiripee . Yaamaari Tasorentsi , icoaque impincatsariventeri . Ipanacari iriori Pirato , ijatashitaqueri yamanantapaajiri yora Jesoshini .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Yoanaque cavaco Pirato . Iquenqueshiretanaque : " 多 Icatimaitacampa icamanaque Jesoshi ? " Ari icajemacantaqueri iyapitanote soraro . Isampitavaqueri : - - 多 Queariompa ? 多 Camasanotanaquempa Jesoshi ?

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Icantiri : - - Je , camasanotaque ini . Irosati itiancantacariri Jose intijeri Jesoshini .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: Yamanantaque Jose tocoya . Yoaniitaqueri Jesoshi , yapinaicacotaqueri tocoyaqui . Yoiponaaqueri omoroqui , anta imoqueetironta imperita . Itivironcashitanaqueri antearo mapi omoroqui .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: Oneacotaqueri jaoca yoaqueriri Maria Maquitarasato . Otsipataro Maria , ora iriniro Jose .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Avisanaque quitaiteri imaoreantajeitari . Amanantanaque tsinane casancajari , ontiritantajearimeri Jesoshini . Ari opajitari iroori tiriterinemeri Maria Maquitarasato . Aisati iroori ocaratiro pashini Maria iriniro Santiaco , jero aisati iroori Sarome .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Ari capichaji quitaiteri ojatamani anta omoroqui yoyeevetacarinta . Iro tominco ojatantacari . Ari ijenoquitapaaque catsirincaiteri , irosati areetantapaaca .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Ocantavacaanaca : - - 多 Janicampa tivironqueerone ora mapi omoroquinta ? Antearo oni , eiro aaveirotsi .

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Amenapaaque , oneapaaquero mapi , tivironcanaca . Antearo catsini onaveta .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Oqueapaaquero omoroqui anta yoavetacarinta . Te oneapaajeriji ocoavetapaajari , irinti oneapaaque evancari , isavicaque acosanoriqui . Iquitsaataro quitsaarentsi quitamarori catsini . Oapaaque cavaco .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Icantavaquero : - - Eiro poitsi cavaco . Irio picoaveta yora Jesoshi nasaretesati , yora ipajacoyeetaqueri . Itinaanaja , te aneajeriji aca . Pamenerote aca yoyeevetacarica .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: Pijataje meeca , pincamantapeeri iroamere . Aisati pincamanteri Petero . Pincantapaaqueri : " Irijivatanaquempi anta Carireaqui , aitaque pineapaajeriri anta . Tempa aitaque icamantitimpini " .

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Ari osoquijanaji , oshianaca . Opioncanaque , oanaque cavaco catsini . Otsaroanaque , irootaque caari ocamantacotantari .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: Irootaque itinaantajari Jesoshi tominco . Iro intasanotajari yonijaajaro Maria Maquitarasato . Irootaque peerani yatajeaoncaveitaniri 7 camaari , iro cantaincha yoavisacotaqueroni .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: Irosatiquea ojatantanaca iroori ocamantapaaqueri yora itsipajeiveitaniri Jesoshi . Irosatiquera yoashiretacojeivetari , iraacojeivetari aisati .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Ari ocamantavetapaacari : - - Tinaanaja Jesoshi , noneajiri . Te inquemisantavaqueroji .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Impoiji ipashinivorotanaca Jesoshi , inijapaajari apite iroamereni , yaniijeitanaji anta oantsiqui .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Ari ipianaja yoca neaqueriri , icamantapaaqueri itsipapee . Aisati iquempetavaqueri , te inquemisantavaqueriji .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Impoiji yoajeitaja iroamerepee , icarajeitaji 11 . Irosati inijajeitantapaajariri Jesoshi . Icantajeitaqueri : - - Tempa nocamantitimpini nontinaanaje : 多 paita caari piquemisantantana ? Tempa ontime piquenqueshireantari . 多 Paita caari piquemisantantari neajanari incaranqui ?

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Pijajeite pintsoteanaquero maaroni quipatsiqui . Pincamantajeiteri maaroni atiri jaoca incantajeari iroavisacotantajeari iriori .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Janicarica quemisantavaquerone ora pincamanteriri , aisati ariorica irivaotisatajea , aitaque iroavisacotajea . Irompa yora caari quemisantavaquerone , iroasanquetasanoteri Tasorentsi irinti .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Jaocarica pijajeiteri , intasoncacoventempi Tasorentsi , iriojeitanteari atiri queariotaque oca picantaqueriri . Nomatacayempiro poavisacotanteariri yatajeaoncane camaari . Pioyetero otsipapee neantsi pinquenquetsatacotantenari .

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: Ariorica pajiricaveteari maranque , ariorica irantsicavetempi , iro cantaincha eiro yoamaimpitsi . Aisati , ariorica pirero piantatsiri , eiro oamaimpitsi . Aisati ariorica pimpamiteri mantsiatatsiri aisati pincantacoventeri , ari iravisacojeitaje .

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Irootaque icantajeitaqueriri Avincatsarite Jesoshi , irosati yoancantanaja inquitequi , isavicapaaji anta iracosanoriqui Tasorentsi , icaratapaajiri ipincatsaritapaaji iriori .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Ari ijajeitanaque iroamerepeeni . Iquenaquenayetanaque , icamantantayetanaque jaocarica iquenanaqueri . Quiso yoiri Avincatsarite , yamitacojeitiri . Aisati itasoncantayetaque , iojeitantacari atiripee queariosanotaque icamantajeitapairiri . Aitaque ocanta . Ari ocarati . Narotaque sanquenatirori :

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: 多 Ainirompi Tiojiro ? 多 Tecatsimpa oyempine ? Meeca noninti nonquenquetsatacoteri Jesoquirishito . Icarajeitaque oshequi sanquenatacojeitaqueriri , icamantacoyetaquero yantayetaqueri . Ineajeitaqueri , aisati iquemacojeitaqueri , irootaque isanquenatacotantariri . Noneanataquero narori isanquenare , aisati nosampitacoyetaquero yantayetaqueri niotasanotantacarori , notsoteaquero maaroni . Meeca novaajempiro narori , nocoaque tampatica piotasanotero yantayetaqueri Jesoshi , piojeite te iramatavijeitempiji yora sanquenatirori .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Peerani , ipincatsaritantari Eroreshi anta Joreaqui , itimini saserote pajitachari Sacariashi . Iriotaque ishanincani Aviashi : ariorica yantaveetiniri Tasorentsi anta ivancoqui , icarajeitiri ishanincasanori iriori . Opajita ijina Sacariashi Isavere , irootaque ishanincani Aaro .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Quemisantincari ini iriori Sacariashi , aisati ijina . Icantani imayetaquero icantiriri Tasorentsi , iojeitiri atiri icameetsataque .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Te intimeji itomipee : shiravaro oni ijina , aisati imoncaratavacaajeitaca yanteashipajeitaque .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Ari omoncarataca quitaiteri yantaveejeiti ishaninca . Yamejeitaro itiancapinitiri aparoni saserote itainiri Avincatsarite casancapatsari .

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: Icantajeitiri Sacariashi ishaninca : - - Meeca aviro queasanotatsine anta , pintayeneri Avincatsarite casancapatsari .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Ari iqueanaque , irinti yora apatojeitainchari isavicajeiti saiteriqui , iquenquetsatacaajeitiri Tasorentsi . Aitaque ariorica itaaquero casancapatsari , iquenquetsatacaajeitiri Tasorentsi .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Anta tsompoina , imapocaqueri inampire Avincatsarite , icatiapaaca quempeji onantariqui casancapatsari , icatiapaaca irampatequi .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Ineantavacariri yoanaque cavaco , aisati oshequi itsaroanaque .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Iro cantaincha icantaqueri : - - Sacariashi , eiro pitsaroitsi . Timatsi picantaqueriri Tasorentsi ; tempa iquemaquempi , irootaque ontimanteariri coajica pijina pitomi . Pimpajiteri Joa .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Oshequi pinquimoshireventeari , aisati inquimoshireventajeiteari oshequi pishanincapee .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Aisati irineacameetsatasanoteri Tasorentsi iriori . Eiro irirotsi cachojari . Quiso oasanoteri Ishire Tasorentsi , tequeratsita intime , quiso oyeri : oncanteani oameteri .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Oshequi inquemisantacaajeiteri pijorioririnte , impincatsajeitanteariri Tasorentsi , tempa irio Avincatsarite maaroni .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Inquempeteari Iriashini , oshequi oametiri Ishire Tasorentsi , aisati otasoncacaaqueri . Irijivatanaqueri Avincatsarite , incamantajeiteri ishanincapee iraamaajeiteari , aisati incamanteri inquemisantajeiteri . Iroamejeiteri ishaninca inquemisantanteari , inquempeteari yora peeraniniri iquemisantini intacaroniri . Iroamejeiteri tseencantatsiri cameetsa inquemisanteri Tasorentsi .

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Icantaqueri Sacariashi : - - 多 Arimpa ? 多 Jaoca noncanteari niotasanotanteari queariotaque oca picantaquenari ? Anteashipataquena , aisati nojina , anteashipataque iroori .

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Naro Caviriyeri , quiso noiri Tasorentsi . Iriotaque tiancaquenari nocamantantimpirori oca cameetsatatsiri .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Aitaque omoncarataquea oca nocamantaquempiri , iro cantaincha te pishiretearoji , irointi pitseencaquena . Meeca pimasontite , eiro pineanatajitsi irosati intimanteari pitomi .

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Ainiro anta saiteriqui apatojeitainchari yamenaajeivetacari Sacariashi , icantajeitaque : - - Osamanitanaqueteemi ipeaca . 多 Paita caari isoquijantaja ?

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Impoiji isoquijanaji , te irimatajeaji irineanataje , irointi ijicojicotashitaca . Impoiji iojeitanaque , icantajeiti : - - Timatsi ineaqueri anta tsompoinaqui . Te irineanatasanoteji catsini .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Irosati icanta , oshequi quitaiteri yantaveetaji aisati ivancoqui Tasorentsi . Impoiji ipianaja ivancoqui iriori .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Impoiji oaque ijina , irosati oquempoyeantaca ovancoqui . Icarati 5 cashiri te osoquijajeji .

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: Ocanti : - - Peerani te intimeji notomi , irootaque nopashiventantacari , iro cantaincha eiro nopashiventajatsi aisati . Icavintsaaquena Avincatsarite , tempa icameetsatasanoti .

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Impoiji icarataque 6 cashiri otsomotetantacari Isavere . Ari itiancajiri aisati Tasorentsi Caviriyeri : - - Pijate Nasaretequi : ora carireaquiniri .

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: Pincoapaaquero Maria , ijinatsori Jose . Iriotaque ishanincani Iravirini . Ocashiacari ayeri , iro cantaincha te oneayeteriji shirampari .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Ari ijatashitaquero . Imapocapaaquero , icantapaaquero : - - 多 Ainirompi , Maria ? Noncamantempi : oshequi inintasanotaquempi Tasorentsi , quiso yoaquempi . Oshequi icavintsaasanotaquempi , panaacotaquero maaroni pitsinaneroronte .

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Iro cantaincha otsaroanaque iroori , oquenqueshiretanaca : " 多 Paita ojita oca icantaquenari ? "

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Icantaquero : - - Eiro pitsaroitsi . Queario , icavintsaasanotaquempi Tasorentsi .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Irotaintsi poye . Coajica pintimeri pitomi , pimpajiteri Jesoshi .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Impincatsaritasanote . Iriojeitanaque atiri irio Itomi Tasorentsi , savicatsiri inquitequi . Tempa iriotaque Avincatsarite . Peerani yora Iravirini ipincatsariventaveitarini pijorioririnte . Iro cantaincha incanteri Tasorentsi : " Notiomi , aviro pincatsariventajeiterineri maaroni , pincantaitatiyempani " . Aitaque incanteari impincatsaritanaque , eiro yoipacaajirotsi .

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: Ari ocantiri : - - 多 Jaoca incanteari intimanteari notomi ? Te intimeji nojime .

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Yacanaquero : - - Iro timacayempine Ishire Tasorentsi . Aisati intasoncaventaquempi Tasorentsi , savicatsiri inquitequi jenoqui . Coajica incantacojeiteri pitomi : " Icameetsatasanoti , te aneeroji irantane . Iriotaque Itomi Tasorentsi " .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Aisati noncamantempi : anteashipatasanovetaca iroori pishaninca Isavere , aisati icanteetiro shiravaro oni , iro cantaincha icarataque meeca 6 cashiri otsomontetantacari . Coajica ontimeri otomi .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: Pineaquero , tecatsi pomerentsitimotearine Tasorentsi , imajeitaquero paitarica icoiri .

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: Ocantiri iroori : - - Irioyeampa Avincatsarite . Onimotaquena paitarica icoacaaquenari : icoacaaquenarica intimashitea notomi , ari cameetsataque . Irosati ipiantanaja inampire Tasorentsi .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Pashini quitaiteri ojatanaque Maria Joreaqui . Oshintsiti ojatanaque toncaariqui .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Areetapaaca anta ivancoqui Sacariashi . Oneapaaquero Isavere , ocantapaaquero : - - 多 Ainirompi ?

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Oquemantavacarori Maria ocajemapaaque , oquematiiri ishevatanaca orijani , moyec . Aisati oametasanotaquero Ishire Tasorentsi ,

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: irosati ocajemantavacaro . Ocantiro : - - Tempa ineshinoncajeitaquee Tasorentsi , aisati iquempejeitiro maaroni tsinane ; iro cantaincha avinti , panaacojeitaquena : ineshinoncatasanotaquempi catsini . Tempa aisati ineacameetsatiri pirijani .

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: Aviro ashitearine Avincatsarite . 多 Paita piquenqueshiretantanari pineana ?

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Pamene , noquemantavaquempiri pivetsatapaaquena , iquimoshiretanaque norijani , ishevatanaca , moyec .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Pishiretasanotavacaro maaroni icamantaquempiri Avincatsarite , irootaque ineshinoncatantaquempiri .

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Ocantiro Maria : - - Tempa icameetsatasanotaque Avincatsarite ,

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: iriotaque Atasorentsite aisati oavisacojeiteeneri coajica . Oshequi noquimoshireventaqueri .

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: 多 Paita icavintsantanari narori ? Nashinoncaavetaca , tecatsi niote narori . Iro cantaincha iriojeitanaque maaroni atiri noquimoshireventaqueri .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Oshequi itasoncacoventaquena , tempa itasorentsitasanotaque , icameetsatasanotaque .

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Icantatiani icavintsaajeitaqueri maaroni pincatsajeitiriri .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Oshequi itasoncantayetaque . Intsoncajeitajeri maaroni shemejeitatsiri .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Imajeitaqueri pincatsarivetachari yojocacaaqueri ipincatsariventanti . Irintiquea ashinoncaincari ipeajiri pincatsari .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Iquemacaacari tasheavetachari , aisati yaapitsatajiri ashitaarantincari maaroni timimojeivetariri .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Icantani Tasorentsi yamitacojeitaqueri ajorioririnte , te impeacoteeji arori icavintsaajeitaquee .

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: Aitaque imataquero maaroni icantaqueriri intacaroniri peerani : Avarama aisati maaroni ishanincani , catsini . Irootaque ocantirori Maria .

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: Ari osavicaiti mava cashiri , impoiji opianaja onampiqui .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Ari moncarataca otimiri Isavere otomi .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: Iquemacojeitaquero oshanincapee , iquimoshireventaquero . Icantajeitaque : - - Tempa ineshinoncatasanotaquero Avincatsarite .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Ari ocarataque imaacotaque 7 , moncarataca intoyeantanteariri . Yamejeitaro jorio ipajitavacaa iriori , icantajeiti ishaninca : - - Tempa impajitea Sacariashi , inquempetajeari iriri .

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: Iro cantaincha ocanti iriniro : - - Eiro ipajitatsi Sacariashi , ainti impajitea Joa .

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Icantajeivetaro : - - 多 Paitaquea ? Te intimeji pishaninca pajitachaneri Joa .

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Ari isampijeitiri Sacariashi : - - 多 Paita picoiri avinti ?

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Ari ijicotiro paperi , isanquenajeitaqueneriri : " Aitaque , impajitea Joa " . Irosati yoajeitantanaca cavaco .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Imapocanaja Sacariashi ineanataji aisati , icanti : - - Tempa icameetsati Tasorentsi .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Impoiji yoajeitanaqueri cavaco maaroni ishaninca . Iquemacojeitaqueri maaroni savicajeitatsiri toncaaripeequi : ora timatsiri Joreaqui .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Iquenqueshirejeitanaca maaroni quemacojeitaqueriri : " 多 Jaoca icantari yora jananequi ? 多 Paita iranteri coajicani ? Tempa ineshinoncatasanotaqueri Avincatsarite " .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: Impoiji Ishire Tasorentsi oametaqueri Sacariashi , icantantarori oca :

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: - - Tempa icameetsatasanoti Avincatsarite , iriotaque tasoncaventajeitaqueeri . Ipocashijeitaquee iroavisacojeitajee .

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Peerani Iravirini yantiniri Tasorentsi icoacairiri . Meeca itiancaqueri Tasorentsi ishanincani Iravirini , itasorentsitaque , yoavisacotantaque .

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: Tempa peerani icantirini Tasorentsi quenquetsatacotiriniri :

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: " Nontianquempiri oavisacojeitempineri , intimerica quisajeitempineri , irojocacoventajeitaquempi .

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: Noncavintsaajeitaqueri ishanincani Avarama , maaroni . Eiro nopeacotajarotsi nocantajeitaqueriri .

text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham ,
text2: Peerani nocantasanotaqueri Avarama :

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: ' Coajica noavisacojeiteri pishanincapee , nompiajeiteari quisajeivetearineri , impoiji eiro itsaroajeititsi inquemisantajeitena .

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: Noameetsajeiteri , noncanteani noneacameetsajeiteri ' " . Irootaque icantaqueriri Tasorentsi peeraniniri .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Meeca notiomi , noncamantempi : iriojeitempi atiri aviro quenquetsatacoterine Tasorentsi jenoquiniri . Pincamantajeiteri incameetsatanaque , iraamaajeiteari Avincatsarite .

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: Poamejeiteri ashanincapee iriojeitanteari jaoca incanteari iravisacotantajeari . Pincamantajeiteri icavintsaasanojeitaqueri Tasorentsi , eiro iquenqueshiretajirotsi yantayetiri caari cameetsatatsi . Ariorica icontetapaaque catsirincaiteri , te ontsitenitanajeji , irointi oquitaitetanaji . Aisati oquempetaca , ariorica imponeaquea Avincatsarite jenoqui , ayotasanojeitanaque cameetsa asavicajeite .

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: Iroavisacojeiteri maaroni caari iovetari Tasorentsi , maaroni tsaroayevetachari incame . Iriotacaajeitapaaqueri jaoca incanteari iraacameetsatanteariri Tasorentsi . Irootaque icantaqueri Sacariashi .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Ari avisanaji oshequi osarintsi , yantearitanaque Joa , oshequi iquemisantaqueri Tasorentsi . Ari itimaqueri apaniro caaraiteriqui , irosati iquenquetsatacantacariri ishanincapee .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Ari ipincatsariventanti Jerosarequi oromasati , ipajita Shisari Acoshito . Ari iroaquera itimapaaque Joa , icanti Shisari : - - Nocoaque irisanquenatacojeitea maaroni atiripee , niotanteari jaoca icarajeitiri .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Iro isanquenajeitantarori ivajiropee , irio Shirino pincatsariventajeitiriri shiriasati .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Ari ijajeiti atiri anta nampitsiqui itimajeitini ishanincani peerani , isanquenatacojeitaca .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: Itimi meeca Jose anta Nasaretequi , ora timatsiri Carireaqui . Iro cantaincha ishanincatacari Iravirini : yora pincatsariveitachaniri . Iro inampini Iravirini Verequi , timatsiri anta Joreaqui . Irootaque ijatantacari Jose Verequi , irisanquenatacotantajeari irisati .

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: Itsipatanacaro iroori ijinatsori , irotimataintsi ontimacote .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Ari yareetantapaacari Verequi , irosati oquemantacaro atsicaneentaquero , niii .

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: Icoayevetapaaca pancotsi irimaanteari , iro cantaincha ijaajeitacaro pancotsipee irisavicantapeempameri : irointi timatsi ivanco virantsi . Aitaque otimaqueriri otomi , jivatatsiri itimi . Oponataqueri , oaqueri ora iquempoyeanteetanariri virantsi yoari .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: Ari otsitenitanaji , ainiro anta queshiiqui isavicajeiti shentajeitiriri irovishate .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Imapocaqueri Avincatsarite , ishipaquireacojeitaqueri , oquempetaca quitaiteri , aisati ineajeitavaqueri inampire Avincatsarite . Itsaroajeitanaque ; icantaita , shiquere .

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: Iro cantaincha icantapaaqueri : - - Eiro pitsaroajeititsi , timatsi noncamantempiri : ocameetsatasanotaque . Pinquimoshireventajeitearo , aisati inquimoshireventearo maaroni atiri .

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: Iroaquera itimaque Verequi oavisacojeitempineri : iriotaque Avincatsarite Quirishito .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Jeroca noncamantempiri piotanteariri . Pijate ivancoquinta virantsi , pamenaiteri yora iroaquera timaintsiri ; pineapaaqueri iponaaca anta ivancoqui virantsi , iponataca .

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Irosati imapocajeitantacariri oshequi jenoquisati , icantajeiti : - - Tempa icameetsatasanoti Tasorentsi ,

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: nopincatsatasanojeitiri anta inquitequi . Aca quipatsiqui irisavicacaajeiteri cameetsa maaroni ineacameetsajeitiri .

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Ari ipiajeitanaja inquitequi , impoiji icantajeiti shentajeitiriri irovishate : - - Icamantaquee Avincatsarite timaque Verequi oavisacojeiteeneri . Tsamete amenaiteri .

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Ari ishiajeitanaca , ineajeitapaaqueri Jose , jero Maria , jeri iriori otomi , iponaaca ara .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Ari icamantajeitapaaqueri maaroni icamantaqueriri inampire Tasorentsi .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Ari yoajeitanaque cavaco maaroni quemajeitaqueriri .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: Iroori Maria oshequi oquenqueshiretaquero oca icantajeitaqueriri , oquenqueshiretapinitaquero .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Ari ipiajeitanaja ashitariri irovishate anta queshiiqui . Icantajeitanaque : - - Tempa icameetsataque Tasorentsi . Ocameetsataque maaroni inijaaqueeri aisati maaroni icamantaqueeri . Cameetsa ini Tasorentsi .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: Ari ocarati 7 imaacotaque Jesoshi , irosati itoyeantanteetacari . Aisati ipajitiri Jesoshi : imoncarataquero icantaquerori Maria chapinqui inampire Tasorentsi .

text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Ari peerani isanquenatacaaqueri Avincatsarite Moishishini : " Ariorica ontimeri tsinane otomi , onquempoyeempaya ovancoqui oncarate 40 quitaiteri : eiro ojatitsi ampatojeiteari quemisantatsiri . Ariorica omoncarataquea 40 quitaiteri , ocameetsati ojate ivancoqui Tasorentsi onquemisantantajeari aisati . Aanajeneri Tasorentsi apite sampaquiti , ariorica apite paroma . Ompapaaqueri saserote , iroyeri , impoiji intayeneri Tasorentsi . Impoiji onquempetajea aisati peerani , cameetsa ojatapinitaje aisati , onquemisantapinitaje " . Timatsi pashini isanquenatiniri aisati : " Iriorica shirampari yora jivatatsiri otimiri tsinane , icoaque Avincatsarite inquemisantasanoteri , iranaacoteri impoiterineri intime . Ocameetsati iraanajeri ashitariri ivancoqui Tasorentsi , incanteri Tasorentsi : ' Jerica notomi , jivatatsiri itimi . Paitarica pincoacaaqueriri , nocoaque irantasanotempiro ' " . Ari ocarataque 40 quitaiteri itimantacari Jesoshi , irosati ijajeitantanaja Jerosarequi : Jose , Maria , jeri Jesoshi . Imoncarajeitaquero maaroni isanquenatiniri Moishishi ojatapinitantajeari Maria onquemisante . Aisati ocamantaqueri Tasorentsi : - - Jerica notomi , nocoaque irantasanotempiro paitarica picoacaaqueriri .

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Ari itimi anta Jerosarequi shirampari pajitachari Shimeo . Quemisantasanotatsiri ini , cameetsa isaviqui , iquemisantasanotaquero Ishire Tasorentsi . Aisati yaamaari Quirishito : yora veshireacaajeitearineri maaroni joriopee .

text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost , that he should not see death , before he had seen the Lord ' s Christ .
text2: Ocamantaqueri Ishire Tasorentsi : " Eirotsitarica picami , pineavaqueri Quirishito : yora intianqueri Avincatsarite " .

text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple : and when the parents brought in the child Jesus , to do for him after the custom of the law ,
text2: Irosati otiancantacari Shimeo anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi ; impoitapaaqueri Jose , Maria , jeri Jesoshi .

text: Then took he him up in his arms , and blessed God , and said ,
text2: Ineavaqueri Jesoshi , ijatashitaqueri , yatsomaavaqueri ; icantiri Tasorentsi : - - Novincatsarite , tempa picameetsati ,

text: Lord , now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace , according to thy word :
text2: noneaqueri oavisacotenaneri , yora picantaquenari . Meeca moncarataca , tecatsi noncoyeri aisati . Noquimoshiretaque , vetsicaquena noncame .

text: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people ;
text2: Queario , pitiancaqueri iroavisacojeiteri maaroni atiri :

text: A light to lighten the Gentiles , and the glory of thy people Israel .
text2: irio iotacaajeiterine pashinipee atiri , iriveshireimentajeiteari maaroni joriopee quemisantajeitimpiri .

text: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him .
text2: Irosati yamenantanaca Jose , jero Maria , yoanaqueri cavaco ; iquenqueshiretasanotiro icantaqueri Shimeo .

text: And Simeon blessed them , and said unto Mary his mother , Behold , this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel ; and for a sign which shall be spoken against ;
text2: Aisati icantajeitaqueri : - - Nocoaque irineshinoncajeitempi Tasorentsi . Aisati icantiro iriniro : - - Pamene , coajica oshequi piraacoteari pitomi : ipocaque ayojeitanteari avavisacojeitajea , iro cantaincha incarate oshequi ashaninca tseencajeiterineri : iroashinoncaajeitea iriori . Irintiquea pashini ashanincapee , iroveshireimentasanojeiteari pitomi . Aparo intseencajeiteri , pashini iroveshireimenteari , onconijatanteari iquenqueshirejeitiri . Irootaque icantaquerori Shimeo .

text: And there was one Anna , a prophetess , the daughter of Phanuel , of the tribe of Aser : she was of a great age , and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity ;
text2: Ari otimi aisati ivancoqui Tasorentsi tsinane pajitachari Aana : oshequi ocamantapinitiri oshaninca irineane Tasorentsi . Ipajitani irini Janoeri : iriotaque ishanincani Asere . Anteashipatasanotaque Aana : ocarataque osarintsite 84 . Camajimentaaro oni , ocarataque 7 osarintsi irosati icamantacari ojimeni . Meeca osavicaque ivancoqui Tasorentsi . Ocantani : quitaiteriqui , tsiteniriqui oquenquetsatacaapinitiri Tasorentsi ; oshequi opincatsataqueri . Te onquenqueshiretasanoteroji oayetari .

text: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord , and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem .
text2: Ari ojatashitaqueri Jesoshi iroori . Ocantaqueri Tasorentsi : - - Ariove , noneaqueri narori . Aisati ocantajeitiri oshaninca : - - Jerica yoca , iriotaque oavisacojeiterineri ashanincapee : maaroni aamaajeitariri .

text: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord , they returned into Galilee , to their own city Nazareth .
text2: Ari imataquero Jose aisati Maria maaroni isanquenataqueri Moishishi : tempa isanquenatacairi Avincatsarite . Impoiji ipiajeitanaja Nasaretequi : timatsiri Carireaqui .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , filled with wisdom : and the grace of God was upon him .
text2: Ari iqueveanaque Jesoshi , aisati ishintsitanaque , aiquero ijatanaque iotasanotanaque , yanaacotiri ijananequiririnte . Oshequi ineshinoncataqueri Tasorentsi .

text: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover .
text2: Ari ijatapiniti anta Jerosarequi , itsipajeitari Jose aisati Maria . Aitaque ijatapinitiri maaroni osarintsi ariorica omoncaratapaaca quitaiteri Yavisantaniri .

text: And when he was twelve years old , they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast .
text2: Ari ocarataque irosarintsite Jesoshi 12 , ijajeitanaji aisati ,

text: And when they had fulfilled the days , as they returned , the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem ; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it .
text2: iquimoshireventaqueri Tasorentsi . Pashini quitaiteri ipiajeivetanaja maaroni ishaninca , iro cantaincha isavicanaque Jesoshi Jerosarequi apaniro . Te irioveteari ishaninca ,

text: But they , supposing him to have been in the company , went a day ' s journey ; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance .
text2: yaamaashivetacari itsipajeitanajari ishanincapee pashini . Ari ishaaviniji icoacoayevetacari ishanincaqui ,

text: And when they found him not , they turned back again to Jerusalem , seeking him .
text2: iro cantaincha te irineajeriji . Irosati ipiantanaja Jerosarequi , icoacoayevetajari ,

text: And it came to pass , that after three days they found him in the temple , sitting in the midst of the doctors , both hearing them , and asking them questions .
text2: ocarataque mava quitaiteri . Impoiji ineapaajiri ivancoqui Tasorentsi : icarajeitiri oametantayetatsiri . Iquemisantayetiri yoametantayetiri , aisati isampijeitiri paitapeerica .
