text2: Ari pashini quitaiteri itimi Jesoshi anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi yoamejeitaqueri atiripee , icamantaqueri jaoca incantajeiteari iroavisacotantajeari . Ari ipocajeitaque yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , yora oametantirori sanquenarentsi , yora jivatacaajeitantatsiri , maaroni .

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: Icantajeitapaaqueri : - - Pincamantajeitena janica peaquempiri pincatsari : 多 janica tiancaquempiri pantayetantarori oca ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Aisati narori , timatsi nosampijeitempiri . Pincamantajeitena :

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: 多 janicampa tiancaqueriri Joa ivaotisatanti ? 多 Iriompa Tasorentsi tiancaqueriri ? Terica , 多 iriompa tianquiriri atiri ?

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Te irancajeiteriji , irointi icantavacaajeitanaca : - - 多 Paita ancanteriri ? Ancanteririca : " Irio Tasorentsi tianquiriri " , icantajeiteecari : " 多 Paita caari piquemisantantari ? "

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Irompa ancanteririca : " Irio atiri tiancaqueriri " , tempa inquisajeitaquee atiripee . Ipitseecari . Icantajeitaque iriori itiancaqueri Tasorentsi Joa ivaotisatanti .

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Ari impoiji icantajeiti : - - Te niojeiteji janicarica tiancaqueriri Joa .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Irosati icantantari Jesoshi : - - Aisati narori , eiro nocamantimpitsi janica tiancaquenari .

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Impoiji aisati iquenquetsatacaajeitiri Jesoshi atiri , jero oca ishiacantiniri : - - Itimini panquitirori ova anta iipatsitequi . Impoiji icantaqueri iratirite : " Pamenenarorica , coajica ariorica oitsoquitanaque , paaqueyea avirori cashetani oitsoqui , cashetani pimpena narori " . Icantajeiti : " Ari cameetsa " . Impoiji ijatanaque pashiniqui quipatsi , peerani ipeaca .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Impoiji omoncarataca irayetero oitsoqui . Yora ashitarori irovate itiancaque yora inampire : " Pijataite anta otiminta novate , picoacotaiteri yora amenanarori impaarantena cashetani " . Ari ijavetaca , iro cantaincha iquisajeitavaqueri , ipasanatavaqueri , yoipiavajiri . Tecatsi impavaqueri .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Impoiji itiancavetacari pashini inampire , iro cantaincha ishirontimentavacari , ipasanatavaqueri , yoipiavajiri . Tecatsi impavaqueri .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Impoiji itiancavetacari pashini aisati , iro cantaincha ipasanayetavaqueri , tac , tac , oshequi irirajanive . Yojocanajiri aisati .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: Iotantacari yora ashitarori , icanti : " 多 Paita nanteri meeca ? Irioyeata nontianqueri notomi nonintasanotiri . Ariorica irineajeitavaqueri irinti , impincatsatavaqueri " . Ari itiancavetacari iriori .

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Ineantajeitavacariri , icantavacaajeitanaca : " Pamenerite itomi ashitarori iipatsite . Ariorica incame iriri , iriotaque ashitajearoneri . Tsame avavaqueri , impoiji ashijeitajearo ainti quipatsi " .

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Ari yaajeitavaqueri , shepi . Yaajeitanaqueri anta ocaratapaaque iipatsite , yoajeitaqueri , shemi . Irootaque iquenquetsatacaajeitaqueriri Jesoshi . Impoiji isampijeitiri : - - Aamaaca , 多 jaoca incanteriri yora ashitarori iipatsite ?

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Tempa irijate iriori , inquisasanojeitaqueri tsameevetanariri iipatsite , iroapaaqueri . Impoiji iramenaje pashini tsameetajenerine . Ari icantajeiti quemajeitaqueriri : - - Te oncameetsateji irimajeitero oca , eiro ishinetiritsi Tasorentsi .

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Yamenajeitaqueri Jesoshi , icanti : - - 多 Pijivetacampa eiro imatirotsi ? 多 Paitampa otimantacari oca sanquenarentsi ? Tempa ocanti : " Itseencaquero yora vetsicavetarori pancotsi otincami , yojocajiro . Iro cantaincha ipeaquero Tasorentsi antearo otincami pancotsi " . 多 Paita oshiacantiri ?

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Incarajaque maaroni pariatsiri mapiqui , ariorica ontsinacapaaqueri atiri oca mapi , ompeaqueri ovane quipatsi , ontsoncaqueri . Narotaque shiaquerori mapi : nompoyereajeitaqueri maaroni quisajeitaquenari .

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , aisati yora oametantirori Sanquenarentsi icoajeiveta irayerime meeca Jesoshi , tempa iojeitaque ishiacaventiri iriori . Irayerime , iro cantaincha itsaroacaajeitacari atiripee , icanti : " Eiro airitsi , iquisacoventaricari ashanincapee " .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Impoiji itiancaqueri saserote ishaninca : - - Meeca pijate pamatavitaiteri yora Jesoshi . Pishiacantamempeapeempa picoaque pinquemisanteri , iro cantaincha , pincomitacayeari irineane . Ariorica incomitanaquearo incanteri , pishintsite pimpoque pincamantapeena . Impoiji ancamanteri pincatsari icantaqueri .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Ari ijatashitaqueri Jesoshi , icantapaaqueri : - - Oametanari , niojeitaque oqueariotasanotaque maaroni picantaquenari aisati maaroni poametaquenari . Te pamenashiteariji ashaninca piotanteari icameetsatirica , irointi piotasanotaqueri iquenqueshiretiri . Aisati cameetsa poamejeitaquenaro icoacaajeitaquenari Tasorentsi .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: Meeca pincamantena : 多 ocameetsatimpa ampajeiteri yora ivincatsarite oromasati airequite icoacotaqueeri ? 多 Eirompa apiritsi ?

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Ari iotaqueri Jesoshi icoajeiveta iramataviterime . Icantiri : - - 多 Paitaquea picoantari pincomitacayenaro noneane ?

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: Poniajayenari iitsoqui piirequite . 多 Janica ishiavorotaqueri aca quirequiqui ? 多 Janica ashitarori ivajiro isanquenataqueri ? Yacanaqueri : - - Iro ivoro ivincatsarite oromasati , aisati osanquenataca ivajiro : yora Sesari .

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Ari icantiri Jesoshi : - - Ocameetsataque pimpincatsateri yora Sesari , iro cantaincha ocameetsataque aisati pimpincatsatasanoteri Tasorentsi .

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Tecatsi icantajeitea incomitacayeari irineane Jesoshi , cameetsa yoametantasanotaque . Yoajeitanaqueri cavaco yora amataviterinemeri , irootaque imajerejeitantacari . Tecatsi incantajeri aisati .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Impoiji ijatashitaqueri saroseo Jesoshi . Icantaque iriori saroseo eiro itinaajeitajatsi camayetatsiri , eiro ijajeititsi inquitequi . Ari icantapaaqueri :

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: - - Oametanari , peerani isanquenataqueroni Moishishi . Icanti ariorica iraavetearo shirampari ijina , impoiji incamaque . Eirorica itimacairo ijananequite , cameetsataque iraajero irirentini . Impoiji intimerica otomi irishiacantajeri itomini irirentini .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Ariorica itimi shirampari irirenti 6 . Yaavetaro ijina , impoiji icamaque . Te intimeji itomi .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: Impoiji yaavetajaro iriori irirentini . Aisati te intimacayeroji ijina itomi , impoiji icamaque iriori , toren .

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: Aisati iquempetaca pashini irirentini . Yaavetajaro tsinane , impoiji aisati icamaque . Aisati iquempejeitaca maaroni irirentini . Tecatsi timacayerone otomi .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Ari impoitanaque iroori tsinane , ocamaque .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Meeca pincamantena : queariorica intinaajeitanaje maaroni camajeivetainchari , 多 janica jinantajearone oca tsinane ? Tempa icarajeiveta aayevetaroniri 7 .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Ari yacanaqueri Jesoshi : - - Queario , aca quipatsiqui yamejeitacaro shirampari yairo ijina . Aisati tsinanepee aajeiti ojime .

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: Ari irointinaajeitajeri Tasorentsi maaroni atiri ineacameetsatiri , iro cantaincha anta inquitequi eiro yaajitsi ijina . Aisati tsinane , eiro aajitsi ojime .

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: Aisati eiro anta icamajitsi aisati , inquempejeiteari maaroni inampirepee Tasorentsi , saviquimojeitiriri : te incamajeiteji iriori . Icantani yaneajeiti . Aisati intomintasanojeiteari maaroni atiri yora irointinaajeitajeri .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: Peerani iotitani Moishishini intinaajeitanaje camayetatsiri . Iquenquetsatacotantarori totseequi otaavetaca , iquenquetsatacotiri aisati Avincatsarite . Icantini : " Iquemisantiri Avarama Tasorentsi . Aisati Isaca iquemisantaqueri , jeri aisati Jacovo " .

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Pineaquero , te incanteji : " Iquemisantaveitarini Avaramani " . Yaneanaji Avarama aisati itsipapee , irootaque icantantacari : " Iquemisantiri " .

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Impoiji icantayetiri aparopee oametantirori sanquenarentsi : - - Oametanari , cameetsa oca picantaqueriri .

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Ari itsaroacaajeitacari irisampitajerime aisati .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: Pashini aisati icantaqueri Jesoshi : - - 多 Paita picantajeitantari : " Iriotaque Quirishito ishanincani Iravirini " ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Tempa peerani ipampoyeaventirini Iravirini Tasorentsi , isanquenataquero oca : " Yora Tasorentsi , icantaqueri novincatsarite : ' Notomi , pisavique aca nacosanoriqui , pincaratena ampicatsarijeite ,

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: irosati impincatsajeitantempiri maaroni quisajeivetaquempiri ' " .

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: 多 Iriompa Quirishito ishanincani Iravirini ? Iriorica ishanincani , 多 paita icantantariri peerani : " Novincatsarite " ? Te pamejeivetearoji pimpincatsajeiteri impoitatsiri itimi .

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Impoiji iquemajeitaqueri atiri Jesoshi , yoamejeitaqueri iroamerepee , icantaqueri :

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: - - Paamayeariyea yora oametantajeitirori sanquenarentsi . Oshequi icoaque inquenaquenatsantsanayete . Icoaque aisati cameetsa iraacameetsajeitavaqueri ishaninca anta nampitsiqui . Aisati anta pancotsiqui apatojeitantapinitari , icoaque irisaviquimotapiniteri pincatsaripee . Aisati ariorica yampatojeita atiri yoajeita , icoaque quiso iroapiniteri pincatsaripee .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Oshequi ishiacantanirota . Osamani iquenquetsatacaamempeacari Tasorentsi . Icoaque irijitashijeitanteariri ishaninca iquemisantasanoti . Iro cantaincha yamatavitapinitiro camajimentaaro , icoshitantarori timimojeivetarori . Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri : iroasanquetaasanojeitaqueri Tasorentsi , catsini .

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: Ari isavicaque Jesoshi anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi . Yamenayetavaqueri ashitaarantincari yamayetaqueri iirequite anta inantariqui quirequi .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: Aisati ineaquero camajimentaaro amaqueri apite iitsoqui quirequi , caari pinatacha .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Icanti : - - Queario oca noncamantempiri : pitseenquitirocari yoca amaqueri oca camajimentaaro . Oshequi ineacameetsatitacaro Tasorentsi yoca amaqueri , anaacotaqueri yamajeivetacari yora ashitaarantincari .

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Oshequi ivinaro yamavetacari iriori , iro cantaincha itimaarantaque oshequi catsini iquempoyeanontavajari iriori . Irompa oca , amaqueri maaroni timimovetarori , te aneajeriji timaarantajantsine , tecatsi amanantantearori oyeari .

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: Ari iquenquetsatavacaajeitaca iroamerepee , icantajeiti : - - Tempa ocameetsatasanotaque ivancoca Tasorentsi . Aisati maaroni mapipee yovetsicantacarori , ocameetsajeitaque , aisati maaroni yoaneencajeitantarori anta otantoqui . Iquemantajeitacariri , icantiri Jesoshi :

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: - - Coajica intireetajero maaroni oca pineacameetsajeitiri meeca . Irojoqueetajero mapipeeca arejiqui .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Ari isampijeitaqueri : - - 多 Jaoca oncarate omoncaratanteari oca picantaquenari ? Aisati , 多 paita iotacaayenaneri irotaintsi omoncaratea ?

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Icantaqueri : - - Paamayea , yamataviyeetimpicari . Impoque oshequi atiri cantempineri : " Naro nainti Quirishito " . Pashini incante : " Itiancaquena Quirishito noncamantempi irotaintsi impoque " . Iro cantaincha eiro piquemisantiritsi .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Pinquemapiniteri atiri incante irimanatavacaajeitea atiripee , aisati irojocajeiteri ivincatsarite . Iro cantaincha eiro pitsaroajeititsi . Aitaque incanteari inquisavacaapinijeitea , iro cantaincha tequera omoncarateaji .

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Jero pashini icantaqueriri aisati : - - Yora atiripee irimanayeteri itsipapee atiri . Yora savicayetatsiri aparopeequi nampitsi irimanateri yora savicayetsiri pashinipeequi nampitsi .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Aisati oshequi onicasanotanaquea quipatsi . Aajeiteri atiripee itashe , oshequi incamajeitanaque ; aisati irojoquiijeitea itsipapee atiri , incamaarantayetanaque iriori . Aisati , anta inquitequi pineaquero caari pineapinijeiti , oshequi pintsaroacayearo .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: Aisati icantajeitiri : - - Iro cantaincha irijivayeetempi inquisanayeetempi . Iraajeitanaquempi anta pancotsiqui yapatojeitantari , aisati iroiminqueayetempi caravosoqui . Iraajeitanaquempi aisati anta pincatsaripeequi , inquisatsajeitempi : " 多 Paita piquemisantanirotantariri Quirishito ? "

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Iro cantaincha eiro pitsaroacaaritsi yora quisavetempineri , irointi pincamantajeiteri jaoca nocanta noavisacojeitaquempiri .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Eiro piquenqueshiretitsi : " Ariorica irayeetena , 多 paita noncanteriri ? "

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: Ariorica iraanajempi noamejeitempi nainti paitarica pincanteriri . Eiro imatirotsi yora quishempineri impiatsatempi .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: Noncamantempi : iraacantempi piripee , piniropee , pirentipee , pitsiropee , pishanincapee , maaroni . Iroaarantempi aparopee .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Iriojeitanaque atiri piquemisantaquena , irootaque inquisajeitantempiri .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Iro cantaincha ariorica quiso poyena aisati pinquearioventenaro maaroni nocantajeitaquempiri , nonquempoyeasanojeitaquempi . Tecatsi catsini incantajeitempi yora quishempineri , eiro yaapitsatimpirotsi aparoni piishi . Aisati pincantaitatiyempani pintime inquitequi .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: Aisati icanti Jesoshi : - - Ariorica pineajeitavaqueri soraro irishoncajeitaquearo Jerosare , ari piojeitanaque irotaintsi intsoncajeitajero pinampi .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Ocameetsati irishiajeitanaque toncaariqui maaroni savicajeitatsineri . Aisati maaroni savicatsineri Joreaqui , irishiajeitanaque . Aisati yora jayetatsineri oantsipeequi , eiro ipiajeitanaja nampitsiqui .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Aitaque omoncarataquea maaroni oca isanquenatiniri peerani : " Iroasanquetaasanojeiteri Tasorentsi maaroni tseencajeitaqueriri " .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: Ashinoncaajeitanaquea maaroni tsinane tsomonteyetatsineri , aisati maaroni antsotaayeterineri ojananequite . Oshequi irineacatsiyetearo yora savicajeitatsiri . Oshequi iroasanquetaajeiteri Tasorentsi .

text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Irimanajeiteri oshequi atiri , incamaarantayetanaque . Itsipapee iroisoyeteri , iraanajeri otsipapeequi quipatsi . Intime pashinipee atiri Jerosarequi peerani , irosati incantanteari Tasorentsi : " Moncarataca " .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: Jeroca icantiriri aisati Jesoshi : - - Pineajeitavaqueri impashinijeitanaque inquitesati : yora catsirincaiteri , cashiri , impoquiropee , maaroni . Pineero caari pineapinijeiti . Aisati intsaroajeitanaque maaroni atiri , inquemajeitavaquero oneajatanaque antearoja incajare , soooo . Aisati irineavaquero antearoja otavoncajare . Iramenajeitavaquero , sorererere .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Eiro iojeititsi atiri jaocarica incanteeteriri , irootaque intsaroasanojeitantanaqueari catsini . Irishevayetanaquea impoquiro .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Impoiji pineajeitavaquena , nompiaje aisati . Tempa noponeaca peerani inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Ariorica nompiaje aisati , nonquenapaaje mencoriqui , nontasorentsitasanotapaaque , nompincatsaritasanotapaaque .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Ariorica pineajeitavaquero oca nocantajeitaquempiri , piveshireajeitanaquea , pamenajeitavaquena : irotaintsi noavisacotasanojeitempi .

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Impoiji ishiacantiniri oca : - - Ari pamenero iyera , jaoca ocantari . Terica iyera , ari pashini inchato pamenero .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Ariorica ontimayetanaje oshi , eereshitanaje , ari piojeitaque irootimatajantsi onquimojantsitaje .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Aisati oquempetaca , ariorica pineaquero omoncarataquea maaroni nocamantitanaquempiri , piojeitaque irotaintsi impincatsariventasanojeitempi Tasorentsi .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Ariorica pineajeitavaquero intanaquea oca nocamantaquempiri , ari eirotsitarica picamitsi , aitaque pineajeitaquero omoncarataquea maaroni .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Coajica , peerani , ompeanaquea quipatsi aisati impeajeitanajea maaroni inquitequiniri : cashiri , catsirincaiteri , impoquiropee , maaroni . Iro cantaincha eiro opeimatatsi irointi noneane catsini .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: Aisati icantiri : - - Paamaasanojeitajena : nomapocapaimpicari . Piquenqueshiretirocari caari cameetsatatsi . Pishinquijeitacari . Piquenqueshiretapinitirocari timajeitatsiri aca quipatsiqui .

text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth .
text2: Aitaque nomapocapaaqueri maaroni savicajeitatsiri quipatsiqui . Iroashinoncaajeitea maaroni caari aamaventajeitachane .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Paamaventea . Aisati pincanteri Tasorentsi iramitacotempi cameetsa pareejeitantajenari , eirota piquematsicatarotsi maaroni oca nocamantaquempiri .

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: Ari maaroni quitaiteriqui yoametantaque Jesoshi anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi . Maaroni tsiteniriqui ijatapiniti anta toncaariqui ipajiyeetiri Orivomashi .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: Aisati maaroni quitaiteriqui ijajeitamanaji atiripee ivancoqui Tasorentsi iquemisantapinijeitiri .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: Irotaintsi quitaiteri yoapinijeitantarori tanta caari iconoyeeti tapiacairori . Yapiitapinijeitiro joriopee maaroni osarintsi iquenqueshireantarori peerani anta Ejipitoqui yavisajeitanajiro oantatsiri ivancopee .

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: Ari yoametavacaajeitaca yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee aisati yora oametantajeitirori sanquenarentsi : - - 多 Jaocasa ancanteriri Jesoshi avanteariri ? Aamaaca ari inquisacotanaqueari atiripee .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Impoiji yora Satanashi ishintsinataqueri Jorashi Ishicariote , yora yoamevetacari Jesoshi : yoametaqueri iraacanteri .

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: Ari ijatashitaqueri yora saserotepee , icantapaaqueri : - - Namitacotempi paacanteri Jesoshi .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: Iquemantavacariri , iquimoshirejeitanaque , icantajeitavaqueri : - - Ari , cameetsa . Ariorica ayeri , ari nompinatempi quirequi .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Icanti : - - Ari . Namenasanoteri , impoiji noncamantempi jaoca pincanteari pimanacanteariri paacanteri . Eiroquea ineajeitiritsi atiripee .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Ari moncarataca meeca vieshita . Meeca yoacaajeitacari atiripee ovisha , iquempetacari ishaninca peerani anta Ejipitoqui .

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: Ari Jesoshi itiancaqueri Petero aisati Joa , icantavaqueri : - - Pijate povetsicajeitapee avajeiteari , anquenqueshirejeiterota yavisantanacari peerani oamaantatsiri .

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Isampitiri : - - 多 Jaoca picoaqueri novetsiquerori ?

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Ariorica pareetea nampitsiqui , pineapaaqueri shirampari yaacotanajiro nija . Poijatanaqueri anta pancotsiqui , jaocarica inqueapaajeri .

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Pincantapaaqueri yora ashitarori ivanco : " Icanti Avincatsarite : ' 多 Jaoca noacayeariri noamerepee ? ' "

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: Ari ironijayempiro anta oshitamencotanta jenoqui . Ovetsicajeitaca asavicajeitanteari . Ari povetsicajeitero avirori avajeiteari .

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Irosati ijajeitantanaca , ineajeitapaaquero icantaqueriri Jesoshi . Yovetsicajeitapaaquero yoari .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Impoiji yareejeitapaaca maaroni , yoajeitapaaca .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: Impoiji icantajeitaqueri Jesoshi : - - Oshequi nocoitacani tequeratani noncame , nontsipajeitanajempita meeca tsiteniriquica noacaajeitanajempita tanta .

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Noncamantempi , eiro napiitajirotsi noajearo aisati aca quipatsiqui . Aintiquea noapaajearo anta ipincatsaritinta Tasorentsi .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Ari yaaquero tsota , ipasonquitaqueri Iriri , impoiji icanti : - - Paacojeitavaquero oca , pirajeitero .

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: Noncamantempi : eiro nirajirotsi ovaja aca quipatsiquica . Aintiquea nirapaajero aisati anta ipincatsaritinta Tasorentsi .

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Impoiji yaaquero tanta , ipasonquitiri Iriri . Icarajaquero , ipajeitaqueri iroamere , icantiri : - - Jero oca tanta , poajeitearo . Narotaque camimentajeitempineri . Nocoaque poapinitearo tanta pinquenqueshiretapinitantenari nocamimentajeitaquempi .

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Ari yoajeitaca , maaroni . Impoiji ipacojeitaqueri ovaja aisati . Icantajeitaqueri : - - Ariorica pirero oca , nocoaque piojeite nocamantajeitaquempi noavisacojeitempi . Irootaque niraja amparajatimentajeitempineri , noncamimentajeitempi noavisacojeitantempiri .

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: Impoiji icantajeitaqueri : - - Timatsi acarajeitaqueri meeca avajeitaca yora aacantenaneri iroacantantenari .

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Noponeaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque noncamimentajeiteri maaroni atiri , iro cantaincha irashinoncaasanoitaquea yora aacantenaneri iroacantena .

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Iquemantajeitacariri , isampitavacaajeitaca : - - 多 Janicampa aacantaniroterineri ?

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Ari anta icantavacaajeitanaca iroamerepee : - - 多 Janica coajica jivatacaajeiteeneri ? 多 Janica anaacojeiteeneri impincatsaritasanote ? 多 Naroitatsimpa jivatacaajeitajempine ?

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: Ari icantiri Jesoshi : - - Yamejeitaro yora atiripee ipincatsajeitaqueri ivincatsaritepee , iro cantaincha iperanatapinijeitacari pincatsari ishanincapee . Jero icantashijeitaca : " Nintacojeitacari natiritepee " .

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: Iro cantaincha eiro piquempejeitaritsi . Ariorica picoaque pimpincatsariventante , eiro pishemetitsi , irointi pamitacotapiniteri itsipapee .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: 多 Janica ipincatsatasanotiri atiri ? 多 Yorampa vetsicapinitiniriri yoari ? Teve . Tempa ipincatsayeetiri yora peranajeitariri inampirepee . Iro cantaincha te nomperanajeitempiji nainti , irointi nintacojeitaquempi .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: Quiso poajeitaquena peerani , piojeitaque opomerentsitimotapinijeitaquee .

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: Irootaque nocantantimpiri meeca : oquempetaca incantena Apa nompincatsaritante , aisati noncantajeitempi pimpincatsarijeite .

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Pincaratapinijeitena avapinijeitea aisati irapinijeite anta nompincatsaritenta , aisati ampincatsariventajeiteri maaroni joriopee .

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: Aisati icantiri Avincatsarite : - - Shimo , yora Satanashi icantaqueri Tasorentsi icoaque irineantempi , iriotanteari piquemisantasanotirica . Queariompia , icoaque irantacayempiro caari cameetsatatsi .

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: Iro cantaincha noncanteri Tasorentsi iramitacotempi eiroquea pojocasanotantarotsi piquemisanti . Coajica , ariorica pinquenqueshirereempa aisati pinquemisantajena , pinquenqueshiretacaajeiteri maaroni piyemisantaririnte , pinquemisantacaasanojeiteri .

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: Yacanaqueri Shimo : - - Tempa aviro novincatsarite , quiso noanaquempi ; ariorica iroiminqueetempi , eiro nojoquimpitsi . Iroiminqueetenata narori . Ariorica iroyeetempi , nontsipatasanotanaquempi . Iroyeetenata narori .

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Icantaqueri : - - Noncamantempi : meeca tsiteniriquica , eirotsitarica ineaji teapa , oncarate mava pincante : " Te noneeriji Jesoshi " .

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Impoiji icantajeitiri Jesoshi iroamerepee : - - Peerani notiancajeitaquempi piquenquetsatacaajeitaqueri atiripee . Nocantajeitavaquempi : " Eiro paanajirotsi pitsarate , piirequite , aisati otsipa piitsaare " . Meeca nosampijeitempi : " 多 Pashinoncaajeitanacampa ? 多 Otimaquempa coiteimojeitaquempiri ? " Yacajeitanaqueri : - - Te . Tecatsi .

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Impoiji icantajeitaqueri : - - Meeca noncantajeitempi : ontimerica pitsarate , paanajero . Intimerica piirequite , paanajeri . Terica ontime pivesamento , pimpimantero poicoro pamanantantearori aparoni .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Aitaque omoncarataquea isanquenatacotaquenaniri peerani Isayashini : " Iroyeeteri , inquempetacanteeteri oayeri " . Queario , ontsataajeitaquea maaroni isanquenatacotaquenaniri peerani yora quenquetsatacantantatsiniri .

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: Impoiji icantajeitiri : - - Jero oca , Novincatsarite : apite ocarati avesamento . Yacanaqueri : - - Ari , moncarataca .

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Impoiji isoquijanaji Jesoshi , ijatanaji anta ijatapinitinta : anta toncaariqui pajitachari Orivomashi . Yoijajeitanaqueri iroamerepee .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Ari yareejeitapaaca , icantajeitaqueri : - - Meeca pincantajeiteri Tasorentsi iramitacojeitantempiri : pantirocari caari cameetsatatsi .

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Impoiji ari ijataque Jesoshi apaniro aiquetiji ara . Itiyeroapaaca , iquenquetsatacairi Iriri :

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: - - Apa , pincoaquerica , poavisacotenaro oca nonquematsicataqueari . Iro cantaincha eiro pantirotsi nocoaqueri narori , irointi picoacaaquenari avirori .

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Impoiji ipocaque aparoni inampire Tasorentsi , intacotapaacari Jesoshi , ishintsitantacari .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Oshequi iquematsicatacaro , aiquero ijatatii iquenquetsatacairi Iriri . Oshequi imasavitanaque , ovitejatanaque quipatsiqui , oquempevetaca iriraja .

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Ari itsoncanaquero iquenquetsatacairi iriri , ijatanaji anta yoisavicanaquerinta iroamerepee , ineajeitapaatiiri maajeitaque ini . Oshequi yoashirejeitanaca incaranqui , irootaque imaojeitantacari .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: Icantajeitapairi : - - 多 Paita pimaajeitantacari ? Pintinaajeitanaje . Pincantajeiteri Tasorentsi eiroquea pantantarotsi caari cameeetsatatsi .

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Ainiroquera iquenquetsatacaajeitiri Jesoshi iroamere , yareejeitapaaca oshequi atiri , ijivajeitapaaqueri Jorashi . Iroamere Jesoshi inaveta , iro cantaincha icoaque iraacantajeri meeca . Ijatashitaqueri , inintavoronirotapaaqueri .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Icantavaqueri : - - Iro pinintavoronirotantanari , paacantena . Tempa piotaque naro poneainchari inquitequi , natiritapaaque .

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Ari ineajeitavaqueri itsipajeitari Jesoshi . Isampijeitiri : - - Novincatsarite , 多 picoaquempa nompesheri ?

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Ari ipeshitavaqueri iyempitasanori aparoni inampire yora ivincatsarite saserote , peti .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: Icantiri Jesoshi : - - Ari inaji , eiro pantiritsi . Impoiji yoipiajiniri iyempita , yoavisacotajiri .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Irio itsipajeitapaacari Jorashi yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , jeri aisati yora jivatacaantatsiri anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi , jeri aisati savicacaantajeitatsiri . Icantavaqueri Jesoshi : - - 多 Paita pamashitantanari pivesamentopee aisati inchaquipee ? 多 Narompa coshinti ?

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Tempa nocaratapinijeitaquempi anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi , iro cantaincha te payenaji . Ja , moncarataca meeca paantaquenari : meeca ipincatsaritanti camaari .

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Impoiji yaasanotaqueri Jesoshi , shepi . Yaajeitanaqueri anta ivancoqui ivincatsarite saserote . Osamanitanaque Petero , yoijatacoventavetanacari .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: Anta pancotsiqui , ocaraiteti , yoisheetiro paamari . Isavicajeitapaaque , icotsitajeitapaaca yora aajeitaqueriri Jesoshi . Impoiji itsipajeitapaacari Petero .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Impoiji aisati , opoqui aparoni inampire saserote . Ocatiapaaca , amenapaaqueri Petero , sorerere . Impoiji ocanti : - - Jeri yoca oijatiriri Jesoshi .

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Icanti : - - Te nioteriji .

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Impoiji pashini amenaqueriri , icantiri : - - Aviro oijatiriri Jesoshi . Icantiri : - - Teve . Te noijateriji .

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Ari osamanitapainti aisati , icantiri pashini : - - Queario yoijavetacari yoca shirampari , tempa aisati iponeaca iriori Carireaqui .

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Icantiri : - - Te nioteji paitarica picantaqueri . Irosati ineantanaca teapa .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Yora Jesoshi ipitsocashitanacari Petero , yamenanaqueri . Irosati iquenqueshiretantanacaro icantaqueriri incaranqui : " Tequeratsitarica irineaje teapa , mava pincante : ' Te nioteriji Jesoshi ' " .

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Ari ijatanaque Petero , iraasanotanaca , jii , jii . Oshequi yoashiretanaca , catsini .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Yora shentajeitaqueriri Jesoshi ishirontimentajeitacari , aisati ipasanataqueri , tac , tac , tac .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: Impoiji ipashicajaquitaqueri aisati ipasavorotaqueri , icantaqueri : - - Pincamantenate janica pasavorotaquempiri . Iji , iji , iji .

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Icantani , oshequi yoashinoncaaqueri , ishirontimentacari .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Ari meeca oquitaitetamanaji . Yapatojeitamanaja yora savicacantajeitatsiri , yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , yora oametantirori sanquenarentsi , maaroni . Yaajeitanaqueri Jesoshi anta yoametavacaapinijeitanta .

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: Isampijeitaqueri : - - Pincamantenate : 多 avirompa Quirishitotatsiri naamaajeitacari ? Yacanaqueri : - - Noncantempiricame : " Je , narotaque Quirishito " , eiro pishiretarotsi .

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: Aisati , nosampitempiricame paitapeerica , eiro pacanatsi .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Noponeaca nainti inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Irotaintsi nompianaje jenoqui , nosaviquimotapaajeri Apa iracosanoriqui , noncaratapaajeri nontasoncantajeitaje .

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Isampijeitaqueri : - - 多 Avirompa Itomi Tasorentsi ? Yacanaqueri : - - Je , narotaque .

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Impoiji icanti : - - 多 Paita ancoanteari itsipa camantacoterineri ? Tempa aquemajeitaqueri , ijitasorentsinirotacateemi . Ainiro yantane .

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Ari ijajeitanaque , yaajeitanaqueri Jesoshi anta Piratoqui . Oromasati ini iriori , ipincatsariventajeitiri joriopee .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Icantapaaqueri : - - Ainiro yantanirotaqueri yoca . Yamatavijeitaqueri noshanincapee , icantajeivetacari : " Eiro pipiritsi pincatsari piirequite " . Aisati icantapiniti : " Narotaque Quirishito , pimpincatsajeitena nainti " .

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: Ari isampitiri Pirato : - - 多 Queariompa ? 多 Avirompa ivicatsarite jorio ? Yacanaqueri : - - Je , narotaque .

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: Impoiji yora Pirato icantajeitavaqueri : - - Te aneroji irantane yoca .

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Aiquero icantajeiti : - - Iquisacaajeitacari atiripee , icantajeitaqueri atiri : " Tsame ajocajeri avincatsarite " . Intanacaro anta Carireaqui , meeca iquenaquenayeti aca Joreaqui , yamatavijeitaqueri maaroni .

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Iquemantacarori Pirato icantajeitaqueriri , isampitaqueri : - - 多 Iriompa carireasati yoca ?

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Je , iriotaque . Icantiri : - - Ari , paanajeri anta Eroreshiqui . Iriotaque pincatsariventajeitiriri carireasati . Savicatsi meeca aca Jerosarequi . Ipoqui chapinqui .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Ari yaajeitanajiri anta . Ineantavacariri Eroreshi Jesoshi , iquimoshiretanaque . Oshequi iquemacotapinitaqueri , itasoncantayetaque , irootaque icoantavetacaniri irineeri . Icoaveta irineerime intasoncantayeteme .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Oshequi isampiyevetacari paitapeerica , iro cantaincha te iranqueriji Jesoshi .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Oshequi yapiitapinitiniri yora amaqueriri : - - Te incameetsateji . Ainiro irantane .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Impoiji ishirontimentajeitacari Jesoshi yora Eroreshi aisati maaroni soraropee . Impoiji iquitsaataqueri cameetsari quitsaarentsi , ishiacantamempeacari pincatsari , irishirontimentajeitanteariri aisati . Impoiji itianquiri aisati anta Piratoqui .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Ari peerani iquisavacaapinita Eroreshi aisati Pirato , iro cantaincha meeca intanacaro yaacameetsatavacaaja . Yojocajiro iquisavacaaveitani .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Impoiji yapatojeitacari Pirato yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , pincatsaripee , aisati oshequi atiripee pashini .

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: Ari icantavaqueri : - - Pamene , incaranqui pamavetaquenari yoca , picantajeivetaquena yoamejeitaqueri atiri irojocajeitena narori , aisati iriori novincatsaririntepee . Pineajeitaquena nosampitaqueri paitaricapee , iro cantaincha noneacameetsatiri : te aneeroji irantane .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Aisati iriori Eroreshi , ineacameetsataqueri , irootaque yoipiantacariri aca . Pineaquero , tecatsi irante noacantanteariri .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: Meeca nompasatacanteri , impoiji noimpacajeri .

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: Ari maaroni osarintsi ariorica omoncarataca oca vieshita iquenqueshiretantarori yavisantaniri peerani inampire Tasorentsi , yora oantatsiri , yora Pirato yoipacajiri aparoni shirampari yoiminqueetaqueri .

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Ari itsipatavacaajeitaca icantajeitaqueri : - - Poacanteri yoca , irinti Varavashi poimpacajeri .

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: Ari yora Varavashi peerani icantajeitaqueri ishaninca anta Jerosarequi : " Tsame ajocajeri yora pincatsari " . Impoiji yoaqueri ishaninca , irootaque yoiminqueantacariri caravosoqui .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: Icoaveta Pirato iroimpacajerime Jesoshi , irootaque icoantavetacari iroimajerentajerime atiripee , iro cantaincha

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: aiquero icantajeitanajatiiri : - - Pimpajacotacanteri . Pimpajacotacanteri .

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Yapiivetajari aisati Pirato : - - 多 Paita nompajacotacantanteariri ? 多 Paita yantaqueri ? Nosampijeivetaquempi , iro cantaincha tecatsi piotacaasanotena noacantanteariri . Nompasanatacanteri , impoiji noimpacajeri .

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Icantani icajemajeitanaque : - - Pimpajacotacanterive . Pimpajacotacanterive . Aiquero icantanaitii , irosati iquemisantantacariri Pirato ,

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: icantiri : - - Ari nomajeitempiro oca picoacaajeitaquenari .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Yoipacaacantajiri Varavashi , aisati icantajeitaqueri : - - Paajeitanaqueriqueti Jesoshica , jaocarica pincanteriri .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Ari yaajeitanaqueri Jesoshi anta impajacoterinta , iquenanaque avotsiqui . Jeri itonquiojeitavacari shirenesati pajitachari Shimo . Iponeanaca oantsiqui . Ari iperanatavacari soraro yanatanaqueneri Jesoshi coroshi , ora impajacotanteariri . Yoijatapairi itapiiqui Jesoshi .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Yoijajeitanaqueri oshequi atiri . Otimi aisati oshequi tsinane iraacojeitaqueriri . Oshequi oashiretacotacari , irootaque ocajemacojeitantacariri aisati . Jerosaresato onajeiti .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Iro cantaincha yamenanaquero Jesoshi , icantajeitanaquero : - - Eiro piracojeitanatsi , avisati iracojeitajanchane , aisati piracojeiteri pitomipee .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Coajica ompomerentsitimojeitempi , pashinoncaajeitanaquea . Pincantajeite : " Oquimoshiretaque caari timatsi otomi " .

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Incoajeivetea atiri ontijerime imperita .

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Pamene , tecatsi nanteni nainti , iro cantaincha iroashinoncayena . Tempa coajica irashinoncaasanotaquea maaroni antirori caari cameetsatatsi .

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Aisati anta yaayeetanajiri apite coshitantatsiri , intsipajeiteari iriori Jesoshi , impajacojeiteri .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Ari yareetacaajeitapaacari anta Caraveraqui , ipajacojeitapaaqueri coroshiqui , tac , tac , tac . Irinti yora coshitantatsiri , ipajacotaqueri pashiniqui coroshi anta iracosanoriqui Jesoshi . Irio itsipa ipajacotaqueri anta irampatequi .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Impoiji iquenquetsatacairi Jesoshi iriri : - - Apa , pincavintsayeri yocapee , eiro poasanquetaimentiritsi yoaquena . Te irioteji paitarica yantiri . Ari icoajeitaque soraropee iraajeitero iitsaareni Jesoshi . Icanti : - - Tsame ampishonquero mapijaniqui ayojeitanteari janicarica aitajerine iitsaareni . Icanti itsipa : - - Jaa , jentsiqueti , aneantearo .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: Ari itimi anta oshequi atiri , amenajeitaqueriri , aisati itimi yora pincatsaripee , ishirontimentajeitacari Jesoshi , iji , iji , iji ; icanti : - - Yoavisacovetacari itsipapee , jentsite amenavaquerita ariorica irimatajea iroavisacotajea irisati . Iriotasanotaquerica Quirishito , itiancane Tasorentsi , ari irimatajea irisati iroavisacotajea .

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Aisati iriori soraropee , ishirontimentajeitacari . Ijatashitaqueri , imperime ovaja , quepishijari .

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: Icantaqueri : - - Avirorica ivincatsarite jorio , jentsite poavisacotajea avisati : iji , iji , iji .

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Ainiro ipajacoyeetaquero anta coroshiqui sanquenarentsi , otimi iitoqui Jesoshi , jenioquiji . Osanquenataca irineanequi quereshiasati , aisati irineanequi oromasati , aisati irineanequi jorio . Osanquenataca , ocanti : " Jeri yoca ivincatsarite jorio " .

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Aisati yora coshitantatsiri ipajacoyeetaqueri , ishirontimentacari iriori . - - Avirorica Quirishito , poavisacotajea avisati , aisati poavisacotena narori .

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Iro cantaincha iquisatsataqueri itsipa coshitantatsiri : - - Tempa pimpincatsateri Tasorentsi . Aisati avirori , irotaintsi pincame .

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Ainiro antanepee arori ancamajeitanteari , irintiquea yoca , tecatsi irante incamanteari .

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Aisati icantiri : - - Jesoshi , ariorica pareetea anta pimpincatsaritenta , pinquenqueshiretapeena narori , poavisacotena .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Queario oca noncantempiri : meeca quitaiteri pintsipatanaquena anta ocameetsaitetinta .

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Itampaticatapaaque meeca catsirincaiteri . Omapocashitanaca antearo otsitenitanaque . Ari otsitenitanaque irosati ishaaviniji .

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Aisati itsitenitanaque catsirincaiteri . Aisati otimi anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi oticaashiro nianqui . Ari omapocashitanaca , otsereanaque , tsererere , tsati ; apitemaotanaque . Impoiji antearojenca icantanaque Jesoshi :

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: - - Apa , meeca noncame . Aviro quempoyeajenaneri . Irosati icamantanaca , toren .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Ineantavacariri iyapitanote soraro , icanti : - - Tempa icameetsataque Tasorentsi . Queario icameetsatasanotini yoca shiramparini . Te ontimeniji irantane .

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Aisati yora amenajeitiriri , iquenqueshirejeitanaca maaroni . Ipiajeitanaja nampitsiqui , yoashirejeitanaca catsini .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Irintiquea yora iojeitiriniri Jesoshi , icatiajeitaca ara aiquetiji , yamenajeitanaque . Ocarajeitiri oca tsinanepee poneachari Carireaqui , tsipatapaacariri chapinqui Jesoshi .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: Ari itimi anta cameetsari shirampari , pajitachari Jose , arimateasati . Otimi Arimatea anta Joreaqui . Ari icarajeitaqueri Jose yora itsipapee pincatsariyetatsiri , yoametavacaapinijeita , iro cantaincha te incoaveteaji irinti impajacotacanteri Jesoshi . Ipincatsataqueri irinti Tasorentsi , yaamaajeitacari impoque impincatsariventajeiteri maaroni atiri .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: Ari ijataque iriori , yameniri Pirato , icantaqueri : - - Nocoaque pishinetenari Jesoshini , naanajeri . Icantiri : - - Ari , pijatequeti , paanajeri .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Impoiji yoaniireajiri , yapinaicacotaqueri tocoyaqui , cameetsamaotatsiri . Yaanajiri anta oninta mapi , ora iroaquera imoqueeti , yominqueapaaqueri tsompoinaqui . Tecatsi itsipa iroyeete anta omoroquinta .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Tempa irootaque Viereneshi icamantacari Jesoshi . Yovetsicajeitaquero atiri paitapeerica , tempa irotaintsi saavaro imaoreajeitantari .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Ora tsinanepee oijatacojeitiri Jesoshi , amenacojeitaqueri yaajeitanaqueri omoroqui , anta yoajeitaqueri tsompoina .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Impoiji opiajeitanaja anta ovancoqui . Ovetsicapaaquero casancajari aisati pashini casancatatsiri . Impoiji saavaro omaoreajeitanaque , omoncarataquero isanquenare Moishishi .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Ari otomincotamanaji , tsiteniquera ojatamanaque tsinane anta yoyeetaquerinta Jesoshi . Aanaquero casancajari ovetsicaqueri . Oijatanaquero otsipapee tsinane .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Ari yoyeetaqueri chapinqui omoroqui antearo mapi , itsinacacoyeetanaqueri omoroqui . Iro cantaincha areevetapaacaro oneapaatiiro tivironcaja oni .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Oqueashivetapaacari Jesoshi omoroqui , iro cantaincha te oneapeeriji Avincatsarite .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Te iojeiteji paitarica onquenqueshirejeiteri . Impoiji imapocashitapaacaro apite shirampari , icatiimotapaacaro quempeji . Oshipaquireamaotanaque iitsaare .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Oshequi otsaroacaavacari , oivotasanotanaca . Isampitapaaquero : - - 多 Paita picoantariri aneatsiri aca ? Aca yoyeetapinitiri camasanoyetatsiri .

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Te aneajeriji Jesoshi aca , tempa tinaanaja ini . Pinquenqueshiretero icamantitaquempiri anta Carireaqui .

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: Tempa icamantitaquempi : " Noponeaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Coajica irayena caari quemisantatsi , impajacotena coroshiqui . Oncarate mava quitaiteri ari nontinaanaje aisati " . Meeca omoncarataca icamantitaquempiniri .

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Impoiji oquenqueshiretasanotaquero icamantitacaroniri Jesoshi .

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: Opianaja nampitsiqui , ocamantapaaqueri iroamerepee aisati itsipapee quemisantatsiri .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Opajita oca tsinanepee Maria ora maquitarasato , Joana , Maria iriniro Santiaco ; aisati otimi otsipapee tsinane .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Iro cantaincha te irishiretearoji yora quemisantatsiri oca ocamantavetapaacariri , ijitashijeiveta te ioteji .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Iro cantaincha iriori Petero ishianaca anta omoroqui yoajeivetacarinta chapinqui Jesoshi . Yamenapaaquero tsompoina , ineapaaquero tocoya yapinaicacotantavetacariri . Impoiji ipianaja pancotsiqui , oshequi iquenqueshiretanaca .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Impoiji ijatanaque apite iroamere Jesoshi anta Emaoshiqui . Ariorica imponeaquea Jerosarequi , ocarati 11 quirometoro irareetanteari nampitsiqui .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Ari iquenanaque , iquenquetsatavacaajeitaca . Iquenquetsatacotaqueri jaoca icanteetiri Jesoshi , aisati maaroni yantayetiri iriori .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Ari iquenanaque , icantavacaanaca , irosati itsipajeitantacari Jesoshi , quiso yoanaqueri anta avotsiqui .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Ineajeivetacari , iro cantaincha te irishineteriji Tasorentsi iriojeitajeri .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Ari isampitiri Jesoshi : - - Incaranqui , piquenantacari avotsiqui , 多 paita picantavacaimentacari ? 多 Paita poashirejeitantacari ?

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Ari ipajita aparoni Quereojashi , yacanaqueri iriori : - - Iojeitaque maaroni jerosaresati : 多 paita caari piotanta avirori ?

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Isampitiri : - - 多 Paitaquea ? Yacanaqueri : - - 多 Tempa pinquemacoteri Jesoshini , yora nasaretesati ? Iquenquetsatacaapinijeitanaroni irineane Tasorentsi aisati oshequi itasoncantapiniyetini . Ineacameetsataqueri Tasorentsi aisati noneacameetsajeitaqueri narori .

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Yaajeitaqueri yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserote aisati avincatsaritepee . Icantajeiti te incameetsateji , ipajacotacantaqueri , icamaque toren .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Nojijeivetaca irio oavisacojeiteenemeri , pincatsariventajeiteenemeri . Meeca ocarataque mava quitaiteri icamantacari .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Ocarajeitaquena aparopee tsinane jatamanatsiri incaranqui anta noavetacarinta . Opiaja , omapocapaaquena ,

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: ocamantapaaquena : " Te noneapaajeriji Jesoshini , te aneajeriji . Irintiquea noneapaaque inampirepee Tasorentsi , icantaquena iriori : ' Tinaanaja Jesoshi ' " . Irootaque ocantaquenari .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Impoiji ishiayetanaca aparopee anta , ineaquero ocantaquenari tsinanepee : irintiquea Jesoshi , te irineeriji .

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Impoiji icantaqueri Jesoshi : - - Te aneajeroji piojeitantari , pitseencaqueri yora quenquetsatirori irineane Tasorentsi . Te pinquemisantajeiteriji .

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: Tempa icantajeiti irijivate Quirishito inquematsicataquearo maaroni oca , impoijiquea impincatsaritasanotanaque .

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Ari yoametasanojeitanaqueri Sanquenarentsi , itsoteaquero maaroni quenquetsatacotiriri iriori . Ijivataqueneri isanquenare Moishishini , impoiji yoamejeitiri isanquenare itsipapee quenquetsatacantajeitatsiniri .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Ari yareejeitapaaca nampitsiqui , iravisanajeme Jesoshi ,

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: iro cantaincha icantaqueri itsipapee : - - Eirota pijatita , pisavicapee novancoqui . Ishaavijiiteanaji , irotaintsi ontsitenijencaitete . Ari ijatapainti ivancoqui iriori .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Impoiji itsipatavacaajeitaca , yoajeitaca . Impoiji yaaquero Jesoshi tanta , ipasonquitiri Tasorentsi , impoiji ipajeitaqueri itsipapee .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Irosati iquenqueshireantanaja , iojeitavajiri . Impoiji imapocanaja Jesoshi , ipeanaja .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Icantavacaajeitanaca : - - Tempa ocameetsatasanotaque icantaqueeri anta avotsiqui . Oshequi aquenqueshiretaquero , aquimoshireventasanotaquero .

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Irosati ijajeitantanaja , ipiajeitanaja Jerosarequi . Ineapaaqueri yora iroamereni Jesoshi , icarataji 11 , itsipajeitacari itsipapee quemisantatsiri , yapatojeitaca .

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: Icantajeitavaqueri yora savicajeitatsiri : - - Quearioteemi : itinaasanotanaja Avincatsarite . Ineaqueri Shimo .

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Irosati icamantantapaacari : - - Aisati narori , noneajeitaqueri anta avotsiqui , cameetsa catsini yoametaquena , iro cantaincha te nioveteariji . Impoiji anta novancoqui icarajaquero tanta , ipaquenaro , irosati niotantajari .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Ari ainirojeitatsi iriori anta pancotsiqui , iquenquetsatavacaajeitaca , irosati imapocantapaajari Jesoshi , icatiimojeitapaajari nianqui . Icantapaajiri : - - Pinquimoshirejeitanaque , maaroni .

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Yoajeitanaqueri cavaco , te iriojeitavaqueriji , ijitashijeivetavacari camaari . Itsaroajeitanaque .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Isampitapaaqueri : - - 多 Paita pitsaroacantanari ? 多 Paita pitseencajeitantanari ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Pamenajeitero naco aisati noiti oqueanaquena quiravo . Narotaque pocajantsiri . Jentsite , pimpamijeitena piojeitantenari . Pineaquena , otimi novatsa aisati notonqui , te nonquempeteariji camaari .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Irosati yonijantajeitacari iraco aisati iiti .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Iro cantaincha tequera irishiretasanoteari itinaanaja . Iquimoshirejeivetaca , iro cantaincha itseencashirejeitaque . Icantiri Jesoshi : - - 多 Timatsimpa avajeiteari ?

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Ari ipavaqueri shima shincorentsi ,

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: yoacari . Iriorijei yamenashejeitaqueri , sorerere .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Impoiji icantajeitaqueri : - - Tempa chapinqui nocamantaquempi : " Oshequi nonquematsicataquearo , iroyeetena . Aitaque omoncarataquea maaroni isanquenatacotitaquenaniri Moishishini , aisati yora quenquetsatacaantatsiniri , aisati yora pampoyeaventajeitiriniri Tasorentsi " . Meeca moncarataca .

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Impoiji yoametasanojeitaqueri ocantayetiri Sanquenarentsi ,

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: icantajeitaqueri : - - Tempa ocanti Sanquenarentsi : " Incamaque Quirishito , oncarate mava quitaiteri ari intinaanaje aisati .

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: Inquenquetsatacoyeeteri maaroni quipatsipeequi , irijivate aca Jerosarequi : inquemacojeitaqueri maaroni atiri . Incamantajeiteri atiri : ' Pinquenqueshirejeitanaquea , pojocajeitajero caari cameetsatatsi pantajeitiri . Paventeari Tasorentsi iroavisacotantempiri ' " .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Ari pineajeitaquero meeca omoncarataca isanquenatacotitaquenaniri peerani .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: Meeca nontianquempiro icashiacaaquempiri Apa : ompocashitempi Ishire , quiso oajeitantempiri . Pisavicavaqueta aca nampitsiqui irosati ompocanteari . Impoiji irimatacaajeitempi Tasorentsi pantajeitantearori paitapeerica incoacaayempiri .

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Impoiji yora Jesoshi yaajeitanaqueri iroamerepee anta Vetaniaqui . Ari anta nianqui , yacotanaque Jesoshi , iquenquetsatacairi iriri , icantiri : - - Apa , jeri yoca noamereca : pintasoncaventajeiteri , poveshireacaajeiteari .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Irosati yovancantanaja inquitequi , ipeanaja .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Oshequi ipincatsajeitaqueri , impoiji ipiajeitanaja Jerosarequi , iquimoshirejeitanaque catsini .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Ijatapinitaque anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi icantapinijeitaque : - - Tempa icameetsataque Tasorentsi . Ari ocarati . Narotaque sanquenatirori :

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Iriotaque Quirishito intasanotarori itimi : irio Ashitarori Irineane oamejeitaqueeri . Itsipatarini Tasorentsi , tempa Tasorentsi ini iriori .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Itsipatarini peerani iriori .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Iriotaque vetsicajeitirori maaroni , paitaricapee . Tecatsi timashiyetachane : eirome itimime eiro ovetsicayetame timayetaintsiri .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Iriotaque oaneajeitaqueeri , quitaitetacojeitaqueeri : tempa iotacaajeitaquee jaoca icantari Tasorentsi .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Peerani te ayojeiveitearini , oquempetimoveiteeni atimini tsiteniriqui ; impoiji ipocapaaque , iotacaajeitapaaquee , meeca oquempetimotaquee iquitaitetacojeitaquee . Meeca eiro atimajitsi aisati tsiteniriqui .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Ari itimaveitani aparoni shirampari pajitachari Joa , itiancane Tasorentsi .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Iquenayetanaque , icamantacoyetapaaqueri yora quitaitetacojeitaqueeri , iquemisantajeitantariri maaroni atiri . Yora Joa caari ini quitaitetacotantatsi , irointiquea ineaqueri aisati iquenquetsatacotaqueri . Irootaque itiancantacariri Tasorentsi .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Ari impoiji ipocapaaque aca quipatsiqui yora quitaitetacotasanotantatsiri irinti , iotacaajeitaquee arori , aisati iriori maaroni savicajeitatsiri .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Ari itimapaaque quipatsiqui , oca yovetsicaqueri peerani , iro cantaincha te iriojeitavaqueriji atiri , yora yovetsicajeivetacari .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Ipocavetapaaca inampiqui , ishanincavetapaacari joriopee , iro cantaincha te iraacameetsajeitavaqueriji .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Irintiquea aacameetsatavaqueriri , yora quemisantajeitavaqueriri : itasoncacoventajeitaqueri , ipeajeitajiri itomi Tasorentsi .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Iriotaque Tasorentsi tomintajeitaqueeri arori , aisati maaroni quemisantajeitiriri iriori . Te inquempeteariji ashijeitaqueeri aca quipatsiquica , itimacaajeitiro irinti ijina itomi . Aisati tecatsi ancantajeite arori : " Nompeajeata nainti itomi Tasorentsi " , eiro amatirotsi . Tempa icoashita irinti , irootaque itomintajeitantaqueeri , maaroni .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Tempa Tasorentsi ini yora Ashitarori Irineane : iponeanaca inquitequi , yatiritapaaque , itimimojeitapaaquee aca quipatsiqui . Yashi yoiro ineshinoncajeitaquee , queariotasanotaque oca yoamejeitaqueeri . Noneajeitavaqueri narori ipincatsaritasanotaque , iquempetacari Tasorentsi ; tempa iriotaque itomi irapintite .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Yora Joa icamantacotaqueri Quirishito , icantajeitaqueri atiri : - - Jeri yoca nocamantacotaqueri chapinqui : " Yanaacotaquena impoitapeenaneri , ipincatsaritasanoti irinti . Te nompincatsariteji narori . Tequerani nontimeni narori , itimitani irinti " .

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Yashi yoiro ineshinoncatantaque Quirishito , irootaque ineshinoncatanteeri arori . Aiquero ijatatii ineshinoncajeitaquee .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Peerani yora Moishishini , isanquenatironi oca peranajeitaqueeri ; irintiquea Quirishito ineshinoncajeitaquee , queariotasanotaque maaroni yoamejeitaqueeri .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Tecatsi atiri neerine Tasorentsi , apaniro irinti ineiri itomi irapintite . Iquempetacari iriri , tempa quiso yoitarini , irootaque iotantacariri : meeca yoamejeitaquee jaoca icantari .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Yora joriopee jerosaresati itiancayetaqueri saserotepee , jeri ishanincapeeni Irevi . Itiancaqueneri Joa , ari ijataque . Isampitapaaqueri : - - 多 Janicampimpa ? 多 Avirompa Quirishito naamaajeivetacari ?

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Ari te irimanacoteaji . Icamantasanotavaqueri : - - Caarina noni Quirishito .

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Yapiitajiri : - - 多 Queariompa ? 多 Avirompa Iriashini ? - - Caarina . - - 多 Avirompa camantantatsineri naamaajeitacari ? - - Caarina .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Isampitajiri aisati : - - 多 Janicampimpa ? 多 Paitampa noncamantapeeriri tiancaquenari ? 多 Paita pantiri ?

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Icantiri : - - Narotaque iquenquetsatacotiniri peerani Isayashini , tempa isanquenatini : " Coajica impoque camantantatsineri , inquenquetsatapinite anta caaraiteriqui , incante : ' Pinquenqueshireempa , pinquemisanteri Avincatsarite iroameetsatantempiri ' " .

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Ari isampitaqueri : - - 多 Queariompa ? 多 Caarimpimpa Quirishito ? 多 Caarimpimpa Iriashini ? 多 Caarimpimpa yora camantantatsineri naamaajeitacari impoque ? 多 Paitampa pivaotisatantariri ashanincapee ?

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
