text2: Yacanaqueri Joa : - - Iro novaotisatantariri nija . Timatsi meeca pashini shirampari caari piojeiti .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Iriotaque impoitapeenaneri , pincatsaritasanotatsiri ini . Oshequi nopincatsataqueri , te nompincatsateji narori .

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Aitaque icantapinita Joa anta Vetaniaqui . Otimi Vetania intatiqueronta Jorirani . Anta ivaotisatantapinitinta .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Otsipani quitaiteri yamenanaque Joa , ineavaqueri Jesoshi , ipocapaaque . Icantiri atiripee : - - Jeritapaaque ovishatatsiri itiancaqueeneri Tasorentsi . Iriotaque oavisacojeiterineri maaroni atiri caari cameetsatatsi .

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Iriotaque noquenquetsatacotaqueri chapinqui : " Yanaacotaquena impoitapeenaneri , ipincatsaritasanoti irinti . Te nompincatsariteji nainti . Tequerani nontimeni narori , itimitani irinti " .

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Te niovetearini narori , iro cantaincha meeca icoaque Tasorentsi iriojeiteri maaroni ajorioririnte . Irootaque nopocantacari narori novaotisatantayeti .

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Icamantantaji Joa aisati : - - Te niovetearini narori . Iro cantaincha itiancaquena Tasorentsi , icantaquena : " Pivaotisatapiniteri pishaninca nijaqui , poamejeiteri inquenqueshirejeitanaquea . Coajica pineavaquero aniireapee noshire . Janicarica aatapaaqueri , iriotaque yora pajeiterineri atiripee noshire " . Ari impoiji noneavaquero aniireapaaque Ishire Tasorentsi , oponeanaca inquitequi . Oshiavetapaacari sampaquiti : aatapaaqueri Jesoshi .

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Queario noneasanotaquero . Irootaque nocamantacotantacariri : " Iriotaque Itomi Tasorentsi " .

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Oquitaitetamani icatiaja Joa aisati ara , itsipatacari iroamere apite .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Ipampoyeaqueri Jesoshi yaniiti anta avotsiqui . Icanti : - - Jeri yonta ovishatatsiri itiancaqueeri Tasorentsi , iriotaque camimentajeiteeneri oameetsajeitajeeneri .

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Iquemantavacariri iroamere apite , yoijajeitanaqueri Jesoshi .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Ipitsocashitanacari iriori , ineavaqueri yoijatapaaqueri . Icantavaqueri : - - 多 Paita picoiri ? Icantanaqueri : - - 多 Jaoca pisaviquiri maishitoro ? Acantiri maishitoro aneanequi arori : oametantatsiri .

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Ari icantiri : - - Poijatanaquena , nonijayempiro . Irosati yoijajeitantanacari , ineapaaquero ivanco isavicantari . Ari ishavijiiteanaque catsirincaiteri , irosati isaviquimojeitantapaacari .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Ari ipajita aparoni savicapaintsiri Antirishi , iriotaque irirenti Shimo Petero .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Impoiji ijatanaque Antirishi , icoapaaqueri irirenti . Ineantapaacariri , icantapaaqueri : - - Noneaqueri Meshiashi . Acanti Meshiashi aneanequi arori : Quirishito .

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Icantiri : - - Tsame , poijatanaquena , pineapeeri . - - Tsame . Ari yareetacaacari Jesoshiqui . Yamenavaqueri , icantavaqueri : - - Tempa aviro Shimo , itomi Jonashi . Coajica impajiyeetajempi : Sejashi . Acantajeitiri Sejashi aneanequi arori : Petero , mapitatsiri .

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Otsipaniqui quitaiteri ijataque Jesoshi pashiniqui quipatsi . Opajita quipatsi Carirea . Ari ineapaaqueri Jeripi , icantapaaqueri : - - Poijatanaquena .

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Yora Jeripi vetsairasati ini . Vetsaira irootaque inampi Antirishi , jeri Petero .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Jeripi ineapaaqueri Natanaeri . Icamantapaaqueri : - - Noneaqueriyea yora isanquenatacotitacaniri peerani Moishishini . Aisati camantantatsiniri isanquenatacotitajeitacarini iriori . Iriotaque Jesoshi , itomi Jose nasaretesati .

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Icantanaqueri Natanaeri : - - Te incameetsajeiteji nasaretesati . 多 Icameetsatimpa iriori ? Yacanajiri Jeripi : - - Tsame , pamenaiteri , piotanteariri icameetsatirica .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Ari iquempejijeitapaacari Jesoshi , ineavaqueri ipocapaaque , icantiri itsipajeitari : - - Pamenerite yora Natanaeri . Iriotaque quempetasanotariri Ishiraeri : icameetsataque , te irioteji iramatavitante .

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Isampitapaaqueri Natanaeri : - - 多 Jaoca picantacari piotantavaquenari nocameetsati ? Yacanaqueri Jesoshi : - - Noneitaquempi anta pitsititaro iyera , tequerata incamantempi Jeripi .

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Icantaqueri : - - Tempa aviro itomi Tasorentsi : pitsoteaquero maaroni , pioyetiro . Avirotaque pincatsariventerineri joriopee .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Icantiri Jesoshi : - - Pamene , incaranqui nocantaquempi : " Noneitaquempi pitsititaro iyera " . 多 Irootaquempa piquemisantantaquenari ? Ari pineaquero coajicani nontasoncantasanoyetanaque , impoijiquea pinquemisantasanotanaquena .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Queario oca nocantimpiri . Aitaque pineaquero coajica inquite tsompoina . Pineaqueri inampire Tasorentsi iraniireashitena , iroancanajea aisati . Tempa naro poneachari inquitequi , natiritapaaque .

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Avisanaque mava quitaiteri , aitaque iquimoshirejeitanaque canasati . Otimi Cana Carireaqui . Yoveshireimentajeitacari aparoni shirampari aatsiri ijina . Ainiro iroori iriniro Jesoshi .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Ari icajemacanteetaqueri aisati Jesoshi , aisati narori , jeri aisati itsipapee iroamerepee .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Ari nirajeitapaaque ovaja ; nocarajeitaqueri itsipapee pocajeitatsiri . Otsaatapaaca , te ontimeji aisati . Iriniro Jesoshi ocantiri otomi : - - Te aneajeroji ovaja : 多 arimpa pimataquero pamitacoteri ?

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Icantiro : - - 多 Paita , ina , picantantanari ? Tequeratsita omoncarateaji nontasoncantayete .

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Iro cantaincha ocantiri nampirentsi : - - Pinquemisanteriyea paitarica imperanataquempiri .

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Onaque ara chomo , ocarati 6 . Yovetsiqueetiro mapi , antearo oni . Irootaque onantari nija iquivapinitantari joriopee .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Jesoshi icantajeitiri nampirentsi : - - Pisaje nija chomoquira . Isajeitanaque , ijaajeitaquero .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Irosati icantantanacariri : - - Pinquite meeca . Paacotanaqueneri peranatimpiri . Yaacojeitanaqueneri .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Ineantavacarori , opeanaja ovaja aisati . Te irioteji peranatariri nampirentsi jaoca oquenacotapaajiri . Irinti iotaintsi nampirentsi quitaquerori nija . Irosati icajemantacariri aatsiri ijina .

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: Icantiri : - - Tempa iro ajivatapinitiri cameetsajari ovaja . Ariorica ashinquijeitanaquea ompocacotapee masancajari . Aitaque ocantari amejeitari . Aviroyeata quempoyeaquerori cameetsajari . Iroaquera meeca pamacantajiro aisati .

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Otimi Cana anta Carireaqui . Ijivataque Jesoshi anta itasoncantaque . Nocarajeitaqueri itsipapee iroamerepee noneajeitaquero , irosati noshirejeitantanacariri .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Irosati noirincantajeitanaca Caperenaoqui . Itsipatanacaro Jesoshi iriniro , irirentipee , narori , itsipapee iroamerepee aisati . Nomaajeitanaque anta aparopee quitaiteri .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Irotimataintsi quitaiteri iquimoshirejeitantapinitari joriopee , ipajiyeetiro : yavisantaniri . Iro iquenqueshiretiri quitaiteri peerani yavisantaniri inampire Tasorentsi anta Ejipitoqui : te iroyeriji itomipee jorio , irinti yoaque itomipee ejipitosati . Ari itoncaanaque Jesoshi Jerosarequi . Nocarajeitanaqueri itsipapee iroamerepee , noijajeitanaqueri .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Noneajeitapairi ivancoqui Tasorentsi pimantajeitiriri vaca , ovisha , sampaquiti , maaroni . Isavicajeitaque ara pinavacaayetariri atiri iirequite .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Ari yampitsataquero Jesoshi iviritsa impasatanteariri vaca . Irosati yoimisoquijacantajeitacariri ovisha , vaca , maaroni . Ipitamonquitaqueri imesatepee pinavacaariri iirequite , itequitaqueri iirequite .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Icantiri pimantajeitiriri sampaquiti : - - Poimisoquijajeitajeri yoca . Eiro pipimantayetitsi aca ivancoquica Apa .

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Irosati noquenqueshireantajeitanajarori isanquenatitacaniri : " Icanti Quirishito : ' Nontsaneacotearo , Apa , pivanco ; irootaque iroimenteetenari coajicani ' " .

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Icantanaque jorio : - - 多 Paita pantantarori oca ? 多 Paita pinijayenari niojeitantempiri avirorica Tasorentsi ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Yacanaqueri Jesoshi : - - Pintireajerorica oca ivancoca Tasorentsi , ari oncarate mava quitaiteri novetsicajero aisati .

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Irosati icantantanacari : - - Ocarati 46 osarintsi yovetsicanteetacarori pancotsica . 多 Ariompa oncarate mava quitaiteri povetsicantajearori avinti ?

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Ja , irisati shiacantaincha . Tempa iriotaque shiaquerori ivanco Tasorentsi , tempa quiso yoaqueri .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Icamanaque , ocarataque mava quitaiteri itinaantanajari aisati . Impoiji , aitaque noquenqueshireajeitanajiro oca ishiacantaqueri . Aisati niotanaquero oquenquetsatacotaqueniri peerani sanquenarentsi , moncarataca meeca maaroni oquenquetsatacotaqueriniri .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Areetapaaja aisati yavisantaniri , iquimoshirejeitantari . Itimapaaji Jesoshi Jerosarequi , oshequi itasoncantayetapaaque . Ineayetaqueri atiri , irootaque iquemisantantajeitacariri oshequi .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Yora Jesoshi ioti jaoca icantashirejeitari maaroni atiri , irootaque yaamaventantanacari : " Yayeetanacari " .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Iojeitaqueri atiri jaoca ocantajeitari iquenqueshirejeitiri . Iotashitaca , tecatsi camanterineri .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Itimini aparoni shirampari pincatsariventiriri joriopee , ipajita Nicoremo . Variseo ini .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Ari yananincashitanaqueri Jesoshi , icantapairi : - - Niotaquempi , oametanari , piponeaca Tasorentsiqui ; irootaque pipocantacari , poamejeitapeena . Eirome itsipatimpime Tasorentsi , eirome pitasoncantime .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Icantiri Jesoshi : - - Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri : yora caari apiitajanchane intimaje , tecatsi incantea irijate anta ipincatsaritinta Tasorentsi .

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Icantiri iriori Nicoremo : - - Ariorica anteashiparitanaje , 多 jaoca ancantajeari antimaje aisati ? 多 Arimpa amatajearo ampianajero otsomontequi anironi ontimacotantajeeri aisati ?

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Yacanajiri : - - Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri . Maaroni caari vaotisatajachane nijaqui , aisati maaroni caari ontimaje Ishire Tasorentsi , tecatsi incantea irareetea anta ipincatsaritinta Tasorentsi .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Tsinane , ariorica ontimeri otomi , irishanincatajeari iriri . Aisati oquempevetaca Ishire Tasorentsi : ariorica ontimajeri atiri , irishanincatajeari Tasorentsi .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Ariorica noncantempi : " Pampiitajea pintimaje " , eiro poanatsi cavaco .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Jaocarica oninti , ojeaoncaque tampea , piquemavaquero opoimatapaaque , sooo . Iro cantaincha te pioteji jaoca oquenapaaqueri , aisati te pioteji jaocarica ojateri . Aisati iquempeyevetaro maaroni otimajiri Ishire Tasorentsi .

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Icantajiri Nicoremo : - - 多 Jaoca ocantari oca pishiacantanari ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Yacanajiri iriori Jesoshi : - - 多 Caarimpimpa oamejeitiriri ajorioririntepee ? 多 Paita caari piotantavacaro oca nocantimpiri ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri : nocamantacotiro nioyetiri aisati noneayetiri , iro cantaincha te pinquemisanteroji nocamantayevetimpiri .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Jero noquenquetsavetimpiro ineeyetiri aca quipatsiquica , iro cantaincha te pinquemisantenaji . Nonquenquetsatempirome timayetatsiri inquitequi , 多 arimpa pinquemisantaquename ?

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: Aitaque noponeari narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque ; coajica nompianaje aisati . Noquenquetsatacotirorica inquite , niotaquero nocantaqueri .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Peerani anta caaraiteriqui yatsicajeitaqueri ashanincani oshequi maranquepee . Ari icantirini Tasorentsi : " Pishiacanteri maranque , poatiacoteri inchaquiiqui iramenajeitanteariri atiripee , eiroquea icamajeitantatsi maaroni amenajeiterineri " . Ari yoatiacotaqueri Moishishi , yavisacojeitantajari oshequi atiri . Aisati narori iroatiacoyeetaquena , coajica .

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: Maaroni quemisantenaneri incantaitatiyempani iraneajeitanaje anta inquitequi .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: Inintasanojeitiri Tasorentsi maaroni atiri , irootaque itiancantaquenari aca quipatsiqui . Narotaque itomi irapintite . Incantaitatiyempani iraneajeitapaaje inquitequi maaroni quemisantajeitanari ; eiro catsini ijatitsi ishaaviji maaroni quemisantajeitanari .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Te iro intiancantena Apa noasanquetaajeiteri atiripee , irointi itiancantaquena noavisacojeiteri .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: Eiro yashinoncaajeitatsi maaroni quemisantanari . Iro cantaincha iroasanquetaajeitaqueri Apa maaroni caari quemisantana . Iro iroasanquetaanteariri , itseencajeitana .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Nopoqui noamejeiteri atiri jaoca icantari Tasorentsi aisati iriotanteari intimajeite cameetsa : oquempevetaca noquitaitetacovetacari atiri . Iro cantaincha yantapinijeitiro caari cameetsatatsi , te incoajeiteji iriojeitero oca noamejeivetacariri ; oquempetaca inintasanojeitiro tsiteniri irointi . Te incoajeiteji intimajeite quitaiteriqui , icantajeiti : " Ineiteerocari Tasorentsi antayetiri , yoasanquetayeecari " .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Yora antajeitirori caari cameetsatsi iquisajeitana . Te incoajeiteji impocashitena : iotaque nonijaantiteri caari cameetsatatsi yantajeitiri , irootaque caari ipocashitantana inquemisantena .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Antirori cameetsayetatsiri , iriotaque pocashitanari irinti . Nonijayetiri ocameetsajeitaque yantayetaqueri . Tempa irio Tasorentsi antacaajeitiriri cameetsayetatsiri , irootaque caari ipashiventanta ipocashitana . Irootaque icantaqueriri Jesoshi Nicoremo .

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Irosati ijatantanaja Jesoshi Joreaqui , nocarajeitanaqueri itsipapee iroamerepee , noijajeitanaqueri . Nosavicajeitapaaji anta , novaotisatantapaaji .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Aisati iriori Joa , ivaotisatanti aisati Ainoqui , oquempejitaro Sarimi . Oshequitapai nija anta . Ijatashijeitanaqueri oshequi atiri irivaotisatanteariri .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Tequeratsita iroiminqueeteriji Joa . Yora iroamere , ipiatsatacari aparoni jorio . Iro ipiatsatavacaimentari jaoca ancantajeitajeari ancameetsajeitantajeari .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Irosati ipocashitantapaacari Joa iroamere , icantapaaqueri : - - Oametanari , jeri ivaotisatanti yoranqui pitsipatariranqui chapinqui intatiqueronta Jorirani . Yoranqui picantiri Quirishito . Irootaque ijatashijeitantanacariri maaroni atiri , meeca yojocajeitanaquee arori . 多 Paitaquea ?

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Yacanaqueri Joa : - - Tecatsi amatashitea arori , irintiquea Tasorentsi jenoquisati matacayeerori maaroni cameetsayetatsiri .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Piquemajeitaquena nocantaqueri chapinqui : " Caarina noni Quirishito . Itiancaquena Tasorentsi nojivataqueri " .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Yora aintsiri ijina , iriotaque aasanotirori . Yora ishaninca icarajeitiri inquimoshireimenteari inquemavaqueririca irineanate . Aisati meeca noquempetari narori . Oshequi noquimoshireimentasanotanaqueri iriori Jesoshi .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Aiquero ijatatii ipincatsaritasanotanaque irinti . Narori , te :

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: eiro nopincatsarititsi . Yoraquea poneachari jenoqui ipincatsariventasanotanti irinti . Aroquea quipatsisati ashanincatasanojeitari savicajeitatsiri quipatsiqui , te ampincatsarijeiteji . Aquenquetsatacotiro oca aneayetiri aca quipatsiqui .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Yora poneachari inquitequi icamantacoyetiro paitarica ineayetiri aisati iquemayetiri anta . Iro cantaincha te intimasanoveteaji quemisantasanotavaqueroneri icantaqueri .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Irintiquea maaroni quemisantavaquerori , ioti irinti otampaticatasanotaque maaroni icantiriri Tasorentsi .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Iriotaque Tasorentsi tianquiriri Jesoshi , meeca yoametapaaqueero irineane . Yora Tasorentsi te intsaneemparoji Ishire , quiso oajeitaquee .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Apa jenoquisati inintiri Itomi , itiancaqueeri ipincatsariventajeitee maaroni .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Maaroni quemisantajeiterineri Itomi Tasorentsi incantaitatiyempani iranee inquitequi . Eiro ijatitsi inquitequi caari quemisanterine irinti , irosati incantatiyempani Tasorentsi inquisheri irinti .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: Yora variseopee iquemacotaqueri Jesoshi , icantajeitiri atiri : - - Jesoshi yanaacotiri Joa yoametanti . Oshequi iquemisantacaaqueri atiri , oshequi ivaotisatanti . Te iri Jesoshi vaotisaterine atiri , narojeitaque nainti iroamerepee vaotisatantatsiri . Iotaque Avincatsarite icantaqueri variseopee ,

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: yojocanajiro Jorea , ipianaja aisati Carireaqui .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Iquenanaji Jesoshi Samariaqui , noijatanaqueri narori . Nareejeitapaacaro nampitsi samariaquiniri pajitachari Shicari . Oquempejitaro iipatsiteni Jacovoni : oca ipaqueriniri itomini Jose .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Otimi ara iiyanareni Jacovoni . Imaotapaaque Jesoshi , tempa noponeajeitaca arejiqui . Isaviquimotapaaquero iriori iiyanareni . Irotimataintsi intampaticate catsirincaiteri .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Irosati opocantapaaca tsinane samariasato , onquitaate nija . Icantavaquero Jesoshi : - - Pimpacotena nire .

text: ( For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat . )
text2: Notsipatacari itsipapee iroamerepee , nojajeitapainti nampitsiqui namanantapaintiro noyeari .

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Ocantiri : - - 多 Caarimpimpa jorio ? 多 Paita pamanantanari nija ? Samariasato noni . Te iraacameetsajeiteriji jorio samariasati , irootaque ocantantacariri .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Yacanaquero Jesoshi : - - Te pioteji paitarica inintacaaquempiri Tasorentsi nomatempiri . Aisati te piotenaji narori , janicanarica . Nocantaquempi : " Pimpacotena nireta " . Iro cantaincha piotaquename , pincantaquename avinti : " Aviro avinti penaneri nireri " . Irosati nompashitantempirome nija oaneantatsiri .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Ocantanaqueri : - - Tecatsi pinquitaatanteari . Tsompoina oni nija . 多 Jaoca payerori oca nija ovaneantatsiri ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: 多 Panaacotirimpa yora Jacovoni , quianatironiri oca iiyanareni ? Irironi nijaca , irajeitironi itomipee iriori , aisati ivira . Irosati meeca nirajeitiro narori . Ocameetsajataque nijaca : 多 pijitimpa ari pimpajena nija anaacoteroneri oca ocameetsajati ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Yacanajiro aisati : - - Irimirejeitanaje aisati maaroni irapinitirori oca nija .

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: Irintiquea yora iraqueroneri nija nompaqueriri nainti : eiro imiretajitsi aisati . Ora nija nomperiri amotoapaaque ishirequi , irootaque aneacaajerine incantaitatiyempani .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Ocantanajiri tsinane : - - Pimpenaroqueti meeca ora nija picantaquenari , eiroquea nomiretantajatsi . Eiro natsipetajatsi nompocaje nonquitaataje aisati .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Icantanajiro : - - Pijate meeca , pincajemaitenari pijime , pimpiaje aisati .

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Acanajiri : - - Te intimeji nojime . Icantanajiro : - - Queariotaque picantaquenari : " Te intimeji nojime " .

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: Icarajeitaque pijime paavetacari apapacoroni . Yora pitsipatari meeca caari ini pijime . Queario picantaquena .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Ocantanajiri : - - Aviroyeata camantantatsiri : aparo meeca nosampitempi .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Aca toncaariqui iquemisantapinijeitiri noshaninca Tasorentsi . Avirojei jorio , picantajeiti avirori cameetsa anquemisantajeite Jerosarequi . 多 Paitaquea anashitavacantacari ?

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Icantanajiro : - - Pinquemisantero oca noncamantempiri meeca . Coajica eiro piquenqueshiretajirotsi jaocarica pinquemisanteriri Tasorentsi . Atsipetashita aquenqueshiretashitaro jaoca anquemisanteri , irointi cameetsatasanotatsiri anquenqueshiretero janica aquemisantiri .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Avirojei samariasati te piojeiveteariji yora piquemisantajeivetari . Narojei , jorio , niojeitiri nainti janica noquemisantajeitiri . Jorio irine oavisacotantatsineri .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Moncarataca pinquemisantasanojeiteri Apa : pincoaquerica , ari amitacojeitempi Ishire Tasorentsi , oametempiro quearioyetatsiri . Aitaque icoaque Apa inquemisantajeiteri maaroni coyeroneri Ishire oamejeiteri .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Te ontimeji ivatsa Tasorentsi , irointi Ishire . Coatsiri inquemisanteri Tasorentsi inquemisantasanotero Ishire iriotantearori quearioyetatsiri .

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Ocantanajiri : - - Niotaque impoque Meshiashi , yora icanteetiri Quirishito . Irareetapeemparica iriotacaajeitapaajee maaroni .

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Icantanaquero : - - Narotaque nainti Quirishito neanataquempirica .

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Irootaque icantaquerori Jesoshi . Irosati narori , nocarajeitiri itsipapee iroamerepee , nareejeitapaaja . Noneapaaqueri iquenquetsatacairo tsinane , noajeitapaaque cavaco . Iro cantaincha te nosampitapeeri : " 多 Paita picantirori tsinane ? 多 Paita piquenquetsatacantarori ? " Namenashitapaacari .

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Irosati ojocantanacaro ochomone , ojatanaque nampitsiqui . Ocamantapairi onampiquiniri :

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: - - Tsame , poijajeitanaquena . Nonijayempiri shirampari cantaquenari maaroni , paitarica nantayetiniri . Irioyeata Quirishito .

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Irosati yoijajeitantacaro irameneri Jesoshi .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Irosatiquera nonajeitaque iiyanareniqui , nocantavetari Jesoshi : - - Oametanari , poyea .

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Icantana : - - Timatsi noari narori caari piojeiti avinti .

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Irosati nocantavacaajeitantanaca : - - 多 Yameetinirimpa yoari ?

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Icantanaquena : - - Nantiniri tiancaquenari inintacaanari : oquempetimotaquena noaca , te meeca nonquemeroji notashe .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Ariorica pipanquitiro pivanquire , tempa picantavacaajeita : " Itsipasatinivani cashiri aajeitantearori avanquire " . Pinquemisantajeitero noncamantajeitempiri meeca : piotavaquero noshiacantempiri . Pamenajeitero panquirentsi : sampatanaque ,

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: moncarataca iraanteetearori . Impinateri ashitarori , impoiji inquimoshirejeitanaque : yora ashitarori , aisati iratiritepee , maaroni . Aviro noshiacantiri aayetirori , irio Tasorentsi ashitarori . Ariorica pinquemisantacayeri atiri impinatempi , aisati incantaitatiyempani iranee maaroni pinquemisantacaajeiteri . Irampatojeiteri Tasorentsi maaroni irioriqui , anquimoshirejeitantajeari , maaroni .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Queariotaque oca icantapiniyeetiri : " Yora panquitaquerori , eiro yaayetirotsi ; irinti pashini aajeroneri " .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Notiancajeitaquempi nainti paajeitantearori caari pipanquiti avirori . Timatsi pashini panquitaquerori , pimpoijeitajeri avirori . Ari pimoncaratavacaajeitaca pantajeitaquero nocoacaajeitaquempiri .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Irosati areetantajari tsinane aisati maaroni oijajeitaquerori . Iro ipocajeitantacari ishirejeitavacaro ocantapaaqueriri tsinane . Ocantapaaqueri onampipeequiniri incaranqui : " Icantaquena Jesoshi maaroni , paitarica nantayetiri : irioyeata Quirishito " . Irootaque iquemisantajeitantanacariri Jesoshi oshequi .

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Irosati ipocashijeitantacari , icantapairi : - - Pisaviquimotanaquenatsita . Ari isavicanaque apite quitaiteri ,

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: iquenquetsatacaanaqueri . Iquemisantasanojeitanaqueri oshequi .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Icantajeitaquero tsinane : - - Noquemisantavetacaro picantaquenari , iro cantaincha meecaquea noquemasanotaqueri iriori Jesoshi , irootaque niojeitantacari queario oni picantaquenari . Iriotaque oavisacojeiteeneri . Iriotaque yoca Quirishito .

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Ari apite imaaque Jesoshi anta , irosati ijatantanajari . Ijatanaji aisati Carireaqui . Narori , noijajeitanaqueri .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Jero oca icantapinitiri Jesoshi : " Te impincatsatasanoteriji yora inampipeequiniri camantantatsiri , irointi itseencapinitiri ishanincasanori " .

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Ari nareejeitapaaja Carireaqui . Yaacameetsajeitavaqueri carireasati irinti . Ijajeitanaque chapinqui iriori anta Jerosarequi , iquimoshirejeitinta . Aitaque anta ineayetaquero yantayetiri Jesoshi . Irootaque meeca ineacameetsajeitantacariri .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Ipianaja aisati Jesoshi Canaqui : ora carireaquiniri . Anta chapinqui ipeaquero nija ovaja . Itimaiti Caperenaoqui pincatsari , yojoquiitaca itomi .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Iquemacotavaqueri Jesoshi , iponeanaja Joreaqui , yareetapaaja Carireaqui . Ari ijatashitanaqueri , icantapairi : - - Irotaintsi incame notomi . Tsame poavisacotajantenari .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Icantaqueri Jesoshi atiripee : - - Eirorica notasoncantayeti , 多 ariompa pinquemisantajeitena ? Aitaque picantajeitari avirori , pitseencajeiti .

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Icantanajiri aisati : - - Intsipaite apa , pijate novancoqui . Icamicari notomi .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Icantanaqueri : - - Pijataje meeca . Eiro icamitsi pitomi , aitaque iravisacotaje . Iquemisantaqueri icantaqueriri , ijatanaji .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Nianqui itonquiotavacari inampirepee , icantavajiri : - - Avisacotanaji pitomi .

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Irosati isampitantavacari : - - 多 Jaoca ocaratiri yavisacotantajari ? Yacanajiri : - - Oshaiteji , itaanaji catsirincaiteri , aitaque opeanaja iyatsiire .

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Iquenqueshireanajiro aitaque icaratiri catsirincaiteri icantantacariri Jesoshi : " Eiro icamitsi pitomi " . Ari iquemisantanaque iriori . Aisati iquempejeitaja maaroni ishaninca , iquemisantajeitaji .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Ari meeca isaviqui Jesoshi Carireaqui , iponeanaja chapinqui Joreaqui . Ocarati meeca apite itasoncantaque Jesoshi anta .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Irosati iquimoshirejeitantanaja aisati joriopee . Itoncaanaji Jesoshi Jerosarequi , tonca , tonca .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Otsapiqui nampitsi otimi yoiminqueantapinitariri ovisha . Otimi anta quempeji incajare . Irineanequi Evereo opajita Vetsata . Otimi anta pancotsipee apapacoroni .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Irootaque inariantajeitari joquiijeitachari oshequi . Yapatojeita quitapoajari , mayempiri , choriveetatsiri . Yoyeajeitiro nija oshevajatajea .

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: Yaniireashitapinitiro incajare inampire Tasorentsi . Ishevajatacaapinitaro nija , irosati iqueajatantarori yora joquiijeitachari . Jaocarica itimiri jivatasanotatsiri iqueajataque , yavisacotaji ; opeanaja paitarica oavetariri .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Itimaiti ara aparoni shirampari joquiitachari : ocarati 38 osarintsi yojoquiitantacari .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Ineapaaqueri Jesoshi inariaita . Iotacotapaaqueri aitaque ocaratiri yoshequitaquero osarintsi . Icantiri : - - 多 Picoimpa pavisacotaje ?

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Tecatsi queajatacayenane ariorica oshevajaveta nija . Irointita nopomerentsita narori , irosati yanaacotantanari itsipapee : iqueajatanaque irinti .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Icantanaqueri Jesoshi : - - Pintinaanaje , pajiricajero pinariantaveitari , paniitanaje .

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Irosati yavisacotantanaja . Yajiricanajiro inariantaveitaniri , irosati yaniitantanaja . Irootaque saavaro , quitaiteri imaoreanteetari .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: Irootaque icantajeitantacariri joriopee yora avisacotajantsiri : - - Irootaque meeca quitaiteri amaoreantajeitari . Te oshinetanteaji paanajero meeca pinariantari .

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Yora oavisacotajanari irio cantanari : " Paanajero pinariantaitari , paniitanaje " .

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Irosati icantantanajari : - - 多 Janicampa cantaquempiri ?

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Te irioteji iriori janicarica oavisacotajiriri . Itimaiti ara oshequi atiri , ipeimotanacari Jesoshi .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Impoiji ineajiri aisati anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi . Icantiri : - - Pineaquero , avisacotajimpi meeca . Eiro pantajirotsi aisati caari cameetsatatsi . Apiitajimpicari , omatasanoticari catsini .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Irosati ijatantanaja shirampari . Icamantapaajiri joriopee : - - Irio oavisacotajanari Jesoshi .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Irootaque iquisajeitantanacariri joriopee Jesoshi . Iro icoantacari iroyerime , ineaqueri yoavisacotantaque quitaiteriqui imaoreantajeitari .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Iro cantaincha icantanaqueri : - - Irosati icantani Apa yantayetiro cameetsatatsiri . Aisati noquempetacari narori : 多 paitampa noimpacaantearori saavaroqui ?

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Aiquero catsini icoasanotanaiti iroyerime . Ineaqueri Jesoshi yantaveetantaro quitaiteri imaoreantajeitari . Iquemaqueri aisati icanti : " Iriotaque Apa Tasorentsi " . Irosati icantantanaca joriopee : - - Ijitasorentsitacateemi , te incameetsateji .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Yacanajiri Jesoshi : - - Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri . Naro itomi Tasorentsi . Te nantaveetashiteaji , irointiquea nomoncarayetaquero paitarica noneacotiriri yantiri Apa .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Inintaquena iriori , yoameyetaquenaro maaroni nantayetiri . Coajica irimatacayena nomatasanoyetero catsini nontasoncantayete , poantenari cavaco .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Tempa yoitinaapiniyetiri Apa camayetatsiri , yoaneajiri . Aisati nonquempetea narori , noaneajeri janicarica noncoacayeri .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Eiro icantacoventiritsi Apa atiri , eiro catsini ; irootaque itiancantaquenari nainti noncantacoventanteariri .

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: Icoaque Apa impincatsajeiteri maaroni atiri . Aisati icoacaaquena narori , impincatsajeitena maaroni . Yora caari pincatsatana narori , te impincatsateriji aisati Apa , yora tiancaquenari .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri . Maaroni quemeroneri noneane , ariorica inquemisanteri tiancanari , incantaitatiyempani iraneajeitanaje inquitequi . Eiro yoasanquetairitsi Apa . Incamavetaquea , iro cantaincha iraneanaje aisati .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Queariotaque oca nocantimpiri . Irotimataintsi yora camavetainchari inquemajeitena noneanate : tempa naro Itomi Tasorentsi . Icantaitatiyempani iraneajeitanaje maaroni quemajeitenaneri . Aitaquequea meeca omoncarataca inquemajeitantenari .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Irisati aneashitacha Apa . Aisati icoacaaquena narori nomoncaratacari , narosati aneashitacha narori .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Tempa noponeanaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Irootaque itiancantanari noncantacoventeri maaroni atiri .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: Eiro poajeititsi cavaco . Coajica inquemajeitena noneanate maaroni yora tijajeivetainchari .

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: Aitaque intinaajeitanaje antirori cameetsayetatsiri , iraneajeitanaje aisati . Aisati iriori antayetirori caari cameetsatatsi : intinaajeivetanajea , iro cantaincha noashinoncaasanojeiteri irinti .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: Tecatsi noncantea nantashitearo . Nocantacoventantirica , nomoncarataquero icantanari Apa . Tampatica nocantacoventanti . Te nantashitearoji paitarica nonintiri narori , irointi nantiniri Apa tiancanari inintacaaquenari iriori .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: Aisati icantajeitiri Jesoshi : - - Narosatirica camantacotachaneme apaniro pincanteme : " Te ontampaticateji icantiri " .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Iro cantaincha ainiro pashini camantacotitananiri : yora Joani . Nioti queario oni icamantacotanari iriori .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Pitiancayetaqueri pishaninca , pisampitacantaqueri . Ari icamantacotasanotaquero queariotasanotatsiri , icamantaquempi : " Iriotaque Jesoshi Quirishitotatsiri , Itomi Tasorentsi " .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Te oncantimoneentenaji incanterica atiri : " Icameetsati Jesoshi " , iro cantaincha nocoaque pavisacojeitaje , irootaque nocamantantimpirori oca .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Yora Joa iquempevetacaro tsiomentotsi amorecasanotatsiri . Pineajeitavaqueri itsiojeitapaaquempi : tempa oshequi iotacaajeitaquempi . Piquimoshireventajeivetavacari osamani .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Timatsi aisati otsipa iotacaaquempiri , ora anaacotiriri Joa , piotasanotantenari . Apa itiancaquena . Meeca nontsoteeneri icantaquenari . Paitarica nantayetiri narori , irootaque piotantenari itiancaquena Apa .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Aisati icamantacotaquena Apa tiancaquenari . Queario , te pinquemapiniteriji irineanate , aisati te pineapiniteriji jaoca icantari .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Iro cantaincha te pinquemisanteriji itiancane , irootaque caari pishiretantaro irineane .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Pineanatapinijeitaquero Sanquenarentsi , tempa pijitashijeivetaca ariorica pineanatero , pincantaitatiyempani paneajeitanaje . Tempa irootaque camantacotanari .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Iro cantaincha te pincoyeji paventena noaneantajeitajempiri .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: Te oncantimoneentenaji pineacameetsajeitanarica .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Niojeitimpi nainti , te pininteriji Tasorentsi .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Itiancana Apa , irootaque nopocantacari . Iro cantaincha te pineacameetsajeitenaji . Ariorica impocashitempi irinti yora caari itiancane , irioquea pineacameetsajeitavaqueri irinti .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Avisati neacameetsatavacaajeitacha . Aitaque picantajeitari . Iro cantaincha te pincoyeji irineacameetsajeitempi Tasorentsi . Iriotaque Tasorentsi apaniro . 多 Jaoca pincanteari meeca pinquemisantasanoteri ?

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Eiro pijitashitatsi naro camantacotempineri Apaqui : " Ainiro , Apa , yantajeitiri yocapee " . Timatsi pashini camantacotempineri : iriotaque yora Moishishini , incanteri Apa : " Te inquemisantajeiteroji yocapee ora pisanquenatacaaquenari " . 多 Pijivetacampa ari irancacoventaquempi ?

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Arime pinquemisantasanojeiterime Moishishini , aitaque pinquemisantajeitavaquename narori . Isanquenatacotaquena iriori peerani .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Niotaque te pinquemisanteroji isanquenatiniri . 多 Ariompa pinquemisantero nocantimpiri narori ? Irootaque icantajeitiriri Jesoshi joriopee .

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Irosati imonteantanajaro Jesoshi incajare pajitachari Tiveriashi , onta carireaquiniri ; noijajeitanaqueri .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Oshequi catsini oijajeitiriri . Ineacojeitaqueri itasoncacoventajiri joquiitachari , irootaque yoijajeitantanacariri .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Itoncaanaque Jesoshi toncaariqui . Isavicapaaque anta , nocarajeitaqueri itsipapee iroamerepee , notsipajeitanacari .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Irotimataintsi inquimoshirejeitantajeari joriopee . Ipajiyeetiro quitaiteri " Yavisantaniri " .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Yamenanaque Jesoshi . Ineavaqueri oshequi atiri pocashijeitaqueriri , isampitiri Jeripi : - - Jeripi , 多 jaoca amananterori meeca tanta iroajeiteari ashanincapee ?

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: Iro icantashitantacariri , icoaque Jesoshi irineanteari Jeripi . Irinti Jesoshi , iotaque jaoca incanteriri .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Ari yacanaqueri : - - Amanantavetearorica tanta oshequi , ampinaventavetaquearorica 200 tenario , eiro inajeitarotsi . Ariorica ampayevetaqueari capichaji , eiro inajeitarotsi .

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Ari itimi anta pashini iroamere , yora Antirishi . Iriotaque irirenti Shimo Petero . Icantiri :

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: - - Oametanari , jerica aparoni evancari , timatsi itantane apapacoroni . Timatsi aisati ishivajaniquite apite . Iro cantaincha notseencaqueri : tempa oshequi catsini atiri .

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Irosati icantantanacari Jesoshi : - - Poisavicajeiteri maaroni atiri . Ocasaveshiiteaquera . Icarajeitaque 5 , 000 shirampari savicajeitaintsiri .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Irosati yaantacaro Jesoshi tanta . Ipasonquitacotaquero . Ipajeitaqueri savicajeitaintsiri . Aisati iquempetaqueri shivajaniqui , ipajeitaqueri . Aitaque ocarati icoajeitaqueri aitaque ocarati ipaqueriri .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Iquemajeitanaca maaroni . Irosati icantajeitantajari Jesoshi iroamerepee : - - Paajeitajero timaarantapaajantsiri , aparatacari .

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Iquemajeitacaro oca tanta apapacoroni . Yaajeitajiro timaarantapaajantsiri . Itetajiro cantiriqui . Ijaajeitajiro ocarati 12 .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Noneajeitaqueri itasoncaquero tanta , irosati nocantajeitantanacari : - - Iriotasanotaque yoca camantantatsiri aquemacotaqueri , aamaajeiveitaniri peerani .

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Iotavaque Jesoshi impocashijeiterime oajeitainchari iraanaquerime , impeajerime ivincatsarite . Irosati ipeapitsatantanajari . Ijatanaji toncaariqui apaniro .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Ishavijiiteanaque , nocarajeitanajiri itsipapee iroamere , noirincajeitanaja incajarequi ,

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: notejeitapaajaro pitotsi . Notiancajiro nomonteanaje intatiquero , anta Caperenaoqui . Tsitenitasanotanaji , tequeratsita intsipajeitajena Jesoshi .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Opocaque antearo tampea , oquisaatanaca incajare , soooo , irootaque otimantacari antearo omotoncane .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Aitaque nonajeitaque nianquijaqui . Osamani quipatsi , aamaaca ari ocarati 5 quirometero , arioricampa 6 nareetantajeari . Aiquero nocomajeivetaca . Irosati noneantavajari Jesoshi yaniijatapaaji incajarequi , te intsitiaquiiteji . Iquempejitapaajaro pitotsi .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Notsaroajeitanaque . Icantapaajana iriori Jesoshi : - - Narotaque , eiro pitsaroacaajeitanatsi .

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Nocoajeivetanaca nontetavajerime , iro cantaincha noneacotashitapaaca naatacojeitapaaque otsapijaqui , anta nojajeitenta .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Oshaiteji icatiajeitaca atiri intatiqueronta . Ineajeitavajana narori notejeitanaja novitoqui . Te intsipajeitanajena Jesoshi , nainti jajeitajantsi . Tecatsi pashini pitotsi vaatachane anta .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Meeca yareejeivetapaaca tiveriashisati , iquenacotapaaque ivitoqui . Yaatacojeitapaaque quempeji yoacaajeitacarinta oshaiteji tanta . Icoavetapaacari : - - 多 Jaocame Jesoshi ? 多 Jaoca iroamerepee ?

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: irineajeitapaajeriji Jesoshi ; aisati narorijei iroamerejei , te irineajeitapaajenaji . Ari impoiji itejeitanaja atiripee ivitopeequi , ijatacojeitanaji Caperenaoqui , icoajeitapaajiri Jesoshi .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Aitaque ineajeitapaajiriri intatiquero . Icantajeitapaajiri : - - Oametanari , 多 jaoca ocaratiri pareetantajari aca ?

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Yacanajiri : - - 多 Paitasa picoantanari ? Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri : te iro pincoimentena pimpincatsatena , irointiquea picoimentana noacaaquempi oshaiteniji tanta . Meeca picoajeiveta noacaajeitajempi aisati .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Ora ayeari ario ontsoncanaquea . Eiro piquenqueshiretapinitirotsi . Naintiquea pinquenqueshiretasanote nainti , naro materone noaneasanojeitempi pincantaitatiyempani paneasanojeitantapaajeari anta inquitequi . Notimitani inquitequi , itiancaquena Apa quipatsiquica , natiritapaaque noaneajeitantajempiri .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Isampitiri jorio : - - 多 Jaoca noncanteari nantanteanariri inintacaanari Tasorentsi ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Yacanajiri Jesoshi : - - Pinquemisantajeitena : irootaque inintacaajeitimpiri Apa .

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Irosati isampitantanajari : - - 多 Paita ponijayenari nonquemisantantempiri ? Ariorica noneaquempi pintasoncante , ari niotaque queario picantaqueri .

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Peerani yora ashanincani yoajeitaro mana anta caaraiteriqui . Ocanti sanquenarentsi : " Ipeetaqueri yoari yoajeitantarori . Oponeaca inquitequi " . Tempa irio Moishishi pajeitaqueriri , irootaque iojeitantacaniri ashanincani ocameetsati iroijajeiteri .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Icantanajiri Jesoshi : - - Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri . Te irio Moishishini perineri yoajeitari poneainchari inquitequi . Irinti Apa pajeivetacariniri . Meeca icoaveta impempi pashini poajeiteari , cameetsatasanotatsiri , poneachari inquitequi .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Noponeaca narori inquitequi , naniireapaaque quipatsiqui noaneajeiteri maaroni atiri : noshiaquero poyeameri impempimeri Tasorentsi .

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Icantanajiri : - - Irosati pincanteani , novincatsarite , pimpapinitenaro ora noyeari picamantaquenari . Aiquero pimpapinitenaro .

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Icantanajiri iriori : - - Narotaque shiirori oanarontsi aneacantatsiri . Pocashitanari eiro aajiritsi itashe . Quemisantanari eiro imiretajitsi .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Aitaque nocantajeivetaquempi . Pineajeivetaquena , iro cantaincha te pinquemisantenaji .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Yora icantanari Apa : " Pinquempoyeajeitenari " , iriojeitaque pocashitajenaneri . Pocashitapaajenaneri eiro noipiavajiritsi .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Te iro naniireantapeempa nantapeero nonintiri narori , irointi nante inintacaanari tiancanari . Irootaque naniireantapaacari .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Yontapee noquempoyeaqueneri Apa , eiro ipeatsi aparoni . Nontinaajeitajeri omoncaratapeemparica quitaiteri . Irootaque inintacaanari Apa tiancaquenari .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Maaroni neenaneri , ariorica inquemisantena , incantaitatiyempani iraneanaje inquitequi . Nontinaajeitajeri coajicani , omoncaratapeemparica quitaiteri . Irootaque inintacaanari Apa tiancaquenari .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Irosati icantimajeitantanacariri joriopee . Iquemaqueri icantaqueri : " Narotaque shiirori oanarontsi , poneachari inquitequi " , irosati icantimajeitantanacari .

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Icantajeiti : - - Tempa iriotaque Jesoshi , itomi Jose . Tempa aneapinijeitiri iriri , iriniro aisati . 多 Paita icantantari : " Noponeaca inquitequi " ?

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Icantanaqueri iriori Jesoshi :

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: - - Eiro picantimajeitanatsi . Eirome inintacairime Apa tiancaquenari , tecatsi pocashitimatenaneme . Iriotaque nontinaajeri coajicani omoncaratapeemparica quitaiteri .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Isanquenatacotitacarini peerani camantantatsiniri : " Tasorentsi iroamejeitajeri maaroni " . Maaroni quemavaquerori icantiri Apa , iriotavaquerorica , impocashitena noavisacotanteariri .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Noponeanaca Tasorentsiqui , irootaque noneantariri Apa . Tecatsi pashini neerine .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: Queariotaque oca nocantimpiri . Yora quemisantanari incantaitatiyempani iraneajeitanaje inquitequi .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Jero oca icantajeitiri aisati : - - Narotaque oanarontsi aneacaantatsiri .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Yoajeivetacaroni pishanincani mana peerani anta caaraiteriqui , iro cantaincha yanteashipajeitanaque , icamajeitanaque .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Oca oanarontsi noquenquetsatacotiri oponeaca inquitequi . Eiro icamanetajitsi oaquearoneri irinti .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Narotaque shiirori oanarontsi aneatsiri , noponeaca inquitequi . Maaroni oyearoneri oca oanarontsi incantaitatiyempani iraneajeitaje inquitequi . Nompajeiteri maaroni atiri iraneajeitantajeari : irootaque novatsa .

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Irosati icantavacaajeitantanacari joriopee . Icantajeiti : - - 多 Jaoca incanteari yoca impanteerori ivatsa avantearori ?

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Icantajeitiri Jesoshi : - - Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri . Noponeaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Eirorica poarotsi novatsa , aisati eirorica pirirotsi niraja , eiro paneajitsi .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Maaroni oyearoneri novatsa , aisati ireroneri niraja , incantaitatiyempani iraneaje inquitequi iriori . Nontinaajeri coajicani omoncaratapeemparica quitaiteri .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Novatsa irootaque oanarontsisanori . Niraja irootaque ireetasanoyeetiri .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Oyearoneri novatsa aisati ireroneri niraja irosati incantea , quiso iroajena . Aisati nonquempetea narori , quiso noajeiteri .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Aneatsiri ini Apa tiancaquenari : iriotaque oaneaquenari narori . Aisati inquempejeitea iriori oyearoneri novatsa , noaneajeiteri maaroni .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Irootaque oca oanarontsi aniireapaintsiri inquitequi . Te onquempetearoji ora yoajeivetacaniri peerani pishanincani . Tempa icamajeitaque irinti . Yora oyearoneri oanarontsica nocantaquempiri incantaitatiyempani iraneajeitanaje irinti inquitequi .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Aitaque ocanta icantajeitaqueriri Jesoshi anta pancotsiqui yapatojeitantari . Otimi anta Caperenaoqui .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Oshequi catsini quemajeivetavacarori yoamejeivetacariri , irosati icantajeitantanaja : - - Te oncameetsate oca icantiri , tecatsi ancantea anquemisantero .

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Iotashitaca Jesoshi icantimentavacaajeitacaro yora yoamejeivetacari . Icantanajiri :

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: - - Terica oncameetsatimotempi oca nocantaquempiri . Peerani noponeanaca narori inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Coajica pineajeitavajena nompianaje aisati jenoqui . Impoiji , 多 paita pinquenqueshirejeiteri ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Ishire Tasorentsi , irootaque oaneajeitajerineri maaroni savicajeitatsiri inquitequi . Eiro isavicajeititsi maaroni atiri . Oca nocamantaquempiri oshiavetaro Ishire Tasorentsi : ariorica pinquemisantero , ari oaneaquempi inquitequi .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Niotacojeitimpi : timatsi picarajeitica caari quemisantatsine . Peerani iotitari Jesoshi caari quemisantajeitatsine . Aisati iotitacari aacanterineri coajicani .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Icantanaqueri : - - Niotaque te pinquemisantajeitenaji maaroni , irootaque nocantantaquempiri incaranqui : " Eirome inintacairime Apa , tecatsi pocashitenaneme narori " .

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Irosati yojocaarantantanajari oshequi yora yoamejeivetacari . Te meeca iroijajeitanajeriji .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Irosati icantajeitantajanari Jesoshi : - - Noamerepee , 多 aisatimpa pojocajeitanajena avirori ?

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Yacanaqueri Shimo Petero : - - Novincatsarite , eirorica noijatimpitsi , 多 janicampa noijatanajeri ? Incantaitatiyempani iraneajeitanaje inquitequi maaroni quemisantajeitirori pineane .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Noquemisantajeitimpi , niojeitanaquempi ; avirotaque itiancane Tasorentsi , picameetsataque .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Yacanajiri Jesoshi : - - Tempa nocoyeajeitaquempi . Picarajeiti aca 12 , iro cantaincha aparo picarajeitica , iriotaque camaaritajantsineri .

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Iquenquetsatacotaqueri Jorashi Ishicariote , yora itomi Shimo . Ainiroquera icarajeivetana maaroni . Iriotaque aacanterineri Jesoshi coajicani .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Irosati iquenantanaca Jesoshi Carireaqui . Icoaveta joriopee iroyerime , irootaque caari icoanta irijate Joreaqui .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Irotimataintsi inquimoshirejeitanteari joriopee . Irotaintsi irovetsicajeitero pancotsijaniqui inquenqueshirejeitantearori iquenajeitanaque ishanincani caaraiteriqui .

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: Irirentipee Jesoshi icantajeitiri : - - Pijate meeca Joreaqui . Pinijaayetapeeri poamerepee anta paitarica pantayetiri .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Pincoaquerica iriojeitempi maaroni atiripee pinquenaquenayetanaque irineajeitantempiri . Eiro pimanirotsi paitarica pantayeteri . Ariorica pintasoncantayete , pinijaayeteri maaroni atiri .

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Te inquemisantajeiteji irirentipee iriori ,

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: irootaque icantantacariri . Icantajeitanajiri Jesoshi : - - Tequerata omoncarateaji nomatantearori .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Avirojei , pijajeite avinti . Tecatsi incantea atiri inquisajeitempi avinti . Irompa nainti , iquisajeitaquena . Nocamantajeitaqueri : " Te oncameetsateji oca pantayetiri " , irootaque iquishimentaquenari .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Pintoncaajeitanaquetsita avinti Joreaqui . Eirotsita nojatita narori , tequeratsita omoncarateaji nojatanteari .

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Aitaque icantajeitaqueriri Jesoshi . Isavicanaji Carireaqui .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Irinti irirentipee jajeitaintsi Joreaqui , itoncaajeitanaque , tonca , tonca . Iquimoshirejeitapaaque . Impoitanaji iriori Jesoshi , itoncaanaji , iro cantaincha te irinijaantapeempaji : te incoyeji irineeyeteri .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Icanta joriopee iquimoshirejeitanaque . Icoajeivetacari Jesoshi Jerosarequi , icantajeiti : - - 多 Jaoca meeca yoranqui Jesoshi ?

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Apatojeitainchari anta icantavacaajeitanaca . Icantacoyetiri Jesoshi : - - Cameetsari ini . Pashini cantayetaintsi : - - Te incameetsateji , irointi yamatavitiri atiri .

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Iro cantaincha itsaroacaajeitacari atiripee yora jivatacaajeitiriri , irootaque imanacojeitantacarori icantacoyetiriri Jesoshi .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Yovaanajiro aisati iquimoshirejeitanaji . Itoncaanaque Jesoshi iriori ivancoqui Tasorentsi , yoametantapaaji .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Yoajeitanaque cavaco joriopee . Icanti : - - 多 Jaoca icantari iotantarori paitapeerica ? Tecatsi oameterine .

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Yacanaqueri Jesoshi : - - Te naro iotashitearone oca noametimpiri , irinti iotacaanaro yora tiancaquenari .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Pincoasanoterica panteneri inintacaaquempiri , aitaque piotanaque . Piotanaque itiancaquenarica Tasorentsi . Piotanaque noneaveetashitarica .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Yora neaveetashitachari icoi impincatsayeeyeteri iriori . Intimerica coatsiri impincatsayeeyeteri tiancaqueriri , icameetsati iriori ; te irioteji iramatavitante .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: Tempa irootaque icantajeitimpiniri Moishishini peerani : " Jeroca pantayeteri " . Iro cantaincha tecatsi aca matasanojeiteroneri oca icantaquempiniri . 多 Paita pisareantanari poyena narori ?

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Yacajeitanaqueri apatojeitainchari : - - Yoitsaviantaquempi camaari . 多 Janica sareimpiri iroyempi ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Jero aparo notasoncantaque saavaroqui , meeca poajeitanaquena cavaco maaroni .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Icantimpiniri Moishishini : " Pintoyeantea " . Iro cantaincha caari ini Moishishini cantasanotatsine , irintiquea yora intasanotaroniri . Irootaque meeca pitoyeantantacari . Pitoyeantapinita aisati saavaroqui amaoreantari .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Tempa pitoyeantapinita saavaroqui , pimoncaratantarori isanquenatiniri . Irosati saavaroqui noavisacotantariri yora shirampari . Aiquero piquisanaitiana . 多 Paitaquea ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Ariorica pamenavoroteri pishaninca , eiro picantashitatsi : " Cameetsari ini . Yora pashini te incameetsateji " . Pijivateta piotasanoteri , impoijiquea piotanaque paitarica pinquenquetsatacoteriri . Aisati onquempetea , pinquenqueshiretasanotero nocantimpiri piotasanotantenari .

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Irosati icantayetantanaca jerosaresati aparopee : - - 多 Caarimpa yoca icoyeetiri iroyeeteri ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Pameneri meeca , yoametantayeti , te irimaneroji . Tecatsi cantimenterine : " Pimajerete " . 多 Yaamaajeitarimpa avincatsarite iriosanotaque yoca Quirishito ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Iro cantaincha ayotacojeitaqueri arori jaoca iponeacari yoca . Impocasanotapaajerica Quirishito , tecatsi iotacoterine jaoca imponeempari iriori .

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Yoametanti Jesoshi ivancoqui Tasorentsi , icanti : - - 多 Piojeitanampa ? 多 Piotimpa jaoca noponeacari ? Te nompocashiteaji , timatsi tiancaquenari : icameetsatasanotaque catsini . Te pioteriji avinti ,

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: narori niotiri nainti . Iriotaque tiancaquenari , iriotaque noponeimotacari .

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Irosati icoajeitantavetacari iraayerime . Iro cantaincha tecatsi ayerine . Tequeratsita omoncarateaji iraanteeteariri .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: Oshequi apatojeitainchari quemisantajeitaqueriri . Icantayeti : - - 多 Ariorica impocapaaque Quirishito , iranaacotapeerimpa Jesoshi intasoncantayetapee ?

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
