text2: Yora variseopee iquemajeitavaqueri atiri iquenquetsatacojeitaqueri Jesoshi . Irosati itiancantacari variria iraayerime . Iriojeitaque tiancaqueriri jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , variseopee aisati .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Irosati icantantanacari Jesoshi atiri : - - Capichanivaniji nontsipajeitanajempi . Irotanaintsi nompianaje tiancanariqui .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Pincoajeivetajenarica , iro cantaincha eiro pineajanatsi . Jaocarica nosavicapaaje eiro pimatirotsi pijataje avirori .

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Icantanaque jorio : - - 多 Jaocampa irijateri yoca eiro aneantajaritsi ? 多 Ariompa irijatashiteri ashaninca savicayetatsiri pashinipeequi nampitsi ? Irioyeata oamejeitapeerine itsipapee atiri .

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: Jero icantaque : " Pincoajeivetajenarica eiro pineajanatsi . Jaocarica nosavicapaaje eiro pimatirotsi pijataje avirori " . 多 Paita icantantari ?

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: Irootaque quitaiteri ivecaratantarori iquimoshirejeitanaque . Irosati icatiantanaca Jesoshi . Icajemanaque : - - Maaroni miretatsiri impocashitenata irirapeeta ,

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: ontimanteari ishirequi quemisantanari nija oaneantatsiri , oncontejatapaaqueri . Aitaque oquenquetsatacotiro Sanquenarentsi nija nocantaquempiri .

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: Iro ishiacantaqueri nijatatsiri Ishire Tasorentsi , quiso oajeiterine quemisantajeiterine corajicani . Iro cantaincha tequeratsita iroancajeaji Jesoshi jenoqui , irootaque caariquera opocashitantari quemisantajeitatsiri .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Apatojeitainchari ara iquemajeitavaqueri icantaqueriri Jesoshi , irosati icantayetantanaca aparopee : - - Iriotasanotaque yoca camantantatsiri aamaajeitacari .

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Pashini cantayetatsi : - - Iriotaque Quirishito . Pashini cantatsi : - - 多 Ariompa imponeempari Quirishito Carireaqui ?

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Tempa ocanti Sanquenarentsi : " Quirishito irio irishanincatajeari Iravirini . Imponeaquea Verequi , anta isavicaveitani Iravirini peerani " .

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Impoiji icantavacaimentajeitacari Jesoshi .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Timatsi aparopee coayevetachari irayerime , iro cantaincha te irimateroji .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Ipiajeitanaja variria . Yareetapaajari jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , jeri variseopee . Icantajeitavajiri : - - 多 Paitasa caari pamantanari aca ? Nocantavetimpi incaranqui : " Pamaquenari " .

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Cameetsa ineanati yonta shiramparinta . Cameetsa yoametanti , tecatsi pashini quempetearine .

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Icantavaqueri : - - 多 Yamatavitajimpimpa aisati avirori ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: 多 Iquemisantaquerimpa jivatacairiri ashaninca arori ? Te inquemisanteriji . 多 Iquemisantaquerimpa variseo ? Te .

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Yonta atirinta te irionirojeiteroji Sanquenarentsi . Te oncameetsateji impincatsajeiteri Jesoshi : iroasanquejeiteri Tasorentsi .

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Itimaiti ara Nicoremo , ananincashitanaqueriri Jesoshi chapinqui . Itsipatavacaajeita ivariseoririnte , icantanaqueri :

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: - - 多 Paita ocantiri Sanquenarentsi ? 多 Oshinetantampa ancantashitea : " Te incameetsateji Jesoshi " ? Tempa ocameetsati ajivatavaqueri anquemisanteri incantaqueeri . Tempa ocameetsati aisati ajivataque ayote paitarica yantayetaqueri .

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Yacanajiri : - - Aviroyeata avirori carireasati . Pineanatasanotero Sanquenarentsi piotanteari te imponeempaji Carireaqui camantantatsiri .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Irosati ijajeitantanaja maaroni ivancopeequi .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: Yora Jesoshi ijatanaque toncaariqui , ipajiyeetironta Orivomashi .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Oquitaitetamanaque ipiapaaja ivancoqui Tasorentsi . Maaroni atiri ijatashijeitajiri . Isavicapaaji , yoametapaajiri .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Yamajeitapaaqueneri aparoni tsinane , ineetaquero aimentacari ojime . Irio amirori oametantirori Sanquenarentsi , jeri variseopee . Isatecaquero nianqui ,

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: icantapaaqueri : - - Oametantatsiri , ineetaquero oca aimentacari ojime .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Peerani icantini Moishishini ocameetsati ampichanatero aimentariri ojime . 多 Paita picantiri avirori ?

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Ineantavetari , icoajeiveta incomitacayearime , irootaque icantantajeivetariri . Itsentetanaque Jesoshi , isanquenatantanacaro iracotsapaqui quipatsi .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Yapiivetajari : - - 多 Paita picantiri ? Icatianaja Jesoshi . Icantajeitiri : - - Timatsirica picarajeitica meeca caari antiro caari cameetsatatsi , irijivaterota impicheero ; impoiji ari pimpichaajeitero maaroni .

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Yoivotanaja aisati . Isanquenatanaji aisati quipatsiqui .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Maaroni quemajeitavaqueriri , ijajeitanaji . Ijivajeitanaji yora anteashiparipee , impoijeitanajiri iriori maaroni evancaripee , ijajeitanaji . Apanivaniji irinti Jesoshi , jero iroori tsinane . Irosati ocatia ara .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Icatianaja aisati . Tecatsi irineaje , irointi tsinane apaniro . Icantiro : - - 多 Jaoca meeca yoranqui quisajeitaquempiriranqui ? 多 Tempa intimeji quishimentempirone pantiri ?

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Ocantanaqueri iroori : - - Te aneajeriji , novincatsarite , jajeitanaji inaji . Irosati icantantajaro : - - Aisati narori , eiro noquishimentimpirotsi . Pijataje meeca , eiro papiitajirotsi caari cameetsatatsi .

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Ineanatajiri aisati Jesoshi atiri , icantajiri : - - Narotaque iotacaajeitiriri atiripee , oquempetaca noquitaitetacojeitiri . Eiro iquenashiyetanajatsi tsiteniriqui oijajeitenaneri . Queario , naro iotacaajeitiriri atiripee , aisati oaneajeiterineri .

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Irosati icantantanacari variseopee : - - Avisati camantacotashitacha . Irootaque caari otampaticatanta picantayetaqueri .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Yacanajiri Jesoshi : - - Je , narosati camantacotacha , iro cantaincha otampaticati nocantaqueri . Iro otampaticatantacari nioti nainti jaoca noponeacari . Aisati nioti jaoca nojatajeri . Te piojeiteji avinti jaoca noponeacari , aisati te piojeiteji jaoca nojatajeri .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Piquempejeitacari pashinisati atiri : te piojeitenaji , iro cantaincha picantacoventashijeitaquena . Naintiquea , te meeca noncantacoventempiji .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: Iro cantaincha , noncantacoventempime meeca , ontampaticateme noncantacoventempime . Niotaquempi ; aisati quiso yoaquena Apa tiancaquenari , iotaquempi aisati . Nocarataque apite iotasanojeitimpiri .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Tempa ocanti Sanquenarentsi pineanatapinitiri : " Apiterica incarate camantacoterineri ashaninca , ari paamayea queariotaque incanteri " .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Ari nocamantacotaja narosati , icamantacotana Apa tiancaquenari iriori ; apite nocanta .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Icantanaqueri : - - 多 Jaoca meeca piri ? Yacanajiri Jesoshi : - - Te piotenaji . Te piojeiteriji aisati Apa . Ariorica piojeitaquename piotaquerime aisati Apa iriori .

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Irootaque icantajeitaqueriri Jesoshi anta ivancoqui Tasorentsi . Icatianaja anta ipapinijeitirinta Tasorentsi quirequi . Tequera omoncarateaji incamanteari Jesoshi , irootaque caari imatanteetari irayeeteri .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Yapiitajiri aisati : - - Irotimataintsi nojataje . Pincoacoajeivetajena pineajename aisati , iro cantaincha eiro pineajanatsi . Irotaintsi nojataje . Pincoajeivetea poijajeitena , iro cantaincha eiro pimajeitirotsi pijajeitaje nojatajenta narori . Irosati pincanteani pantapinijeitero caari cameetsatatsi irosati pincamanteari , irootaque pijajeitanteari Sharincaveniqui .

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Icantajeitanaque jorio : - - Irisatiyeata oajanchane . Piquemaquerinea icantantari : " Irotaintsi nojataje , eiro pimajeitirotsi pijajeitaje nojatajenta narori " .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Icantajiri Jesoshi : - - Avirojeitaque timajeitatsiri quipatsiquica . Noponeaca nainti jenoqui . Aca quipatsiquica irootaque pisavicantajeitari avirori . Te nosavicasanote narori quipatsiquica .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Irootaque nocantantaquempiri incaranqui : " Irosati pincanteani pantapinijeitero caari cameetsatatsi irosati pincamanteari " . Eirorica piquemisantirotsi nocantaquempiri , irootaque pijatanteari Sharincaveniqui .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Isampitajiri : - - 多 Janicampimpa ? Icantanajiri iriori : - - Aitaque nocamantasanovetaquempi .

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Timatsi oshequi noncamantempimeri ; otimi aisati pantayetiri noncantacoventantempimeri . Iro cantaincha icameetsataque tiancaquenari , timatsi icamantaquenari iriori : irootaque oca novaaqueneriri atiri .

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Te iriojeiteriji joriopee irio iquenquetsatacotaqueri Jesoshi Iriri .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Icantanajiri Jesoshi : - - Ariorica poatiacotaquena , aitaque piojeitanaquenari . Piojeitena noponeanaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Aisati piojeitanaque tecatsi nantashitea nainti . Noneanatiro oca yoametaquenari Apa tiancaquenari ,

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: quiso yoana iriori . Irosati nantiniri narori paitarica inintacaaquenari iriori , irootaque caari yojocantana .

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Aitaque ocantari icantaqueriri . Icarati oshequi quemisantajeitanaqueriri .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Irosati Jesoshi icantajeitantanajari joriopee quemisantajeivetacariri : - - Ariorica pincantaitatiyempani pishiretearo noneane , avirosanojeitaque noamere .

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Aitaque piotavaquero queariotatsiri . Irootaque oipacaacoventajempineri . Eiro itimajitsi peranatajempineri aisati .

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Narojeitaque ishanincani Avaramani . Tecatsi peranatenane . 多 Paitasa picantantanari : " Oimpacaacoventajempi queariotatsiri " ?

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Yacanajiri Jesoshi : - - Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri . Timatsi peranajeitariri maaroni antajeitirori caari cameetsatatsi . Ora caari cameetsatatsi yantapinijeitiri , oshiavetacari peranajeitariri .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Yora peranarontsi eiro icantatiani irisavicasanote ivancoqui peranatariri . Irintiquea itomi ashitarori ivanco incantatiyempani irisavicasanote irinti .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Narotaque itomi Tasorentsi . Ariorica noimpacaacoventajempi , eiro yapiiyeetajimpitsi iromperanayeetajempi .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Niotasanojeitaquempi , avirojeivetaca ishanincani Avaramani . Iro cantaincha te pinquemisanteroji noneane . Irootaque pisareantanari poyena .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Ora icamantaquenari Apa , irootaque nocamantajeitimpiri . Ora icantimpiri pirintajeitari irootaque pantapinijeitiri avirori .

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Nirintajeitacari Avaramani . Icantanajiri Jesoshi : - - Avirome ishanincani Avaramani , aitaque pinquempejeitajearime . Iquemisantini peerani iriori ; pishanincataquearime , pinquempejeitaquearime avirori , pinquemisantajeitaquename .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Narotaque neanavetarori queariotatsiri noquemiriri Tasorentsi . Iro cantaincha pisareajeitana poyena . Te inquempeteaniji irinti Avaramani .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Pantapinijeitiro avinti yantayetiri pirintasanotari . Irosati icantajeitantanacari : - - 多 Pashinimpa ashitana ? Apaniro ini nirintajeitari . Iriotaque Tasorentsi .

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Icantajeitaqueri Jesoshi : - - Irioricame pirintajeiteame Tasorentsi aitaque pinintajeitaquename narori . Te nompocashiteaji ; aitaque noponeacari Tasorentsiqui , iriotaque tiancaquenari .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: 多 Paita caari piotantavacaro nocantimpiri ? Te pimateroji pinquemisantero noneane .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Camaari ini pirintajeitacari . Irootaque picoantajeitacari pantapinijeitiniri inintacaajeitimpiri . Oantatsiri ini peerani : irio nijantirori yoanti . Te inquenqueshireteroji quearioyetatsiri , irootaque caari icameetsatanta . Tseeyari ini , irootaque itseeyantacari . Yashi yoiro itseeya . Iriotaque tseeyacaayetariri atiri .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Irompa nainti nocamantavetaquempiro queariotatsiri , te pinquemisantenaji .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: 多 Timatsimpa aca neaquenari narori nantiro caari cameetsatatsi ? Tempa otampaticati nocantajeitaquempiri . 多 Paitampa caari piquemisantantana ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Maaroni itomintajeitari Tasorentsi , iriojeitaque quemisantajeitirori irineane . Te intomintajeitempiji avirori . Irootaque caari piquemisantantaro irineane .

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Irosati yacantanajari jorio : - - Queariotaque nocantaquempiri . Avirotaque samariasati , yoitsaviantaquempi camaari .

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Yacanajiri : - - Te nontsaviateji . Nopincatsatiri Apa . Irompa avinti te pimpicatsajeiteriji ; pitseencajeitiri avinti .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Te noncoyeji impincatsayeetena nainti . Irintiquea Apa coaintsi impincatsayeetena . Aisati iriotaque cantacoventajeiterineri maaroni tseencajeitanari .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Queariotaque oca nocantimpiri . Quemisantavaquerori noneane eiro icamanetajitsi .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Irosati icantantanajari joriopee : - - Meecaquea niotasanojeitaquempi pitsaviataque . Camaque Avaramani . Aisati camantantatsiniri , camajeitaque iriori . Aiquero picanti : " Eiro icamitsi quemisantajeitirori noneane " .

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: Camaque ashanincani Avaramani . Camajeitaque iriori camantantatsiniri . 多 Arimpa pijipincatsaritashitaca ? 多 Pijivetampa panaacojeitiri maaroni peeraniniri pipincatsaritasanotaque avinti ?

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Yacanajiri Jesoshi : - - Narosatiricame jitashitachaneme nopincatsaritaque , tempa nantsipetearome . Apa , yora picantajeitiri avirori : " Notasorentsite " , iriotaque pincatsaritacaaquenari .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Te piojeiteriji . Nainti niotiri . Ariorica noncantaqueme narori : " Te nioteriji " , aitaque nonquempetaquempime , nontseeyaqueame narori . Irompa niotiri . Noquemisantiro irineane .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Icamantacotaquenani pishanincani Avaramani , icantini : " Coajica ontime quitaiteri noneanteariri Quirishito , irootaque noquimoshiretantacari " . Ari ineaquena , irosati iquimoshiretasanotantanacari aisati .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Icantanaqueri jorio : - - Tequeratsita oncarate pisarintsite 50 . 多 Piniirimpa Avaramani ?

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Icantanajiri Jesoshi : - - Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri . Tequeratsitani intimeni iriori Avaramani , notimitani nainti . Je , noneiri .

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Irosati yaantajeivetanaca mapi , impichaajeiterime . Iro cantaincha ipeapitsajeitanajari ivancoqui Tasorentsi , ineacotashitapaaja jaocarica anta .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Ari iquenanaque anta Jesoshi . Ineapaaqueri aparoni shirampari quitapoajari . Aitaque icantitapaani iroaquera itimapaaque .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Nocarajeitiri iroamerepee nosampijeitiri : - - Oametanari , 多 paitampa itimantapaari quitapoajari ? 多 Irompa yantayetiro caari cameetsatatsi ashitariri iquitapoajatantacari itomi ? 多 Irioricampa yoca antaquerori caari cameetsatatsi iquitapoajatantacari ?

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Yacanaqueri Jesoshi : - - Tecatsi irante , iquitapoajatashitaca . Aisati ashitariri , tecatsi irante . Iro iquitapoajatantacari yoca intasoncacoventantajeariri Tasorentsi . Icoacaajeitaqueri atiri iriojeitanaque queario itasorentsitaque . Ainiroquera meeca oquitaiteti .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Ocameetsatimotana nanteneri meeca tiancanari inintacaanari . Ariorica ontsitenitanaje , tecatsi matajerone irantaveetaje .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Ainiroqueratatsina quipatsiquica narotaque iotacaajeitaqueriri atiri .

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Irootaque icantaqueriri , irosati iquitiojantanacaro quipatsi . Ocajavatsatanaque oca iquitiojaqueri quipatsi , irosati ipatsancajaquitantacari quitapoajari .

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: Icantajiri : - - Pijate anta Shiroequi , pinquivajaquitajantea . Incajare oni Shiroe . Acanti aneanequi arori : Itianqueetiri . Irosati ijatantanaca , iquivajaquitapaaca . Ipiaja , amenanaji ini .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Itimi ara inampiquiniri , aisati yora neapinitiriri yamanantapiniti quirequi . Icantajeitanaque : - - 多 Caarimpa yoca yoranqui savicapinitatsiri amanantapinitatsiri quirequi ?

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Aparopee cantayetanaintsi : - - Iriotaque . Pashini cantayetatsi : - - Caari ini . Shiavetariri ini . Icantanaque iriori : - - Narotaque .

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Icantaqueri : - - 多 Jaoca icanteetajimpiri pamenantajari ?

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Yacanaqueri iriori : - - Yora shiramparinta pajitachari Jesoshi icajavatsataquero quipatsi , ipatsancajaquitantajanaro noquiqui . Icantajana : " Pijate Shiroequi , pinquivajaquitajantea " . Nojatanaque , noquivapaaja ; irosati namenantanaja .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Irosati icantantanajari : - - 多 Jaocariqueame iriori ? Yacanajiri : - - Jaocarica , te nioteji .

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Irootaque saavaro icajavatsatantacarori Jesoshi quipatsi yamenacantajariri quitapoajaveitachaniri . Iro saavaro imaoreanteevetari . Ari yayeetanaqueneri variseopee ,

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: isampitavaqueri : - - 多 Jaoca icantajimpiri ? Icantiri : - - Ipatsancajaquitaquena quipatsi noquiqui , irosati nojatantanaca noquivajaquitaja . Meeca namenanaji .

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Irosati icantantanaca variseo aparopee : - - Yora shirampari yantaveetantaro saavaro . Te imponeempaji Tasorentsiqui . Pashini cantayetatsi : - - Irioricame antayetirori caari cameetsatatsi , eiro imatirome intasoncantayeteme . Irosati icantavacaimentantajeitanacari .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Yapiitajiri isampitajiri : - - 多 Paita pijitiri avirori yora amenacaajimpiri ? Icantanaqueri : - - Nojitiri itiancane Tasorentsi .

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Yora joriopee te irishiretearoji iquitapoajaveitani . Icajemacantaqueri iriri , jero iriniro ,

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: isampitavaqueri : - - 多 Iriotaquempa yoca pitomi picantiriranqui : " Itimapaaque quitapoajari " ? 多 Jaoca icantajari yamenantajari meeca ?

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Yacanaqueri : - - Je , iriotaque notomi . Noneasanotiri yashi yoiro iquitapoajatapaaque .

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: Jaocarica icantajari yamenantajari , te nioteji narori . Te nioteji aisati janicarica amenacaajiriri . Te irijananequitajeji meeca . Pisampiteri iriori . Irisati camantacotajanchane .

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Yora ashitariri itsaroacaacari joriopee , iotaque aitaque yapatotimentajeitacari Jesoshi . Icantajeititaca : " Intimerica cantatsine : ' Iriotaque Jesoshi Quirishito ' , eiro ashinetajiritsi irinti intsipajeitee anquemisantajeite " . Irootaque itsaroajeitantanacari ashitariri ,

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: irootaque icantantanacariri : " Te irijananequitaje meeca notomi . Irio pisampite " .

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Ari yapiitajiri icajemajiri . Icantavaqueri : - - Tasorentsi pimpincatsate . Yora shirampari niojeitiri irio antayetirori caari cameetsatatsi .

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Irosati yacantanacari iriori : - - Irioricampa antayetirori caari cameetsatatsi , te nioteji narori . Apatiro niotaque noquitapoajaveitani , meeca namenanaji .

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Icantanajiri aisati : - - 多 Jaoca icantajimpiri yamenacantajimpiri ?

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Yacanajiri iriori : - - Aitaque nocamantavetaquempi incaranqui , iro cantaincha te pinquemisanteroji piquemavetaquenari . 多 Paita picoantari aisati pinquemajero ? 多 Picoajeitajimpa avirori pimpeajeitajea iroamere ?

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Irosati iquisatsatantanacariri , icantanaqueri : - - Avironirotaque avinti iroamere . Naro nainti iroamerepeeni Moishishini .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Niojeiti iquenquetsatacaaquerini Tasorentsi Moishishini peerani . Irompa yoranqui , te niojeiteriji jaocarica iponeacari iriori .

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Yacanajiri iriori : - - Iriotaque amenacaajanari . Piojeiteriquetite avirori jaocarica iponeacari , irootaque noantanaquempiri cavaco .

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Ayotacojeitiri Tasorentsi , te inquemeriji antayetirori caari cameetsatatsi . Yora quemisantiriri Tasorentsi , antirori inintacaaqueriri , iquemapinitiri irinti .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Te anquemacotapiniteriji amenacayerine timapaatsiri quitapoajari .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Eirome iponeame Tasorentsiqui , tecatsi irimateme .

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Yacanajiri : - - Peerani pitimantapaacari te pincameetsatapeeni . 多 Arimpa picoaque meeca poamejeitena ? Irosati yojocantanajari .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Iquemacotajiri Jesoshi yojocajeitaqueri quitapoajaveitachaniri . Impoiji ineapaajiri aisati , icantapaajiri : - - 多 Piquemisantirimpa Atiritapaintsiri ?

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Ari yacanaqueri : - - 多 Jaoca itimiri , apa ? Nonquemisanteri . Yacanaqueri :

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: - - Tempa narotaque : noponeanaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque . Pineaquena , meeca noneanataquempi .

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Icantanaqueri : - - Noquemisantimpi , Novincatsarite . Itiyeroashitanacari .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Icantiri Jesoshi : - - Irootaque nopocantacari quipatsiqui noncantajeitanteariri atiri jaoca incantajeiteari . Namenacaajeitajeri quitapoajavetachari . Yora amenajeivetachari nonquempetacantajeri quitapoajatatsiri . Pineaquero , niotacaajeiteri caari iojeitatsi ; irinti iovetachari nompeapitsatajeri iotantavetari .

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Yora variseopee itsipajeitacari , iquemajeitavaquero icantaqueriri . Irosati icantajeitantanaca aparopee : - - 多 Jaocampa nocantajeitari narori ? 多 Noquitapoajatimpa ?

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Yacanajiri Jesoshi : - - Pinquitapoajateme , eiro otimime pantane ; iro cantaincha picantajeiveta : " Namenajeiti " , irosati picantani pantapinijeitiro caari cameetsatatsi .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: Aisati yoametanti Jesoshi , icanti : - - Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri . Tempa yoiminqueapinitiri ashitariri irovishate itantoqui iquempoyeantariri . Yora coshitiriri irovishate , te inqueapeeji omoroqui , ainti yataitashitapaaqueri araquerora . Icanti : " Ineanacari ashitariri " .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Intimerica iratirite shentiniriri omoro , ariorica impocapaaque irinti ashitariri , ari irashireavaqueneri , irishineteri iravisanaje . Ariorica inqueashitapaajeri , incajemapeeri ivajiropee , ari impocashijeiteri , eiro itsaroacaavacaritsi . Impoiji iraajeitanajeri anta paashitomashiqui ,

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: irijivatanaqueri . Ari iotsajeititiri irineane , irootaque yoijajeitantariri .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Ariorica incajamaveteari caari ineapiniti , eiro iotsajeititavaqueritsi irineane . Eiro yoijajeitiritsi , aintiquea irishiapitsajeitanaqueri .

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Aitaque ocantari ishiacaaventaqueneriri Jesoshi , iro cantaincha te iriojeitavaqueroji icantavetacariri .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Icantajeitaqueri aisati : - - Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri . Narotaque shiacaventachari omoro tantorentsi iqueapinitantari ovisha .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Maaroni jivajeitaquenari , coshinti ini irinti , coshitantatsiri ; irootaque caari iquemisantajeitantari ovishapee .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Narotaque iqueapinitantari , nareetacaajeiteari maaroni pocashijeitenane . Iriojeitaque avisacotajantsine . Inqueapinijeite , aisati irijatashitapinitero iroyeari .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: Ipocashitiri coshinti icoshiteri ovisha , iroyeri , impoyereeri . Irompa nainti , nopocashitiri naneacaajeiteri oijajeitenaneri , naneacaasanojeitajeri inquitequi .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: Narotaque ashitariri cameetsari , irootaque nocoantacari noncamimenteri novishate .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Te nonquempeteariji oisantiniriri ashitariri . Caari ini ashitariri ovisha . Ariorica irineavaqueri maniti impocapaaque , intsaroanaque , irishiapitsatanaqueri ; irojocanaqueri ovishapee . Irosati iraantapeempariri maniti ovisha , irovarayetapeeri .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Aitaque icantari oisantiniriri irovishate . Te inquenqueshireteriji ovisha , irinti iquenqueshireti quirequi impinayeeteri , irootaque ishiantanacari .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: Narotaque ashitariri cameetsatatsiri . Niotiri novishate . Yora nashijeitacari iojeitaquena iriori .

text: As the Father knoweth me , even so know I the Father : and I lay down my life for the sheep .
text2: Aisati iquempeta Apa , iotaquena ; aisati niotiri narori . Coajica noncamimentajeiteri novishate noavisacotanteariri .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Ainiro aisati pashini , tequerata noviratajeari aca . Iriojeitaque nampatojeitajeri . Ariorica noneanateri iriotsatavaquena , inquempeavacantajeitajeari novishatepee maaroni . Apaniro nashijeitajeari maaroni .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: Aisati icanti Jesoshi : - - Noncamimenteri novishate , irosati naneantajeari . Irootaque inintacaanari Apa .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Tecatsi matashitenaneme iroyename , irointiquea nocoasanotaque noncamimenteri novishate . Noncamavetaquea , aisati nontinaanaje : irootaque inintacaaquenari Apa .

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Aitaque ocantari icantaqueriri Jesoshi . Irosati icantavacaimentajeitanacari joriopee .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: Timatsi icarajeiti oshequi cantayetatsiri : - - Yoitsaviantaqueri camaari . Ishinquiventaitia . 多 Paita piquemisantantariri ?

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Icanti itsipapee : - - Te intsaviateji : tempa cameetsa yoametanti . Caari ini camaari : tempa icavintsaajiri quitapoajari , irootaque yamenacantajariri .

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Iquimoshirejeitaji aisati joriopee Jerosarequi . Iquenqueshiretajiro yoameetsayeetantajaroniri peerani ivanco Tasorentsi . Opariantsitapaaji .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Yaniiveeti Jesoshi anta oveshintsayetacanta otincamipee pancotsi . Iro yovetsicacantiniri peerani Saromoni .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Yapatojeitashitapaacari joriopee . Icantapaaqueri : - - Peerani pimanapitsataquenaro . Pincamantasanotena : 多 avirompa Quirishito ?

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Yacanajiri : - - Aitaque nocamantajeivetaquempi . Iro cantaincha te pinquemisantavaquenaji . Paitarica nomayetaqueri , iriotaque Apa tiancanari matacaaquenarori . Oca nomayetaqueri , irootaque iotacayetempineri narotaque Quirishito .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Aitaque nocantaquempi : " Avirojeitaque caari novishate , irootaque caari piquemisantantana " .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Novishate iquemisantiro noneane . Niojeitiri , aisati iriori , yoijajeitana .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Aitaque naneacaajeitajiri . Incantaitatiyempani iraneanaje inquitequi . Eiro yashinoncaajatsi . Noquempoyeasanotaqueri , oquempetimotaquena najiricaqueri . Tecatsi aapitsatajenarine .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Icantaquena Apa : " Pinquempoyeajenari " . Yanaacojeitiri maaroni itasoncantasanoti , tecatsi aapitsatajerine aisati iriori Apa .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Nomoncaratasanotacari Apa , imoncarataquena iriori .

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Irosati yaantajeivetanaca mapi impichaajeiterime .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Icantanajiri Jesoshi : - - Iriotaque Apa tasoncacaaquenari . Oshequi nonijayetaquempiro . 多 Paita pimpitseimentenari ?

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Icantanajiri : - - Te iro nompitseimentempi pantiri cameetsatatsiri . Aviro shirampari , iro cantaincha pijitasorentsitashitaca , irootaque nompitseimentempiri .

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Yacanajiri Jesoshi : - - Tempa isanquenayeetinirini atiri : " Noncamantajeitempi : ' Avirojeitaque tasorentsitatsiri ' " .

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Yora isanquenatiniri irineane Tasorentsi , icanteetiri : " Tasorentsitatsiri " . Tecatsi ancantero ampashinitajero Sanquenarentsi .

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: Inintacaaquena Apa , irootaque itiancantaquenari aca quipatsiquica . Incaranqui nocantaquempi : " Narotaque Itomi Tasorentsi " . 多 Paita meeca picantantanari : " Pijitasorentsitashitaca " ? Itasoncantaque Apa .

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Terica nonquempeteari eiro piquemisantanatsi .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Irompa noquempetacaririca , pinquemisantajeitena . Eiro piquemisantashitanatsi narori , irointi pinquemisantimentenaro nomayetaqueri . Pinquemisante , piotanteari iquempetaquena Apa . Aisati narori noquempetacari Apa . Piotasanotavaquero .

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Icoasanojeivetanaja aisati irayerime , iro cantaincha ipeimotanacari Jesoshi .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Ari imonteanajaro aisati Jesoshi Jorirani . Ijataji anta intacaronta peerani Joani ivaotisatantaqueni . Aitaque itimapaajiri anta .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Oshequi pocashijeitajiriri aisati . Icantajeitapaaji : - - Te intasoncanteji irinti Joani , iro cantaincha queario oni maaroni icantacotaqueriri Jesoshica .

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Oshequi quemisantajeitavaqueriri Jesoshi anta .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Isaviqui Vetaniaqui shirampari pajitachari Irasaro , yojoquiitaca . Osaviqui aisati ivancoqui iritsiropee : jero Maria , jero Marita .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Chapinqui osaitiri Maria Avincatsarite iitiqui . Iro osaitantari casancajari . Oshetantajari oishi aisati . Ari yojoquiitaca ojariri ,

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: irootaque otiancantacariri camanterine Jesoshi . Arejiqui ijatashitaqueri . Ineantapaacariri icantapaaqueri : - - Novincatsarite , yora Irasaro pinintasanotiri , yojoquiitaca .

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Iquemavaqueri Jesoshi , icantavaqueri : - - Yojoquiivetaca , iro cantaincha eiro icamasanotitsi . Iro yojoquiitantacari , icoaque Tasorentsi impincatsatanteeteariri , aisati impincatsatanteetenari narori .

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Jesoshi inintiro iroori Marita , ireento , jeri ojariri .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Ari iquemacotitacari yojoquiitaca , iro cantaincha apite quitaiteri isavicanaque .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Irosati icantantajana aisati icantajeitiri itsipapee iroamerepee : - - Tsame ampiajeitanaje aisati Joreaqui .

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Nocantanaqueri narori : - - Chapinqui , oametanari , anta impichaaquempime ashanincapee . 多 Ariompa pimpiashitanajeri aisati anta ? Eiro ajatitsi : yoicari .

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Yacanaquena : - - Noshiacantempiro . Icontetapaaque catsirincaiteri , iquitaitetacotapaajee . Ariorica inquianaje , ari ontsiteniiteanaje . Yora aniitatsiri quitaiteriqui , iniiro oquitaiteti quipatsiqui , irootaque caari itsitincanta .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Iro cantaincha itsitincajeita aniitatsiri tsiteniriqui . Iro itsitincantacari , tecatsi quitaitetacoterine .

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Aitaque icantaquenari . Irosati icantantanari : - - Maanaqueyea Irasaro . Nojate meeca noncaocapaajeri .

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Nocantanaqueri : - - Maanaquerica , Novincatsarite , aitaque iravisacotaje .

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Iro cantaincha , irointi iquenquetsatacovetacari Irasaro , icamaque . Narori , nojitashivetaca iro icantaquenari : " Imaashita , irimaoreanteari " .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Irosati icamantasanotantajanari : - - Camanaque Irasaroni .

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Te nontsipatavaqueariji narori . Meeca pinquemisantajeitanaquena , irootaque noquimoshiretantanacari . Tsame amenajeitaiteri .

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Yora Tomashi ipajiyeetiri Tsipari , icantajeitana : - - Tsame aijajeitanaqueri , iroavaqueeta arori .

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Irotimataintsi inampini Irasaro . Niojeitaque icaratacotaque otsipasati quitaiteri yoiminqueantacariri Irasaroni omoroqui imperita .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Ora Vetania oquempejitaro Jerosare , ocarati 3 quirometero .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: Iponeanaca Jerosarequi oshequi joriopee pocashitirori Marita , jero Maria . Icantapaaquero : - - Eiro poashiretacoshirearitsi pijaririni .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Oquemacotavaqueri Marita quempejitapaaque Jesoshi . Osoquijanaque , ojataque otonquiotavacari . Irointi Maria , ainiro osaviqui pancotsiqui .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Ocantavaqueri Marita Jesoshi : - - Ariorica pintimaiteme aca , Novincatsarite , eiro icamime jaijini .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Niotaque meeca paitarica pincanteriri Tasorentsi aitaque inquemisantaquempi .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Icantanaquero Jesoshi : - - Aitaque intinaaje pijaririni .

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Ocantanajiri aisati : - - Ariorica omoncaratapaaquea intinaajeitantanajeari camajeitaintsiri , aitaque intinaanaje iriori jaijini . Niotaquero .

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Icantanajiro : - - Narotaque tinaajeitajerineri camajeitaintsiri , oaneajeitajerineri aisati . Incamajeivetaquea quemisantanari , iro cantaincha iraneanaje aisati .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Maaroni aneajeitatsiri , inquemisantenarica iriori , eiro icamasanotitsi . 多 Pishiretacarompa oca nocantaquempirica ?

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Ocantanajiri : - - Je , Novincatsarite , niotaquempi , avirotaque Quirishito , Itomi Tasorentsi pocaintsiri quipatsiquica .

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Irosati opiantanaja ocajemiro ireento . Ocamantatsatapaaquero : - - Areetapaaca Oametantatsiri , icajemacantaquempi .

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Ocantiro : - - Ari . Intsipaite ocatianaca , ojatashitanaqueri Jesoshi .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Tequeratsita irareetea iriori nampitsiqui . Ainiroqueratatsi anta oneaitirinta Marita .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Ari ineajeitavaquero quivantajeitirori ojatanaque , irosati yoijajeitantanacaro . Ijijeivetaca ario ojateri omoroqui yoiminqueetaquerinta ojaririni . Aisati ijijeitiro ojate iraacotajeari aisati anta .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Ari oneapaaqueri Jesoshi , ojatashitiri , otiyeroashitapaacari . Ocantapaaqueri : - - Ariorica pintimaiteme aca , Novincatsarite , eiro icamime jaijini .

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Ineavaquero Jesoshi iraimotapaacari . Iraajeitaca joriopee tsipajeitarori . Irosati icantashiretantanacari iriori Jesoshi , yoashiretanaca .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Icantanaque : - - 多 Jaoca poaqueriri ? Icantanaqueri : - - Anta , Novincatsarite , noaqueri omoroqui . Tsame pamenaiteri .

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Iraapaaca Jesoshi iriori . Irosati icantantanaca jorio : - - Pineaqueri , oshequi inintasanovetarini .

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Timatsi aparopee cantatsiri : - - 多 Caarimpa yoca amenacaajiriri quitapoajari ? Intimeme aca , 多 eirompa aisati yoavisacotajirime Irasaroni , eiro icamime ?

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Icantashiretasanotanaji Jesoshi aisati . Iquempejitapaacaro omoro , ora imorotashiyeetaqueriri imperitaqui . Yashitacoyeetantacari mapi .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Icantapaaque Jesoshi : - - Pintivironcajero mapica . Ocantanaqueri Marita : - - Novincatsarite , otsipasatitanaque quitaiteri icamantacari . Shititanaque .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Icantanajiro : - - Tempa nocantaquempi : " Pinquemisantaquenarica aitaque pineaquero intasoncante Tasorentsi " .

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Irosati itivironcanteetajaro mapi . Yamenanaque Jesoshi jenoqui , icantanaque : - - Ariove , Apa , niotaque piquemaquena .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Niotaque irosati picanta piquemapinitana . Jeri oshequi catiimojeitanari . Nocoaque iriojeite pitiancaquena , irootaque noquenquetsatacantimpiri .

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Irosati icajemasanotantanaca : - - Irasaro , pintinaanaje , pimpocaje .

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Irosati isoquijantanaja camavetainchari . Ora chapinqui yoisotanteetavacariri tocoyatsa : iracoqui , iitiqui , maaroni . Ipashicavorotanteetavacariri paanio . Icantiri Jesoshi : - - Poisoreajeri , pishineteri irijataje .

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Joriopee , yora tsipajeitacarori Maria , ineacojeitaqueri Jesoshi . Oshequi quemisantajeitanaqueriri ;

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: itsipapee ijatashitaqueri variseopee , icamantacotapaaqueri Jesoshi .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Yora jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , jeri aisati variseo , yapatojeitaqueri pincatsaripee oametavacaajeitainchari . Icantavacaajeitaca : - - 多 Paita antajeiteri ? Yora shirampari oshequi itasoncantapinitaque .

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Ariorica ashinetajeri aisati , ario inquemisantajeitanaqueri maaroni atiri ; impoiji ipocashijeiteecari oromasati , itireayetirocari ivanco Tasorentsi . Ipoyereajeiteecari , maaroni .

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Itsipajeitari anta Caijashi iriori . Meeca osarintsi ipincatsariventiri saserotepee . Icantanaque iriori :

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: - - Tecatsi piojeite avinti . Te pinquenqueshireempaji . Pamenajeite : ocameetsatimojeitee incameta shiramparinta aparoni , iroavisacojeitantajeeri eiro apoyereajeitantatsi .

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Te incantashitearoji oca . Iriotaque pincatsariventajeitiriri maaroni saserotepee . Yoametiri Tasorentsi , iotantacari incamimentajeiteri Jesoshi maaroni joriopee .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Te apaniro incamimentajeiteri joriopee , irointi incamimenteri maaroni atiri intomintajeiteari Tasorentsi . Inashijeiveta , isavicajeiti nampitsipeequi arejipeequiniri , iro cantaincha incamimenteri irampatojeitanteariri maaroni .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Irosati isareajeitantacariri iroyeri Jesoshi .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Irootaque caari meeca iquenapinitantaja Jesoshi anta yoshequitinta joriopee , te ironijaapeempariji . Ijatanaji quipatsiqui pajitachari Ejerai , otsapitapaacanta caaraiteri . Aitaque isavicapaajiri , icarajeitana , aisati maaroni itsipapee iroamerepee .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Irotimataintsi Yavisantaniri , inquimoshirejeitanaque noshanincapee . Meeca itoncaajeitanaque Jerosarequi iroameetsatantajeari , inquemisantanteariri Tasorentsi . Ijajeitanaque maaroni savicajeitatsiri jaocarica ,

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: icoajeitapaajiri Jesoshi . Iqueajeitapaaque ivancoqui Tasorentsi , icantavacaajeitapaaja : - - Paamaaca , 多 ari impoque Jesoshi ? Eirorica ipoquitsi iriori inquemisante .

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Aitaque icantacantaque jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee , jeri variseopee : - - Piotaqueririca jaocarica inaqueri Jesoshi , pincamantenata . Icoajeitanaque iraacanteri .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Ocaranivani 6 quitaiteri inquimoshireventearo Yavisantaniri . Yareetaja Jesoshi Vetaniaqui , anta isaviquinta Irasaro camavetainchari : yora yoitinaajiri Jesoshi , yoaneajiri .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Aitaque icarajeitiri Irasaro Jesoshi , yoajeita . Marita irootaque amacoyetiniriri yoari .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Maria amaqueneri Jesoshi casancajari , cameetsajatasanotatsiri . Opinatasanotaca . Quejitsi oni , ojaacaro voteyajaniqui . Osaitiri iitiqui , irosati oshetantajari oishi . Otimanaque ojencaare , otsoteanaquero maaroni pancotsi .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Ari itimaiti ara Jorashi Ishicariote . Iroamere Jesoshi inaveta , iriotaque aacanterine coajicani . Icantanaque :

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: - - 多 Paitampa caari pipimantantaro casancajarica ? Opinaveta 300 tenario , ampayetajerimeri iriori ashinoncaincari . Paparajatashitacaro maaroni .

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Icantashita : te irineshinoncateriji ashinoncaincari . Iquempoyeajeivetanari noirequite maaroni , iro cantaincha coshinti ini . Ari icoshitaarantitavajanari , irootaque iquishimentantarori te omperiji ovinaro casancajari .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Icantiri Jesoshi : - - Oncanteata . Iotaque noncame , irootaque osaitantanari tequeratsita noncame .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Incantaitatiyempani incarajeitempi ashinoncaincari , ari pineshinoncatapinitatiyerini . Irompa nainti eiro nocantatiani noncarajeitempi . Eiro osamanitajitsi pineshinoncatantajenari aisati .

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Oshequi jorio quemacojeitajiriri Jesoshi itimapaaji anta , ijatashijeitanaqueri . Aisati ijatashijeitanaqueri irineeri Irasaro , yora camavetainchari yoitinaajiri .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Isareajeitacari jivatacaajeitiriri saserotepee iroyeri aisati Irasaro .

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: Oshequi joriopee neacojeitaqueriri Jesoshi yoitinaajiri Irasaro , irootaque yojocajeitantanajarori iquemisantavetari saserotepee , iquemisantajeitantajariri Jesoshi irinti .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Oquitaitetamanaji aisati . Oshequi catsini pocaintsiri inquimoshirejeite . Iquemacojeitajiri Jesoshi impoque Jerosarequi .

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Ari ijajeitanaque itonquiojeitavacari . Yaajeitaqueneri tsiaroshi . Icajemajeiti : - - Jeri yoca oavisacotajeeneri , icameetsatasanoti . Iriotaque itiancane Avincatsarite . Iriotaque yoca pincatsariventajeitajerine ashanincapee , maaroni .

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Ineapaaqueri Jesoshi aparo voro caariquera iquijacoyeeta . Iriotaque iquijacotapaacari . Aitaque peerani isanquenatacotitari :

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: " Savicajeitatsiri Sioniqui , eiro pitsaroashitatsi . Jeri yoca pocaintsiri , iriotaque pincatsariventajeitempine ; iquijacotapaacari vorojaniqui " .

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Tequeratsita niotacojeiteri oca isanquenatacotitacariniri peerani : ijatanaji Jesoshi jenoqui , impoijiquea noquenqueshireajeitanaquero . Aitaquequea imoncarataquero maaroni isanquenatacotitacariniri .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Ari chapinqui icajemiri Irasaro : " Pincontetapaaje " , ari icontetapaaji . Camasanovetainchari , iro cantaincha yoitinaajiri : nocarajeiti oshequi neacojeitiriri , impoiji nocamantacojeitaquero ora noneajeitaqueri .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Ari iquemacojeitaqueri atiri itasoncantayeti Jesoshi , irootaque ijatashijeitantacariri itonquiojeitavacari .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Icantavacaajeitanaca variseo : - - Pineaquero , tecatsi ancantanirojeiteri . Yoijajeitaqueri maaroni atiri .

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Itoncaajeitanaque Jerosarequi oshequi atiri inquimoshirejeite , inquemisantajeite . Icarajeitiri pashinisatipee atiri , iroaquera peajancha jorio .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Ijatashijeitapaaqueri iriori Jeripi , yora vetsairasati . Otimi Vetsaira Carireaqui . Icantapaaqueri : - - Apa , nocoi noneeri Jesoshi .

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Jeripi ijatashitanaqueri icamantaitiri Antirishi . Irosati ijatantanaja apite , icamantiri Jesoshi .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Icantavaqueri : - - Noponeanaca inquitequi , natiritapaaque ; irotaintsi meeca impincatsayeetena .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Queariotaque oca noncamantempiri . Ariorica ompariye quipatsiqui apaitsoquiro tirico , eirorica otijatsi , irosati oncantea : apaitsoquiro onapaaque . Irompa ontijaquearica , ari oshiocanaque , oshequiasanotanaque aisati oitsoqui .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Timatsi atiri quempoyeavetachari irisati , te incoyeji irashinoncayea , yatsipetashitaca iquempoyeaca irisati ; eiro yaneasanotajitsi inquitequi iriori . Irintiquea caari quempoyeacha irisati meeca , incantaitatiyempani iraneanaje irinti inquitequi .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Maaroni coatsiri irantayetenaro nocoacairiri , iroijatenata ; incarajeitenaya jaocarica nontimeri narori .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: Aisati impinateri Apa . Meeca noquenqueshiretanaca . 多 Paita noncanteriri meeca Apa ? 多 Noncanterimpa : " Apa , irotaintsi iroashinonqueetena , poavisacotena " ? Eiro nocantiritsi . Irootaque nopocantacari quipatsiqui nonquematsicatearo meeca . Irosati iquenquetsatacantacariri iriri : - - Apa , nocoaque impincatsajeitempita atiripee , irineacameetsajeitempita . Irosati noquemajeitantacariri Apa anta inquitequi , icanti : - - Aitanaque niotacaajeitiri nopincatsaritasanotaque . Coajica niotacaajeitajeri aisati .

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Ari iquemajeivetavacari catiajeivetainchari , iro cantaincha te iriotasanotavaqueroji . Icantashijeitanaca : - - Otirei . Pashini cantayetanaintsi : - - Ineanatiri inampire Tasorentsi .

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Icantiri Jesoshi : - - Te naro iroamete : avirojeivetaca avinti yoamejeivetaca .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Meecaquea incantacoventajeiteri maaroni tseencantayetatsiri : " Ainiro pantane , aitaque noasanquetimentempiro " . Meeca aisati irojoqueri Apa yora pincatsariventajeitiriri tseencantatsiri .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Irotaintsi iroatiacoyeetena , irosatiquea nampatojeitanteariri maaroni atiri , impocashijeitena .

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Irootaque icantaqueriri Jesoshi . Icamantitacari jaoca incanteari incamanteari coajicani .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Yacanaqueri atiri : - - Oamejeitee Sanquenarentsi : " Irosati incantaitatiyempani Quirishito iranee " . 多 Paita picantiri ? 多 Paita picantantarori avirori : " Iroatiacoyeetaqueri Atiritapaintsiri " ? 多 Janicampa yora Atiritapaintsiri camatsineri ?

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Yacanajiri Jesoshi : - - Ainiroquera oquitaiteti , iro cantaincha eiro meeca osamanitajitsi ontsitenitantajeari . Paniitanaque meeca , omapoquimpicari tsiteniri . Ariorica paniitanaje tsiteniriqui , eiro piotitsi jaocarica pinquenanajeri .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Ainiroquera noquitaitetacotimpi , niotacaimpi ; picoaquerica pinquemisantena , pinquemisantenata meeca . Impoiji pinquempejeiteri pishanincapee : pinquitaitetacoteri , piotacaajeiteri iriori . Irosati ijatantanaja , imanapitsatanajari .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Ineajeivetacari oshequi atiri itasoncantayeti Jesoshi , iro cantaincha te inquemisantajeitavaqueriji .

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Imoncarajeitaquero isanquenatacotitacaniri peerani Isayashini : " Novincatsarite , eiro ishequitasanotitsi quemisantavaqueroneri ora ancamanteriri . Irineajeivetempi pintasoncante , iro cantaincha eiro iquemisantimpitsi " . Camantantatsiniri inaveitani Isayashini .

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Icantitacani aisati : " Yora Tasorentsi inquitapoajatacayeri tseencajeitiriri , impeitaqueri iquenqueshireantavetari . Icanti : ' Ineicari . Ioticari . Yaventanacari . Noavisacotiricari ' " . Irootaque caari imajeitantaro tseencantatsiri inquenqueshireempa .

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Peerani ineaqueri Isayashini ishipaquireaque Avincatsarite , impoiji iquenquetsatacotiri .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Aisati oshequi jivatacaajeitiriri joriopee , iquemisantajeivetanacari Jesoshi . Iro cantaincha itsaroacaajeitacari variseopee , irootaque caari icamantantari ishaninca : " Noquemisantiri Jesoshi " . Iquenqueshireti : " Iquishimentanaricari noquemisantiri Jesoshi , eiro ishinetanatsi nampatojeiteari noshaninca nonquemisantajeite " .

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: Yora variseopee icoapinijeiti irineacameetsajeiteri atiri , te irio incoye irineacameetsateri Tasorentsi irinti .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Irosati icajemantanaca Jesoshi : - - Maaroni quemisantanari , te naro inquemisantasanote , irintiquea iquemisantasanotaque tiancaquenari .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Maaroni neaquenari , irinti ineaque aisati tiancaquenari .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Irootaque nopocantacari nonquitaitetacoteri atiri , niotacaasanojeiteri . Yora quemisantanari , eiro yatsipetajaro intimaje tsiteniriqui ; tempa ioyetaque .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Yora quemayevetacarori noneane : eirorica iquemisantiro , eiro noasanquetiritsi nainti . Te iro nompocantea quipatsiquica noasanquetaayeteri atiri , irointi nopocanta noavisacojeiteri .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Maaroni tseencaquenari , caari quemisantiro noyenquetsare , timatsi oasanquetaajeiterineri coajicani . Jero oca noneane nocantavetacari : coajica omoncaratapeemparica , iroasanquetimenteri itseenquiro noneane . Te noneaveetashiteaji .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Apa tiancaquenari , iriotaque cantavaquenari : " Iroyea oca pineanatapeeri . Jero oca pincantapeeriri " .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Yora quemisantavaquerori irineane Apa , incantaitatiyempani iraneanaje inquitequi . Niotaquero oca . Oca nocantaquempiri , nomoncarataquero icantaquenari Apa .

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Tequeratsita inquimoshireventajeitajearo Yavisantaniri . Aitaque iotaque Jesoshi omoncarataca irojocantanajearori quipatsica , impiantanajeari iririqui . Icantatiani inintajeitaqueri yashijeitacari quipatsiquiniri . Meeca inintasanojeitiri .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Ari noajeitaca , notsipajeitacari Jorashi Ishicariote , yora itomi Shimo . Iquenqueshireacaacari camaari iraacanteri Jesoshi coajicani .

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: Iotaque Jesoshi itiancaqueri Iriri impincatsariventajeiteri maaroni atiri . Iotaque aisati iponeaca Tasorentsiqui , impiashitanajeri aisati .

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Ari yoacaajeitaquena Jesoshi , impoiji icatianaca . Yojoquireaquero yoicoro . Ishiticatsaquitanacaro ishevorotantari .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Irosati isantacaro nija metaroqui , irosati iquivantajeitaquenarori noitipee : narori , aisati itsipapee iroamerepee . Iro ishetantajanarori noiti ishevorotantari .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Irovetaincha inquivaquiitapeerime iriori Petero , icantavaqueri : - - Tempa avirotaque Novincatsarite , te oncameetsateji pinquivenaro noiti narori . Oncameetsateme nonquivempirome piiti avinti .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Yacanaqueri Jesoshi : - - Te piotacoteroji meeca oca nantaquempiri . Aitaque piotajero coajicani .

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: Icantanaqueri : - - Eiro piquivanarotsi noiti catsini . Yacanaqueri : - - Eirorica noquivimpirotsi piiti , eiro aquempeavacaatsi coajicani .

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Irosati icantantacariri : - - Jentsite , Novincatsarite , pinquivenaro noitipee , naco , noito , maaroni .

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: Icantanajiri Jesoshi : - - Eiro yapiitajatsi inquivajea caajeitaintsiri . Quitejeivetaquempi avinti , iro cantaincha te pinquitejeiteji maaroni .

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: Iotaque Jesoshi janica aacanterineri . Irootaque icantantacari : " Te pinquitejeiteji maaroni " .

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: Itsoncajeitaquena iquivajeitaquenaro noiti maaroni . Iquitsaatajaro aisati yoicoro . Aisati isaviquimojeitajana , icantana : - - 多 Piojeitaquempa meeca paita nantantayetarori ocapee ?

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Tempa picantapinijeitana : Oametantatsiri , aisati Pincatsari . Queariotaque oca picantaquenari . Narotaque oamejeitimpiri , pincatsariventajeitimpiri .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Pineaquena meeca , noquivajeitaquempiro piiti . Aitaque pinquempetavacaajeiteari avirori , pinquivavacayea piitiqui .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Naro onijaaquempirori . Aitaque meeca pinquempejeitavacayea avirori , pinquivavacaajeitea .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Queariotaque oca nocantimpiri . Inampire te iranaacoteriji nampitariri impincatsarite . Aisati itiancane eiro yanaacotiritsi impincatsarite yora tianquiriri .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Ariorica piquemavaquero oca noametimpiri , pimataquero nocoacaimpiri pinquimoshirejeitanteari .

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: Timatsi meeca aparoni nocamantacotasanotiri , te maaroni nonquenquetsatacotempiji . Nocoyeajeitaquempi , tempa niojeitaquempi . Ainiro Sanquenarentsi caariquera moncaratacha , ocanti : " Yora oacotaquenari notantane , iraacantena " .

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Aitaque nocamantitajeitaquempi tequeratsita irayeetena . Ariorica piotaque omoncarataca nocantimpiri , aitaque pishiretearo naro nainti isanquenatacotitaniri .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Queariotaque oca nocantimpiri . Ariorica iraacameetsayeetavaqueri notiancane , aisati narori , iraacameetsatena . Ariorica iraacameetsatavaquena narori , aisati inquempeteri iriori tiancanari , iraacameetsateri .

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Irosati yoashiretantanaca Jesoshi , icamantajeitana : - - Queariotaque oca noncamantajeitempiri . Timatsi aca aacantenaneri .

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Ari namenavacaajeitanaca , te nioteji janicarica icantacotaqueri .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Narotaque iroamere inintasanotiri Jesoshi , ainirona narori , notiinatacari inejiqui .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: Ijicotaquena Shimo Petero , icantana : - - Pisampiteri . 多 Janica iquenquetsatacotiri ?

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Irosati notiinatasanotantanacariri aisati inejiqui Jesoshi . Nosampitaqueri : - - Novincatsarite , 多 janicampa aacantempine ?

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Yacanaquena : - - Ariorica novincaquero tantaca , yoca nompaqueri , iriotaque aacantenaneri . Irosati yovincantanacaro tanta , ipaqueri .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Irosati iquenqueshiretacaantacariri Satanashi Jorashi iraacaanteri Jesoshi . Icantanaqueri Jesoshi : - - Ora piquenqueshiretiri panteri , pimateroqueti .

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: Yora oajeitainchari ara te iriotavaqueroji icantaqueriri .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
